analyzed: śrī gaṇeśāya namaḥ
tatra ādime dvitīya aṃśe pretakāṇḍaḥ dharmakāṇḍa nāmā ārabhyate
om namaḥ bhagavate vāsudevāya
nārāyaṇam namaskṛtya naram ca eva narottamam

original: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayamudīrayet // GarP_2,1.Mang //
analyzed: devīm sarasvatīm ca eva tatas jayam udīrayet
veda skandhaḥ purāṇa śākhā āḍhyaḥ
jayati
naimiṣe nimiṣa kṣetre śaunaka ādyāḥ muni īśvarāḥ
karmaṇām antare sūtam su āsīnam idam abruvan
sūta jānāsi sakalam vastu vyāsa prasādataḥ

original: tena naḥ sandihānānāṃ sandehaṃ chettumarhasi // GarP_2,1.3 //
analyzed: tena naḥ sandihānānām sandeham chettum arhasi
yathā tṛṇa jalaukā iti nyāyam ā śritya kañcana
dehinaḥ kecid tu evam vadanti hi
kecid punar yātanānām yāmīnām upabhogataḥ
paścāt deha antara prāptim vadanti kimu tatra sat
sūtaḥ uvāca

original: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ mahābhāgāḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ bhavatāṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: sādhu pṛṣṭam mahābhāgāḥ śṛṇudhvam bhavatām punar

original: sandeho nopapadyeta lokārthaṃ kila pṛcchatām // GarP_2,1.6 //
analyzed: sandehaḥ nā upapadyeta loka artham kila pṛcchatām
tat aham kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāda dvārakam dvijāḥ
apākariṣye sandeham bhavatām bhāvitātmanām

original: namaḥ kṛṣṇāya munaye ya enaṃ samupāśritāḥ /
analyzed: namaḥ kṛṣṇāya munaye ye enam samupāśritāḥ
añjas taranti saṃsāra sāgaram ku nadīm iva
ekadā vainateyasya lokānām lokana spṛhā

original: babhūva so 'tha babhrāma teṣu nāma harergṛṇan // GarP_2,1.9 //
analyzed: babhūva saḥ tha babhrāma teṣu nāma hareḥ gṛṇan
sa pātālam bhuvam svargam bhrāntvā a labdha śama āśayaḥ
loka duḥ khena ati duḥ khī punar vaikuṇṭham āgamat

original: na rajo na tamaścaiva sattvaṃ tābhyāṃ ca miśritam /
analyzed: na rajaḥ na tamaḥ ca eva sattvam tābhyām ca miśritam

original: yatra pravartate naiva sattvameva pravartate // GarP_2,1.11 //
analyzed: yatra pravartate na eva sattvam eva pravartate

original: na yatra māyā nāśaśca na cai rāgādayo malāḥ /
analyzed: na yatra māyā nāśaḥ ca na rāga ādayaḥ malāḥ
śyāma avadātāḥ su rucaḥ śatapatra vilocanāḥ
sura asura arcitāḥ yatra gaṇāḥ viṣṇoḥ supeśasaḥ
piśaṅga vastra ābhāraṇāḥ maṇi yuj niṣka bhūṣitāḥ
catur bhujāḥ kuṇḍalinaḥ maulinaḥ mālinaḥ tathā
bhrājiṣṇubhiḥ vimānānām paṅkibhiḥ ye mahātmanām
dyotante dyotamānānām pramadānām ca paṅktibhiḥ
śrīḥ yatra nānā vibhavaiḥ hareḥ pādau mudā arcati
harim gāyati dolā stham gīyamāna ālibhiḥ svayam

original: dadarśa śrīhariṃ tatra śrīpatiṃ sātvatāṃ patim // GarP_2,1.16 //
analyzed: dadarśa śrī harim tatra śrīpatim sātvatām patim
jagatpatim yajñapatim pārṣadaiḥ pariṣevitam
sunanda nanda prabala arhaṇa mukhyaiḥ nirantaram
bhṛtya prasāda su mukham āyata aruṇa locanam

original: kirīṭinaṃ kuṇḍalinaṃ śriyā vakṣasi lakṣitam // GarP_2,1.18 //
analyzed: kirīṭinam kuṇḍalinam śriyā vakṣasi lakṣitam
pīta aṃśukam catur bāhum prasanna hasita ānanam
abhyarhaṇa āsana āsīnam tābhiḥ śaktibhiḥ āvṛtam
pradhāna puruṣābhyām ca mahatā ca ahamā tathā
ekādaśa indriyaiḥ ca eva pañcabhūtaiḥ tathā eva ca
sva rūperamamāṇam tam īśvaram vinatā sutaḥ
tad darśana āhlāda yuta svāntaḥ hṛṣyat tanūruhaḥ
locanābhyām aśru muñcan prema magnaḥ nanāma ha
nama āgatam natam svīya vāhanam viṣṇuḥ abravīt
bhūmiḥ kā laṅghitā pakṣin tvayā iyantam anehasam
garuḍaḥ uvāca
tava prasādāt vaikuṇṭha trailokyam sacarācaram
mayā vilokitam sarvam jagat sthāvara jaṅgamam

original: bhūrlokātsatyaparyantaṃ puraṃ yāmyaṃ vinā prabho // GarP_2,1.24 //
analyzed: bhūrlokāt satya paryantam puram yāmyam vinā prabho
bhūrlokaḥ sarva lokānām pracuraḥ sarva jantuṣu
mānuṣyam sarva bhūtānām bhukti mukti ālayam śubham

original: ataḥ sukṛtināṃ loko na bhūto na bhaviṣyati // GarP_2,1.26 //
analyzed: atas su kṛtinām lokaḥ na bhūtaḥ na bhaviṣyati

original: gāyanti devāḥ kila gītakāni dhanyāstu ye bhāratabhūmibhāge /
analyzed: gāyanti devāḥ kila gītakāni dhanyāḥ tu ye bhārata bhūmi bhāge

original: svargāpavargasya phalārjanāya bhavanti bhūyaḥ puruṣāḥ suratvāt // GarP_2,1.27 //
analyzed: svarga apavargasya phala arjanāya bhavanti bhūyas puruṣāḥ sura tvāt
pretaḥ kasmāt pañcaratnam mukhe katham

original: adhastāccālitā darbhāḥ pādau yāmyāṃ vyavasthitau // GarP_2,1.28 //
analyzed: adhastāt cālitāḥ darbhāḥ pādau yāmyām vyavasthitau
kimartham putra pautrāḥ ca tasya tiṣṭhanti ca agratas

original: kimarthaṃ dīyate dānaṃ godānamapi keśava // GarP_2,1.29 //
analyzed: kimartham dīyate dānam go dānam api keśava
bandhu mitrāṇi amitrāḥ ca kṣamāpayanti tat katham

original: tilālohaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca karpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā // GarP_2,1.30 //
analyzed: hiraṇyam ca karpāsam lavaṇam tathā
saptadhānyam kṣitiḥ gāvaḥ dīyante kena hetunā

original: kathaṃ hi mriyate janturmṛto vai kutra gacchati // GarP_2,1.31 //
analyzed: katham hi mriyate jantuḥ mṛtaḥ vai kutra gacchati

original: ativāhaśarīraṃ ca kathaṃ hi śrayate tadā /
analyzed: ativāha śarīram ca katham hi śrayate tadā

original: śavaṃ skandhe vahetputro agnidātā ca pautrakaḥ // GarP_2,1.32 //
analyzed: śavam skandhe vahet putraḥ agni dātā ca pautrakaḥ
ājyena abhyañjanam kasmāt kutas eka āhuti kriyā

original: vasundharā kimarthaṃ ca kutaḥ strīśabdakīrtanam // GarP_2,1.33 //
analyzed: vasundharā kimartham ca kutas strī śabda kīrtanam
yama sūktam kimartham ca udīcyāḥ diśam āharet
pānīyam eka vastreṇa sūrya bimba nirīkṣaṇam
yava sarṣapa dūrvāḥ tu pāṣāṇe nimba patrakam

original: vastraṃ naraśca nārī ca vidadhyādadharottaram // GarP_2,1.35 //
analyzed: vastram naraḥ ca nārī ca vidadhyāt adhara uttaram

original: annādyaṃ gṛhamāgatya na bhoktavyaṃ janaiḥ saha /
analyzed: annādyam gṛham āgatya na bhoktavyam janaiḥ saha

original: navakāṃścaiva piṇḍāṃśca kimarthaṃ dadate sutāḥ // GarP_2,1.36 //
analyzed: navakān ca eva piṇḍān ca kimartham dadate sutāḥ

original: kimarthaṃ catvare dugdhaṃ yātre pakve ca mṛnmaye /
analyzed: kimartham catvare dugdham yātre pakve ca mṛd maye

original: kāṣṭhatrayaṃ gaṇābaddhaṃ kṛtvā rātrau catuṣpathe // GarP_2,1.37 //
analyzed: kāṣṭha trayam gaṇa ābaddham kṛtvā rātrau catuṣpathe
niśāyām dīyate dīpaḥ yāvat abdam dinedina

original: dāhodakaṃ kimarthaṃ ca kimarthaṃ ca janaiḥ saha // GarP_2,1.38 //
analyzed: dāha udakam kimartham ca kimartham ca janaiḥ saha
bhagavan na ati vāhaḥ ca nava piṇḍāḥ pradāpayet

original: kathaṃ deyaṃ pitṛbhyaśca vāhasyāvāhanaṃ katham // GarP_2,1.39 //
analyzed: katham deyam pitṛbhyaḥ ca vāhasya āvāhanam katham
idam ced kriyate deva kasmāt piṇḍam pradāpayet
kim tat pradīyate tasya piṇḍa dāna ādi anantaram
asthisañcayanam ca eva ghaṭasphoṭam tathā eva ca

original: dvitīye 'hni kutaḥ snānaṃ caturthe sāgnike dvije // GarP_2,1.41 //
analyzed: dvitīye hni kutas snānam caturthe sa agnike dvije

original: daśame kiṃ malasnānaṃ kāryaṃ sarvajanaiḥ saha /
analyzed: daśame kim mala snānam kāryam sarva janaiḥ saha
kasmāt taila udvartanam ca skandhavāha gṛham nayet
taila udvartanakam ca api sthūla jalāśaye

original: daśame 'hani yatpiṇḍaṃ taddadyā dāmiṣeṇa tu // GarP_2,1.43 //
analyzed: daśame hani yat piṇḍam tat dadyāḥ dāmiṣeṇa tu
kasmāt vṛṣotsarga ādi pūrvakam
bhājana upānahau chatram vāsāṃsi tu aṅgulīyakam
trayodaśe hni deyam syāt pada dānam kimarthakam

original: śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśaitāni abdaṃ yāvatkuto ghaṭaḥ // GarP_2,1.45 //
analyzed: śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa etāni abdam yāvat kutas ghaṭaḥ
annādyena udakena eva ṣaṣṭyā adhika śata trayam

original: dinedine ca dātavyaṃ ghaṭānnaṃ pretatṛptaye // GarP_2,1.46 //
analyzed: dine dine ca dātavyam ghaṭa annam preta tṛptaye

original: prāpte kāle vai mriyate anityā mānavāḥ prabho // GarP_2,1.47 //
analyzed: prāpte kāle vai mriyate anityāḥ mānavāḥ prabho

original: chidraṃ tu naiva paśyāmi kuto jīvaḥ sa nirgataḥ /
analyzed: chidram tu nā eva paśyāmi kutas jīvaḥ sa nirgataḥ
kutas gacchanti bhūtāni pṛthivī apaḥ manaḥ tathā

original: tejo vadasva me nātha vāyurākāśameva ca // GarP_2,1.48 //
analyzed: tejaḥ vadasva me nātha vāyuḥ ākāśam eva ca
kutas karmendriyāṇi iha pañca buddhīndriyāṇi ca

original: vāyavaścaiva pañcaite kathaṃ gacchanti cātyayam // GarP_2,1.49 //
analyzed: vāyavaḥ ca eva pañca ete katham gacchanti ca atyayam
lobha moha ādayaḥ pañca śarīre ca eva taskarāḥ

original: tṛṣṇā kāmo hyahaṅkāraḥ kuto yānti janārdanā // GarP_2,1.50 //
analyzed: tṛṣṇā kāmaḥ hi ahaṅkāraḥ kutas yānti janārdanā
puṇyam vā api athavā apuṇyam yat kiñcid su kṛtam tathā

original: naṣṭe dehe kuto yānti dānāni vividhāni ca // GarP_2,1.51 //
analyzed: naṣṭe dehe kutas yānti dānāni vividhāni ca

original: sapiṇḍanaṃ kimarthaṃ ca pūrṇe saṃvatsare 'pi vā /
analyzed: sapiṇḍanam kimartham ca pūrṇe saṃvatsare vā

original: pretasya melanaṃ keṣāṃ kiṃvidhaṃ tatra kārayet // GarP_2,1.52 //
analyzed: pretasya melanam keṣām kiṃvidham tatra kārayet
mūrchanāt pananāt vā api vipattiḥ yadi jāyate

original: ye dagdhā ye tvadagdhāśca patitā ye narā bhuvi // GarP_2,1.53 //
analyzed: ye dagdhāḥ ye tu adagdhāḥ ca patitāḥ ye narāḥ bhuvi

original: yāni cānyāni bhūtāni teṣāmante bhavecca kim /
analyzed: yāni ca anyāni bhūtāni teṣām ante bhavet ca kim

original: pāpino ye durācārā ye cānye gatabuddhayaḥ // GarP_2,1.54 //
analyzed: pāpinaḥ ye durācārāḥ ye ca anye gatabuddhayaḥ
ātma ghātī brahma hā ca steyī viśvāsa ghātakaḥ
kapilāyāḥ pibet śūdraḥ yaḥ paṭhet idam akṣaram
dhārayet brahmasūtram vā kā gatiḥ tasya mādhava

original: śūdrasya brāhmaṇī bhāryā saṃgṛhītā yadā bhavet // GarP_2,1.56 //
analyzed: śūdrasya brāhmaṇī bhāryā saṃgṛhītā yadā bhavet
bhītaḥ ham pāpinaḥ tasmāt tat me vada jagatprabho

original: anyacca śṛṇu viśvātmanmayā kautukinā rayāt // GarP_2,1.57 //
analyzed: anyat ca śṛṇu viśvātman mayā kautukinā rayāt
lokān lokayatā loke jagāhe viśva maṇḍalam

original: tatrājani janāndṛṣṭvā duḥ kheṣveva nimajjataḥ // GarP_2,1.58 //
analyzed: tatra ajani janān dṛṣṭvā duḥ kheṣu eva nimajjataḥ

original: svānte me durdharā pīḍā tatpīḍāto garīyasī /
analyzed: svānte me durdharā pīḍā tad pīḍātaḥ garīyasī
tridive diti jātebhyaḥ bhūmau mṛtyu ruj ādibhiḥ
iṣṭa vastu viyogaiḥ ca pātāle māmakam bhayam

original: evaṃ na nirbhayaṃ sthānamanyadīśa bhavatpadāt // GarP_2,1.60 //
analyzed: evam na nirbhayam sthānam anyat īśa bhavat padāt
asatyam svapna māyā vat kālena kavalīkṛtam

original: tatrāpi bhārate varṣe bahuduḥ khasya bhāginaḥ // GarP_2,1.61 //
analyzed: tatra api bhārate varṣe bahu duḥkhasya bhāginaḥ
janāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ mayā rāga dveṣa moha ādi viplutāḥ
kecid andhāḥ kekara akṣā skhalat vācaḥ tu paṅgavaḥ

original: khañjāḥ kāṇāśca badhirā mūkāḥ kuṣṭhāśca lomaśāḥ /
analyzed: khañjāḥ kāṇāḥ ca badhirāḥ mūkāḥ kuṣṭhāḥ ca lomaśāḥ
nānā roga parītāḥ ca khapuṣpāt ca abhimāninaḥ
teṣām doṣasya vaicitryam mṛtyoḥ gocara tām api

original: dṛṣṭvā prasumanāḥ prāptaḥ ko mṛtyuścitratā katham // GarP_2,1.64 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā prasumanāḥ prāptaḥ kaḥ mṛtyuḥ citra tā katham
mṛtiḥ yasya vidhānena maraṇāt api anantaram

original: vidhinābdakriyā yasya na sa durgatimāpnuyāt // GarP_2,1.65 //
analyzed: vidhinā abda kriyā yasya na sa durgatim āpnuyāt
ṛṣibhyaḥ tu mayā pūrvam iti sāmānyatas śrutam
jñānāya tad dviśeṣasya pṛcchāmi idam iti prabho

original: mriyamāṇasya kiṃ kṛtyaṃ kiṃ dānaṃ vāsavānuja /
analyzed: mriyamāṇasya kim kṛtyam kim dānam vāsava anuja
vāha mṛtyoḥ antarāle kaḥ vidhiḥ dahanasya ca

original: sadyo vilambato vā kiṃ dehamanyaṃ prapadyate /
analyzed: sadyas vilambataḥ vā kim deham anyam prapadyate
saṃyamanyām kramyamāṇam āvarṣam kā mṛti kriyā
prāyaścittam durmateḥ kim pañcaka ādi mṛtasya ca

original: prasādaṃ kuru me mohaṃ chettumarhasyaśeṣataḥ // GarP_2,1.69 //
analyzed: prasādam kuru me moham chettum arhasi aśeṣatas

original: sarvamantemayā pṛṣṭaṃ brūhi lokahitāya vai // GarP_2,1.70 //
analyzed: pṛṣṭam brūhi loka hitāya vai

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśākhye dharmakāṇḍe (pretakhaṇḍe)
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśa ākhye dharma kāṇḍe pretakhaṇḍe
śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde praśraprapañcaḥ nāma prathamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā bhadra mānuṣāṇāṃ hitāya vai /
analyzed: sādhu pṛṣṭam tvayā bhadra mānuṣāṇām hitāya vai
śṛṇuṣva avahitaḥ bhūtvā sarvam eva aurdhvadaihikam
samyak vibheda rahitam śruti smṛti samuddhṛtam
yat na dṛṣṭam suraiḥ sa indraiḥ yogibhiḥ yoga cintakaiḥ
guhyat guhyataram tat ca na ākhyātam kasyacid kvacid

original: bhaktastvaṃ hi mahābhāga vainateyaṃ bravīmi te // GarP_2,2.3 //
analyzed: bhaktaḥ tvam hi mahābhāga vainateyam bravīmi te

original: aputrasya gatirnāstu svargo naiva ca naiva ca /
analyzed: aputrasya gatiḥ nā astu svargaḥ nā eva ca nā eva ca

original: yena kenāpyupāyena kāryaṃ janma sutasya hi // GarP_2,2.4 //
analyzed: yena kena api upāyena kāryam janma sutasya hi
tārayet narakāt puttraḥ yadi mokṣaḥ na vidyate

original: skandhaḥ putreṇa kartavyo hyagnidātā ca pautrakaḥ // GarP_2,2.5 //
analyzed: skandhaḥ putreṇa kartavyaḥ hi agni dātā ca pautrakaḥ

original: tiladarbhaiśca bhūmyāṃ vai kuṭī ṛtumatī bhavet /
analyzed: tila darbhaiḥ ca bhūmyām vai kuṭī ṛtumatī bhavet

original: pañca ratnāni vaktre tu yena jīvaḥ prarohati // GarP_2,2.6 //
analyzed: pañca ratnāni vaktre tu yena jīvaḥ prarohati

original: yadā puṣpaṃ pranaṣṭaṃ hi kva tadā garbhadhāraṇam /
analyzed: yadā puṣpam pranaṣṭam hi kva tadā garbha dhāraṇam

original: ādarācca tato bhūmau yena garbhaṃ pradhāryate // GarP_2,2.7 //
analyzed: ādarāt ca tatas bhūmau yena garbham pradhāryate
lepyā tu gomayaiḥ bhūmiḥ tilān darbhān viniḥ kṣipet

original: tasyāmevāturo muktaḥ sarvaṃ dahati kilbiṣam // GarP_2,2.8 //
analyzed: tasyām eva āturaḥ muktaḥ sarvam dahati kilbiṣam
darbha tūlī nayet svargam āturasya na saṃśayaḥ
darbhān tatra kṣipet vā atha tūlīga induka madhyataḥ

original: sarvatra vasudhāpūtā yatra lepo na vidyate /
analyzed: sarvatra vasudhā pūtāḥ yatra lepaḥ na vidyate

original: yatra lepaḥ sthitastatra punarlepena śudhyati // GarP_2,2.10 //
analyzed: yatra lepaḥ sthitaḥ tatra punar lepena śudhyati
yātudhānāḥ piśācāḥ ca rākṣasāḥ krūra karmiṇaḥ

original: alepaṃ hyāturaṃ muktaṃ viśantyete viyonayaḥ // GarP_2,2.11 //
analyzed: a lepam hi āturam muktam viśanti ete viyonayaḥ
nitya homaḥ tathā śrāddham pāda śaucam dvije tathā

original: maṇḍalena vinā bhūmyāmāturo mucyate na hi // GarP_2,2.12 //
analyzed: maṇḍalena vinā bhūmyām āturaḥ mucyate na hi
brahmā viṣṇuḥ ca rudraḥ ca śrīḥ hutāśaḥ tathā eva ca
maṇḍale ca upatiṣṭhanti tasmāt kurvīta maṇḍalam
anyathā mriyate vālaḥ vṛddhaḥ tārkṣya yuvā athavā

original: yonyantaraṃ na gacchetsa krīḍate vāyunā saha // GarP_2,2.14 //
analyzed: yoni antaram na gacchet sa krīḍate vāyunā saha
miśritam lohita amiśram tat evam janma jīyate

original: tasyaiva vāyubhūtasya na śrāddhaṃ nodakakriyā // GarP_2,2.15 //
analyzed: tasya eva vāyu bhūtasya na śrāddham na udakakriyā
mama sveda samudbhūtāḥ tilāḥ tārkṣya pavitrakāḥ

original: asurā dānavā daityā vidravanti tilaistathā // GarP_2,2.16 //
analyzed: asurāḥ dānavāḥ daityāḥ vidravanti tilaiḥ tathā
tilāḥ śvetāḥ tilā kṛṣṇāḥ tilāḥ go mūtra saṃnnibhāḥ

original: dahantu te me pāpāni śarīreṇa kṛtāni vai // GarP_2,2.17 //
analyzed: dahantu te me pāpāni śarīreṇa kṛtāni vai

original: eka eva tilo datto hemadroṇatilaiḥ samaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ eva tilaḥ dattaḥ hema droṇa tilaiḥ samaḥ

original: tarpaṇe dānahomeṣu datto bhavati cākṣayaḥ // GarP_2,2.18 //
analyzed: tarpaṇe dāna homeṣu dattaḥ bhavati ca akṣayaḥ
darbhāḥ roma samudbhūtāḥ tilāḥ svedeṣu na anyathā
devatāḥ dānavāḥ tṛptāḥ śrāddhena pitaraḥ tathā
prayoga vidhinā brahmā viśvam ca api upajīvanām
apasavya āditas brahmā pitaraḥ deva devatāḥ

original: tena te pitarastṛptā apasavye kṛte sati /
analyzed: tena te pitaraḥ tṛptāḥ apasavye kṛte sati

original: darbhamūle sthito brahmā madhye devo janārdanaḥ // GarP_2,2.21 //
analyzed: darbha mūle sthitaḥ brahmā madhye devaḥ janārdanaḥ

original: darbhāgre śaṅkaraṃ vidyāttrayo devāḥ kuśe smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: darbha agre śaṅkaram vidyāt trayaḥ devāḥ kuśe smṛtāḥ

original: viprā mantrāḥ kaśā vahnistulasī ca khageśvara // GarP_2,2.22 //
analyzed: viprāḥ mantrāḥ kaśāḥ vahniḥ tulasī ca khageśvara

original: naite nirmālyatāṃ yānti kriyamāṇāḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: na ete nirmālya tām yānti kriyamāṇāḥ punar punar

original: tulasī brāhmaṇā gāvo viṣṇurekādaśī khaga // GarP_2,2.23 //
analyzed: tulasī brāhmaṇāḥ gāvaḥ viṣṇuḥ ekādaśī khaga
pañca pravahaṇāni ye bhava abdhau majjatām nṛṇām
viṣṇuḥ ekādaśī gītā tulasī vipra dhenavaḥ
tilāḥ pavitram atulam darbhāḥ ca api tulasī atha
nivārayanti ca etāni durgatim yāntam āturam
hastābhyām uddharet darbhān toyena prokṣayet bhuvi
mṛtyu kāle kṣipet darbhān karayoḥ āturasya ca

original: darbhaistu kṣipyate yo 'sau darbhaistu pariveṣṭitaḥ // GarP_2,2.27 //
analyzed: darbhaiḥ tu kṣipyate yaḥ sau darbhaiḥ tu pariveṣṭitaḥ

original: viṣṇuloke sa vai yāti mantrahīno 'pi mānavaḥ /
analyzed: viṣṇu loke sa vai yāti mantra hīnaḥ u pi mānavaḥ

original: tūlīṃ kṛtvā kṛtau pādau saṃsthitau kṣitipṛṣṭhataḥ // GarP_2,2.28 //
analyzed: tūlīm kṛtvā kṛtau pādau saṃsthitau kṣiti pṛṣṭhataḥ
prāyāścittam viśuddha agnau saṃsāre sāra sāgare
gomayena upalimpet tu darbha āstaraṇa saṃsthite

original: yane dattena dānena sarvaṃ pāpaṃ vyapohati /
analyzed: yane dattena dānena sarvam pāpam vyapohati

original: lavaṇaṃ tadrasaṃ divyaṃ sarvakāmapradaṃ nṛṇām // GarP_2,2.30 //
analyzed: lavaṇam tad rasam divyam sarva kāma pradam nṛṇām
yasmāt anna rasāḥ sarve na utkaṭāḥ lavaṇam vinā

original: pitṝṇāṃ ca priyaṃ bhavyaṃ tasmātsvargapradaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,2.31 //
analyzed: pitṝṇām ca priyam bhavyam tasmāt svarga pradam bhavet
viṣṇu deha samudbhūtaḥ yatas yam lavaṇaḥ rasaḥ

original: etatsalavaṇaṃ dānaṃ tena śaṃsanti yoginaḥ // GarP_2,2.32 //
analyzed: etat sa lavaṇam dānam tena śaṃsanti yoginaḥ
brāhmaṇa kṣattriya viśām strīṇām śūdra janasya ca

original: āturasya yadā prāṇā na yānti vasudhātale // GarP_2,2.33 //
analyzed: āturasya yadā prāṇāḥ na yānti vasudhā tale

original: lavaṇaṃ tu tadā deyaṃ dvārasyodvāṭanaṃ divaḥ /
analyzed: lavaṇam tu tadā deyam dvārasya udvāṭanam divaḥ

original: anyacca śṛṇu pakṣīndra mṛtyo rūpaṃ prapañcataḥ // GarP_2,2.34 //
analyzed: anyat ca śṛṇu pakṣi indra mṛtyoḥ rūpam prapañcataḥ
yasya kālena no yāyāt viyogaḥ prāṇa dehayoḥ
prāṇinaḥ ca sva samaye mṛtyuḥ atyanta vismṛtiḥ
yathā vāyuḥ jaladharān vikarṣati yatas tatas
tadvat jalada vat tārkṣya kālasya eva vaśa anugāḥ

original: sāttvikā rājasāścaiva tāmasā ye ca kecana /
analyzed: sāttvikāḥ rājasāḥ ca eva tāmasāḥ ye ca kecana

original: bhāvāḥ kālātmakāḥ sarve pravartante hi jantuṣu // GarP_2,2.37 //
analyzed: bhāvāḥ kāla ātmakāḥ sarve pravartante hi jantuṣu
ādityaḥ candramāḥ śambhuḥ āpaḥ vāyuḥ śatakratuḥ

original: agniḥ khaṃ pṛthivī mitra oṣadhyo vasavastathā // GarP_2,2.38 //
analyzed: agniḥ kham pṛthivī mitraḥ oṣadhyaḥ vasavaḥ tathā
saritaḥ sāgarāḥ ca eva bhāva abhāvau ca sarpa han

original: sarve kālena sṛjyante saṃkṣipyante yathā punaḥ // GarP_2,2.39 //
analyzed: sarve kālena sṛjyante saṃkṣipyante yathā punar
kālena saṃhriyante ca mṛtyau upasthite
daiva yogāt tdā vyādhiḥ kaścid utpadyate khaga
vaikalyam indriyāṇām ca balau jaḥ raṃhasām bhavet
yugapad vaścika koṭi śūka daṃśaḥ bhavet yadi
tadā anumīyate tena pīḍā mṛtyu bhavā khaga

original: tataḥ kṣaṇena caitanye vikale jaḍatāṃ gate // GarP_2,2.42 //
analyzed: tatas kṣaṇena caitanye vikale jaḍa tām gate
pricālyante tatas prāṇāḥ yāmyaiḥ nikaṭa vartibhiḥ

original: bībhatsaṃ tu tadā rūpaṃ prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭhagatairbhavet // GarP_2,2.43 //
analyzed: bībhatsam tu tadā rūpam prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭha gataiḥ bhavet
mukham lālā ākulam bhavet
aṅguṣṭha mātra puruṣaḥ hāhā kurvan tatas tanoḥ
tadā eva nīyate dvataiḥ yāmyaiḥ vā ukṣan svakam gṛham

original: bhūya eva hite tāta mṛtyukāladaśāmimām // GarP_2,2.45 //
analyzed: bhūyas eva hite tāta mṛtyu kāla daśām imām
aṣmā prakupitaḥ kāye tīvra vāyu samīritaḥ
bhinatti marma sthānāni dīpyamānaḥ nirindhanaḥ
udānaḥ nāma pavanaḥ tatas ca ūrdhvam pravartate
bhaktānām abubhukṣāṇām adhogati nirodha kṛt

original: yairnānṛtāni coktāni prītibhedaḥ kṛto na ca /
analyzed: yaiḥ nā anṛtāni ca uktāni prīti bhedaḥ kṛtaḥ na ca

original: āstikaḥ śraddadhānaśca sa sukhaṃ mṛtyumṛcchati // GarP_2,2.48 //
analyzed: āstikaḥ śraddadhānaḥ ca sa sukham mṛtyum ṛcchati
yaḥ na kāmāt na saṃraṃbhāt na dveṣāt dharmam utsṛjet

original: yathoktakārī saumyaśca sa sukhaṃ mṛtyumṛcchati // GarP_2,2.49 //
analyzed: yathā ukta kārī saumyaḥ ca sa sukham mṛtyum ṛcchati
moha jñāna pradātāraḥ prāpnuvanti mahat tamaḥ

original: kūṭasākṣī mṛṣāvādī ye ca viśvāsaghātakāḥ // GarP_2,2.50 //
analyzed: kūṭa sākṣī mṛṣāvādī ye ca viśvāsa ghātakāḥ

original: te mohaṃ mṛtyumṛcchanti tathā ye vedanindakāḥ /
analyzed: te moham mṛtyum ṛcchanti tathā ye veda nindakāḥ
vibhīṣakāḥ pūti gandhāḥ yaṣṭi mudgara pāṇayaḥ
āgacchanti durātmānaḥ yamasya puruṣāḥ tadā

original: prāpte tvīdṛkpathe ghore jāyate tasya vepathuḥ // GarP_2,2.52 //
analyzed: prāpte tu īdṛkpathe ghore jāyate tasya vepathuḥ
krandati aviratam saḥ pi pitṛ mātṛ sutān api
sā asya vāc asphuṭā yatnena eka varṇā vibhāsate
dṛṣṭiḥ vai bhrāmyate trāsāt śvāsāt śuṣyati ca ānanam
sa tatas vedanā āviṣṭaḥ tat śarīram vimuñcati
aspṛśyam kutsanīyam ca tad kṣaṇāt eva jāyate

original: uktaṃ mṛtyoḥ svarūpaṃ tu prasaṅgādanyadapyatha // GarP_2,2.55 //
analyzed: uktam mṛtyoḥ svarūpam tu prasaṅgāt anyat api atha
vaicitryasya uttaram praśre dvitīyasya vadāmi te

original: karmaṇāṃ prāktanānāṃ tu tadasattvenaṃ bhadetaḥ // GarP_2,2.56 //
analyzed: karmaṇām prāktanānām tu bhadā itas
bhavet bhogasya vaicitryam bhrāmyatām prāṇinām iha
deva tvam asura tvam ca yakṣa tva ādi sukha pradam
mānuṣa tvam paśu tvam ca pakṣi tva ādi ati duḥkha dam
karmaṇām tāratamyena bhavati iha khageśvara
atra te kīrtayiṣyāmi vipākam karmaṇām aham
vaicitryasya saṃsarati ayam
mahāpātaka jān ghorān narakān prāpya dāruṇān
karma kṣayāt prajāyante mahāpātakinaḥ kṣitau
jāyante lakṣaṇaiḥ yaiḥ tu tāni me śṛṇu sattama
mṛga aśva sūkara uṣṭrāṇām brahma hā yonim ṛcchati
kṛmi kīṭa pataṅga tvam svarṇa hārī samāpnuyāt
tṛṇa gulma tā tvam ca kramaśas guru talpa gaḥ
brahma hā kṣaya rogī syāt surā paḥ śyāva dantakaḥ

original: hemahārī tu kunakhī duścarmā gurutalpagaḥ // GarP_2,2.63 //
analyzed: hema hārī tu kunakhī duścarmā guru talpa gaḥ
yaḥ yena saṃvasati eṣām sa tad liṅgaḥ abhijāyate
saṃvatsareṇa patati patitena saha ācaran
saṃlāpa sparśa niḥ śvāsa saha yāna aśana āsanāt
yājana adhyāpanāt yaunāt pāpam saṃkramate nṛṇām
gatvā dārān pareṣām ca brahma svam apahṛtya ca

original: araṇye nirjane deśe jāyate brahmarākṣasaḥ // GarP_2,2.66 //
analyzed: araṇye nirjane deśe jāyate brahmarākṣasaḥ
hīna jātau prajāyeta ratnānām apahārakaḥ

original: patraṃ ca śākhino hṛtvā gandhāṃśchucchundarī pumān // GarP_2,2.67 //
analyzed: patram ca śākhinaḥ hṛtvā gandhān chucchundarī pumān
mūṣakaḥ dhānya hārī syāt yānam uṣṭraḥ phalam kapiḥ
nirmantra bhojanāt kākaḥ gṛdhraḥ hṛtvā hi upaskaram

original: madhudaṃśaḥ phalaṃ gṛdhro gāṃ godhāgniṃ bakastathā /
analyzed: madhudaṃśaḥ phalam gṛdhraḥ gām godhā agnim bakaḥ tathā
syāt śvetakuṣṭhī hi arucī rasahārakaḥ

original: kāṃsyahārī tu haṃsaḥ syātparasvasya ca hārakaḥ /
analyzed: kāṃsya hārī tu haṃsaḥ syāt para svasya ca hārakaḥ
apasmārī guroḥ hantā krūra kṛt vāmanaḥ bhavet
dharmapatnīm tyajan śabdavedhī prāṇī bhavet kṣitau
deva vipra svāpa hārī pāṇḍuraḥ para māṃsa bhuj
bhakṣya abhakṣyaḥ gaṇḍamālī mahā rogī prajāyate

original: nyāsāpahārī kāṇaḥ syāstrījīvaḥ khañjako bhavet // GarP_2,2.72 //
analyzed: nyāsa apahārī kāṇaḥ syāḥ strī jīvaḥ khañjakaḥ bhavet
kaumāra dāra tyāgī ca kamiṣṭa bhuj

original: vātagulmī viprayoṣidgāmī vā jambuko bhavet // GarP_2,2.73 //
analyzed: vāta gulmī vipra yoṣit gāmī vā jambukaḥ bhavet
mātsaryāt api kapālī dīpa hārakaḥ
kauśikaḥ mitra hantā ca kṣayī pitṛ ādi nindakaḥ
skhalat vāc anṛta vādī kūṭa sākṣī jalodarī
maśakaḥ vivāhe vighna kṛt bhavet

original: syādvātha vṛṣalaḥ so 'yaṃ catvare vai viṇmūtrakṛt // GarP_2,2.76 //
analyzed: syāt vā atha vṛṣalaḥ saḥ yam catvare vai viṣ mūtra kṛt
mūtrakṛcchrī dūṣakaḥ tu kanyāyāḥ klība tām iyāt
dvīpī syāt veda vikretā varāhaḥ yājya yājakaḥ
khadyotaḥ vaha dāhakaḥ

original: kṛmiḥ paryuṣitādaḥ syānmatsarī bhramaro bhavet // GarP_2,2.78 //
analyzed: kṛmiḥ paryuṣitādaḥ syāt matsarī bhramaraḥ bhavet
agni utsādī tu kuṣṭhī syāt adatta ādānataḥ vṛṣaḥ
sarpaḥ gohārakaḥ nnasya hārakaḥ syāt ajīrṇavān
jalahārī tu matsyaḥ syāt kṣīrahārī balākikā

original: annaṃ paryuṣitaṃ vipre pradadatkubjatāṃ vrajet // GarP_2,2.80 //
analyzed: annam paryuṣitam vipre pradadat kubja tām vrajet
phalāni harate yaḥ tu santatiḥ mriyate khaga
a dattvā bhakṣyam a śrāti hi anapatyaḥ bhavet naraḥ
pravajyā gamanāt rājan bhavet maru piśācakaḥ

original: cātako jalahartā syājjanmāndhaḥ puṃstakaṃ haran // GarP_2,2.82 //

analyzed: pratiśrutya dvijebhyaḥ ṛtham adadat jambukaḥ bhavet
parivāda ādi jātīnām labhate kācchapīm tanum
durbhagaḥ phala vikretā vṛkaḥ ca vṛṣalī patiḥ
mārjāraḥ gnim padā spṛṣṭvā rogavān para māṃsa bhuj
jala prastravaṇam yaḥ tu bhindyāt matsyaḥ bhavet naraḥ

original: hareḥ kathāṃ na śṛṇvanti ye na sādhujanastavam // GarP_2,2.85 //
analyzed: hareḥ kathām na śṛṇvanti ye na sādhu jana stavam
tān narān karṇa mūlaḥ yam vyāpnuyāt na itarān janān

original: parasyānanasaṃsthaṃ yo grāsaṃ hari mandadhīḥ // GarP_2,2.86 //
analyzed: parasya ānana saṃstham yaḥ grāsam hari manda dhīḥ
deva upakaraṇāni enam gaṇḍamālinam īhate

original: dambhenācarate dharmaṃ gajacarmā bhavettu saḥ // GarP_2,2.87 //
analyzed: dambhena ācarate dharmam gaja carmā bhavet tu saḥ
śiraḥ rti pramukhāḥ rogāḥ yānti viśvāsa ghātakam

original: liṅgapīḍī śivasvaṃ ca śivanirmālyameva ca // GarP_2,2.88 //
analyzed: liṅga pīḍī śiva svam ca śiva nirmālyam eva ca
striyaḥ api anena mārgeṇa hṛtvā doṣam avāpnuyuḥ
eteṣām eva jantūnām bhāryā tvam upajāyate
bhoga ante narakasya etat sarvam iti avadhāraya
pradarśyam etat tu mayā uktam te samāsatas

original: dravyaprakārā hi yathā tathaiva prāṇijātayaḥ // GarP_2,2.90 //
analyzed: dravya prakārāḥ hi yathā tathā eva prāṇi jātayaḥ

original: evaṃ vicitrairnijakarmabhirnṛṇāṃ sukhasya duḥ khasya ca janmanāmapi /
analyzed: evam vicitraiḥ nija karmabhiḥ nṛṇām sukhasya duḥ khasya ca janmanām api
vaicitryam uktam śubha karmataḥ śubham tathā aśubhāt ca aśubham īrayanti
etat te sarvam ākhyātam yat pṛṣṭaḥ ham iha tvayā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe pratakā(kha)
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe
ṇḍe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde aurdhvadehikavidhikarmavipākayorvarṇanam nāma dvitīyaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca
evam utsāhitaḥ pakṣī sva rūpam nirayasya tu
papraccha narakāṇi evam śrutvā ca utkūlita antaraḥ
garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: narakāṇāṃ svarūpaṃ me vada yeṣu vikarmiṇaḥ /
analyzed: narakāṇām svarūpam me vada yeṣu vikarmiṇaḥ

original: pātyante duḥ khabhūyiṣṭhāsteṣāṃ bhedāṃśca kīrtaya // GarP_2,3.2 //
analyzed: pātyante duḥ kha bhūyiṣṭhāḥ teṣām bhedān ca kīrtaya
śrī bhagavān uvāca
narakāṇām sahasrāṇi vartante hi aruṇānuja

original: śakyaṃ vistarato naiva vaktuṃ prādhānyato bruve // GarP_2,3.3 //
analyzed: śakyam vistarataḥ nā eva vaktum prādhānyataḥ bruve

original: rauravaṃ nāma narakaṃ mukhyaṃ tadvainibodha me /
analyzed: rauravam nāma narakam mukhyam tat vai nibodha me

original: raurave kūṭasākṣī tu yāti yaścānṛtī naraḥ // GarP_2,3.4 //
analyzed: raurave kūṭa sākṣī tu yāti yaḥ ca anṛtī naraḥ

original: yojanānāṃ sahasre dve rauravo hi pramāṇataḥ /
analyzed: yojanānām sahasre dve rauravaḥ hi pramāṇataḥ

original: jānumātrapramāṇaṃ tu tatra gartaṃ sudustaram // GarP_2,3.5 //
analyzed: jānu mātra pramāṇam tu tatra gartam su dustaram
tatra aṅgāra caya oghena kṛtam tat haraṇī samam
tatra agninā su tīvreṇa tāpita aṅgāra bhūminā
tad madhye pāpa karmāṇam vimuñcanti yama anugāḥ
sa dahyamānaḥ tīvreṇa vahninā paridhāvati

original: padepade ca pādo 'sya sphuṭyate śīryate punaḥ /
analyzed: pade pade ca sphuṭyate śīryate punar
ahorātreṇa uddharaṇam pāda nyāsena gacchati
evam sahasram vistīrṇam yojanānām vimucyate
tatas tādṛś nirayam ṛcchati
rauravaḥ te samākhyātaḥ prathamaḥ narakaḥ mayā

original: mahārauravasaṃjñaṃ tu śṛṇuṣva narakaṃ khaga // GarP_2,3.10 //
analyzed: mahāraurava saṃjñam tu śṛṇuṣva narakam khaga
yojanānām sahasrāṇi santi pañca samantataḥ
tatra tāmra mayī bhūmiḥ adhas tasyāḥ hutāśanaḥ
tayā tapantyā sā sarvā prodyat vidyut sama prabhā
vibhāvyate mahāraudrā pāpinām darśana ādiṣu

original: tasyāṃ baddhakarābhyāṃ ca padbhyāṃ caiva yamānugaiḥ /
analyzed: tasyām baddha karābhyām ca padbhyām ca eva yama anugaiḥ

original: mucyate pāpakṛnmadhye luṇṭhamānaḥ sa gacchati // GarP_2,3.13 //
analyzed: mucyate pāpa kṛt madhye luṇṭhamānaḥ sa gacchati
kākaiḥ bakaiḥ vṛka ulūkaiḥ maśakaiḥ vṛścikaiḥ tathā
bhakṣyamāṇaiḥ tathā raudraiḥ gataḥ mārge vikṛṣyate
dahyamānaḥ gata matiḥ bhrāntaḥ tāta iti ca ākulaḥ
vadati asakṛt udvagnaḥ na śāntim adhigacchati
evam tasmāt naraiḥ mokṣaḥ tu atikrāntaiḥ avāpyate

original: varṣāyutāyutaiḥ pāpaṃ yaiḥ kṛtaṃ duṣṭabuddhibhiḥ // GarP_2,3.16 //
analyzed: varṣā yuta ayutaiḥ pāpam yaiḥ kṛtam duṣṭa buddhibhiḥ
tathā anyaḥ tu tatas nāma saḥ tiśītaḥ svabhāvataḥ
mahāraurava vat dīrghaḥ tathā andhatamasā vṛtaḥ
śīta ārtāḥ tatra badhyante narāḥ tamasi dāruṇe
parasparam samāsādya parirabhya āśrayanti te
dantāḥ teṣām ca bhajyante śīta ārti parikampitāḥ
kṣu tṛṣā atibalāḥ pakṣin atha tatra api upadavāḥ
himakhaṇḍa vahaḥ vāyu bhinatti asthīni dāruṇaḥ
majja asṛj asthi galitam aśranti atra kṣudhā anvitāḥ
āliṅgyamānāḥ bhrāmyante paraspara samāgame
evam tatra api su mahān kleśaḥ tamasi mānavaiḥ
prāpyate śakuni śreṣṭha yaḥ bahūkṛta sañcayaḥ
nikṛntanaḥ iti khyātaḥ tatas nyaḥ naraka uttamaḥ
kulāla cakrāṇi tatra bhrāmyanti aviratam khaga
teṣu āpāṣye nikṛṣyante kālasūtreṇa mānavāḥ
āpādatalamastakam

original: na caiṣāṃ jīvitabhraṃśo jāyate pakṣisattama // GarP_2,3.24 //
analyzed: na ca eṣām jīvita bhraṃśaḥ jāyate pakṣi sattama

original: chinnāni teṣāṃ śataśaḥ khaṇḍānyaikyaṃ vrajanti hi /
analyzed: chinnāni teṣām śataśas khaṇḍāni aikyam vrajanti hi
evam varṣa sahasrāṇi bhrāmyante pāpa karmiṇaḥ
tāvat yāvat aśeṣam ca tat pāpam saṃkṣayam gatam

original: aprātaṣṭhaṃ ca narakaṃ śṛṇuṣva gadato mama // GarP_2,3.26 //
analyzed: aprātaṣṭham ca narakam śṛṇuṣva gadataḥ mama
tatrasthaiḥ nārakaiḥ duḥ kham asahyam anubhūyate

original: tānyeva tatra cakrāṇi ghaṭīyantrāṇi cānyataḥ // GarP_2,3.27 //
analyzed: tāni eva tatra cakrāṇi ghaṭīyantrāṇi ca anyatas
duḥ khasya hetu bhūtāni pāpa karma kṛtām nṛṇām
cakreṣu āropitāḥ kecid bhāmyante tatra mānavāḥ
yāvat varṣa sahasrāṇi na teṣām sthitiḥ antarā

original: ghaṭīyantreṣu badvā ye baddhā toyavaṭī yathā // GarP_2,3.29 //
analyzed: ghaṭīyantreṣu ye baddhā toya vaṭī yathā
bhrāmyante mānavāḥ raktam udgirantaḥ punar punar
antraiḥ mukha viniṣkrāntaiḥ netraiḥ antra avalambi bhaiḥ
duḥ khāni prāpnuvanti iha yāni asahyāni jantubhiḥ

original: asipatravanaṃ nāma narakaṃ śṛṇu cāparam // GarP_2,3.31 //
analyzed: asipatravanam nāma narakam śṛṇu ca aparam
yojanānām sahasram yaḥ jvalati agnyā śṛta avaniḥ
sapta tīvra karāḥ ca aiṇḍarī atra tīvra su dāruṇe
pratapanti sadā tatra prāṇinaḥ naraka okasaḥ
tad madhye caraṇam śīta snigdha patram vibhāṣyate
patrāṇi yatra khaṇḍāni phalānām pakṣi sattama
śvānaḥ ca tatra su balāḥ caranti āmiṣa bhojanāḥ
mahā vaktrāḥ mahā daṃṣṭrāḥ vyāghrāḥ iva mahā balāḥ
tatas ca vanam ālokya śiśira chāyam agratas
prayānti prāṇinaḥ tatra kṣudh tāpa paripīḍitāḥ

original: mātarbhrātastāta iti krandamānāḥ suduḥ khitāḥ // GarP_2,3.36 //
analyzed: mātar bhrātar tāta iti krandamānāḥ su duḥ khitāḥ
dahyamāna aṅghri yugalā dharaṇi sthena vahninā

original: teṣāṃ gatānāṃ tatrāpi ati śītiḥ samīraṇaḥ // GarP_2,3.37 //
analyzed: teṣām gatānām tatra api ati śītiḥ samīraṇaḥ
tena pātyante teṣām khaḍgāḥ tathā upari

original: chinnāḥ patanti te bhūmau jvalatpāvakasaṃcaye // GarP_2,3.38 //
analyzed: chinnāḥ patanti te bhūmau jvalat pāvaka saṃcaye
lelihyamāne ca anyatra tapta aśeṣa mahī tale

original: sārameyāśca te śīghraṃ śātayanti śarīrataḥ // GarP_2,3.39 //
analyzed: sārameyāḥ ca te śīghram śātayanti śarīrataḥ
teṣām khaṇḍāni anekāni rudatām ati bhīṣaṇe
asipatravanam tāta mayā etat parikīrtitam

original: ataḥ paraṃ bhīmataraṃ taptakuṃbhaṃ nibodha me /
analyzed: atas param bhīmataram tapta kuṃbham nibodha me
samantataḥ tapta kumbhāḥ vahni jvālā samanvitāḥ
jvalat agni cayāḥ tapta taila ayaḥ cūrṇa pūritāḥ

original: eṣu duṣkṛtakarmāṇo yāmyaiḥ kṣiptā hyadhomukhāḥ // GarP_2,3.42 //
analyzed: eṣu duṣkṛta karmāṇaḥ yāmyaiḥ kṣiptāḥ hi adhomukhāḥ
kvāthyante visphuṭat gātrāḥ galat majjā jala anvitāḥ
sphuṭat kapāla enatra asthi chidyamānā vibhīṣaṇaiḥ
gṛdhraiḥ utpāṭya mucyante punar teṣu eva vegitaiḥ
punar cimacimāyante taila naikyam vrajanti ca
dravībhūtaiḥ śiraḥ gātraiḥ snāyu māṃsa tvac āsthibhiḥ
tatas yāmyaiḥ naraiḥ āśu darvyā āghaṭṭana ghaṭṭitāḥ
kṛta āvarte mahātaile kvāthyante pāpa karmiṇaḥ

original: eṣa te vistareṇoktastaptakumbho mayā khaga // GarP_2,3.46 //
analyzed: eṣa te vistareṇa uktaḥ tapta kumbhaḥ mayā khaga
ādimaḥ rauravaḥ proktaḥ paraḥ
ati śītaḥ tṛtīyaḥ tu caturthaḥ hi nikṛntanaḥ
apratiṣṭhaḥ pañcamaḥ syāt asipatravano paraḥ
saptamaḥ taptakumbhaḥ tu saptā ete narakāḥ matāḥ
tathā narakāṇi nara adhamāḥ

original: karmaṇāṃ tāratamyena teṣuteṣu patanti hi // GarP_2,3.49 //
analyzed: karmaṇām tāratamyena teṣu teṣu patanti hi

original: tathā hi narako rodhaḥ śūkarastāla eva ca /
analyzed: tathā hi narakaḥ rodhaḥ śūkaraḥ tālaḥ eva ca
taptakumbhaḥ mahājvālaḥ vimohanaḥ
krimiḥ ca krimabhakṣaḥ ca lālābhakṣaḥ viṣañjanaḥ

original: adhaḥ śirāḥ pūyavaho rudhirāndhaśca viḍrabhujaḥ // GarP_2,3.51 //
analyzed: adhas sirāḥ pūya vahaḥ rudhirāndhaḥ ca viḍra bhujaḥ
tathā vaitaraṇī
masipatravanam tathā
agni jvālaḥ mahā ghoraḥ sandaṃśaḥ vā api abhojanaḥ
tamaḥ ca kālasūtram ca lohaḥ ca api abhidaḥ tathā
apratiṣṭhaḥ u pi avīciḥ ca narakāḥ evamādayaḥ

original: tāmasā narakāḥ sarve yamasya viṣaye sthitāḥ /
analyzed: tāmasāḥ narakāḥ sarve yamasya viṣaye sthitāḥ

original: yeṣu duṣkṛtakarmāṇaḥ patanti hi pṛthakpṛthak // GarP_2,3.54 //
analyzed: yeṣu duṣkṛta karmāṇaḥ patanti hi pṛthak pṛthak
bhūmeḥ adhastāt te sarve raurava ādyāḥ prakīrtitāḥ

original: rogho goghno bhrūṇahā ca agnidātā naraḥ patet // GarP_2,3.55 //
analyzed: roghaḥ go ghnaḥ bhrūṇa hā ca agni dātā naraḥ patet
sūkare brahma hā majjet surā paḥ svarṇa taskaraḥ

original: tāle patetkṣattrahantā hatvā vaiśyaṃ ca durgatiḥ // GarP_2,3.56 //
analyzed: tāle patet kṣattra hantā hatvā vaiśyam ca durgatiḥ
brahmahatyām ca yaḥ kuryāt yaḥ ca syāt guru talpa gaḥ
svasṛgāmī taptakumbhī tathā rāja bhaṭaḥ nṛtī
tapta lohaiḥ ca vikretā tathā bandhana rakṣitā

original: mādhvī vikrayakartāṃ ca yastu bhaktaṃ parityajet // GarP_2,3.58 //
analyzed: ca yaḥ tu bhaktam parityajet

original: mahājvālī duhitaraṃ snuṣāṃ gacchati yastu vai /
analyzed: mahājvālī duhitaram snuṣām gacchati yaḥ tu vai

original: vedo vikrīyate yaiśca vedaṃ dūṣayate tu yaḥ // GarP_2,3.59 //
analyzed: vedaḥ vikrīyate yaiḥ ca vedam dūṣayate tu yaḥ
gurum ca eva avamanyante vāc śaraiḥ tāḍayanti ca

original: agamyāgāmī ca naro narakaṃ śabalaṃ vrajet // GarP_2,3.60 //
analyzed: agamyā gāmī ca naraḥ narakam śabalam vrajet

original: vimohe patate śūre maryādāṃ yo bhinatti vai /
analyzed: vimohe patate śūre maryādām yaḥ bhinatti vai

original: duriṣṭaṃ kurute yastu kṛmibhakṣaṃ prapadyate // GarP_2,3.61 //
analyzed: duriṣṭam kurute yaḥ tu kṛmi bhakṣam prapadyate
deva brāhmaṇa vidveṣṭā lālābhakṣe patati api
kuṇḍa kartā kulālaḥ ca nyāsa hartā cikitsakaḥ
ārāmeṣu agni dātā ca ete yānti viṣañjane
asat pratigrahī yaḥ tu tathā eva a yājya yājakaḥ
na kṣattraiḥ jovate yaḥ tu naraḥ gacchet adhomukham

original: kṣīraṃ surāṃ ca māsaṃ lākṣāṃ gandhaṃ rasaṃ tilān // GarP_2,3.64 //
analyzed: kṣīram surām ca māsam lākṣām gandham rasam tilān
evamādīni vikrīṇan ghore pūyavahe patet
yaḥ kukkuṭān nibadhnāti mārjārān sūkarān ca tān

original: pakṣiṇaśca mṛgāṃśchā gānso 'pyevaṃ narakaṃ vrajet // GarP_2,3.65 //
analyzed: pakṣiṇaḥ ca mṛgān chā gān saḥ pi evam narakam vrajet

original: ājāviko māhiṣikastathā cakrī dhvajī ca yaḥ /
analyzed: ājāvikaḥ māhiṣikaḥ tathā cakrī dhvajī ca yaḥ
raṅga upajīvikaḥ vipraḥ śākuniḥ grāmayājakaḥ
agāra dāhī garadaḥ kuṇḍāśī soma vikrayī

original: surāpo māṃsabhakṣī ca tathā ca paśughātakaḥ // GarP_2,3.67 //
analyzed: surāpaḥ māṃsa bhakṣī ca tathā ca paśu ghātakaḥ
rudhirāndhe patanti ete patanti ete evam āhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ
upaviṣṭantu eka paṅktyām viṣam sambhojayanti ye

original: patanti niraye ghore viḍbhuje nātra saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: patanti niraye ghore viḍbhuje na atra saṃśayaḥ
madhu grāhaḥ vaitaraṇīm ākrośī mūtra saṃjñake
asipatravane saucī krodhanaḥ ca ete id api

original: agnijvālāṃ mṛgavyādho bhojyate yatra vāyasaiḥ // GarP_2,3.70 //
analyzed: agni jvālām mṛgavyādhaḥ bhojyate yatra vāyasaiḥ
ijyāyām vrata lopāt ca sandaṃśe narake patet

original: skandante yadi vā svapne yatino brahmacāriṇaḥ // GarP_2,3.71 //
analyzed: skandante yadi vā svapne yatinaḥ brahmacāriṇaḥ
putraiḥ adhyāpitāḥ ye ca putraiḥ ājñāpitāḥ ca ye

original: te sarve narakaṃ yānti nirayaṃ cāpyabhojanam // GarP_2,3.72 //
analyzed: te sarve narakam yānti nirayam ca api abhojanam
varṇa āśrama viruddhāni krodha harṣa samanvitāḥ

original: karmāṇi ye tu kurvanti sarve nirayavāsinaḥ // GarP_2,3.73 //
analyzed: karmāṇi ye tu kurvanti sarve niraya vāsinaḥ
upariṣṭāt sthitaḥ ghoraḥ uṣṇa ātmā rauravaḥ mahān

original: sudāruṇaḥ suśītātmā tasyā dhastāmasaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_2,3.74 //
analyzed: su dāruṇaḥ su śīta ātmā tasyāḥ dhaḥ tāmasaḥ smṛtaḥ
evamādi krameṇa eva sarve dhaḥ dhaḥ paristhitāḥ

original: duḥ khotkarṣaśca sarveṣu karmasvapi nimittataḥ // GarP_2,3.75 //
analyzed: duḥ kha utkarṣaḥ ca sarveṣu karmasu api nimittataḥ
sukha utkarṣaḥ ca sarvatra dharmasya iha nimitataḥ
paśyanti narakān devāḥ hi adhas vaktrān su dāruṇān
nārakāḥ ca api te devān sarvān paśyanti ūrdhva gān
etāni ānyāni śataśas narakāṇi viyat gate
dine dine tu narake pacyate dahyate nyatas
śīryate bhidyate nyatra cūryate klidyate nyatas
kvathyate dīpyate nyatra tathā vāta hataḥ nyatas

original: ekaṃ dinaṃ varṣaśatapramāṇaṃ narake bhavet // GarP_2,3.79 //
analyzed: ekam dinam varṣa śata pramāṇam narake bhavet
tatas sarveṣu nistīrṇaḥ pāpī tiryaktvam aśnate
kṛmi kīṭa pataṅgeṣu sthāvara ekaśapheṣu ca
gatvā vana gaja āḍhyeṣu tathā eva ca
śvaḥ śvataraḥ gauraḥ śarabhaḥ camarī tathā

original: ete caikaśaphāḥ ṣaṭ ca śṛṇu pañcanakhānataḥ /
analyzed: ete ca eka śaphāḥ ṣaṭ ca śṛṇu pañcanakhān atas

original: anyāsu bahupāpāsu duḥ khadāsu ca yo niṣu // GarP_2,3.82 //
analyzed: anyāsu bahu pāpāsu dus kha dāsu

original: mānuṣyaṃ prāpyate kubjo kutsito vāmano 'pi vā /
analyzed: mānuṣyam prāpyate vā
caṇḍāla pukkasa ādyāsu nara yoniṣu jāyate
muhur garbhe vasanti eva mriyante ca muhur muhur

original: avaśiṣṭena pāpena puṇyena ca samanvitaḥ // GarP_2,3.84 //
analyzed: avaśiṣṭena pāpena puṇyena ca samanvitaḥ
tatas ca ārohiṇīm yonim śūdra vaiśya nṛpa ādikam
vipra deva indra tām ca api kadācid adhirohati
evam tu pāpa karmāṇaḥ nirayeṣu patanti adhas

original: yathā puṇyakṛto yānti tanme nigadataḥ śṛṇu // GarP_2,3.86 //
analyzed: yathā puṇya kṛtaḥ yānti tat me nigadataḥ śṛṇu

original: te yamena vinirdiṣṭāṃ yoniṃ puṇyagatiṃ narāḥ /
analyzed: te yamena vinirdiṣṭām yonim puṇya gatim narāḥ
pragīta gandharva gaṇāḥ nṛtya utsava samākulāḥ
hāra nūpura mādhuryaiḥ śobhitāni amalāni tu
prayānti āśu vimānāni divya gandha sraj ujjvalāḥ
tasmāt ca pracyutāḥ rājñām anyeṣām ca mahātmanām

original: jāyante nīrujāṃ gehe sa dvṛttipīrapālakāḥ // GarP_2,3.89 //
analyzed: jāyante nīrujām gehe sa dvṛtti pīra pālakāḥ
bhogān samprāpnuvanti ugrān tatas yānti ūrdhvam anyathā
avarohiṇīm samprāpya pūrvavat yanti mānavāḥ

original: jātasya mṛtyuloke vai prāṇino maraṇaṃ dhruvam /
analyzed: jātasya mṛtyu loke vai prāṇinaḥ maraṇam dhruvam
pāpiṣṭhānām adaḥ mārgāt jīvaḥ niṣkramate dhruvam

original: pṛthivyāṃ līyate pṛthvī āpaścaiva tathāpsu ca /
analyzed: pṛthivyām līyate pṛthvī āpaḥ ca eva tathā apsu ca

original: tejastejasi līyate samīre ca samīraṇaḥ // GarP_2,3.92 //
analyzed: tejaḥ tejasi līyate samīre ca samīraṇaḥ
ākāśe ca tathā ākāśam sarva vyāpi niśākare

original: tatra kāmastathā krodhaḥ kāye pañcendriyāṇi ca // GarP_2,3.93 //
analyzed: tatra kāmaḥ tathā krodhaḥ kāye pañca indriyāṇi ca

original: ete tārkṣya samākhyātā dehe tiṣṭhanti taskarāḥ /
analyzed: ete tārkṣya samākhyātāḥ dehe tiṣṭhanti taskarāḥ

original: kāmaḥ krodho hyahaṅkāro manastatraiva nāyakaḥ // GarP_2,3.94 //
analyzed: kāmaḥ krodhaḥ hi ahaṅkāraḥ manaḥ tatra eva nāyakaḥ
saṃhāraḥ ca eva sau puṇya pāpena saṃyutaḥ
pañca indriya samāyuktaḥ sakalaiḥ vibudhaiḥ saha

original: praviśetsa nave dehe pṛhe daradhe guhī yathā /
analyzed: praviśet sa nave dehe pṛhe daradhe guhī yathā

original: śarīre ye samāsīnāḥ sarve vai sapta dhātavaḥ // GarP_2,3.96 //
analyzed: śarīre ye samāsīnāḥ sarve vai sapta dhātavaḥ

original: ṣāṭkauśiko hyayaṃ kāyaḥ sarve vātāśca dehinām /
analyzed: ṣāṭkauśikaḥ hi ayam kāyaḥ sarve vātāḥ ca dehinām

original: mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ tadyogādye cānye vyādhayastathā // GarP_2,3.97 //
analyzed: mūtram purīṣam tad yogāt ye ca anye vyādhayaḥ tathā

original: pittaṃ śleṣmā tathā majjā māṃsaṃ vai meda eva ca /
analyzed: pittam śleṣmā tathā majjā māṃsam vai medaḥ eva ca

original: asthi śukraṃ tathā snāyurdehena saha dahyati // GarP_2,3.98 //
analyzed: asthi śukram tathā snāyuḥ dehena saha dahyati
eṣa te kathitaḥ tārkṣya vināsaḥ sarva dehinam

original: kathayāmi punasteṣāṃ śarīraṃ ca yathā bhavet // GarP_2,3.99 //
analyzed: kathayāmi punar teṣām śarīram ca yathā bhavet
eka stambam snāyu baddham sthūṇā traya vibhūṣaṇam
indriyaiḥ ca samāyuktam nava dvāram śarīrakam
viṣayaiḥ ca samākrāntam kāma krodha samākulam
rāga dveṣa samākīrṇam tṛṣṇā durgama taskaram
lobha jāla paricchinnam moha vastreṇa veṣṭitam
su baddham māyayā ca etat lobhena adhiṣṭhitam puram
etat guṇa samākīrṇam śarīram sarva dehinām

original: ātmānaṃ ye na jānanti te narāḥ paśavaḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_2,3.103 //
analyzed: ātmānam ye na jānanti te narāḥ paśavaḥ smṛtāḥ
evam eva samākhyātam śarīram te caturvidham
caturaśīti lakṣāṇi nirmitāḥ yonayaḥ purā
udbhid jāḥ sveda jāḥ ca eva aṇḍa jāḥ ca jarāyu jāḥ
etat te sarvam ākhyātam nirayasya prapañcataḥ

original: athayāmi kramaprāptaṃ praṣṭu vā vartate spṛhā // GarP_2,3.106 //
analyzed: athayāmi krama prāptam praṣṭu vā vartate spṛhā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe dharmakāṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde narakatatpraveśanirgamanādivarṇanaṃ nāma tṛtīyo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe dharmakāṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde narakatatpraveśanirgamanādivarṇanam nāma tṛtīyaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca
jñānataḥ jñānataḥ vā api yat naraiḥ kaluṣam kṛtam

original: tasya pāpasya śuddhyarthaṃ vidheyā niṣkṛtirnaraiḥ // GarP_2,4.1 //
analyzed: tasya pāpasya śuddhi artham vidheyā niṣkṛtiḥ naraiḥ
bhasma ādi snāna daśakam ādau kuryāt vicakṣaṇaḥ
yathāśakti ṣaṣ abda ādi pratyāmnāyāt caret api

original: tadardhaṃ vā tadardhaṃ vā tadardhārdhamathāpi vā /
analyzed: tad ardham vā tad ardham vā tad ardha ardham atha api vā

original: yathāśaktyā tataḥ kuryāddaśa dānāni vai śṛṇu // GarP_2,4.3 //
analyzed: yathāśaktyā tatas kuryāt daśa dānāni vai śṛṇu
go bhū tila hiraṇya ājya vāsaḥ dhanya guḍāḥ tathā

original: rajataṃ lavaṇaṃ caiva dānāni daśa vai viduḥ // GarP_2,4.4 //
analyzed: rajatam lavaṇam ca eva dānāni daśa vai viduḥ

original: prāyaścitte tvāgatā ye tebhyo dadyānnaro daśa /
analyzed: prāyaścitte tu āgatāḥ ye tebhyaḥ dadyāt naraḥ daśa
tatas yama dvāra pathe pūya śoṇita saṃkule

original: nadīṃ vaitaraṇīṃ tartuṃ dadyādvaitaraṇīṃ ca gām /
analyzed: nadīm vaitaraṇīm tartum dadyāt vaitaraṇīm ca gām

original: kṛṣṇastanī sakṛṣṇāṅgī sā vai vaitaraṇī smṛtā // GarP_2,4.6 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇa stanī sa kṛṣṇa aṅgī sā vai vaitaraṇī smṛtā

original: tilā lohaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca karpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā /
analyzed: tilāḥ loham hiraṇyam ca karpāsam lavaṇam tathā

original: saptadhānyaṃ kṣitirgāva ekaikaṃ pāvanaṃ smṛtam // GarP_2,4.7 //
analyzed: saptadhānyam kṣitiḥ gāvaḥ ekaikam pāvanam smṛtam
etāni aṣṭau mahā dānāni uttamāya dvijātaye

original: ātureṇa tu deyāni padarūpāṇi me śṛṇu // GarP_2,4.8 //
analyzed: ātureṇa tu deyāni pada rūpāṇi me śṛṇu
chatrā u pānaha vastrāṇi mudrikā ca kamaṇḍaluḥ

original: āsanaṃ bhājanaṃ padaṃ cāṣṭavidhaṃ smṛtam // GarP_2,4.9 //
analyzed: āsanam bhājanam padam ca aṣṭavidham smṛtam

original: tilāpātraṃ sarpiḥ pātraṃ śayyā sopaskarā tathā /
analyzed: tila apātram sarpiḥ pātram śayyā sa upaskarā tathā

original: etatsarvaṃ pradātavyaṃ yadiṣṭaṃ cātmano 'pi tat // GarP_2,4.10 //
analyzed: etat sarvam pradātavyam yat iṣṭam ca ātmanaḥ api tat

original: aśvo rathaśca mahīṣī vyañjanaṃ vastrameva ca /
analyzed: aśvaḥ rathaḥ ca mahī iṣī vyañjanam vastram eva ca
brāhmaṇebhyaḥ pradātavyam brahma pūrvam api svayam
dānā ni anyāni api khaga tarpayet svīya śaktitaḥ

original: prāyāścittaṃ kṛtaṃ yena daśa dānānyapi kṣitau // GarP_2,4.12 //
analyzed: prāyāścittam kṛtam yena daśa dānāni api kṣitau
dānam goḥ vaitaraṇyāḥ ca dānāni aṣṭau tathā api vā

original: tilapātraṃ sarpiḥ pātraṃ śayyādānaṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_2,4.13 //
analyzed: tila pātram sarpiḥ pātram śayyā dānam tathā eva ca
pada dānam ca vidhivat na asau niraya garbha gaḥ
svātantryeṇa api lavaṇa dānam icchanti sūrayaḥ
viṣṇu deha samutpannaḥ yatas yam lavaṇaḥ rasaḥ

original: āturasya yadā prāṇā na yānti vasudhātale // GarP_2,4.15 //
analyzed: āturasya yadā prāṇāḥ na yānti vasudhā tale

original: lavaṇaṃ ca tadā deyaṃ dvārasyodvāṭanaṃ divaḥ /
analyzed: lavaṇam ca tadā deyam dvārasya udvāṭanam divaḥ

original: yānikāni ca dānāni svayaṃ dattāni mānavaiḥ // GarP_2,4.16 //
analyzed: yānikāni ca dānāni svayam dattāni mānavaiḥ
tāni tāni ca sarvāṇi upatiṣṭhanti ca agratas

original: prāyaścittaṃ kṛtaṃ yena sāṅgaṃ khaga sa vai pumān // GarP_2,4.17 //
analyzed: prāyaścittam kṛtam yena sa aṅgam khaga sa vai pumān
pāpāni bhasmasātkṛtvā svarga loke mahīyate

original: amṛtaṃ tu gavāṃ kṣīraṃ yataḥ patagasattam // GarP_2,4.18 //
analyzed: amṛtam tu gavām kṣīram yatas pataga sattam
tasmāt dadāti yaḥ dhenum amṛta tvam sa gacchati

original: dānānyaṣṭau tu dattvā vai gandharvanilaye vaset // GarP_2,4.19 //
analyzed: dānāni aṣṭau tu dattvā vai gandharvanilaye vaset

original: ālayastatra raudre hi dahyate yena mānavaḥ /
analyzed: ālayaḥ tatra raudre hi dahyate yena mānavaḥ

original: chatradānena succhāyā jāyate pathi tuṣṭidā // GarP_2,4.20 //
analyzed: chatra dānena su chāyā jāyate pathi tuṣṭi dā
asipatravanam dhāram atikrāmati vai sukham
aśva ārūḍhaḥ ca vrajati dadate yadi upānahau
bhojana āsana dānena sukham mārge bhunakti vai

original: pradeśe nirjale dātā sukhī syādvai kamaṇḍaloḥ // GarP_2,4.22 //
analyzed: pradeśe nirjale dātā sukhī syāt vai kamaṇḍaloḥ
yama dūtāḥ mahā raudrāḥ karālāḥ kṛṣṇa piṅgalāḥ
na pīḍayanti dākṣiṇyāt vastra ābharaṇa dānataḥ

original: tilapātraṃ tu viprāya dattaṃ patraratha dhruvam /
analyzed: tila pātram tu viprāya dattam patraratha dhruvam
nāśayet trividham ṣāpam vāc manaḥ kāya sambhavam
ghṛta pātra pradāne rudra loke vaset naraḥ
sarva upaskara saṃyuktām śayyām dattvā dvijātaye
nānā apsarobhiḥ ākīrṇam vimānam adhirohati
ṣaṣṭi varṣa sahasrāṇi krīḍitvā śakra mandire
indra lokāt paribhraṣṭaḥ iha loke nṛpaḥ bhavet
sarva upaskaraṇa upetam yuvānam doṣa varjitam

original: yo 'śvaṃ dadāti viprāya svargaloke ca tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: yaḥ śvam dadāti viprāya svarga loke ca tiṣṭhati

original: yāvanti romāṇi haye bhavanti hi khageśvara // GarP_2,4.28 //
analyzed: yāvanti romāṇi haye bhavanti hi khageśvara
tāvataḥ rājitān lokān āpnuvanti hi puṣkalān
caturbhiḥ turagaiḥ yuktam sarva upakaraṇaiḥ yutam

original: rathaṃ dvijātaye dattvā rājasūyaphalaṃ labht // GarP_2,4.30 //
analyzed: ratham dvijātaye dattvā rājasūya phalam

original: dugdhādhikāṃ ca mahiṣīṃ navameghavarṇāṃ santuṣṭatarṇakavalīṃ jaghanābhirāmām /
analyzed: dugdha adhikām ca mahiṣīm nava megha varṇām santuṣṭa tarṇa kavalīm jaghana abhirāmām

original: dattvā suvarṇatilakāṃ dvijapuṅgavāya lokodayaṃ sa jayatīti kimatra citram // GarP_2,4.31 //
analyzed: dattvā suvarṇa tilakām dvija puṅgavāya loka udayam sa jayati iti kim atra citram
tālavṛntasya dānena vāyunā vījyate pathi
kānti yuj subhagaḥ śrīmān bhavati ambara dānataḥ
rasa anna upaskara yutam gṛham viprāya yā ūrpayet

original: na hīyate tasya vaṃśaḥ svargaṃ prāpnotyanuttamam // GarP_2,4.33 //
analyzed: na hīyate tasya vaṃśaḥ svargam prāpnoti anuttamam
bhavati atra khaga śreṣṭha
śraddhā aśraddhā vibhedena dāna gaurava lāghavāt
tatas yena ambu dānāni kṛtāni atra rasāḥ tathā
tadā khaga tathā āhlādam āpadi pratipadyate
annāni yena dattāni śraddhā pūtena cetasā

original: so 'pi tṛptimavāpnoti vināpyannena vai tadā // GarP_2,4.36 //
analyzed: tṛptim avāpnoti vinā api annena vai tadā
āsanne maraṇe kuryāt saṃnyāsam ced vidhānataḥ
āvarteta punar na asau brahma bhūyāya kalpate
āsanna maraṇaḥ matyaḥ ced tīrtham pratinayite
tīrtha prāptau bhavet muktiḥ mriyate yadi mārga gaḥ

original: padepade kratusamaṃ bhavettasya na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_2,4.38 //
analyzed: pade pade kratu samam bhavet tasya na saṃśayaḥ
gṛhṇīyāt ced anaśanam vratam vidhivat āgate

original: mṛtyau na so 'pi saṃsāre bhūyaḥ paryaṭati dvija // GarP_2,4.39 //
analyzed: mṛtyau na saḥ pi saṃsāre bhūyas paryaṭati dvija
kim dānam iti turyasya praśnasya uttaram īritam
dāha mṛtyoḥ antare kim iti praśna uttaram śṛṇu

original: gataprāṇaṃ tato jñātvā snātvā putrādirāśu tam /
analyzed: gata prāṇam tatas jñātvā snātvā putra ādiḥ āśu tam
śavam jalena śuddhena kṣālayet avicārayān
paridhāpya ahate vastre candanaiḥ prokṣayet tanum

original: tato mṛtasya sthāne vai ekoddiṣṭaṃ samācaret // GarP_2,4.42 //
analyzed: tatas mṛtasya sthāne vai ekoddiṣṭam samācaret
prayoga pūrvam dāhasya yogyatā ādiḥ yathā bhavet

original: āṃsanaṃ prākṣaṇa ca syānna syādetaccatuṣṭayam // GarP_2,4.43 //
analyzed: āṃsanam ca syāt na syāt etat catuṣṭayam
āvāhana arcana ca eva
bhavet dāna anna saṅkalpaḥ piṇḍa dānam sadā bhavet
dadyāt akṣayyam udakam na syāt etat trayam punar
svadhāvācanam āśīḥ ca tilakam ca khaga uttama
ghaṭam dadyāt sa māṣa annam dadyāt lohasya dakṣiṇām

original: piṇḍasya cālanaṃ proktaṃ naiva proktamidaṃ trikam /
analyzed: piṇḍasya cālanam proktam nā eva proktam idam trikam
pracchādana visargau ca svastivācanakam tathā

original: eṣu ṣaṭsu vidhiḥ proktaḥ śrāddheṣu malineṣu te /
analyzed: eṣu ṣaṭsu vidhiḥ proktaḥ śrāddheṣu malineṣu te

original: ṣaḍeva maraṇasthāne dvāri cātvarike tathā // GarP_2,4.48 //
analyzed: ṣaṭ eva maraṇasthāne dvāri cātvarike tathā
viśrāme kāṣṭha cayane tathā sañcayane khaga

original: mṛtisthāne śavo nāma bhūmistuṣyati devatā // GarP_2,4.49 //
analyzed: mṛti sthāne śavaḥ nāma bhūmiḥ tuṣyati devatā
pānthaḥ dvāri bhavet tena prītā syāt vāstu devatā
catvare khecaraḥ tena tuṣyet bhṛta ādidevatā
viśrāme bhūta saṃjñaḥ yam tuṣṭaḥ tena diśaḥ daśa

original: citāyāṃ sādhaka iti sañcitau preta ucyate // GarP_2,4.51 //
analyzed: citāyām sādhakaḥ iti sañcitau pretaḥ ucyate
tila darbha ghṛta idhāṃsi gṛhītvā tu suta ādayaḥ

original: gāthāṃ yamasya sūktaṃ vāpyadhīyānā vrajanti hi // GarP_2,4.52 //
analyzed: gāthām yamasya sūktam vā api adhīyānāḥ vrajanti hi
ahar ahar nīyamānaḥ gām aśvam puruṣam vṛṣam

original: vaivasvato na tṛpyeta surayā tviva durmatiḥ // GarP_2,4.53 //
analyzed: vaivasvataḥ na tṛpyeta surayā tu iva durmatiḥ

original: imāṃ gāthamapeteti sūktaṃ vā pathi saṃpaṭhet /
analyzed: imām gātham apeta iti sūktam vā pathi saṃpaṭhet
dakṣiṇasyām diśi araṇyam vrajeyuḥ sarva bāndhavāḥ
pathi śrāddha dvayam kuryāt pūrva ukta vidhinā khaga

original: tataḥ śanairbhūtale vai dakṣiṇāśirasaṃ śavam // GarP_2,4.55 //
analyzed: tatas śanais bhū tale vai dakṣiṇā śirasam śavam
sthāpayitvā citā bhūmau pūrva uktam śrāddham ācaret
tṛṇa kāṣṭha tila ājya ādi svayam ninyuḥ suta ādayaḥ

original: śūdrānītaiḥ kṛtaṃ karma sarvaṃ bhavati niṣphalam /
analyzed: śūdra ānītaiḥ kṛtam karma sarvam bhavati niṣphalam
prācīnāvītinā bhāvyam dakṣiṇa abhimukena ca
vedī tatra prakartavyā yathāśāstram atha aṇḍaja

original: pratevastraṃ dvidhā kṛtvārdhena taṃ chādayettataḥ // GarP_2,4.58 //
analyzed: pratevastram dvidhā kṛtvā ardhena tam chādayet tatas
ardham śmaśāna vāsa artham bhūmau eva kṣipet

original: tataḥ pūrvoktavidhinā piṇḍaṃ pretakare nyaset // GarP_2,4.59 //
analyzed: tatas pūrva ukta vidhinā piṇḍam preta kare nyaset
ājyena abhyañjanam kāryam sarva aṅgeṣu śavasya ca

original: dāhamṛtyorantarāle vidhiḥ piṇḍasya taṃ śṛṇu // GarP_2,4.60 //
analyzed: dāha mṛtyoḥ antarāle vidhiḥ piṇḍasya tam śṛṇu
pūrva uktaiḥ pañcabhiḥ piṇḍaiḥ śavasya āhuti yogya tā

original: anyathā copaghātācca rākṣasādyā bhavanti hi // GarP_2,4.61 //
analyzed: anyathā ca upaghātāt ca rākṣasa ādyāḥ bhavanti hi
saṃmṛjya ca upalipya atha ullikhya uddhṛtya vedikām
abhyukṣya upasamādhāya vahnim tatra vidhānataḥ
