original: śrautena tu vidhānena hyāhitāgniṃ dahedvudhaḥ // GarP_2,4.63 //
analyzed: śrautena tu vidhānena hi āhitāgnim dahet vudhaḥ
caṇḍāla agnim citā agnim ca patita agnim parityajet
tvam bhūta kṛt jagat yoniḥ tvam loka paripālakaḥ
upasaṃhara tasmāt tvam enam svargam naya amṛtam
iti kravyādam abhyarcya śarīra āhutim ācaret
ardha dagdhe tathā dehe dadyāt ājya āhutim tatas
asmāt tvam adhijātaḥ si tvat ayam jāyatām punar

original: asau svargāya lokāya svāhetyuktvā tu nāmataḥ /
analyzed: asau svargāya lokāya svāhā iti uktvā tu nāmataḥ
evam ājya āhutim dattvā tila miśrām sa mantrakam

original: roditavyaṃ tato gāḍhamevaṃ tasya sukhaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: roditavyam tatas gāḍham evam tasya sukham bhavet
dāhasya anantaram tatra kṛtvā sañcaya nikriyām
preta piṇḍam pradadyāt ca dāha ārti śamanam khaga
tatas pradakṣiṇam kṛktvā citā prasthāna vīkṣakāḥ
kaniṣṭha pūrvāḥ snāna artham gaccheyuḥ sūkta jāpakāḥ

original: tato jālasamīpe tu gatvā prakṣālya cāṃśukam // GarP_2,4.70 //
analyzed: tatas jāla samīpe tu gatvā prakṣālya ca aṃśukam
paridhāya punar tat ca brṛyuḥ tam puruṣam prati

original: udakaṃ tu kariṣyāmaḥ sacailaṃ puruṣāstataḥ // GarP_2,4.71 //
analyzed: udakam tu kariṣyāmaḥ sa cailam puruṣāḥ tatas
kurudhvam iti eva vadet śata varṣa avare mṛte

original: putrādyā vṛddhapūrvāste ekavastrāḥ śikhāṃ vinā // GarP_2,4.72 //
analyzed: putra ādyāḥ vṛddha pūrvāḥ te eka vastrāḥ śikhām vinā
prācīnāvītinaḥ sarve viśeyuḥ mauninaḥ jalam
apanaḥ śośucat agham anena pitṛ diṅmukhāḥ
jala avaghaṭṭanam na kuryuḥ snāna kārakāḥ

original: tatastaṭe samāgatya śikhāṃ baddhvā ṛjūn kuśān // GarP_2,4.74 //
analyzed: tatas taṭe samāgatya śikhām baddhvā ṛjūn kuśān
dakṣiṇa agra hastayoḥ tu kṛtvā atha sa tilam jalam

original: ādāyāñjalinā yāmyāṃ duḥ khī paitṛkatīrthataḥ // GarP_2,4.75 //
analyzed: ādāya añjalinā yāmyām duḥ khī paitṛka tīrthataḥ
eka vāram tri vāram vā daśa vāram atha api vā

original: bhūmāvaśmani vā sarve kṣipeyurvāgyatāḥ khaga // GarP_2,4.76 //
analyzed: bhūmau aśmani vā sarve kṣipeyuḥ vāgyatāḥ khaga
tṛpyantu tṛpyatām vā api tarpayāmi upatiṣṭhatām
preta etat amuka gotrā iti ukteṣu evam samuccaret
jala añjalau kṛte paścāt vidheyam dantadhāvanam

original: tyajanti gotriṇaḥ sarve dināni nava kāśyapa // GarP_2,4.78 //
analyzed: tyajanti gotriṇaḥ sarve dināni nava kāśyapa
tatas uttīrya udakāt vai vastrāṇi paridhāya ca
snāna vastram sakṛt pīḍya viśeyuḥ śuci bhū tale
aśru pātam na kurvīta dattvā dāha jala añjalim

original: śleṣmāśru bāndhavairmuktaṃ preto bhuṅkte yato 'vaśaḥ // GarP_2,4.80 //
analyzed: śleṣma aśru bāndhavaiḥ muktam pretaḥ bhuṅkte yatas vaśaḥ

original: ato na roditavyaṃ hi kriyāḥ kāryāḥ svaśaktitaḥ /
analyzed: atas na roditavyam hi kriyāḥ kāryāḥ sva śaktitaḥ
tatas teṣu upaviṣṭeṣu purāṇa jñaḥ sukṛt svakaḥ
śoka apanodam kurvīta saṃsāra anitya tām bruvan
mānuṣye kadalīstanbhe asāre sāra mārgaṇam
karoti yaḥ sa saṃmūḍhaḥ jala budh vat rasannibhe

original: pañcadhā saṃbhṛtaḥ kāyo yadi pañcatvamāgataḥ // GarP_2,4.83 //
analyzed: pañcadhā saṃbhṛtaḥ kāyaḥ yadi pañcatvam āgataḥ
karmabhiḥ sva śarīra utthaiḥ tatra kā paridevanā
gantrī vasumatī nāśam udadhiḥ daivatāni ca

original: phenaprakhyaḥ kathaṃ nāśaṃ martyaloko na yāsyati /
analyzed: phena prakhyaḥ katham nāśam martya lokaḥ na yāsyati
evam saṃśrāvayet tatra mṛdu śādvala saṃsthitān
te saṃśrutya gaccheyuḥ gṛham bāla puras sarāḥ

original: vidaśya rnibapatrāṇi niyatā dvāri veśmanaḥ // GarP_2,4.86 //
analyzed: vidaśya niyatā dvāri veśmanaḥ
ācamya vahni salilam gomayam gaurasarṣapān
dūrvā pravālam vṛṣabham anyat api atha maṅgalam
praviśeyuḥ samālabhya kṛtvā aśmani padam śanais

original: śrautena tu vidhānena āhitāgniṃ dehadvadhaḥ // GarP_2,4.88 //
analyzed: śrautena tu vidhānena āhitāgnim deha dvadhaḥ
ūna dvi varṣam nikhanet na kuryāt udakam tatas
yoṣit pativratā yā syāt bhartāram yā anugacchati
prayoga pūrvam bhartāram namaskṛtya āruhet citim

original: citibhraṣṭā tu yā mohātsā prājāpatyamācaret // GarP_2,4.90 //
analyzed: citi bhraṣṭā tu yā mohāt sā prājāpatyam ācaret

original: tisraḥ koṭyordhakoṭī ya yāni lomāni mānuṣe /
analyzed: tisraḥ yāni lomāni mānuṣe
tāvatkālam vaset svarge bhartāram yā anugacchati
vyāla grāhī yathā vyālam bilāt uddharate balāt

original: tadvaduddhṛtya sā nārī tenaiva saha modate // GarP_2,4.92 //
analyzed: tadvat uddhṛtya sā nārī tena eva saha modate
tatra sā bhartṛ paramā stūyamānā apsaraḥ gaṇaiḥ
krīḍate patinā sārdham yāvat indrāḥ caturdaśa

original: brahmaghno vā kṛghno vā mittrighno vā bhavetpatiḥ /
analyzed: brahma ghnaḥ vā kṛ ghnaḥ vā mittri ghnaḥ vā bhavet patiḥ

original: punātyavidhavā nārī tamādāya mṛtā tu yā // GarP_2,4.94 //
analyzed: punāti avidhavā nārī tam ādāya mṛtā tu yā
mṛte bhartari yā nārī samārohet hutāśanam
sā arandhatī sama ācārā svarga loke mahīyate

original: yāvaccāgnau mṛte patyau strī nātmānaṃ pradāhayet /
analyzed: yāvat ca agnau mṛte patyau strī na ātmānam pradāhayet

original: tāvanna mucyate sā hi strīśarīrātkathañcana // GarP_2,4.96 //
analyzed: tāvat na mucyate sā hi strī śarīrāt kathañcana

original: mātṛkaṃ paitṛkaṃ caiva yatra caiva pradīyate /
analyzed: mātṛkam paitṛkam ca eva yatra ca eva pradīyate
kula trayam punāti eṣā bhartāram yā anugacchati

original: ārtārte mudite hṛṣṭā proṣite malinā kṛśā /
analyzed: ārta ārte mudite hṛṣṭā proṣite malinā kṛśā

original: mṛte mriyeta yā patyau sā strī jñeyā pativratā // GarP_2,4.98 //
analyzed: mṛte mriyeta yā patyau sā strī jñeyā pativratā

original: pṛthak citāṃ samāruhya na priyā gantumarhati /
analyzed: pṛthak citām samāruhya na priyā gantum arhati
kṣattriya ādyāḥ savarṇāḥ ca āroheyuḥ api iha tāḥ
cāṇḍālīm avadhim kṛtvā brāhmaṇītaḥ samaḥ vidhiḥ
a garbhiṇīnām sarvāsām a bāla tākma ekānām api

original: dahanasya vidhiḥ proktaḥ sāmānyena mayā khaga /
analyzed: dahanasya vidhiḥ proktaḥ sāmānyena mayā khaga
viśeṣam api tasya asya kañcid kim śrotum icchati
garuḍaḥ uvāca
proṣite tu mṛte svāmini asthni nāśam upeyuṣi

original: kathaṃ dāhaḥ prakartavyastanme vada jagatpate // GarP_2,4.102 //
analyzed: katham dāhaḥ prakartavyaḥ tat me vada jagatpate
śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: asthīni cenna labhyante proṣitasya narasya ca /
analyzed: asthīni ced na labhyante proṣitasya narasya ca

original: teṣāñca hi gatisthānaṃ vidhānaṃ kathayāmyaham // GarP_2,4.103 //
analyzed: teṣām ca hi gati sthānam vidhānam kathayāmi aham

original: śṛṇu tārkṣya paraṃ gopyaṃ patyurdurmaraṇeṣu yat /
analyzed: śṛṇu tārkṣya param gopyam patyuḥ durmaraṇeṣu yat
laṅghanaiḥ ye mṛtāḥ jīvām daṃṣṭribhiḥ ca abhighātitāḥ
kaṇṭha grahe vilagnānām kṣīṇānām tuṇḍa ghātinām
viṣa agni vṛṣa viprebhyaḥ viṣūcyā ca ātma ghātakāḥ
patana udbandhana jalaiḥ mṛtānām śṛṇu saṃsthitim
sarpa vyāghraiḥ śṛṅgibhiḥ ca upasarga upala udakaiḥ
brāhmaṇaiḥ śvāpadaiḥ ca eva patanaiḥ vṛkṣa vaidyutaiḥ
nakhaiḥ lohaiḥ gireḥ pātaiḥ bhitti pātaiḥ bhṛgoḥ tathā
kaṭvāyām antarikṣe ca caura cāṇḍālataḥ tathā
udakyā śunakī śūdra rajaka ādi vibhūṣitāḥ
ūrdhva ucachiṣṭa adhara ucchiṣṭa ubhaya ucchiṣṭāḥ tu ye mṛtāḥ
śastra ghātaiḥ mṛtāḥ ye ca asi aśva spṛṣṭāḥ tathā eva ca

original: tattu durmaraṇaṃ jñeyaṃ yacca jātaṃ vidhaiṃ vinā /
analyzed: tat tu durmaraṇam jñeyam yat ca jātam vidhaim vinā

original: tena pāpena narakān bhuktvā pretatvabhāginaḥ // GarP_2,4.110 //
analyzed: tena pāpena narakān bhuktvā preta tva bhāginaḥ
na teṣām kārayet dāham sūtakam na udakakriyām

original: na vidhānaṃ mṛtādyañca na kuryā daurdhvadaihikam // GarP_2,4.111 //
analyzed: na vidhānam mṛta ādyam ca na kuryāḥ daurdhvadaihikam
na piṇḍa dānam kartavyam pramādāt ced karoti hi
na upatiṣṭhati tat sarvam antarikṣe vinaśyati
atas tasya sutaiḥ pauttraiḥ sapiṇḍaiḥ śubham icchubhiḥ
nārāyaṇa baliḥ kāryaḥ loka garhā bhiyā khaga
tathā teṣām bhavet śaucam na anyathā iti abravīt yamaḥ
kṛte nārāyaṇa balau aurdhvadehika yogyatā
tasya suddhi karam karma tat bhavet na tat anyathā

original: nārāyaṇabaliṃ samyak tīrthe sarvaṃ prakpayet // GarP_2,4.115 //
analyzed: nārāyaṇa balim samyak tīrthe sarvam
kṛṣṇa agre kārayet bipraiḥ yena pūtaḥ bhavet naraḥ

original: pūrvantu tarpaṇaṃ kāryaṃ vipraiḥ paurāṇavaidikaiḥ // GarP_2,4.116 //
analyzed: pūrvam tu tarpaṇam kāryam vipraiḥ paurāṇa vaidikaiḥ
sarva oṣadhi akṣataiḥ miśraiḥ viṣṇum uddiśya tarpayet
kāryam puruṣasūktena mantraiḥ vā vaiṣṇavaiḥ api
dakṣiṇa abhimukhaḥ bhūtvā pretam viṣṇum iti smaran
akṣayaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ preta mokṣa pradaḥ bhava
tarpaṇasya avasāne syāt vīta rāgaḥ vimatsaraḥ
jita indriya manāḥ bhūtvā śuciṣmān dharma tatparaḥ

original: bhaktyā tatra prakurvīta śrāddhānyekādaśaiva tu // GarP_2,4.120 //
analyzed: bhaktyā tatra prakurvīta śrāddhāni ekādaśa eva tu
sarva karma vidhāne ekaika agre samāhitaḥ
toya vrīhi yavān dadyāt godhūmān ca priyaṅgavaḥ

original: haviṣyānnaṃ śubhaṃ mudrāṃ chatroṣṇīṣe ca dāpayet /
analyzed: haviṣya annam śubham mudrām chatra uṣṇīṣe ca dāpayet
dāpayet sarva saṃsyāni kṣīram kṣaudra samānvitam
vastra upānaha saṃyuktam dadyāt aṣṭavidham padam
dpayet sarva pāpebhyaḥ na kuryāt paṅkti vañcanam
bhūmau sthiteṣu piṇḍeṣu gandha puṣpa akṣata anvitam
dātavyam sarvam viprebhyaḥ veda śāstra vidhānataḥ

original: śaṅkhe khaḍge 'tha vā tāmre tarpaṇañca pṛthakpṛthak /
analyzed: śaṅkhe khaḍge vā tāmre tarpaṇam ca pṛthak pṛthak
dhyāna dhāraṇa saṃyuktaḥ jānubhyām avanīm gataḥ
ṛcā vai dāpayet argham arghoddiṣṭam pṛthak pṛthak

original: brahmā viṣṇuśca rudraśca yamaḥ pretaśca pañcamaḥ // GarP_2,4.126 //
analyzed: brahmā viṣṇuḥ ca rudraḥ ca yamaḥ pretaḥ ca pañcamaḥ
pṛthak kumbhe tatas sthāpyāḥ pañcaratna samanvitāḥ
vastra yajñopavītāni pṛthak mudgāḥ padāni ca
pañca śrāddhāni kurvīta devatānām yathāvidhi
jala dhārām tatas kuryāt piṇḍe piṇḍe pṛthak pṛthak

original: śaṅkhe vā tāmrapātre vā alābhe mṛnmaye pi vā /
analyzed: śaṅkhe vā tāmra pātre vā alābhe mṛd maye vā
tila udakam samādāya sarva oṣadhim asanvitam
tāmra pātram tilaiḥ pūrṇam sa hiraṇyam sa dakṣiṇam
dadyāt brāhmaṇa mukhyāya pada dānam
yama uddeśe tilān lauham tatas dadyāt ca dakṣiṇām

original: evaṃ viṣṇubaliṃ dattvā yathāśaktyā vidhānataḥ // GarP_2,4.131 //
analyzed: evam viṣṇu balim dattvā yathāśaktyā vidhānataḥ

original: samuddharati tatkṣipraṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇa nāgadaṃśānmṛto yastu viśeṣastantu me śṛṇu // GarP_2,4.132 //
analyzed: samuddharati tat kṣipram na atra kāryā vicāraṇa nāga daṃśāt mṛtaḥ yaḥ tu viśeṣaḥ tantu me śṛṇu
suvarṇa bhāra niṣpannam nāgam kṛtvā tathā eva gām
viprāya dattvā vidhivat pituḥ ānṛṇyam āpnuyāt
evam sarpa balim dattvā sarpa doṣāt vimucyate
paścāt puttalakam kāryam sarva oṣadhi samanvitam

original: palāśasya ca vṛntānāṃ vibhāgaṃ śṛṇu kāśyapa /
analyzed: palāśasya ca vṛntānām vibhāgam śṛṇu kāśyapa
kṛṣṇājinam samāstīrya kuśaiḥ ca puruṣa ākṛtim
śata trayeṇa ṣaṣṭyā ca vṛntaiḥ proktaḥ sthi sañcayaḥ

original: vinyasya tāni vṛntāni aṅgeṣveṣu pṛthak pṛthak // GarP_2,4.136 //
analyzed: vinyasya tāni vṛntāni aṅgeṣu eṣu pṛthak pṛthak
catvāriṃśat śiraḥ bhāge grīvāyām daśa vinyaset
viṃśati uraḥ sthale dadyāt viṃśatim jaṭhare tathā
bāhu dvaye śatam dadyāt kaṭi deśe ca viṃśatim
ūru dvaye śatam ca api triṃśat jaṅghā dvaye nyaset
dadyāt catuṣṭayam śiśne ṣaṣ dadyāt vṛṣāṇa dvaye
daśa pāda aṅgulī bhāge evam asthīni vinyaset

original: nārikelaṃ śiraḥ sthāneṃ tumbaṃ dadyācca tāluke /
analyzed: nārikelam śiraḥ tumbam dadyāt ca tāluke
pañcaratnam mukhe dadyāt jihvāyām kadalī phalam
antreṣu nālikam tat yāt vālukā aṅghrāṇe eva ca
vasāyām mṛttikām dadyāt haritāla manaḥ śilāḥ

original: pāradaṃ retasaḥ sthāne purīṣe pittalaṃ tathā /
analyzed: pāradam retasaḥ sthāne purīṣe pittalam tathā

original: manaḥ śilā tathā gātre tilapakvantu sandhiṣu // GarP_2,4.142 //
analyzed: manaḥ śilā tathā gātre sandhiṣu

original: yavapiṣṭaṃ yathā māṃse madhu śoṇitameva ca /
analyzed: yava piṣṭam yathā māṃse madhu śoṇitam eva ca

original: keśeṣu ca jaṭājūṭaṃ tvacāyāñca mṛgatvacam // GarP_2,4.143 //
analyzed: keśeṣu ca jaṭā jūṭam tvacāyām ca mṛga tvacam
karṇayoḥ tāla patram ca stanayoḥ ca eva guñjikāḥ
nāsāyām śatapatram ca kamalam nābhi maṇḍale
vṛntākam vṛṣaṇa dvandve liṅge syāt gṛñjanam śubham

original: ghṛtaṃ nābhyāṃ pradeyaṃ syātkau pīne ca trapusmṛtam // GarP_2,4.145 //
analyzed: ghṛtam nābhyām pradeyam syāt kau pīne ca trapu smṛtam
mauktikam stanayoḥ mūrdhni kuṅkuma iva vilepanam
karpūra aguru dhūpaiḥ ca śubhaiḥ mālyaiḥ sugandhibhiḥ
paridhānam paṭṭasūtram hṛdaye ca eva vinyaset

original: ṛddhivṛddhī bhujau dvau ca cakṣurbhyāñca kapardakam // GarP_2,4.147 //
analyzed: ṛddhi vṛddhī bhujau dvau ca cakṣurbhyām ca kapardakam
danteṣu dāḍimī bījāni aṅgulīṣu ca campakam
sindūram netra koṇe ca tāmbūla ādi upahārakam
sarva oṣadi yutam pretam kṛtvā pūjām yathā uditām

original: sāgnike cāpi vidhinā yajñapātraṃ nyasyetkramāt // GarP_2,4.149 //
analyzed: sa agnike ca api vidhinā yajña pātram nyasyet kramāt

original: striyaḥ punantu ma śira imaṃ me varuṇena ca /
analyzed: striyaḥ punantu me śiraḥ imam me varuṇena ca
pretasya pāvanam kṛtvā śālagrāma śilā udakaiḥ
viṣṇum uddiśya dātavyā su śīlā gauḥ payasvinī

original: tilā lauhaṃ hiraṇyañca karpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā // GarP_2,4.151 //
analyzed: tilāḥ lauham hiraṇyam ca karpāsam lavaṇam tathā
saptadhānyam kṣitiḥ gāvaḥ ekaikam pāvanam smṛtam

original: tilapātraṃ tato dadyātpadadānaṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_2,4.152 //
analyzed: tila pātram tatas dadyāt pada dānam tathā eva ca
kartavyam vaiṣṇavam śrāddham preta mukti artham ātmanaḥ

original: pretamokṣaṃ tataḥ kuryāddhṛdi viṣṇuṃ prakalpyaca // GarP_2,4.153 //
analyzed: pretamokṣam tatas kuryāt hṛdi viṣṇum prakalpya ca
evam puttalakam kṛtvā dāhayet vidhi pūrvakam

original: tacchruddhaye tu saṃskartā putrādirniṣkṛtiṃ caret // GarP_2,4.154 //
analyzed: tad śruddhaye tu saṃskartā putra ādiḥ niṣkṛtim caret
trīn kṛcchrān ṣaṭ dvādaśa ca tathā pañcadaśa api ca
prāyaścitta nimitta anusāreṇa vipra vat smṛtaḥ
aśaktau go hiraṇya ādi pratyāmnāyam caret api
ātmanaḥ na adhikāri tve śuddhim evam caret vundhaḥ
aśuddhena tu yat dattam uddiśya aśuddhim eva ca
na upatiṣṭhati tat sarvam antarikṣe vinaśyati
śuddhim sampādya kartavyam dahana ādi aurdhvadehikam

original: akṛtvā niṣkṛtiṃ yastu kurute dahanādikam // GarP_2,4.158 //
analyzed: a kṛtvā niṣkṛtim yaḥ tu kurute dahana ādikam
mati pūrvam amatyā ca kramāt tad niṣkṛtim śṛṇu

original: kṛtvāgnimudakaṃ snānaṃ sparśanaṃ vahanaṃ kathām // GarP_2,4.159 //
analyzed: kṛtvā agnim udakam snānam sparśanam vahanam kathām
rajju cheda aśru pātam ca taptakṛcchreṇa śudhyati

original: eṣāmanyatamaṃ pretaṃ yo vahettu dehata vā // GarP_2,4.160 //
analyzed: eṣām anyatamam pretam yaḥ vahet tu vā
kaṭa udakakriyām kṛtvā kṛcchra sāntapanam caret

original: nimitte laghuni svalpaṃ mahanmahati kalpayet // GarP_2,4.161 //
analyzed: nimitte laghuni su alpam mahat mahati kalpayet
garuḍaḥ uvāca
kṛcchrasya taptakṛcchrasya tathā sāntapanasya ca

original: lakṣaṇaṃ brūhi me svāmiṃstrayāṇāmapi suvrata // GarP_2,4.162 //
analyzed: lakṣaṇam brūhi me svāmin trayāṇām api suvrata
śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca
tri aham prātar tri aham sāyam tri aham adyāt a yācitam
upavāsaḥ tri ahan ca eva eṣa kṛcchraḥ udāhṛtaḥ
tapta kṣīra ghṛta ambūnām ekaikam pratyaham pibet
eka rātra upavāsaḥ ca taptakṛcchraḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: gomūtraṃ gomayaṃ kṣīraṃ dadhi sarpiḥ kuśodakam /
analyzed: go mūtram gomayam kṣīram dadhi sarpiḥ kuśa udakam
jagdhvā pare hni upavaset kṛcchram sāntapanam caran

original: mayā te 'yaṃ samākhyāto durmṛtasya vidhiḥ khaga /
analyzed: mayā te yam samākhyātaḥ durmṛtasya vidhiḥ khaga
tadā mṛtam vijānīyāt dīpa nirvāṇam āgataḥ
agni dāham tatas kuryāt sūtakam ca dina trayam
daśa aham kartavyam preta pūrvakam

original: evaṃ vidhiṃ tataḥ kuryāttataḥ pretaśca muktibhāk /
analyzed: evam vidhim tatas kuryāt tatas pretaḥ ca mukti bhāj

original: mṛtabhrāntyā pratikṛteḥ kṛte dāhe sa vai yadi // GarP_2,4.168 //
analyzed: mṛta bhrāntyā pratikṛteḥ kṛte dāhe sa vai yadi
tena kartavyam majjanam ghṛkuṇḍake
jātakarma ādi saṃskārāḥ kartavyāḥ punar eva tu
ūḍhām eva svakām bhāryām udvahet vidhivat pumān

original: varṣe pañcadaśe pakṣin dvādaśe vā gate sati // GarP_2,4.170 //
analyzed: varṣe pañcadaśe pakṣin dvādaśe vā gate sati
a jñātasya proṣitasya kṛtvā pratikṛtim dahet
rajasvalā sūtikayoḥ viśeṣam maraṇe śṛṇu
sūtikāyām mṛtāyāntu evam kurvanti yājñikāḥ

original: kumbhe salilamādāya pañcagavyaṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_2,4.172 //
analyzed: kumbhe salilam ādāya pañcagavyam tathā eva ca
puṇyābhiḥ abhimantrya apaḥ vācā śuddhim labhet tatas
śata sūrpa udakena ādau snāpayitvā yathāvidhi
tena eva snāpayitvā tu dāham kuryāt svageśvara

original: pañcabhiḥ snāpayitvā tu gavyaiḥ pretāṃ rajasvalām // GarP_2,4.174 //
analyzed: pañcabhiḥ snāpayitvā tu gavyaiḥ pretām rajasvalām
vastra antara ākṛtim kṛtvā dāhayet vidhi pūrvakam

original: mṛtasya pañcake dāhavidhiṃ vacmi śṛṇuṣva me // GarP_2,4.175 //
analyzed: mṛtasya pañcake dāha vidhim vacmi śṛṇuṣva me
ādau kṛtvā dhaniṣṭhā ardham etat nakṣatra pañcakam

original: revatyantaṃ sadā dūṣyamaśubhaṃ sarvadā bhavet // GarP_2,4.176 //
analyzed: revatī antam sadā dūṣyam aśubham sarvadā bhavet
dāhaḥ tatra na kartavyaḥ viṣādaḥ sarva jantuṣu

original: na jalaṃ dīyate teṣu aśubhaṃ sarvadā bhavet // GarP_2,4.177 //
analyzed: na jalam dīyate teṣu aśubham sarvadā bhavet
pañcaka anantaram sarvam kāryam kartavyam anyathā
puttrāṇām gotriṇām tasya santāpaḥ pi upajāyate
gṛhe hāniḥ bhavati eva ṛkṣeṣu eṣu mṛtasya ca

original: atha vā ṛkṣamadye ca dāhastu vidhipūrvakaḥ // GarP_2,4.179 //
analyzed: atha vā ṛkṣa madye ca dāhaḥ tu vidhi pūrvakaḥ
kriyate mānuṣāṇām tu sa vai āhuti pūrvakaḥ
vipraiḥ vidhiḥ atas kāryaḥ mantraiḥ tu vidhi pūrvakam
śava sthāna samīpe tu kṣeptavyāḥ puttalāḥ tatas
darbha kḷptāḥ tu catvāraḥ ṛkṣa mantra abhimantritāḥ
tatas dāhaḥ prakartavyaḥ taiḥ ca puttalakaiḥ saha

original: sūtakānte tadā puttraiḥ kāryaṃ śāntikapauṣṭikam // GarP_2,4.182 //
analyzed: sūtaka ante tadā puttraiḥ kāryam śāntika pauṣṭikam

original: pañcakeṣu mṛto yo 'sau na satiṃ labhate naraḥ /
analyzed: pañcakeṣu mṛtaḥ na satim labhate naraḥ

original: tilān gāñca suvarṇañca tamuddiśya ghṛtaṃ dadet // GarP_2,4.183 //
analyzed: tilān gān ca suvarṇam ca tam uddiśya ghṛtam dadet
viprāṇām dāpayet dānam sarva vighna vināśanam
bhojana upānahau chattram hema mudrā ca vāsasī
dakṣiṇā dīyate vipre pātakasya pramocanaḥ
yam samākhyātaḥ vidhiḥ pañca haraḥ sthitaḥ
saṃyaminyām yathāyānam yathāvarṣam mṛta kriyā

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde dahanavidhikṛcchralakṣaṇadagdhāgamanarajasvalāmaraṇavidhipañcakamaraṇaprāyaścittanirūpaṇaṃ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde dahana vidhi kṛcchra lakṣaṇa dagdha āgamana rajasvalā maraṇa vidhi pañcaka maraṇa prāyaścitta nirūpaṇam
nāma caturthaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: evaṃ dagdhvā naraṃ pretaṃ snātvā kṛtvā tilodakam /
analyzed: evam dagdhvā naram pretam snātvā kṛtvā tilodakam

original: agrataḥ strījano gacchedvrajeyuḥ pṛṣṭhato narāḥ // GarP_2,5.1 //
analyzed: agratas strī janaḥ gacchet vrajeyuḥ pṛṣṭhatas narāḥ
prāśayet nimba patrāṇi rudantaḥ nāma pūrvakam
vidhātavyam ca ācamanam pāṣāṇa upari saṃsthite

original: te praviśya gṛhaṃ sarve sutādyāśca sapiṇḍakāḥ /
analyzed: te praviśya gṛham sarve suta ādyāḥ ca sapiṇḍakāḥ

original: bhaveyurdaśarātraṃ vai yata āśaucakaṃ khaga // GarP_2,5.3 //
analyzed: bhaveyuḥ daśa rātram vai yatas āśaucakam khaga
krīta labdha aśanāḥ sarve svapeyuḥ te pṛthak pṛthak
a kṣāra lavaṇa annāḥ syuḥ nimajjeyuḥ ca te tri aham
a māṃsa bhojanāḥ ca adhas śayīran brahmacāriṇaḥ
parasparam na saṃspṛṣṭāḥ dāna adhyayana varjitāḥ
malināḥ ca adhomukhāḥ ca dīnāḥ bhoga vivarjitāḥ
aṅga saṃvāhanam keśa mārjanam varjayanti te

original: mṛnmaye patraje vāpi bhuñjīraṃste ca bhājane /
analyzed: mṛd maye patra je vā api bhuñjīran te ca bhājane

original: uvāsantu te kuryurekāhamatha vā tryaham // GarP_2,5.7 //
analyzed: te kuryuḥ eka aham atha vā tri aham
garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: āśaucina iti proktamāśaucasya ca vai prabho /
analyzed: āśaucinaḥ iti proktam āśaucasya ca vai prabho

original: lakṣaṇaṃ kiṃ kiyatkālaṃ bhāvyaṃ vā tadyutairnaraiḥ // GarP_2,5.8 //
analyzed: lakṣaṇam kim kiyatkālam bhāvyam vā tad yutaiḥ naraiḥ
uvāca
apanodyantu idam kāla ādibhiḥ āśu niṣedha kṛt
piṇḍa adhyayana dāna ādeḥ tiśayaḥ hi tat
daśa aham śāvam āśaucam sapiṇḍeṣu vidhīyate
janane pi evam eva syāt nipuṇam śuddhim icchatām
janmani eka udakānām tu tri rātrāt śuddhiḥ iṣyate
śāvasya śeṣāt śudhyanti tri ahāt udaka dāyinaḥ
ā danta jananat sadyas ā caulāt naiśikī smṛtā
tri rātram ā vrata ādeśāt daśa rātram atas param
āśaucam te samākhyātam saṃkṣepāt prakṛtam bruve

original: jalaṃ tridivamākāśe sthāpyaṃ kṣīrañca mṛnmaye // GarP_2,5.13 //
analyzed: jalam tridivam ākāśe sthāpyam kṣīram ca mṛd maye
atra snāhi piba atra iti mantreṇa anena kāśyapa

original: kāṣṭhatraye guṇairbaddhe prītyai rātrau catuṣpathe // GarP_2,5.14 //
analyzed: kāṣṭha traye guṇaiḥ baddhe prītyai rātrau catuṣpathe

original: prathame 'hni tṛtīye vā saptame navame tathā /
analyzed: prathame hni tṛtīye vā saptame navame tathā

original: asthisaṃcayanaṃ kāryaṃ dine tadgotrajaiḥ saha // GarP_2,5.15 //
analyzed: asthisaṃcayanam kāryam dine tad gotra jaiḥ saha
tad ūrdhvam aṅga saṃsparśaḥ sapiṇḍānām vidhīyate
yogyāḥ sarva kriyāṇām ca samāna salilāḥ tathā
preta piṇḍam bahis dadyāt darbha mātra vivarjitam

original: prāgudīcyāṃ caruṃ kṛtvā snātvā prayatamānasaḥ // GarP_2,5.17 //
analyzed: prāc udīcyām carum kṛtvā snātvā prayata mānasaḥ
bhūmau asaṃskṛtānām ca saṃskṛtānām kuśeṣu ca
navabhiḥ divasaiḥ piṇḍān nava dadyāt samāhitaḥ
daśamam piṇḍam utsṛjya rātri śeṣe śuciḥ bhavet

original: asagotraḥ sagotro vā yadi strī yati vā pumān // GarP_2,5.19 //
analyzed: asagotraḥ sagotraḥ vā yadi strī yati vā pumān
prathame hani yaḥ dadyāt sa daśa aham samāpayet
śālinā saktubhiḥ vā api śākaiḥ vā api atha nirvapet
prathame hani yat dravyam tat eva syāt daśāhikam
yāvadāśaucam ekaikasya añjaleḥ dānam ucyate
yat vā yasmin dine dānam tasmin tad dina saṃkhyayā
daśa ahe ñjalayaḥ pakṣin pañcāśat antime
dvi vṛddhyā vā bhavet pakṣin añjalīnām śatam punar

original: yadāhi tryahamāśaucaṃ tadā vāñjalayo daśa // GarP_2,5.23 //
analyzed: yadā hi tri aham āśaucam tadā vā añjalayaḥ daśa
trayaḥ ñjalayaḥ evam tu prathame hanivai tadā
catvāraḥ tu dvitīye hni tṛtīye syuḥ trayaḥ tathā
śata añjali yadā pakṣin ādye triṃśat tadā ahani
catvāriṃśat dvitīye hni triṃśat ahni tṛtīyake
evam jalasya añjalayaḥ vibhājyāḥ pakṣayoḥ dvayoḥ
sarveṣu pitṛ kāryeṣu putraḥ mukyaḥ dhikāravān
piṇḍa prasekaḥ tūṣṇīm ca puṣpa dhūpa ādikam tathā
daśame hani samprāpte snānam grāmāt vahis caret
tatra tyājyāni vāsāṃsi keśa śmaśru nakhāni ca

original: vipraḥ śudhyatyapaḥ spṛṣṭvā kṣattriyo vāhanaṃ tathā // GarP_2,5.28 //
analyzed: vipraḥ śudhyati apaḥ spṛṣṭvā kṣattriyaḥ vāhanam tathā

original: vaiśyaḥ pratodaṃ raśmīnvā śūdro yaṣṭiṃ kṛtakriyaḥ /
analyzed: vaiśyaḥ pratodam raśmīn vā śūdraḥ yaṣṭim kṛta kriyaḥ
mṛtāt alpa vayobhiḥ ca sapiṇḍaiḥ parivāpanam
kāryan tu ṣoḍaśī ṣaḍbhiḥ piṇḍaiḥ daśabhiḥ ā eva ca
prathamā malinā hi etaiḥ ādaśa aham mṛteḥ bhavet
dināni daśa yān ṣiṇḍān kurvanti atra suta ādayaḥ

original: pratyahaṃ te vibhajyante caturbhāgaiḥ khagottama // GarP_2,5.31 //
analyzed: pratyaham te vibhajyante catur bhāgaiḥ khaga uttama
bhāga dvayena dehaḥ syāt tṛtīyena yama anugāḥ
tṛpyanti hi caturthena svayam api upajīvati
ahorātraiḥ tu navabhiḥ dehaḥ niṣpattim āpnuyāt

original: śirastvādyena piṇḍena pretasya kriyate tathā // GarP_2,5.33 //
analyzed: śiraḥ tva ādyena piṇḍena pretasya kriyate tathā
dvitīyena tu karṇa akṣi nāsikam tu samāsatas
gala aṃsa bhuja vakṣaḥ ca tṛtīyena tathā kramāt
caturthena ca piṇḍena nābhi liṅga gudam tathā

original: jānujaṅghaṃ tathā pādau pañcamena tu sarvadā // GarP_2,5.35 //
analyzed: jānu jaṅgham tathā pādau pañcamena tu sarvadā
sarva marmāṇi ṣaṣṭhena saptamena tu nāḍayaḥ
danta lomāni aṣṭamena vīryantu navamena ca
daśamena tu pūrṇa tvam tṛpta tā kṣudh viparyayaḥ

original: madhyamāṃ ṣoḍaśīṃ vacmi vainateya śṛṇuṣva me // GarP_2,5.37 //
analyzed: madhyamām ṣoḍaśīm vacmi vainateya śṛṇuṣva me
viṣṇava ādi viṣṇu paryantāni ekādaśa tathā khaga
śrāddhāni pañca devānām iti eṣām madhyaṣīḍaśī

original: nimittaṃ durmatiṃ kṛtvā yadi nārāyaṇo baliḥ /
analyzed: nimittam durmatim kṛtvā yadi nārāyaṇaḥ baliḥ

original: ekādaśāhe kartavyo vṛṣotsargo 'pi tatra vai // GarP_2,5.39 //
analyzed: ekādaśa ahe kartavyaḥ tatra vai
ekādaśa ahe pretasya na u vṛṣaḥ

original: pretatvaṃ susthiraṃ tasya dattaiḥ śrāddhaśatairapi // GarP_2,5.40 //
analyzed: preta tvam su sthiram tasya dattaiḥ śrāddha śataiḥ api
a kṛtvā yat vṛṣotsargam kṛtam vai piṇḍapātanam

original: niṣphalaṃ sakalaṃ vidyātpramītāya na tadbhavet // GarP_2,5.41 //
analyzed: niṣphalam sakalam vidyāt pramītāya na tat bhavet
vṛṣotsargāt ṛte na anyat kiñcid asti mahī tale

original: putraḥ patnyatha dauhitraḥ pitā vā duhitātha vā // GarP_2,5.42 //
analyzed: putraḥ patnī atha dauhitraḥ pitā vā duhitā atha vā
mṛtāt anantaram tasya dhruvam kāryaḥ vṛṣotsavaḥ
catur vatsatarī yuktaḥ yasya utsṛjyeta vā vṛṣaḥ

original: alaṅkṛto vidhānena pretatvaṃ tasya no bhavet /
analyzed: alaṅkṛtaḥ vidhānena preta tvam tasya no bhavet
ekādaśe hni samprāpte vṛṣa alābhaḥ bhavet yadi

original: darbhaiḥ piṣṭaistu sampādya taṃ vṛṣaṃ mocayedvudhaḥ /
analyzed: darbhaiḥ piṣṭaiḥ tu sampādya tam vṛṣam mocayet vudhaḥ
vṛṣotsarjana velāyām
kathañcana
mṛttikābhiḥ tu darbhaiḥ vā vṛṣam kṛtvā vimocayet
yat iṣṭam jīvataḥ tasya dadyāt ekādaśe hani
mṛtam uddiśya dātavyam śayyā dhenu ādikam tathā
viprān bahūn bhojayīta pretasya kṣudh viśāntaye

original: tṛtīyāṃ ṣoḍaśīṃ vacmi vainateya śṛṇuṣva tām /
analyzed: tṛtīyām ṣoḍaśīm vacmi vainateya śṛṇuṣva tām

original: dvādaśa pratimāsyāni ādyaṃ ṣāṇmāsikaṃ tathā // GarP_2,5.48 //
analyzed: dvādaśa pratimāsyāni ādyam ṣāṇmāsikam tathā
sapiṇḍīkaraṇam ca eva tṛtīyā ṣoḍaśī matā

original: dvādaśāhe tripakṣe ca ṣaṇmāse māsike 'bdike // GarP_2,5.49 //
analyzed: dvādaśa ahe tri pakṣe ca ṣaṣ māse māsike bdike
tṛtīyām ṣoḍaśīm enām vadanti mata bhedataḥ

original: yasyaitā ni na dattāni pretaśrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa // GarP_2,5.50 //
analyzed: yasya etāni na dattāni pretaśrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa
piśāca tvam sthiram tasya dattaiḥ śrāddha śataiḥ api

original: ekādaśe dvādaśe vā dine ādyaṃ prakīrtitam // GarP_2,5.51 //
analyzed: ekādaśe dvādaśe vā dine ādyam prakīrtitam
māsa ādau pratimāsam ca śuddham mṛta tithau khaga
ekena ahnā tribhiḥ vā api hīneṣu vinatā suta
māsa ṣaṣ māsa varṣeṣu tri pakṣeṣu bhavanti hi
śrāddhāni atha asyāt sāpiṇḍyam pūrṇe varṣe tad ardhake
tri pakṣe bhyudaye vā api dvādaśa ahe vā nṛṇām
ānantyāt kula dharmāṇām puṃsām ca eva āyuṣaḥ kṣayāt
asthira tvāt śarīrasya dvādaśa ahe praśasyate

original: sapiṇḍīkaraṇeṣvevaṃ vidhiṃ pakṣīndra me śṛṇu // GarP_2,5.55 //
analyzed: sapiṇḍīkaraṇeṣu evam vidhim pakṣi indra me śṛṇu
ekoddiṣṭa vidhānena kāryam tat api kāśyapa
tila gandha udakaiḥ yuktam kuryāt pātra catuṣṭayam

original: pātraṃ pretasya tatraikaṃ pitryaṃ pātratrayaṃ tathā /
analyzed: pātram pretasya tatra ekam pitryam pātra trayam tathā
secayet pitṛpātreṣu pretapātram khaga triṣu
caturaḥ nirvapet piṇḍān pūrva anteṣu samāpayet

original: tataḥ prabhṛti vai pretaḥ pitṛsāmānyamaśnute // GarP_2,5.58 //
analyzed: tatas prabhṛti vai pretaḥ pitṛ sāmānyam aśnute
tatas pitṛ tvam āpanne tasmin prete khageśvara
śrāddha dharmaiḥ aśeṣaiḥ tu tad pūrvān arcayet pitṝn
ekaciti ārohaṇe ca eka ahni maraṇe tathā

original: sāpiṇḍyantu striyā nāsti mṛte bhartuḥ striyo bhavet // GarP_2,5.60 //
analyzed: sāpiṇḍyam tu striyāḥ na asti mṛte bhartuḥ striyaḥ bhavet
pāka aikyam atha kāla aikyam kartṛ aikyam ca bhavet khaga

original: śrāddhādau saha dāhe ca patipatnyorna saṃśayaḥ // GarP_2,5.61 //
analyzed: śrāddha ādau saha dāhe ca pati patnyoḥ na saṃśayaḥ
bhartuḥ mṛta titheḥ anya tithau citim atha āruhet

original: tāṃmṛtāhani tu samprāpte pṛthak piṇḍena yojayet // GarP_2,5.62 //
analyzed: tām mṛta ahani tu samprāpte pṛthak piṇḍena yojayet
pratyabdam ca yugapad tu samāpayet
yasya saṃvatsarāt arvāk sapiṇḍīkaraṇam bhavet
māsikam ca uda kumbham ca deyam tasya api vatsaram
navaśrāddham sapiṇḍa tvam śrāddhāni api ca ṣoḍaśa
ekena eva tu kāryāṇi saṃvibhakta dhaneṣu api
pitāmahībhiḥ sāpiṇḍyam tathā mātāmahaiḥ saha

original: uktaṃ bhartrāpi sāpiṇḍyaṃ striyā veṣayabhedataḥ // GarP_2,5.66 //
analyzed: uktam bhartrā api sāpiṇḍyam striyāḥ veṣa ya bhedataḥ

original: navaśrāddhasya te kālaṃ vakṣyāmi śṛṇu kāśyapa /
analyzed: navaśrāddhasya te kālam vakṣyāmi śṛṇu kāśyapa
maraṇa ahni mṛti sthāne śrāddham pakṣin prakalpayet

original: dvitīyañca tato mārge viśrāmo yatra kāritaḥ /
analyzed: dvitīyañca tatas mārge viśrāmaḥ yatra kāritaḥ
tatas sañcayana sthāne tṛtīyam śrāddham ucyate
pañcame saptame tadvat aṣṭame navame tathā

original: daśamaikādaśe caiva nava śrāddhāni vai khaga // GarP_2,5.69 //
analyzed: daśama ekādaśe ca eva nava śrāddhāni vai khaga

original: śrāddhāni nava caitāni tṛtīyā ṣoḍaśī smṛtā /
analyzed: śrāddhāni nava ca etāni tṛtīyā ṣoḍaśī smṛtā
ekoddiṣṭa vidhānena kāryāṇi manujaiḥ tathā

original: prathame 'hni tṛtīye vā pañcame saptame tathā /
analyzed: prathame hni tṛtīye vā pañcame saptame tathā
navama ekādaśe ca eva navaśrāddham prakīrtitam
ucyante ṣaḍ imāni iha nava syuḥ api yāga itas

original: uktāni te mayā tāni ṛṣīṇāṃ matabhedataḥ // GarP_2,5.72 //
analyzed: uktāni te mayā tāni ṛṣīṇām mata bhedataḥ
rūḍhi pakṣaḥ mama abhīṣṭaḥ yogaḥ kaiścid iha iṣyate
ādye dvitīye dātavyaḥ tathā eva ekam pavitrakam
pretāya piṇḍaḥ dātavyaḥ bhuktavatsu dvijātiṣu
yajamāna dvijanmanā
akṣayyam amukasya iti vaktavyam viratau tathā

original: ekoddiṣṭaṃ me nibodha cetthamāvatsaraṃ smṛtam // GarP_2,5.75 //
analyzed: ekoddiṣṭam me nibodha ca ittham āvatsaram smṛtam
sapiṇḍīkaraṇāt ūrdhvam yāni śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa
ekoddiṣṭa vidhānena caret vā pārvaṇāt ṛte

original: pratyabdaṃ yo yathā kuryāttathā kuryātsa tānyapi /
analyzed: pratyabdam yaḥ yathā kuryāt tathā kuryāt sa tāni api

original: ekādaśe dvādaśe 'hni preto bhuṅkte dinadvayam // GarP_2,5.77 //
analyzed: ekādaśe dvādaśe hni pretaḥ bhuṅkte dina dvayam
yoṣitaḥ puruṣasya api piṇḍam preta iti nirvapet

original: sāpiṇḍye tu kṛte tasya pretaśabdo nivartate // GarP_2,5.78 //
analyzed: sāpiṇḍye tu kṛte tasya preta śabdaḥ nivartate
dīpa dānam prakartavyam āvarṣantu gṛhāt bahis

original: annaṃ dīpo jalaṃ vastramanyadvādīyate ca yat // GarP_2,5.79 //
analyzed: annam dīpaḥ jalam vastram anyat vā ādīyate ca yat
tṛpti dam preta śabdena sapiṇḍīkaraṇa avadhi
abdakṛtyam mayā ukta ante samāsāt vinatā suta
vaivasvata gṛhe yānam yathā tat tu
trayodaśe hni saḥ
tvac gṛhīta ahi vat tārkṣya gṛhītaḥ yama kiṅkaraiḥ

original: tasminmārge vrajatyeko gṛhīta iva markaṭaḥ // GarP_2,5.82 //
analyzed: tasmin mārge vrajati ekaḥ gṛhītaḥ iva markaṭaḥ
vāyu agra sāri vat rūpam deham anyat prapadyate
tat piṇḍa jam pātana artham anyat tu pitṛ sambhavam
tad pramāṇa vayaḥ vasthā saṃsthānām pragbhavaḥ yathā
ṣaḍaśīti sahasrāṇi yojanānām pramāṇataḥ
adhva antarālikaḥ jñeyaḥ yama mānuṣa lokayoḥ
sādhika ardha krośa yutam yojanānām śata dvayam

original: catvāriṃ śattathā sapta pratyahaṃ yāti tatra saḥ /
analyzed: catvārim śat tathā sapta pratyaham yāti tatra saḥ
aṣṭācatvāriṃśatā ca traiṃśatā divasaiḥ iti
vaivasvata puram yāti kṛṣyamāṇaḥ yama anugaiḥ

original: evaṃ krameṇa yātabye mārge pāparataistu yat // GarP_2,5.87 //
analyzed: evam krameṇa yātabye mārge pāpa rataiḥ tu yat
jāyate sa prapañcam tat śṛṇu tvam aruṇānuja
trayodaśa dine dattaḥ pāśaiḥ baddhvā ati dāruṇaiḥ
yamasya aṅkuśa hastaḥ vai bhṛkuṭī kuṭila ānanaḥ
daṇḍa prahāra sambhrāntaḥ kṛṣyate dakṣiṇām diśam
kuśa kaṇṭaka valmīka śaṅku pāṣāṇa karkaśe
tathā pradīpta jvalane kvacid śvabhra śata utkaṭe
pradīpta āditya tapte ca dahyamānaḥ sa daṃśake
kṛṣyate yamadūtaiḥ ca śivā vat nāda bhīṣaṇaiḥ
prayātiḥ dāruṇe mārge pāpa karmā yamālaye
kalevare dahyamāne mahāntam kṣayam ṛcchati
bhakṣyamāṇe tathā eva aṅge bhidyamāne ca dāruṇam
chidyamāne cirataram jantuḥ duḥkham avāpnute
svena pākena deha antara gataḥ pi san

original: purāṇi ṣoḍaśāmuṣmanmārge tāni ca me śṛṇu // GarP_2,5.94 //
analyzed: purāṇi ṣoḍaśa amuṣmat mārge tāni ca me śṛṇu

original: yāmyaṃ sauripuraṃ nagedvabhavanaṃ gandharvaśailāgamau krauñcaṃ krūrapuraṃ vicitrabhavanaṃ bahvāpadaṃ duḥ khadam /
analyzed: yāmyam sauripuram nagedvabhavanam gandharva śaila āgamau krauñcam krūrapuram vicitrabhavanam bahvāpadam duḥ kha dam

original: nānākrandapuraṃ sutaptabhavanaṃ raudraṃ payovarṣaṇaṃ śītāḍhyaṃ bahubhītiṣoḍaśapurāṇyetānyadṛṣṭani te // GarP_2,5.95 //
analyzed: nānā ākranda puram su tapta bhavanam raudram payaḥ varṣaṇam śīta āḍhyam bahu bhīti ṣoḍaśa purāṇi etāni adṛṣṭani te

original: tatra yāmya puraṃ gacchanputraputreti ca bruvan /
analyzed: tatra yāmya puram gacchan putra putra iti ca bruvan

original: hāheti krandate nityaṃ svakṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ smaran // GarP_2,5.96 //
analyzed: hāhā iti krandate nityam sva kṛtam duṣkṛtam smaran
tārkṣya tat pura prāpnuyāt asau

original: puṣpabhadrā nadī yatra nyagrodhaḥ priyadarśanaḥ // GarP_2,5.97 //
analyzed: puṣpabhadrā nadī yatra nyagrodhaḥ priya darśanaḥ

original: viśrāmecchāṃ karotyatra kārayanti na te bhaṭāḥ /
analyzed: viśrāma icchām karoti atra kārayanti na te bhaṭāḥ

original: kṣitau dattaṃ sutaistasya snehādvā kṛpayā tathā // GarP_2,5.98 //
analyzed: kṣitau dattam sutaiḥ tasya snehāt vā kṛpayā tathā
māsikam piṇḍam aśnāti tatas sauri puram vrajet
vrajan evam pralapate mudgara āhati pīḍitaḥ

original: jalāśayo naiva kṛto mayā tadā manuṣyatṛptyai paśupakṣitṛptaya /
analyzed: jalāśayaḥ nā eva kṛtaḥ mayā tadā manuṣya tṛptyai paśu pakṣi tṛptaye

original: gotṛptihetorna ca gocaraḥ kṛtaḥ śarīra he nistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,5.100 //
analyzed: go tṛpti hetoḥ na ca gocaraḥ kṛtaḥ śarīra he nistara yat tvayā kṛtam

original: tatra nāmnā tu rājāsau jaṅgamaḥ kāmarūpadhṛk /
analyzed: tatra nāmnā tu rājā asau jaṅgamaḥ kāma rūpa dhṛk

original: bhayāt taddarśanājjātādbhuṅkte piṇḍaṃ sa śaṅkitaḥ // GarP_2,5.101 //
analyzed: bhayāt tad darśanāt jātāt bhuṅkte piṇḍam sa śaṅkitaḥ

original: tripakṣe jalasaṃyuktaṃ kṣitau dattaṃ tato vrajet /
analyzed: tri pakṣe jala saṃyuktam kṣitau dattam tatas vrajet
vrajan evam pralapate khaḍga āghāta prapīḍitaḥ

original: na nityadānaṃ na gavāhnikaṃ kṛtaṃ pustaṃ ca dattaṃ na hi vedaśāstrayoḥ /
analyzed: na nitya dānam na gavāhnikam kṛtam pustam ca dattam na hi veda śāstrayoḥ

original: purāṇadṛṣṭo na hi sevito 'dhvā śarīra he nistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,5.103 //
analyzed: purāṇa dṛṣṭaḥ na hi sevitaḥ śarīra he nistara yat tvayā kṛtam
naga indra nagaram gatvā bhuktvā ca annam tathāvidham

original: māsi dvitīye yaddattaṃ bāndhavaistu tato vrajet // GarP_2,5.104 //
analyzed: māsi dvitīye yat dattam bāndhavaiḥ tu tatas vrajet
vrajan evam pralapate kṛpāṇa tsaru tāḍitaḥ
parādhānam abhūt sarvam mama mūrkha śiromaṇeḥ
mahatā puṇya yogena mānuṣyam labdhavān aham

original: tṛtīye māsi samprāpte gandharvanagare śubham // GarP_2,5.106 //
analyzed: tṛtīye māsi samprāpte gandharvanagare śubham
tṛtīya māsikam piṇḍam tatra bhuktvā brajati asau
vrajan evam vilapate tad agreṇa āhataḥ pathi

original: mayā na dattaṃ na hutaṃ hutāśane tapo na taptaṃ himaśailagahvare /
analyzed: mayā na dattam na hutam hutāśane tapaḥ na taptam himaśaila gahvare

original: na sevitaṃ gāṅgamaho mahājalaṃ śarīra he nistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,5.108 //
analyzed: na sevitam gāṅgam aho mahā jalam śarīra he nistara yat tvayā kṛtam
turye śailāgamam māsi prāpnuyāt tatra varṣaṇam
tasya upari bhavet pakṣin pāṣāṇānām nirantaram
caturthamāsikam śrāddham bhuktvā tatra prasarpati
sa patan eva vilapan pāṣāṇa ādi atipīḍitaḥ

original: na jñānamārgo na ca yogamārgo na karmamārgo na ca bhaktimārgaḥ /
analyzed: na jñāna mārgaḥ na ca yoga mārgaḥ na karma mārgaḥ na ca bhakti mārgaḥ

original: na sādhusaṅgātkimapi śrutaṃ mayā śarīra he nistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,5.111 //
analyzed: na sādhu saṅgāt kim api śrutam mayā śarīra he nistara yat tvayā kṛtam

original: tataḥ krūrapura māsi pañcame yāti kāśyapa /
analyzed: tatas krūrapura māsi pañcame yāti kāśyapa

original: bhuvi dattaṃ piṇḍajalaṃ bhuktvā krūrapuraṃ vrajet // GarP_2,5.112 //
analyzed: bhuvi dattam piṇḍa jalam bhuktvā krūrapuram vrajet
vrajan evam vilapate paṭṭiśaiḥ pātitaḥ pathi

original: hā mātarhāpitarbhrātaḥ sutā hā hā mama striyaḥ // GarP_2,5.113 //
analyzed: hā mātar hā pitar bhrātar sutāḥ hā hā mama striyaḥ
yuṣmābhiḥ na upadiṣṭaḥ ham avasthām prāptaḥ īdṛśīm

original: evaṃ lālapyamānaṃ te yamadūtā vadantihi // GarP_2,5.114 //
analyzed: evam lālapyamānam te yamadūtāḥ vadanti hi

original: kva mātā kva pitā mūḍha kva jāyā kva sutaḥ suhṛt /
analyzed: kva mātā kva pitā mūḍha kva jāyā kva sutaḥ suhṛd

original: svakarmopārjite bhuṅkṣvaṃ mūrkha yātāściraṃ pathi // GarP_2,5.115 //
analyzed: sva karma upārjite bhuṅkṣvam mūrkha yātāḥ ciram pathi

original: jānāsi śambalamalaṃ balamadhvagānāṃ no 'śambalaḥ prayatate paralokagatyai /
analyzed: jānāsi śambalam alam balam adhvagānām na u śambalaḥ prayatate para loka gatyai

original: gantavyamasti tava niścitameva tena mārgeṇa yena na bhavet krayavikrayo 'pi // GarP_2,5.116 //
analyzed: gantavyam asti tava niścitam eva tena mārgeṇa yena na bhavet
ūna ṣāṇmāsike krauñce bhuktvā piṇḍantu sa udakam
ghaṭī mātram tu viśramya vicitra nagaram vrajet
vrajan evam vilapate śūla agreṇa vidāritaḥ

original: kutra yāmi na hi gāmi jīvitaṃ hā mṛtasya maraṇaṃ punarna vai /
analyzed: kutra yāmi na hi gāmi jīvitam hā mṛtasya maraṇam punar na vai

original: itthameva vilapan prayātyasau yātanārhadhṛtavigrahaḥ pati // GarP_2,5.119 //
analyzed: ittham eva vilapan prayāti asau yātanā arha dhṛta vigrahaḥ pati
vicitra nagare tatra vicitraḥ nāma pārithivaḥ

original: tatra ṣaṇmāsapiṇḍena tṛptaḥ san vrajate puraḥ // GarP_2,5.120 //
analyzed: tatra ṣaṣ māsa piṇḍena tṛptaḥ san vrajate puras
vrajan evam vilapate prāsa agreṇa prapīḍitaḥ

original: mātā bhrātā pitā putraḥ ko 'pi me vartate na vā /
analyzed: mātā bhrātā pitā putraḥ kaḥ pi me vartate na vā

original: yo māmuddharate pāpaṃ patantaṃ duḥ khasāgare // GarP_2,5.122 //
analyzed: yaḥ mām uddharate pāpam patantam duḥkha sāgare

original: vrajatastatra mārge tu tatra vaitaraṇī śubhā /
analyzed: vrajataḥ tatra mārge tu tatra vaitaraṇī śubhā
śata yojana vistīrṇā pūya śoṇita saṃkulā
āyāti tatra dṛśyante nāvikāḥ dhīvara ādayaḥ

original: te vadanti pradattā gauryadi vaitaraṇī tvayā /
analyzed: te vadanti pradattā gauḥ yadi vaitaraṇī tvayā

original: nāvamenāṃ samāroha sukenottara vai nadīm // GarP_2,5.124 //
analyzed: nāvam enām samāroha sukena uttara vai nadīm

original: tatra yena pradattā gauḥ sa sukhenaiva tāṃ taret /
analyzed: tatra yena pradattā gauḥ sa sukhena eva tām taret

original: adāyī tatra ghṛṣyeta karagrāhantu nāvikaiḥ // GarP_2,5.125 //
analyzed: a dāyī tatra ghṛṣyeta kara grāhantu nāvikaiḥ
ukhaiḥ kākaiḥ baka ulūkaiḥ tīkṣṇa tuṇḍaiḥ vitudyate

original: manujānāṃ hitaṃ dānamante vaitaraṇī khaga // GarP_2,5.126 //
analyzed: manujānām hitam dānam ante vaitaraṇī khaga

original: dattā pāpaṃ dahet sarvaṃ mama lokantu sā nayet /
analyzed: dattā pāpam dahet sarvam mama lokam tu sā nayet

original: maptame māsi samprāpte puraṃ bahvāpadaṃ mṛtaḥ // GarP_2,5.127 //
analyzed: maptame māsi samprāpte puram bahu āpadam mṛtaḥ

original: vrajettu sodakaṃ bhuktvā piṇḍaṃ vai saptamāsikam /
analyzed: vrajet tu sa udakam bhuktvā piṇḍam vai sapta māsikam
vrajan evam vilapate parigha āhati pīḍitaḥ

original: na dattaṃ na hutaṃ taptaṃ na snātaṃ na kṛtaṃ hitam /
analyzed: na dattam na hutam taptam na snātam na kṛtam hitam

original: yādṛśaṃ caritaṃ karma mūḍhātman bhuṅkṣva tādṛśam // GarP_2,5.129 //
analyzed: yādṛśam caritam karma mūḍha ātman bhuṅkṣva tādṛśam

original: māsyaṣṭame duḥ khade tu pare bhuktvātha sodakam /
analyzed: māsi aṣṭame duḥ kha de tu pare bhuktvā atha sa udakam

original: piṇḍaṃ prayātsayau tārkṣya nānākrandapuraṃ tataḥ // GarP_2,5.130 //
analyzed: piṇḍam prayāt sa yau tārkṣya nānā ākranda puram tatas
prayāṇe ca pravadate musala āghāta pīḍitaḥ
kva jāyā caṭulaiḥ cāṭu paṭubhiḥ vacanaiḥ mama
bhojanam bhallabhallībhiḥ musalaiḥ ca kva māraṇam

original: navame māsi dattaṃ vai nānākrandapure tataḥ // GarP_2,5.132 //
analyzed: navame māsi dattam vai nānā ākranda pure tatas
karuṇam nānā ākrandān karoti api

original: daśame māsi dattaṃ vai sutaptabhavanaṃ tataḥ // GarP_2,5.133 //
analyzed: daśame māsi dattam vai sutapta bhavanam tatas
saran evam vilapate halāhati hataḥ pathi
kva sūnu peśala karaiḥ pāda saṃvāhanam mama
kva dūta vajra pratimakaiḥ mad pada karṣaṇam

original: daśame māsi piṇḍādi tatra bhuktvā prasarpati // GarP_2,5.135 //
analyzed: daśame māsi piṇḍa ādi tatra bhuktvā prasarpati

original: māse caikādaśe pūrṇe puraṃ raudraṃ sa gacchati /
analyzed: māse ca ekādaśe pūrṇe puram raudram sa gacchati

original: gacchanneva vilapate yathā pṛṣṭhe prapīḍitaḥ // GarP_2,5.136 //
analyzed: gacchan eva vilapate yathā pṛṣṭhe prapīḍitaḥ
kva aham sa tūlī śayane parivartan kṣaṇe kṣaṇe
bhaṭa hasta bhraṣṭa yaṣṭi kṛṣṭa pṛṣṭhaḥ kva vā punar

original: kṣitau dattañca piṇḍādi bhuktvā tatra tato vrajet /
analyzed: kṣitau dattañca piṇḍa ādi bhuktvā tatra tatas vrajet
payovarṣaṇam iti etad nāmakam puram aṇḍaja
vrajan evam vilapate kuṭhāraiḥ mūrdhni tāḍitaḥ
kva bhṛtya komala karaiḥ gandha taila avasecanam
kva kīnāśa anugaiḥ krodhāt kuṭhāraiḥ śirasi vyathā

original: ūnābdikañca yacchrāddhaṃ tatra bhuṅkte suduḥ khitaḥ // GarP_2,5.140 //
analyzed: ūna ābdikam ca yat śrāddham tatra bhuṅkte su duḥ khitaḥ

original: saṃpūrṇe tu tato varṣe śītāḍhyaṃ nagaraṃ vrajet /
analyzed: saṃpūrṇe tu tatas varṣe śīta āḍhyam nagaram vrajet
gacchan evam churikayā chinna jihvaḥ tu roditi
priya ālāpaiḥ kva ca sa sa madhura tvasya varṇanam
ukta mātre si patra ādi jihvā chedaḥ kva ca eva hi
vārṣikam piṇḍa dāna ādi bhuktvā tatra prasarpati
bahu bhīti karam tat tat piṇḍa jam devam āsthitaḥ
prakāśayati pāppānam ātmānam ca vinindati
yoṣit api evam etasmin mārge vai paridevati

original: tato yāmyaṃ nātidūre nagaraṃ sa hi gacchati /
analyzed: tatas yāmyam na ati dūre nagaram sa hi gacchati
catvāriṃśat yojanāni catuḥ yukta ani vistṛtam

original: trayodaśa pratīhārāḥ śravaṇā nāma tatra vai /
analyzed: trayodaśa pratīhārāḥ śravaṇāḥ nāma tatra vai
śravaṇa akarmataḥ tuṣyanti anyathā krodham āpnuyuḥ
tatas tatra āśu raktākṣam bhinnāñjana caya upamam

original: mṛtyukālāntakādīnāṃ madhye paśyati vai yamam // GarP_2,5.147 //
analyzed: mṛtyu kāla antaka ādīnām madhye paśyati vai yamam
daṃṣṭrā karāla vadanam bhṛkuṭī dāruṇa ākṛtim
virūpaiḥ bhoṣaṇaiḥ vaktraiḥ vṛtam vyādhi śataiḥ prabhum
daṇḍa āsakta mahā bāhum pāśa hastam su bhairavam

original: tannirdiṣṭāṃ tato janturgatiṃ yāti śubhāśubhām // GarP_2,5.149 //
analyzed: tad nirdiṣṭām tatas jantuḥ gatim yāti śubha aśubhām

original: pāpī pāpāṃ gatiṃ yāti yathā te kathitaṃ purā /
analyzed: pāpī pāpām gatim yāti yathā te kathitam purā
chatra upānaha dātāraḥ ye ca veśma pradāyakāḥ

original: ye tu puṇyakṛtastatra te paśyanti yamaṃ tadā /
analyzed: ye tu puṇya kṛtaḥ tatra te paśyanti yamam tadā
saumya ākṛtim kuṇḍalinam maulimantam dhṛta śriyam

original: ekādaśe dvādaśe hi ṣaṇmāse ābdike tathā /
analyzed: ekādaśe dvādaśe hi ṣaṣ māse ābdike tathā

original: viprān bahūn bhojayet tatra yanmahatī kṣudhā // GarP_2,5.152 //
analyzed: viprān bahūn bhojayet tatra yat mahatī kṣudhā
jīvan putra kalatra ādi pradiṣṭam itaraiḥ khaga

original: yo na sādhayati svārthamevaṃ paścāddhikhidyate // GarP_2,5.153 //
analyzed: yaḥ na sādhayati sva artham evam paścāt hi khidyate
etat te sarvam ākhyātam saṃyaminyām yathāgati
proktam āvarṣa kṛtyam te kim anyat śrotum icchasi

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde varṣakṛtyayamalokamārgayātanādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma  #
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde varṣakṛtyayamalokamārgayātanādinirūpaṇam nāma
pañcamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
garuḍaḥ uvāca
api sādhana yuktasya tīrtha dāna ratasya ca

original: akṛte tu vṛṣotsarge paralokagatirna hi // GarP_2,6.1 //
analyzed: a kṛte tu vṛṣotsarge para loka gatiḥ na hi

original: tasmāt kṛṣṇa vṛṣotsargaḥ kartavya iti me śrutam /
analyzed: tasmāt kṛṣṇa vṛṣotsargaḥ kartavyaḥ iti me śrutam

original: kiṃ phalaṃ vṛṣayajñasya purā kena kṛto hare // GarP_2,6.2 //
analyzed: kim phalam vṛṣa yajñasya purā kena kṛtaḥ hare

original: anaḍvān kīdṛśaḥ proktaḥ kasmin kāle viśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: anaḍvān kīdṛśaḥ proktaḥ kasmin kāle viśeṣataḥ

original: ko vidhistasya nirdiṣṭaḥ sarvaṃ me kṛpayā vada // GarP_2,6.3 //
analyzed: kaḥ vidhiḥ tasya nirdiṣṭaḥ sarvam me kṛpayā vada
śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca
itihāsam mahā puṇyam pravakṣyāmi khageśvara

original: brahmaputreṇa yat proktaṃ rājānaṃ vīravāhanam // GarP_2,6.4 //
analyzed: brahma putreṇa yat proktam rājānam vīravāhanam
virādha nagare rājā vīravāhana nāmakaḥ
dharma ātmā satya sandhaḥ ca vadānyaḥ vipratuṣṭi kṛt
sa kadācid vanam vīraḥ mahātmā ākheṭakam gataḥ
kiñcid praṣṭu manāḥ tārkṣya vasiṣṭhasya āśramam yayau
namaskṛtya munim tatra kṛta āsana parigrahaḥ
paśraya avanataḥ rājā papraccha ṛṣi saṃsadi
rājā uvāca

original: mune mayā kṛto dharmo yathāśakti prayatnataḥ /
analyzed: mune mayā kṛtaḥ dharmaḥ yathāśakti prayatnataḥ

original: yamasya śāsanaṃ śrutvā bibhemi nitarāṃ hṛdi // GarP_2,6.8 //
analyzed: yamasya śāsanam śrutvā bibhemi nitarām hṛdi
yaman ca yama dūtān ca nirayān ghora darśanān

original: na paśyāmi mahābhāga tathā vada dayānidhe // GarP_2,6.9 //
analyzed: na paśyāmi mahābhāga tathā vada dayānidhe
vasiṣṭhaḥ uvāca
dharmāḥ bahuvidhāḥ rājan varṇyante śāstra kovidaiḥ
sūkṣma tvāt na vijānanti karma mārga vimohitāḥ

original: dānaṃ tīrthaṃ tapo yajñāḥ saṃnyāsaḥ paitṛko mahaḥ /
analyzed: dānam tīrtham tapaḥ yajñāḥ saṃnyāsaḥ paitṛkaḥ mahaḥ
dharmeṣu gṛhyamāṇeṣu vṛṣotsargaḥ viśeṣitaḥ

original: eṣṭavyā bahavaḥ putrā yadyeko 'pi gayāṃ vrajet /
analyzed: eṣṭavyāḥ bahavaḥ putrāḥ yadi ekaḥ gayām vrajet

original: yajeta vāśvamedhena nīlaṃ vā vṛṣamutsṛjet // GarP_2,6.12 //
analyzed: yajeta vā aśvamedhena nīlam vā vṛṣam utsṛjet
brahmahatyā ādi pāpāni jñāna ajñāna kṛtāni ca
nīla udvāhena śudhyet tu samudra plavanena vā
ekādaśa ahe rāja indra yasya na utsūjyate vṛṣaḥ

original: pretatvaṃ niścalaṃ tasya kṛtaiḥ śrāddhaistu kiṃ bhavet // GarP_2,6.14 //
analyzed: preta tvam niścalam tasya kṛtaiḥ śrāddhaiḥ tu kim bhavet
yathā kathañcid kartavyaḥ tīrthe vā pattane vā

original: vṛṣayajñaiḥ pramucyate nānyathā sādhanaiḥ khaga // GarP_2,6.15 //
analyzed: vṛṣa yajñaiḥ pramucyate na anyathā sādhanaiḥ khaga
vṛṣabham pañcakalyāṇam yuvānam kṛṣṇakaṃbalam
go yūtha madhye nitarām vicarantam vidhānataḥ
catasṛbhiḥ vatsakābhiḥ dvābhyām ca eva ekayā khaga
vivāhya maṅgala dravyaiḥ mantravat tam samutsṛjet
iha ratī iti ṣaḍṛgbhiḥ hemam kuryāt vibhāvasoḥ
kārtikyām māgha vaiśākhyām saṃkrame pāta parvasu
tīrthe pitrya īkṣaya ahe ca viśeṣeṇa praśasyate

original: lohito yastu varṇena mukhe pucche ca pāṇḍuraḥ // GarP_2,6.19 //
analyzed: lohitaḥ yaḥ tu varṇena mukhe pucche ca pāṇḍuraḥ

original: pītaḥ khuraviṣāṇeṣu sa nīlo vṛṣa ucyate /
analyzed: pītaḥ khura viṣāṇeṣu sa nīlaḥ vṛṣaḥ ucyate

original: śvetavarṇo bhavedvipro lohitaḥ kṣattra ucyate // GarP_2,6.20 //
analyzed: śveta varṇaḥ bhavet vipraḥ lohitaḥ kṣattraḥ ucyate

original: pītavarṇo bhavedvaiśyaḥ śūdraḥ kṛṣṇaḥ smṛto budhaiḥ /
analyzed: pīta varṇaḥ bhavet vaiśyaḥ śūdraḥ kṛṣṇaḥ smṛtaḥ budhaiḥ
yathāvarṇam samuddiṣṭaḥ varṇeṣu brāhmaṇa ādiṣu
atha vā rakta varṇaḥ tu sarveṣām eva śasyate
pitā pitāmahaḥ ca eva tathā eva prapitāmahaḥ
āśāsate sutam jātam vṛṣotsargam kariṣyati
dharmaḥ tvam vṛṣa rūpeṇa jagat ānanda dāyakaḥ
aṣṭamūrteḥ adhiṣṭhānam atas śāntim prayaccha me
gaṅgā yamunayoḥ peyam antarvedi tṛṇam cara

original: dharmarājasya purato vācyaṃ me sukṛtaṃ vṛṣa /
analyzed: dharmarājasya puratas vācyam me sukṛtam vṛṣa
dakṣiṇa aṃse triśūla aṅkam vāma ūrau cakra cihnitam
iti saṃprārthya vṛṣabham gandha puṣpa akṣata ādibhiḥ
vṛṣam tad satarī yuktam pūjayitvā samutsṛjet
tasmāt rājan vidhānena vṛṣotsargam samācara
bahu sādhana yuktasya na anyathā sat gatiḥ tava
āsīt tretā yuge pūrvam videha nagare nṛpa
brāhmaṇaḥ dharma vatsa iti sva karma nirataḥ sudhīḥ
viṣṇu bhaktaḥ ti tejasvī yathā lābhena tuṣṭi kṛt

original: pitṛparvaṇi saṃprāpte kuśāryo kānanaṃ yayau // GarP_2,6.29 //
analyzed: pitṛparvaṇi saṃprāpte kuśāryaḥ kānanam yayau
aṭan itas tatas tatra cinvan kuśa palāśakam

vibhrānta manasam gṛhya pratyak jagmuḥ vihāyasā
bahu vṛkṣa samākīrṇam giri durga bhayānakam
vanāt vana antaram ninyuḥ nadīnada samākulam

original: sa tatra nagaraṃ rājan dadarśa bahuvistaram // GarP_2,6.32 //
analyzed: sa tatra nagaram rājan dadarśa bahu vistaram
gopura dvāra racitam saudha prāsāda maṇḍitam
catvara āpaṇa paṇya ādi nara nārī samākulam
tūrya dvandva abhinirghoṣa vīṇā paṭaha nāditam
kāṃścid kṣudhā arditān dīnān malinān vigata ojasaḥ
ti tuṣṭān malinān vastra khaṇḍa samāvṛtān
agratas hṛṣṭa puṣṭān ca svarṇa vastra upaśobhitān
tatas pi sura saṃkāśān sa dṛṣṭvā vismitaḥ bhavat

original: kiṃ svapna uta māyā vai madīyo mānaso bhramaḥ // GarP_2,6.36 //
analyzed: kim svapnaḥ uta māyā vai madīyaḥ mānasaḥ bhramaḥ
sandihānam dvijam ninyuḥ puruṣāḥ rāja sannidhim
sa tat dadarśa vipraḥ tu svarṇa prāsāda mandire
siṃhāsanam mahā divyam chatra cāmara vījitam
tatra upa viṣṭam rājānam kirīṭa kanaka ujjvalam

original: mahatyā ca śriyā yuktaṃ stūyamānaṃ suvandibhiḥ /
analyzed: mahatyā ca śriyā yuktam stūyamānam su vandibhiḥ

original: rājāpi dṛṣṭvā taṃ vipraṃ pratyutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ // GarP_2,6.39 //
analyzed: rājā api dṛṣṭvā tam vipram pratyutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ
pūjayāmāsa vidhivat madhuparkāḥ asa nādibhiḥ
santuṣṭa manasam devam astauṣīt parayā mudā

original: adya me saphalaṃ janma pāvitañca kulaṃ prabho /
analyzed: adya me saphalam janma pāvitam ca kulam prabho

original: viṣṇubhaktasya dharmasya yatte dṛggocaraṃ gataḥ // GarP_2,6.41 //
analyzed: viṣṇu bhaktasya dharmasya yat te dṛś gocaram gataḥ
natvā stutvā bahuvidham uvāca anuvasan nṛpaḥ

original: yataḥ samāgato devaḥ punastatraiva nīyatām // GarP_2,6.42 //
analyzed: yatas samāgataḥ devaḥ punar tatra eva nīyatām

original: iti śrutvā vaco rājñaḥ papraccha dvijapuṅgavaḥ /
analyzed: iti śrutvā vacaḥ rājñaḥ papraccha dvija puṅgavaḥ
brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca

original: ko 'yaṃ deśa- kuto lokā uttamā madhyamādhamāḥ // GarP_2,6.43 //
analyzed: kaḥ yam kutas lokāḥ uttamāḥ madhyama adhamāḥ
kena puṇyena tu bhavān pārameṣṭya vibhūṣitaḥ
kimartham aham ānītaḥ punar tatra eva nīyate
apūrvam iva paśyāmi sarvam svapna gataḥ yathā
rājā uvāca
svadharma nirataḥ yaḥ tu hari bhakti rataḥ sadā

original: virakta indriyārthebhyaḥ sa me pūjyo na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: viraktaḥ indriya arthebhyaḥ sa me pūjyaḥ na saṃśayaḥ
tīrtha yātrā paraḥ nityam vṛṣotsarga viśeṣa vid
satya dāna paraḥ yaḥ tu sa namasyaḥ divaukasām
darśana artham iha ānītaḥ pūjā arhaḥ ca parantapa

original: anugṛhāṇa māṃ deva kṣamasva mama sāhasam /
analyzed: anugṛhāṇa mām deva kṣamasva mama sāhasam

original: ityuktvā darśayāmāsa mantriṇāṃ saṃjñayā bhruvaḥ // GarP_2,6.48 //
analyzed: iti uktvā darśayāmāsa mantriṇām saṃjñayā bhruvaḥ

original: vadiṣyati samagraṃ te svayaṃ vaktuṃ na sāmpratam /
analyzed: vadiṣyati samagram te svayam vaktum na sāmpratam

original: sāmantaḥ sarvavedajño jñātvā hārdaṃ nṛpasya ca // GarP_2,6.49 //
analyzed: sāmantaḥ sarva veda jñaḥ jñātvā hārdam nṛpasya ca
vipaścit uvāca
pūrva janmani vaiśyaḥ yam viśvambharaḥ iti śrutaḥ
virādha nagare vipra dvija deva vibhūṣite
vaiśya vṛttyā sadā jīvan kuṭumba paripālakaḥ

original: gavāṃ śuśrūṣako nityaṃ brāhmaṇānāñca pūjakaḥ // GarP_2,6.51 //
analyzed: gavām śuśrūṣakaḥ nityam brāhmaṇānām ca pūjakaḥ
pātra dāna paraḥ nityam ātitheyī agni sevakaḥ
gārhasthyam vidhivat cakre bhāryayā satyamedhayā
smārtena lokān ajayat śrautena te havirbhujaḥ

original: kadācidbandhubhiḥ sākaṃ kṛtvā tīrthāni bhūriśaḥ // GarP_2,6.53 //
analyzed: kadācid bandhubhiḥ sākam kṛtvā tīrthāni bhūriśas
yāvat āyāti sadanam dṛṣṭavān loṃmaśam pathi
daṇḍa vat praṇipatya āśu kṛtāñjali puṭam sthitam
papraccha vinaya upetam karuṇā vāri vāridhiḥ
ṛṣiḥ uvāca
kutas āgamyate sādho brāhmaṇaiḥ bandhubhiḥ yutaḥ

original: dṛṣṭvā tvāṃ dharmanilayaṃ praklinnaṃ mānasaṃ mama /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tvām dharma nilayam praklinnam mānasam mama
viśvambharaḥ uvāca

original: śīryamāṇaṃ śarīraṃ hi jñātvā mṛtyuṃ puraḥ sthitam // GarP_2,6.56 //
analyzed: śīryamāṇam śarīram hi jñātvā mṛtyum puras sthitam

original: kṛtvā tīrthāni vidhivadviśrāṇya vipulaṃ vasu // GarP_2,6.57 //
analyzed: kṛtvā tīrthāni vidhivat viśrāṇya vipulam vasu
yāvat brajāmi aham veśma bhavān dṛṣṭi patham gataḥ

original: tīrthāni santi bhūrīṇi varṣai'smin bhārate śubhe // GarP_2,6.58 //
analyzed: tīrthāni santi bhūrīṇi varṣaismin bhārate śubhe

original: yattvayā hyupacīrṇāni tāni sarvāṇi me vada /
analyzed: yat tvayā hi upacīrṇāni tāni sarvāṇi me vada
vaiśyaḥ uvāca

original: gaṅgā ca sūrya tanayā mahāpuṇyā sarasvatī // GarP_2,6.59 //
analyzed: gaṅgā ca sūrya tanayā mahā puṇyā sarasvatī
daśa aśvamedhaiḥ ayajat yatra brahmā sureśvaraḥ

original: mṛtānāṃ yatra jantūnāṃ karṇe japati tārakam /
analyzed: mṛtānām yatra jantūnām karṇe japati tārakam
pulahasya āśramam puṇyam phalgutīrtham ca gaṇḍakī
cakratīrtham naimiṣam ca śivatīrtham anantakam
gopratāraka nāgeśam ayodhyābindu saṃjñitam
yatra āsta mukti daḥ sākṣāt rāmaḥ rājīva locanaḥ

original: āgneyaṃ vāyukauberaṃ kaumāraṃ bhūruhāṃ punaḥ // GarP_2,6.63 //
analyzed: āgneyam vāyu kauberam kaumāram bhūruhām punar

original: saukaraṃ mathurā yatra nityaṃ sannihato hariḥ /
analyzed: saukaram mathurā yatra nityam sannihataḥ hariḥ
puṣkaram satyatīrtham ca jvālatīrtham dineśvaram
indratīrtham kurukṣetram yatra prācī sarasvatī

original: tāpī payoṣṇī nirvindhyā malayaḥ kṛṣṇaveṇikā // GarP_2,6.65 //

analyzed: godāvarī daṇḍakam ca tāmracūḍam sadā udakam

asaṃkhya liṅga tīrthāni yatra santi sadā mune

original: veṅkaṭādrau mahātejāḥ śrīraṅgākhyaḥ svayaṃ hariḥ // GarP_2,6.67 //
analyzed: veṅkaṭa adrau mahā tejāḥ śrīraṅga ākhyaḥ svayam hariḥ
veṅkaṭī nāma tatra eva devī mahiṣamardinī
avaṭodā tāmraparṇaḥ trikṛṭaḥ kollakaḥ giriḥ
vāsiṣṭham brahmatīrtham ca jñānatīrtham mahā udadhiḥ
hṛṣīkeśam virājan ca viśālam nīlaparvataḥ

original: avāpa girijā devī tapasā yatra śaṅkaram /
analyzed: avāpa girijā devī tapasā yatra śaṅkaram
vāruṇam sūryatīrtham ca haṃsatīrtham mahā udayam
nimajjya yatra kākolāḥ rājahaṃsa tvam āyayuḥ
asuraḥ yatra deva tvam avāpa snāna mātrataḥ
naranārāyaṇam dṛṣṭvā mucyate pāpa koṭibhiḥ
sarasvatī dṛṣadvatyau narmadā śarma dā nṛṇām
nīlakaṇṭham mahākālam puṇyam ca amarakaṇṭakam
candrabhāgā vetravatī vīrabhadram gaṇeśvaram
gokarṇam bilva tīrtham ca karmakuṇḍam sa tārakam

original: anyānyapi ca tīrthāni kṛtāni kṛpayā tava // GarP_2,6.76 //
analyzed: anyāni api ca tīrthāni kṛtāni kṛpayā tava
utpadyate śubhā buddhiḥ sādhūnām yat anugrahaḥ
ekatas sarva tīrthāni karuṇāḥ sādhavaḥ nyatas
anugrahāya bhūtānām caranti carita vratāḥ

original: tvaṃ guruḥ sarvarṇānāṃ vidyayā vayasādhikaḥ // GarP_2,6.78 //
analyzed: tvam guruḥ sarva ṛṇānām vidyayā vayasā adhikaḥ

original: kiṃ kuryāṃ kaṃ nu pṛcche 'haṃ mano me 'ticalaṃ mune // GarP_2,6.79 //
analyzed: kim kuryām kam nu pṛcche haṃ manaḥ me ticalam mune
niḥ spṛham brahma viṣaye viṣayeṣu ati lālasam

original: manāgapi na sahate virahaṃ timiraṃ bruvat // GarP_2,6.80 //
analyzed: manāk api na sahate viraham timiram bruvat

original: śāntiṃ yathā samāyāti sampannamiva bhūsura // GarP_2,6.81 //
analyzed: śāntim yathā samāyāti sampannam iva bhūsura
viveka pravaṇam śuddham yathā syāt kṛpayā vada
ṛṣiḥ uvāca

original: manastu prabalaṃ nityaṃ savikāraṃ svabhāvataḥ // GarP_2,6.82 //
analyzed: manaḥ tu prabalam nityam sa vikāram svabhāvataḥ
vaśam nayanti kariṇam pramattam api hastipāḥ
tathā api sādhu saṅgatyā sādhanaiḥ api atandritaḥ
tīvreṇa bhakti yogena vicāreṇa vaśam nayet
itihāsam pravakṣyāmi tava pratyaya kārakam
nārado kathayan mahyam sva vṛtta gata janmanaḥ

kasyacid dvijamukhyasya dāsī puttraḥ purā mune
śikṣitaḥ bāla bhāve pi pāṭhitaḥ nitarām aham
tatra api saṅgatiḥ jātā mahatām puṇya karmaṇām
prāvṛṣ kāle mama gṛhe sthitānām bhāgya yogataḥ

original: śuśrūṣaṇānuvṛttyā ca praśrayeṇa damena ca // GarP_2,6.87 //
analyzed: śuśrūṣaṇa anuvṛttyā ca praśrayeṇa damena ca
santoṣam paramam prāpya kṛpayā tu idam abruvan

original: manīṣā nirmalā yena jātā mama śubhārthinī // GarP_2,6.88 //
analyzed: manīṣā nirmalā yena jātā mama śubha arthinī
yayā viṣṇu mayam sarva ātmani eva dadṛśivān

original: śṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyā mo hitāya tava bālaka // GarP_2,6.89 //
analyzed: śṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyāḥ mā u hitāya tava bālaka

original: yena vai dhriyamāṇena ihāmutra sukhaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: yena vai dhriyamāṇena iha amutra sukham bhavet
deva tiryak manuṣyāḥ ca saṃsāre vividhāḥ janāḥ

original: devatvaṃ yāti sattvena rajasā ca manuṣyatām // GarP_2,6.91 //
analyzed: deva tvam yāti sattvena rajasā ca manuṣya tām
tiryaktvam tamasā jantuḥ vāsanā anugataḥ budhaḥ

original: māturlabdhvā punarjanma mriyate ca punaḥ punaḥ // GarP_2,6.92 //
analyzed: mātuḥ labdhvā punarjanma mriyate ca punar punar
evam gatvā hi asaṃkhyātāḥ yonīḥ tāḥ karma bhūḥ api
mānuṣyam durlabham labdhvā kadācid daivayogataḥ
anugraheṇa mahatām harim jñātvā vimucyate
roga grāham moha jālam apāram bhava sāgaram

original: navanīyaṃ yathā dadhno jyotiḥ kāṣṭhādapi kvacit // GarP_2,6.95 //
analyzed: navanīyam yathā dadhnaḥ jyotiḥ kāṣṭhāt api kvacid

analyzed: manthanaiḥ sādhanaiḥ evam param jñātvā sukhī bhavet

original: ātmā nityo 'vyayaḥ satyaḥ sarvagaḥ sarvabhṛnmahān // GarP_2,6.96 //
analyzed: ātmā nityaḥ vyayaḥ satyaḥ sarva gaḥ sarva bhṛt mahān
aprameyaḥ svayan jyotiḥ agrāhyaḥ manasā api yaḥ

ākāśaḥ sarva bhūteṣu sthitaḥ tejaḥ jale tathā

original: bhaktānukampī bhagavān sādhūnāṃ rakṣaṇāya ca // GarP_2,6.99 //
analyzed: bhakta anukampī bhagavān sādhūnām rakṣaṇāya ca

original: tataḥ kṛtārtho bhavati sadā sarvatra niḥ spṛhaḥ // GarP_2,6.101 //
analyzed: tatas kṛtārthaḥ bhavati sadā sarvatra niḥ spṛhaḥ

original: kva svapne niyataṃ dhairyamindrajāle kva satyatā /

original: kva nityatā śaranmeghe kva vā satyaṃ kalevare // GarP_2,6.103 //
analyzed: kva nitya tā śarad meghe kva vā satyam kalevare

original: ityuktvā te gatāḥ sarve sādhavo dīnavatsalāḥ /
analyzed: iti uktvā te gatāḥ sarve sādhavaḥ dīna vatsalāḥ

original: antarhitaṃ mahatejo yathā saudāminī divi // GarP_2,6.107 //
analyzed: antarhitam mahā tejaḥ yathā saudāminī divi

original: kāle kalevaraṃ tyaktvā gatavān harimavyayam // GarP_2,6.108 //
analyzed: kāle kalevaram tyaktvā gatavān harim avyayam
tasya icchayā punar brahman brahmaṇaḥ me bhavat janiḥ

original: ityuktvā me svānubhavaṃ yayau yādṛcchiko muniḥ // GarP_2,6.110 //
analyzed: iti uktvā me sva anubhavam yayau yādṛcchikaḥ muniḥ

original: ataste sādhusaṅgatyā bhaktyā ca paramātmanaḥ // GarP_2,6.111 //
analyzed: atas te sādhu saṅgatyā bhaktyā ca paramātmanaḥ

original: kṣipraṃ naśyati dharmajña jalānāṃ śarado yathā /
analyzed: kṣipram naśyati dharma jña jalānām śaradaḥ yathā

original: pītvā te vākyapīyūṣaṃ svāntaṃ me śāntimāgamat // GarP_2,6.113 //
analyzed: pītvā te vākya pīyūṣam svāntam me śāntim āgamat
sarva tīrtha phalam me dhya sañjātam tava darśanāt

original: iti śrutvā vacastasya provāca ṛpisattamaḥ // GarP_2,6.114 //
analyzed: iti śrutvā vacaḥ tasya provāca ṛpi sattamaḥ
lomaśaḥ uvāca
hitāya tava rāja indra trivarga phalam icchataḥ

original: yattvayā sukṛtaṃ bhūrivṛṣotsargaṃ vinā kṛtam // GarP_2,6.115 //
analyzed: yat tvayā su kṛtam bhūri vṛṣotsargam vinā kṛtam

original: vṛṣotsargasamaṃ kiñcit sādhanaṃ na mahītale // GarP_2,6.116 //
analyzed: vṛṣotsarga samam kiñcid sādhanam na mahī tale

original: vṛṣotsargaḥ kṛto yena aśvamedhasya yājakaḥ // GarP_2,6.117 //
analyzed: vṛṣotsargaḥ kṛtaḥ yena aśvamedhasya yājakaḥ

original: ubhau samau mayā dṛṣṭau divyau tau śakrasannidhau /
analyzed: ubhau samau mayā dṛṣṭau divyau tau śakra sannidhau

original: atastvaṃ puṣkaraṃ gatvā vṛṣotsargaṃ vidhāya ca // GarP_2,6.118 //
analyzed: atas tvam puṣkaram gatvā vṛṣotsargam vidhāya ca

original: tato yāhi gṛhaṃ sādho yena sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: tatas yāhi gṛham sādho yena sarvam kṛtam bhavet
vipaścit uvāca

original: tataḥ sa punarāgatya kārtikyāṃ puṣkare vare // GarP_2,6.119 //
analyzed: tatas sa punar āgatya kārtikyām puṣkare vare
varāha rūpī bhagavān yatra āste yajñapūrakaḥ
cakāra vidhivat sarvam yudkam ṛṣi sattamaiḥ
gatāni bahu tīrthāni tatas lomaśa saṃgatiḥ
tatas dhikataram jātam puṇyam nīla vivāha jam
sa bhuktvā viṣayān divyān vimāna varam āśritaḥ

original: tena rājakule janma vīrasenasya dharmataḥ // GarP_2,6.122 //

etasmāt kāraṇāt vipre nāmnā sūcīmukhaḥ smi aham
śīghragaḥ uvāca

original: purāhaṃ vaiśyajātīyaḥ sākaṃ sakhyā ca kenacit /
analyzed: purā aham vaiśya jātīyaḥ sākam sakhyā ca kenacid
vāṇijyam kartum agamam deśam anyam mahādhanaḥ

original: mitraṃ ca me bahudhanaṃ tasya lobho mahāṃstataḥ /
analyzed: mitram ca me bahu dhanam tasya lobhaḥ mahān tatas
jātaḥ u pi adṛṣṭa vaimukhyāt me naṣṭam mūlam api uta
tatas tasmāt tu niṣkrāntau āvām na āvām atha nimnagām
mārga gām tartum ārabdhau lohitāyati bhāskare
sakhā sa ca mad utsaṅge suṣvāpa adhva klama ākulaḥ

original: abhūttadāti pāpasya krūrā matiratīva me // GarP_2,7.65 //
analyzed: abhūt tadā ati pāpasya krūrā matiḥ atīva me
tam utsaṅga gatam sūre naṣṭe pūre kṣipam tadā

original: katkṛtyaṃ kurvato nāvi lokaistu jñātameva na // GarP_2,7.66 //
analyzed: katkṛtyam kurvataḥ nāvi lokaiḥ tu jñātam eva na
tasya yat vastu tat sarvam maṇi muktā ādi kāñcanam
ādāya śīgragaḥ tasmāt deśāt sva gṛham āgataḥ

original: tatsarvaṃ svagṛhe muktvā tasya patnyai nyavedayam /
analyzed: tat sarvam sva gṛhe muktvā tasya patnyai nyavedayam

original: dasyubhirme hato bhrātā dhanamācchidya vai pathi // GarP_2,7.68 //
analyzed: dasyubhiḥ me hataḥ bhrātā dhanam ācchidya vai pathi
prajāvati pradrutaḥ ham mā rodi iti evam abravam

original: śokārtā sāpi tatkālaṃ mamatvaṃ gṛhabandhuṣu // GarP_2,7.69 //
analyzed: śoka ārtā sā api tad kālam mamatvam gṛha bandhuṣu
tyaktvā ca ati priyān prāṇān juhāva agnau yathāvidhi

original: tato niṣkaṇṭakaṃ taddhi vīkṣya hṛṣṭo gato gṛham // GarP_2,7.70 //
analyzed: tatas niṣkaṇṭakam tat hi vīkṣya hṛṣṭaḥ gataḥ gṛham
abhuñjam sarvam āgatya yāvajjīvam tu tat dhanam

original: mitraṃ pūre hi niḥ kṣipya yadahaṃ śīghramāgataḥ // GarP_2,7.71 //
analyzed: mitram pūre hi niḥ kṣipya yat aham śīghram āgataḥ
etasmāt kāraṇāt pretaḥ śīghragaḥ ham tu nāmataḥ
rodhakaḥ uvāca
śūdra jātīyaḥ purā abhūvam muni īśvara
rāja prasāda āpta mahā śata grāma adhikāravān

original: vṛddhau me pitarāvāstāṃ laghurekaḥ sahodaraḥ // GarP_2,7.73 //
analyzed: vṛddhau me pitarau āstām laghuḥ ekaḥ sahodaraḥ

original: śīghraṃ sa ca mayā bhrātā lubdhenaikaḥ pṛthakkṛtaḥ /
analyzed: śīghram sa ca mayā bhrātā lubdhena ekaḥ pṛthakkṛtaḥ
āptavān paramam duḥkham sa unna vastra vivarjitaḥ

original: adattāṃ pitarau cchannaṃ kiñcitkiñcittu tasya ca /
analyzed: adattām pitarau channam kiñcid kiñcid tu tasya ca
tasmai pitṛbhyām yat dattam āptebhyaḥ tat mayā śrutam
tat sarvam tattvataḥ jñātvā pitroḥ rodham akārayam
śūnya mandire ekasmin baddhvā tu nigaḍaiḥ dṛḍhaiḥ

original: sosau bālo 'pi babhrāma pitṛbhyāṃ rahito dvija // GarP_2,7.77 //
analyzed: saḥ asau bālaḥ babhrāma pitṛbhyām rahitaḥ dvija

lekhakaḥ uvāca

original: tāsāṃ me kurvataḥ pūjāṃ pāpā matirajāyata // GarP_2,7.81 //
analyzed: tāsām me kurvataḥ pūjām pāpā matiḥ ajāyata

original: ullekhanañca ratnānāṃ netrādibhyaḥ kṛtaṃ mayā // GarP_2,7.82 //
analyzed: ullekhanam ca ratnānām netra ādibhyaḥ kṛtam mayā

original: netrāṇi ca viratnāni nṛpaścukrodha vahnivat // GarP_2,7.83 //
analyzed: netrāṇi ca viratnāni nṛpaḥ cukrodha vahni vat

original: ābhyo ratnaṃ suvarṇañca hṛtaṃ yena bhaviṣyati // GarP_2,7.84 //
analyzed: ābhyaḥ ratnam suvarṇam ca hṛtam yena bhaviṣyati

original: jñātaśca sa hi me vadhyo bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: jñātaḥ ca sa hi me vadhyaḥ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ

original: ahaṃ tatsakalaṃ jñātvā rātrāvasidharo gṛham // GarP_2,7.85 //
analyzed: aham tat sakalam jñātvā rātrau asi dharaḥ gṛham

original: gṛhītvātha maṇīn svarṇaṃ niśīthe 'haṃ gato 'nyataḥ // GarP_2,7.86 //
analyzed: gṛhītvā atha maṇīn svarṇam niśīthe haṃ gataḥ nyatas

etasmāt pātakāt pretaḥ lekhakaḥ nāmataḥ smi aham

saṃjñāḥ tādṛśyaḥ ākhyātāḥ yathā etāḥ bhavatā daśāḥ

pretāḥ ūcuḥ
veda mārga anusaraṇam lajjā dharmaḥ damaḥ kṣamā

original: dhṛtirjñānaṃ naiva yatra vayaṃ tatra vasāmahe // GarP_2,7.90 //
analyzed: dhṛtiḥ jñānam na eva yatra vayam tatra vasāmahe

original: tasya pīḍāṃ vapaṃ kurmo naiva śrāddhaṃ na tarpaṇam /
analyzed: tasya pīḍām vapam kurmaḥ na eva śrāddham na tarpaṇam

original: yasya gehe tadaṅgāttu māṃsañca rudhiraṃ kramāt // GarP_2,7.91 //
analyzed: yasya gehe tad aṅgāt tu māṃsam ca rudhiram kramāt

original: jakṣāmaśca pibāmaśca ukta ācāra eṣa naḥ /
analyzed: jakṣāmaḥ ca pibāmaḥ ca uktaḥ ācāraḥ eṣa naḥ
śṛṇu ca āhāram asmākam sarva loka vigarhitam

original: vamanaṃ viḍū dūṣikā ca śleṣmā mūtrāśruṇī tathā // GarP_2,7.93 //
analyzed: vamanam dūṣikā ca śleṣmā mūtra aśruṇī tathā

original: etadbhakṣyañca pānañca mā pṛcchātaḥ paraṃ dvija /
analyzed: etat bhakṣyam ca pānam ca mā pṛccha atas param dvija

original: lajjā no jāyate svāminnāhāraṃ vadatāṃ svakam // GarP_2,7.94 //
analyzed: lajjā naḥ jāyate svāmin āhāram vadatām svakam

original: akasmājjanmanāṃ vipra smṛtiḥ prāptā tu paurvikī // GarP_2,7.95 //
analyzed: akasmāt janmanām vipra smṛtiḥ prāptā tu paurvikī
vinīta tva avinīta tve jānīmaḥ nā eva naḥ prabho
śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: evaṃ vadatsu preteṣu tathā śrutavati dvije // GarP_2,7.96 //
analyzed: evam vadatsu preteṣu tathā śrutavati dvije

original: sa tu dṛṣṭvā dvijaśreṣṭho hṛdgataṃ puruṣaṃ puraḥ // GarP_2,7.97 //

te pi tepuḥ tatas pretāḥ āścarya utphulla cakṣuṣaḥ

original: kṛpayā yaḥ samuddhāraṃ kuruṣe vai namo 'sta te // GarP_2,7.99 //

original: evaṃ dvijātau bruvati prabhū taprabhaiśca mukhyāṃbaracāriyuktaiḥ /

original: tadā madicchāprabhavairvimānaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ samantādruruce giriḥ saḥ // GarP_2,7.100 //
analyzed: tadā mad icchā prabhavaiḥ vimānaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ samantāt ruruce giriḥ saḥ

original: itthaṃ vimānena madīyalokaṃ gato dvijaraso 'pyatha pañcamistaiḥ /
analyzed: ittham vimānena madīya lokam gataḥ dvijarasaḥ pi atha pañcamiḥ taiḥ

original: pretāḥ saṃgavaśena nākamavansantaptako brāhmaṇo viṣvaksana iti prasiddhavibhavo nāmnā gaṇe me 'bhavat /
analyzed: pretāḥ saṃga vaśena nākam avan santaptakaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ viṣvaksanaḥ iti prasiddha vibhavaḥ nāmnā gaṇe me bhavat

original: etatte sakalaṃ mayā nigāditaṃ yaścaitadutkīrtayedyaścedaṃ śṛṇuyānna so 'pi puruṣaḥ pretatvamāpnoti hi // GarP_2,7.102 //
analyzed: etat te sakalam mayā nigāditam yaḥ ca etat utkīrtayet yaḥ ca idam śṛṇuyāt na saḥ pi puruṣaḥ preta tvam āpnoti hi

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde pretakalpe pañcapretopākhyānaṃ nāma saptamo 'dyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde pretakalpe pañcapretopākhyānam nāma saptamaḥ dyāyaḥ

garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: kriyāḥ katividhāḥ proktā vadaitatsarvameva me // GarP_2,8.1 //
analyzed: kriyāḥ katividhāḥ proktāḥ vada etat sarvam eva me
śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: putraḥ pautraḥ prapautro vā tadbhrātā bhrātṛsantatiḥ /
analyzed: putraḥ pautraḥ prapautraḥ vā tad bhrātā bhrātṛ santatiḥ
sapiṇḍa santatiḥ vā api kriyā arhāḥ khaga jñātayaḥ
teṣām abhāve sarveṣām samāna udaka santatiḥ

original: kuladvaye 'pi cocchinne strībhiḥ kāryāḥ kriyāḥ khaga // GarP_2,8.3 //
analyzed: kula dvaye ca ucchinne strībhiḥ kāryāḥ kriyāḥ khaga

original: pūrvāḥ kriyā madhyamāśca tathā caivottarāḥ kriyāḥ // GarP_2,8.4 //
analyzed: pūrvāḥ kriyāḥ madhyamāḥ ca tathā ca eva uttarāḥ kriyāḥ

original: śrāddhaṃ tatra prakartavyaṃ phalaṃ tasya śṛṇuṣva me // GarP_2,8.5 //
analyzed: śrāddham tatra prakartavyam phalam tasya śṛṇuṣva me
brahma indra rudra nāsatya sūrya agni vasu mārutān
viśvedevān pitṛ gaṇān vayāṃsi manujān paśūn
sarīsṛpāt mātṛ gaṇān yat ca anyat bhūta saṃjñitam
śrāddham śraddhā anvitaḥ kurvan prīṇayati akhilam jagat
te tṛptāḥ tarpayanti enam putra dāra dhanaiḥ tathā
adhikāraḥ kriyā bhedaḥ samāsāt te nirūpitaḥ
garuḍaḥ uvāca
ukteṣu ekaḥ ced na syāt adhikārī surottama

original: kartavyaṃ kiṃ tadā viṣṇo puruṣeṇa vijānatā // GarP_2,8.9 //
analyzed: kartavyam kim tadā viṣṇo puruṣeṇa vijānatā
śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: adhikāro yadā nāsti yadi nāsti ca niścayaḥ /
analyzed: adhikāraḥ yadā nā asti yadi nā asti ca niścayaḥ

original: jīvite sati jīvāya dadyācchrāddhaṃsvayaṃ naraḥ // GarP_2,8.10 //

original: kartāramatha bhoktāraṃ viṣṇuṃ sarveśvaraṃ yajet // GarP_2,8.11 //
analyzed: kartāram atha bhoktāram viṣṇum sarva īśvaram yajet

original: agnaye kavyavāhanāya svadhā nama iti smaran /
analyzed: agnaye kavyavāhanāya svadhā namaḥ iti smaran

original: somāyatvā pitṛmate svadhā nama iti smaran // GarP_2,8.13 //
analyzed: soma āyatvā pitṛmate svadhā namaḥ iti smaran
dakṣiṇena tu dadyāt ca tṛtīyām dakṣiṇā yutām

original: yamāyāṅgirase cātha svadhā nama iti smaran // GarP_2,8.14 //
analyzed: yamāya aṅgirase ca atha svadhā namaḥ iti smaran

original: tayormadhye tu niḥ kṣipya viprānsaṃmantrya bho jayet /
analyzed: tayoḥ madhye tu niḥ kṣipya viprān saṃmantrya bho jayet

original: prathamāmuttare nyasya dvitīyāṃ dakṣiṇe nyaset // GarP_2,8.15 //
analyzed: prathamām uttare nyasya dvitīyām dakṣiṇe nyaset
madhye tṛtīyām vinyasya paścāt āvāhana ādikam
āvāhana ādinā pūrvam viśvedevān prapūjya ca
vasubhyaḥ tvām aham vipra rudrebhyaḥ tvām aham tatas
sūryebhyaḥ tvām aham vipra bhojayāmi iti tān vadet
āvāhana ādikam śeṣam kuryāt ca pitṛ śeṣa vat

original: sāmyāṃ dhenuṃ tato dadyādvasūddeśaṃ dvijāya tu // GarP_2,8.18 //
analyzed: sāmyām dhenum tatas dadyāt vasu uddeśam dvijāya tu

original: āgneyyāṃ cātha raudrāya yāmyāṃ sūryadvijāya tu /
analyzed: āgneyyām ca atha raudrāya yāmyām sūrya dvijāya tu
viśvebhyaḥ ca atha devebhyaḥ tila pātram nivedayet
svasti iti eva tathā akṣayyam jalam dattvā atha tān dvijān
visarjayet smaran viṣṇum devam aṣṭa akṣaram vibhum

original: tataḥ kāmaṃ kuleśānīṃ śivaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ smaret /
analyzed: tatas kāmam kuleśānīm śivam nārāyaṇam smaret
caturdaśyām tatas gacchet yathāprāptām saridvarām

original: vastrāṇi lohakhaṇḍāni jitaṃ ta iti saṃjapan /
analyzed: vastrāṇi loha khaṇḍāni jitam te iti saṃjapan

original: dakṣiṇābhimukho vahniṃ jvālayettatra ca svayam // GarP_2,8.22 //
analyzed: dakṣiṇa abhimukhaḥ vahnim jvālayet tatra ca svayam

original: hutvā śmāśānikaṃ homaṃ pūrṇāhutyantameva hi // GarP_2,8.23 //
analyzed: hutvā śmāśānikam homam pūrṇāhuti antam eva hi

original: niragrimatha vā bhūmiṃ yamaṃ rudrañca saṃsmaret /
analyzed: niragrim atha vā bhūmim yamam rudran ca saṃsmaret

original: hutvā prādhānike sthāne paścādāvāhayecca tam // GarP_2,8.24 //
analyzed: hutvā prādhānike sthāne paścāt āvāhayet ca tam
śrapayet ca aparam vahnau mudga miśram carum tatas
tila taṇḍula miśran ca dvitīyam sa pavitrakam
om pṛthivyai namaḥ tubhyam iti ca ekam nivedayet

original: oṃ yamāya namaśceti dvitīyaṃ tadanantaram // GarP_2,8.26 //
analyzed: om yamāya namaḥ ca iti dvitīyam tad anantaram
om namaḥ ca atha rudrāya śma āśāna pataye namaḥ

original: tato dīpte samiddhe 'gnau bhūmau prakṛtidāruṇe // GarP_2,8.27 //
analyzed: tatas dīpte samiddhe gnau bhūmau prakṛti dāruṇe

original: yamāya dharmarājāya mṛtyave cāntakāya ca // GarP_2,8.28 //
analyzed: yamāya dharmarājāya mṛtyave ca antakāya ca
vaivasvatāya kālāya sarva prāṇa harāya ca
svadhākāra namaskāra praṇavaiḥ saha saptadhā
amuka āmuka gautra etat tubhyam astu tila udakam
pradadyāt daśa piṇḍān tu arghapuṣpa samanvitān
dhūpaḥ dīpaḥ baliḥ gandhaḥ sarveṣām astu ca akṣayaḥ

original: daśa piṇḍāṃstu dāndattvā viṣṇoḥ saumyaṃ mukhaṃ smaret // GarP_2,8.31 //
analyzed: daśa piṇḍān tu dān dattvā viṣṇoḥ saumyam mukham smaret
kuryāt ca māsikam māsi sapiṇḍīkaraṇam tatas

original: āśaucānte tataḥ kuryādātmano vā marasya tu // GarP_2,8.32 //
analyzed: āśauca ante tatas kuryāt ātmanaḥ vā marasya tu
kuryāt asthira tām jñātvā śakti ārogya dhana āyuṣam

original: etatte sarvamākhyātaṃ jīvacchrāddhaṃ mayā khaga // GarP_2,8.33 //
analyzed: etat te sarvam ākhyātam jīvacchrāddham mayā khaga

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇa garuḍasaṃvāde śrāddhakartrātmaśrāddhayornirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭamo
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde śrāddhakartrātmaśrāddhayornirūpaṇam nāma aṣṭamaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
