original: kasyacitkenacidrājñā kimādyā sā kṛtā purā // GarP_2,9.1 //
analyzed: kasyacid kenacid rājñā kimādyā sā kṛtā purā
śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: suparṇa śṛṇu vakṣyāmi yathā rājñā kriyā kṛtā /
analyzed: suparṇa śṛṇu vakṣyāmi yathā rājñā kriyā kṛtā

original: āsīt kṛtayuge rājā vāṅgo vai babhruvāhanaḥ // GarP_2,9.2 //
analyzed: āsīt kṛta yuge rājā vāṅgaḥ vai babhruvāhanaḥ
pṛthivyāḥ catur antāyāḥ goptā pakṣi indra dharmataḥ

original: caturbhāgāṃ bhuvaṃ kṛtsnāṃ sa bhuṅke vasudhādhipaḥ // GarP_2,9.3 //
analyzed: catur bhāgām bhuvam kṛtsnām sa bhuṅke vasudhādhipaḥ
na pāpa kṛt kaścid āsīt tasmin rājyam praśāsati

original: nāsīccaurabhayaṃ tārkṣya na kṣudrabhayameva hi // GarP_2,9.4 //
analyzed: na āsīt caura bhayam tārkṣya na kṣudra bhayam eva hi
na āsīt vyādhi bhayam ca api tasmin janapada īśvare
svadharme remire ca āsīt tejasā bhāskara upamaḥ
a kṣubdha tveḥ ṛcala samaḥ sahiṣṇu tve dharā samaḥ
sa kadācid mahā bāhuḥ prabhūta bala vāhanaḥ
vanam jagāma gahanam hayānām ca śataiḥ vṛtaḥ
siṃhanādaiḥ ca yodhānām śaṅkha dundubhi niḥ svanaiḥ
āsīt kilakilā śabdaḥ tasmin gacchatī pārthive

original: tatratatra ca viprendraiḥ stūyamānaḥ samantataḥ // GarP_2,9.8 //
analyzed: tatra tatra ca vipra indraiḥ stūyamānaḥ samantataḥ
niryayau parayā prītyā vanam mṛga jighāṃsayā
sa gacchan dadṛśe dhīmān nandana pratimam vanam
bilva arka khadira ākīrṇam kapittha dhvaja saṃyutam
viṣamaiḥ parvataiḥ ca eva sarvatas ca samanvitam
nirjalam nirmanuṣyam ca bahu yojanam āyatam
mṛga siṃhaiḥ mahā ghoraiḥ yaiḥ ca api vanecaraiḥ
tat vanam manuja vyāghraḥ sa bhṛtya bala vāhanaḥ
līlayā loḍayāmāsa sūdayan vividhān mṛgān
mṛgasya kasyacid kukṣim tatas vivyādha bhūmipaḥ
rājā mṛga prasaṅgena tam anu prāviśat vanam
ekākī vai hṛta balaḥ kṣudh pripāsā samanvitaḥ
sa vanasya antam āsādya mahat ca araṇyam āsadat
tṛṣayā parayā āviṣṭaḥ nviṣyat jalam itas tatas
sa dūrāt pūra cakra āhvam haṃsa sārasa nāditaiḥ

original: sūcitaṃ sara āgatya sāśva eva vyagāhata /
analyzed: sūcitam saraḥ āgatya sa aśvaḥ eva vyagāhata

original: padmānāñca parāgeṇa utpalānāṃ rajena ca // GarP_2,9.16 //
analyzed: padmānām ca parāgeṇa utpalānām rajena ca
sugandham amalam śītam pītvā ambhaḥ nirjagāma ha
mārga śrama pariśrāntaḥ taḍāga taṭa maṇḍapam

original: nyagrodhaṃ vīkṣya tasyāśu jaṭāsvaśvaṃ babandha ha /
analyzed: nyagrodham vīkṣya tasya āśu jaṭāsu aśvam babandha ha
sa tatra āstaram āstīrya kheṭakān upadhāya ca
sūṣvāpa vāyunā tatra sevyā mātar tadā kṣaṇam

original: kṣaṇaṃ supte nṛpe tatra preto vai pretavāhanaḥ // GarP_2,9.19 //
analyzed: kṣaṇam supte nṛpe tatra pretaḥ vai pretavāhanaḥ
kaścid atrā ājagāma atha yuktaḥ preta śatena ca
asthi carma śirā śeṣa śarīraḥ parivibhraman

original: bhakṣyaṃpeyaṃ mārgamāṇo na badhnāti dhṛtiṃ kvacit /
analyzed: bhakṣyaṃpeyam mārgamāṇaḥ na badhnāti dhṛtim kvacid
tam apūrvam nṛpaḥ dṛṣṭvā akarot astram śarāsane

original: dṛṣṭvā so 'pi ciraṃ bhūpaṃ tasthau sthāṇupivāgrataḥ /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā saḥ pi ciram bhūpam tasthau
tam avasthitam ālokya rājā prāpta kutūhalaḥ

original: papraccha tañca ko 'sīti kuto vā vikṛtiṃ gataḥ /
analyzed: papraccha tam ca kaḥ si iti kutas vā vikṛtim gataḥ
pretaḥ uvāca

original: pretabhāvo mayā tyakto gatiṃ prāpto 'ramyahaṃ parām // GarP_2,9.23 //
analyzed: preta bhāvaḥ mayā tyaktaḥ gatim prāptaḥ ramī aham parām
tvad saṃyogāt mahā bāho nā asti dhanyataraḥ mayā
babhruvāhanaḥ uvāca
kim etat dipine ghore sarvatra ati bhayānake
dodhūyamāne vātena vātyārūpeṇa koṇapa

original: pataṅgā maśakāḥ kṣudrāḥ kavandhāśca śirāṃsi ca // GarP_2,9.25 //
analyzed: pataṅgāḥ maśakāḥ kṣudrāḥ kabandhāḥ ca śirāṃsi ca
matsyāḥ kūrmāḥ kṛkalāsāḥ vṛścikāḥ bhramara ahayaḥ
adhomukha ūrdhva pādāḥ te krandamānāḥ su dāruṇam
pravānti vāyavaḥ rūkṣāḥ jvalantaḥ vidyut agnayaḥ
itas tatas bhramantī iva vāyunā tṛṇa santatiḥ
dṛśyante vividhāḥ jīvāḥ nāgāḥ ca śalabha vrajāḥ

original: śrūyante bahudhā rāvā na dṛśyante kvacitkvacit // GarP_2,9.28 //
analyzed: śrūyante bahudhā rāvāḥ na dṛśyante kvacid kvacid
dṛṣṭvā idam vikṛtam sarvam vepate hṛdayam mama
prate uvāca

original: yeṣāṃ naivāgnisaṃskāro na śrāddhaṃ nodakakriyāḥ // GarP_2,9.29 //
analyzed: yeṣām na eva agni saṃskāraḥ na śrāddham na udakakriyāḥ

original: ṣaṭ piṇḍā daśa gātrāṇi sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ na hi /
analyzed: ṣaṭ piṇḍāḥ daśa gātrāṇi sapiṇḍīkaraṇam na hi

original: viśvāsaghātino ye ca surāpāḥ svarṇahāriṇaḥ // GarP_2,9.30 //
analyzed: viśvāsa ghātinaḥ ye ca surā pāḥ svarṇa hāriṇaḥ

original: mṛtā durmaraṇādye ca ye cāsūyāparā janāḥ /
analyzed: mṛtāḥ durmaraṇāt ye ca ye ca asūyā parāḥ janāḥ
prāyaścitta vihīnāḥ ye agamyā gamane ratāḥ
karmabhiḥ bhrāmyamāṇāḥ te prāṇinaḥ sva kṛtaiḥ iha
durlabha āhāra pānīyāḥ dṛśyante pīḍitāḥ bhṛśam
eteṣām kṛpayā rājan tvam kuruṣva aurdhvadehikam

original: yeṣāṃ na mātā na pitā na putro na ca bāndhavāḥ // GarP_2,9.33 //
analyzed: yeṣām na mātā na pitā na putraḥ na ca bāndhavāḥ

original: teṣā rājā svayaṃ kuryātkarmāṇi tu yato nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: rājā svayam kuryāt karmāṇi tu yatas nṛpaḥ

original: ātmanaśca śubhaṃ karma kartavyaṃ pāralaukikam // GarP_2,9.34 //
analyzed: ātmanaḥ ca śubham karma kartavyam pāralaukikam

original: vimuktaḥ sarvaduḥ khebhyo yenāñjo durgātiṃ taret /
analyzed: vimuktaḥ sarva dus khebhyaḥ yena añjas durgātim taret

original: bhrātaraḥ kasya ke putrāstriyo 'pi svārthakovidāḥ // GarP_2,9.35 //
analyzed: bhrātaraḥ kasya ke sva artha kovidāḥ
na kāryaḥ teṣu viśrambha sva kṛtam bhujyate iyatas

original: gṛheṣvarthā nivarnttante śmaśāne caiva bāndhavāḥ // GarP_2,9.36 //
analyzed: gṛheṣu arthāḥ nivarnttante śmaśāne ca eva bāndhavāḥ

original: śarīraṃ kāṣṭhāmādatte pāpaṃ puṇyaṃ saha vrajet /
analyzed: śarīram kāṣṭhām ādatte pāpam puṇyam saha vrajet

original: tasmādāśu tvayā samyagātmanaḥ śreya icchatā // GarP_2,9.37 //
analyzed: tasmāt āśu tvayā samyak ātmanaḥ śreyaḥ icchatā
asthireṇa śarīreṇa kartavyam ca aurdhvadohikam
rājā uvāca

original: kṛśarūpaḥ karālākṣastvaṃ preta iva lakṣyase // GarP_2,9.38 //
analyzed: kṛśa rūpaḥ karāla akṣaḥ tvam pretaḥ iva lakṣyase
kathayasvaḥ mama prītyā pretarāja yathātatham

original: tathā pṛṣṭaḥ sa vai rājñā uvāca sakalaṃ svakam // GarP_2,9.39 //
analyzed: tathā pṛṣṭaḥ sa vai rājñā uvāca sakalam svakam
pretaḥ uvāca
kathayāmi nṛpa śreṣṭha sarvam evā āditas tava

original: pretatve kāraṇaṃ śrutvā dayāṃ kartumihārhasi // GarP_2,9.40 //
analyzed: preta tve kāraṇam śrutvā dayām kartum iha arhasi
vaidiśam nāma nagaram sarva sampad sukha āvaham
nānā janapada ākīrṇam nānā ratna samākulam
nānā puṣpa vana ākīrṇam nānā puṇyajana āvṛtam

original: tatrāhaṃ nyavasaṃ bhūpa devārcanarataḥ sadā // GarP_2,9.42 //
analyzed: tatra aham nyavasam bhūpa deva arcana rataḥ sadā
vaiśya jātiḥ sudevaḥ ham nāmnā viditam astu te

original: havyena tarpitā devāḥ kavyena pitaro mayā // GarP_2,9.43 //
analyzed: havyena tarpitāḥ devāḥ kavyena pitaraḥ mayā
vividhaiḥ dāna yogaiḥ ca viprāḥ santarpitāḥ mayā

original: āhāraśca vihāraśca mayā vai suniveśitaḥ // GarP_2,9.44 //
analyzed: āhāraḥ ca vihāraḥ ca mayā vai su niveśitaḥ
dīna anātha viśiṣṭebhyaḥ mayā dattam anekadhā

original: tatsarvaṃ niṣphalaṃ jātaṃ mama daivādupāgatam // GarP_2,9.45 //
analyzed: tat sarvam niṣphalam jātam mama daivāt upāgatam

original: na me 'sti santatistāta na suhṛnna ca bāndhavāḥ /
analyzed: na me sti santatiḥ tāta na suhṛd na ca bāndhavāḥ

original: na ca mitraṃ hitastādṛgyaḥ kuryādaurdhvadaihikam // GarP_2,9.46 //
analyzed: na ca mitram hitaḥ tādṛś yaḥ kuryāt aurdhvadaihikam

original: pretatvaṃ susthiraṃ tena mama jātaṃ nṛpottama /
analyzed: preta tvam su sthiram tena mama jātam nṛpa uttama
ekādaśam tri pakṣam ca ṣāṇmāsikam atha ābdikam

original: pratimāsyāni cānyā ni hyevaṃ śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa /
analyzed: pratimāsyāni ca anyāḥ hi evam śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa

original: yasyaitāni na dīyante pretaśrāddhāni bhūpate // GarP_2,9.48 //
analyzed: yasya etāni na dīyante preta śrāddhāni bhūpate
preta tvam su sthiram tasyaḥ dattaiḥ śrāddha śataiḥ api

original: evaṃ jñātvā mahārāja pretatvāduddharasva mām // GarP_2,9.49 //
analyzed: evam jñātvā mahā rāja preta tvāt uddharasva mām
varṇānām ca eva sarveṣām rājā bandhuḥ iha ucyate

original: tanmāṃ tāraya rājendra maṇiratnaṃ dadāmi te // GarP_2,9.50 //
analyzed: tat mām tāraya rāja indra maṇi ratnam dadāmi te
yathā mama śubha avāptiḥ bhavet nṛpa vara uttama

original: tathā kāryaṃ mahīpāla dayāṃ kṛtvā mayi prabho // GarP_2,9.51 //
analyzed: tathā kāryam mahīpāla dayām kṛtvā mayi prabho
sapiṇḍaiḥ vā sagotraiḥ vā niṣṭuraiḥ na kṛtaḥ hime
vṛṣotsargaḥ tatas duṣṭam preta tvam prāptavān aham
kṣudh tṛṣā āviṣṭa dehaḥ ca bhakṣyam pānam na ca āpnuyām
atas vikṛtiḥ eṣā vai kṛśā tva ādiḥ amāṃsakā
kṣut tṛṣ janyam mahā duḥ kham anubhavāmi punar punar

original: akalyāṇaṃ hi pretatvaṃ vṛṣotsargaṃ vinā kṛtam // GarP_2,9.54 //
analyzed: akalyāṇam hi preta tvam vṛṣotsargam vinā kṛtam
tasmāt rājan dayā sindho prārthayāmi tava agratas
rājā uvāca

original: vartate matkule preta iti jñeyaṃ kathaṃ naraiḥ // GarP_2,9.55 //
analyzed: vartate mad kule pretaḥ iti jñeyam katham naraiḥ
tat mama ācakṣva hi preta preta tvāt mucyate katham
pretaḥ uvāca

original: liṅgena pīḍayā preto 'numātavyo naraiḥ sadā // GarP_2,9.56 //
analyzed: liṅgena pīḍayā pretaḥ naraiḥ sadā

original: vakṣyāmi pīḍāstā rājanyā vai pretakṛtā bhuvi /
analyzed: vakṣyāmi pīḍāḥ tāḥ rājanyāḥ vai preta kṛtāḥ bhuvi

original: ṛtuḥ syādaphalaḥ strīṇāṃ yadā vaṃśo na vardhate // GarP_2,9.57 //
analyzed: ṛtuḥ syāt aphalaḥ strīṇām yadā vaṃśaḥ na vardhate
ca alpa vayasaḥ sā pīḍā peta sambhavā
akasmāt vṛtti haraṇam apratiṣṭhā janeṣu vai
akasmāt gaha dāhaḥ syāt sā pīḍā preta sambhavā

original: svagehe kalaho nityaṃ syācca mithyābhiśaṃsanapa // GarP_2,9.59 //
analyzed: sva gehe kalahaḥ nityam syāt ca mithyā abhiśaṃsana pa
gaja yakṣma ādi sambhūtiḥ sā pīḍā preta sambhavā

original: api svayaṃ dhanaṃ muktaṃ prayatnādanave pathi // GarP_2,9.60 //
analyzed: api svayam dhanam muktam prayatnāt anave pathi

original: naiva labhyeta naśyetaḥ sā pīḍā pretasaṃmavā /
analyzed: nā eva labhyeta naśya itas sā pīḍā preta saṃmavā
su vṛṣṭau kṛṣi nāśaḥ syāt vāṇijyāt vṛtti nāśanam
kalatram pati kūlam syāt sā pīḍā preta sambhavā
evam tu pīḍayā rājan preta jñānam bhavet nṛṇām
vṛṣotsargaḥ yadi bhavet preta tvāt mucyate tadā

original: tasmānnapa tvamapyevaṃ vṛṣotsargaṃ kuru prabho // GarP_2,9.63 //
analyzed: tasmāt napa tvam api evam vṛṣotsargam kuru prabho
mām uddiśya nṛpe ti anukampayā
rāja putraḥ hataḥ kaścid mayā eva āptaḥ tatas mayā

original: kuruṣva tvaṃ gṛhītvā me taddhanena vṛṣotsavam /
analyzed: kuruṣva tvam gṛhītvā me tad dhanena vṛṣotsavam
kārtikyām paurṇamāsyām vā āśvayuj madhye nṛpa
revatī yukta divase kṛṣīṣṭhāḥ me vṛṣotsavam
puṇyān viprān samāhūya vahnim sthāpya vidhānataḥ
mantraiḥ hemaḥ tathā kāryaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ nṛpa vidhānataḥ
bahūn viprān bhojayethāḥ tad ratna āpta dhanena vai

original: evaṃ kṛte mahīpāla mama muktirbhaviṣyati // GarP_2,9.67 //
analyzed: evam kṛte mahīpāla mama muktiḥ bhaviṣyati
śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: tatheti pratijagrāha maṇiṃ rājā tataḥ khaga // GarP_2,9.68 //
analyzed: tathā iti pratijagrāha maṇim rājā tatas khaga
kriyā adhikāraḥ tasya eva yaḥ dhana grāhakaḥ bhavet
kurvatoḥ tu tayoḥ vārtām evam preta mahīkṣitoḥ
jhaṇatkāraḥ tu ghaṇṭānām bherīṇām bhāṅkṛtiḥ tathā
jātaḥ tadā rāja senā caturaṅgā samāpatat
tasyām āgata mātrāyām pretaḥ ca adṛśya tām gataḥ
tasmāt vanāt viniḥ sṛtya rājā api puram āgamat
sa kārtikyām pūrṇimāyām pretam uddiśya saṃvyadhāt
vṛṣotsargam vidhānena tad maṇi āpta dhanena ca

original: preto 'pyayaṃ sapadilabdhasuvarṇadehaḥ karmānta āgata iti praṇanāma bhūpam /
analyzed: pretaḥ pi ayam sapadi labdha suvarṇa dehaḥ karmānte āgataḥ iti praṇanāma bhūpam

original: deva tvadīyamahimāyamiti stuvan sa yāto divaṃ garuḍa bhūpatinā kṛtajñaḥ // GarP_2,9.73 //
analyzed: deva tvadīya mahimā ayam iti stuvan sa yātaḥ divam garuḍa bhūpatinā kṛtajñaḥ
etat te sarvam ākhyātam yathā bhūpatinā api saḥ
uddhṛtaḥ preta bhāvāt vai kim anyat śrotum icchasi

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde rājakṛtavṛṣotsargakriyādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma navamo
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde rājakṛtavṛṣotsargakriyādinirūpaṇam nāma navamaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
garuḍaḥ uvāca
sapiṇḍīkaraṇa jāte ābdike ca svakarmabhiḥ

original: devatvaṃ vā manuṣyatvaṃ pakṣitvaṃ vāpnuyurnarāḥ // GarP_2,10.1 //
analyzed: deva tvam vā manuṣya tvam pakṣi tvam vā āpnuyuḥ narāḥ

original: teṣāṃ vibhinnāhārāṇāṃ śrāddhaṃ vai tṛptidaṃ katham /
analyzed: teṣām vibhinna āhārāṇām śrāddham vai tṛpti dam katham
yat api anyaiḥ dvijaiḥ bhuktam hūyate yadi vā anale
śubha aśubha ātmakaiḥ pretaḥ tat dattam bhujyate katham
śrāddhasya āvaśyaka tvantu āmāvāsya ādiṣu śrutam
śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: pretānāṃ śṛṇu pakṣīndra yathā śrāddhantu tṛptidam /
analyzed: pretānām śṛṇu pakṣi indra yathā śrāddham tu tṛpti dam

original: devo yadapi jāto 'yaṃ manuṣyaḥ karmayogataḥ // GarP_2,10.4 //
analyzed: devaḥ yat api jātaḥ yam manuṣyaḥ karma yogataḥ
tasya annam amṛtam bhūtvā deva tve pi anuyāti ca

original: gāndhavye bhogarūpeṇa paśutve ca tṛṇaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,10.5 //
analyzed: gāndhavye bhoga rūpeṇa paśu tve ca tṛṇam bhavet
śrāddham hi vāyu rūpeṇa nāga tve pi anugacchati

original: phalaṃ bhavati pakṣitve rākṣaseṣu tathāmiṣam // GarP_2,10.6 //
analyzed: phalam bhavati pakṣi tve rākṣaseṣu tathā āmiṣam
dānava tve tathā māṃsam preta tveḥ rudhiram tathā
manuṣya tve nna pāna ādi bālye bhoga rasaḥ bhavet
garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: kathaṃ kavyāni dattāni havyāni ca janairiha /
analyzed: katham kavyāni dattāni havyāni ca janaiḥ iha

original: gacchanti pitṛlokaṃ vā prāpakaḥ ko 'tra gadyate // GarP_2,10.8 //
analyzed: gacchanti pitṛ lokam vā prāpakaḥ gadyate
mṛtānām api jantūnām śrāddham āpyāyanam yadi
nirvāṇasya pradīpasya tailam saṃvardhayet śikhām
mṛtāḥ ca puruṣāḥ svāmin sva karma janitām gatim

original: gāhantaḥ ke kathaṃ svasya sutasya śreya āpnuyuḥ // GarP_2,10.10 //
analyzed: gāhantaḥ ke katham svasya sutasya śreyaḥ āpnuyuḥ
śrī bhagavān uvāca
śruteḥ pratyakṣataḥ tārkṣya prāmāṇyam balavattaram
śrutyā tuḥ bodhita arthasya pīyūṣa tva ādi rūpa tā
nāma gotram pitṝṇām vai prāpakam havya kavyayoḥ
śrāddhasya mantrāḥ tadvat tu prāpakāḥ ca eva bhaktitaḥ
acetanāni ca etāni prāpayanti kathantu iti

original: suparṇa nāvagantavyaṃ prāpakaṃ vacmi te 'param // GarP_2,10.13 //
analyzed: suparṇa nā avagantavyam prāpakam vacmi te param
agniṣvātta ādayaḥ teṣām mādhipatye vyavasthitāḥ

original: kāle nyāyāgataṃ pātre vidhinā pratipāditam // GarP_2,10.14 //
analyzed: kāle nyāya āgatam pātre vidhinā pratipāditam
annam nayanti tatra ete jantuḥ yatra avatiṣṭhate

original: nāma gotrañca mantrāśca dattamannaṃ nayanti te // GarP_2,10.15 //
analyzed: nāma gotram ca mantrāḥ ca dattam annam nayanti te
api yoni śatam prāptān tān tṛptiḥ upatiṣṭhati
teṣām loka antara sthānām vividhaiḥ nāma gotrakaiḥ

original: apasavyaṃ kṣitau darbhe dattāḥ piṇḍāstrayastu vai /
analyzed: apasavyam kṣitau darbhe dattāḥ piṇḍāḥ trayaḥ tu vai
yānti tān tarpayanti evam preta sthāna sthitān pitṝn
aprāpta yātanā sthānāḥ śreṣṭhāḥ ye bhuvi pañcadhā
nānā rūpāḥ tu jātāḥ ye tiryagyoni ādi jātiṣu
yad āhārāḥ bhavanti ete pitaraḥ yatra yoniṣu
tāsu tāsu tad āhāraḥ śrāddhāḥ avatiṣṭhati

original: yathā goṣu pranaṣṭāsu vatso vindati mātaram /
analyzed: yathā goṣu pranaṣṭāsu vatsaḥ vindati mātaram
tathā annam nayate vipra jantuḥ yatra avatiṣṭhate
pitaraḥ śrāddha moktāraḥ viśveḥ devaiḥ sadā saha

original: ete śrāddhaṃ sadā bhuktvā pitṝnsantarpayantyataḥ // GarP_2,10.21 //
analyzed: ete śrāddham sadā bhuktvā pitṝn santarpayanti atas
vasu rudrāt iti sutāḥ pitaraḥ śrāddha devatāḥ
prīṇayāte manuṣyāṇām pitṝn śrāddheṣu tarpitāḥ

original: ātmānaṃ gurviṇī garbhamapi prīṇāti vai yathā /
analyzed: ātmānam gurviṇī garbham api prīṇāti vai yathā

original: dohadena tathā devāḥ śrāddhaiḥ svāṃśca pitṝnnṛṇām // GarP_2,10.23 //
analyzed: dohadena tathā devāḥ śrāddhaiḥ svān ca pitṝn nṛṇām
hṛṣyanti pitaraḥ śrutvā śrāddha kālam upasthitam

original: anyonyaṃ manasā dhyātvā sampatanti manojavam // GarP_2,10.24 //
analyzed: anyonyam manasā dhyātvā sampatanti manojavam
brāhmaṇaiḥ saha pitaraḥ hi antarikṣa gāḥ

original: vāyubhūtāśca tiṣṭhanti bhuktvā yānti parāṃ gatim // GarP_2,10.25 //
analyzed: vāyu bhūtāḥ ca tiṣṭhanti bhuktvā yānti parām gatim
nimantritāḥ tu ye viprāḥ śrāddha pūrva dineḥ khaga

original: praviśya pitarasteṣu bhuktvā yānti svamālayam // GarP_2,10.26 //
analyzed: praviśya pitaraḥ teṣu bhuktvā yānti svam ālayam

original: śrāddhakartrā tu yadyekaḥ śrāddhe vipro nimantritaḥ /
analyzed: śrāddha kartrā tu yadi ekaḥ śrāddhe vipraḥ nimantritaḥ

original: udarasthaḥ pitā tasya vāmapārśve pitāmahaḥ // GarP_2,10.27 //
analyzed: udara sthaḥ pitā tasya vāma pārśve pitāmahaḥ
prapitāmahaḥ dakṣiṇatas pṛṣṭhatas piṇḍa bhakṣakaḥ
śrāddha kāle yamaḥ pretān pitṝn ca api yama ālayāt
visarjayati mānuṣye niraya sthān ca kāśyapa
kṣudhā ārtāḥ kīrtayantaḥ ca duṣkṛtam ca svayaṅkṛtam
kāṅkṣanti putra pautrebhyaḥ pāyasam madhu saṃyutam
tasmāt tān tatra vidhinā tarpayet pāyasena tu
garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: svāminkenāpi te dṛṣṭā āgatāḥ pitaro dvija /
analyzed: svāmin kena api te dṛṣṭāḥ āgatāḥ pitaraḥ dvija
lokāt amuṣmāt āgatya bhuñjantaḥ bhuvi mānada
śrī bhagavān uvāca
garutman śṛṇu vakṣyāmi yathā dṛṣṭā astu sītayā

original: pitaro vipradehe vai śvaśurādyāstrayaḥ kvacit // GarP_2,10.32 //
analyzed: pitaraḥ vipra dehe vai śvaśura ādyāḥ trayaḥ kvacid
gṛhītvā pituḥ ājñām vai rāmaḥ vanam upāgamat
tatas puṣkara yātrā artham rāmaḥ yāt sītayā saha

original: tīrthaṃ cāpi samāgatya śrāddhaṃ prārabdha vāṃstu saḥ /
analyzed: tīrtham ca api samāgatya śrāddham saḥ

original: phalaṃ pakvantu jānakyā siddhaṃ rāme niveditam // GarP_2,10.34 //
analyzed: phalam jānakyā siddham rāme niveditam
snāta priyā ukta vākyāt tu su snātā nam apālayat

original: nabhomadhyagate sūrye kāle kutupa āgate // GarP_2,10.35 //
analyzed: nabhaḥ madhya gate sūrye kāle kutupe āgate

original: ayātā ṛḥṣayaḥ sarve ye rāmeṇa nimantritāḥ /
analyzed: a yātāḥ ṛḥṣayaḥ sarve ye rāmeṇa nimantritāḥ
tān munīn āgatān dṛṣṭvā vaidehī janaka ātmakā
rāma ājñayā annam ādāya pariveṣṭum upāgatā

original: apāsarpattato dūre vipramadhye tu saṃsthitā // GarP_2,10.37 //
analyzed: apāsarpat tatas dūre vipra madhye tu saṃsthitā

original: gulmairācchādya cātmānaṃ nigūḍhaṃ sā sthitā tadā /
analyzed: gulmaiḥ ācchādya ca ātmānam nigūḍham sā sthitā tadā

original: ekānte tu tadā sītāṃ jñātvā rāghavanandanaḥ // GarP_2,10.38 //
analyzed: ekānte tu tadā sītām jñātvā rāghava nandanaḥ
vimṛśya su ciram kālam idam kim iti sa tvaram

original: kiñcitkvacidgatā sādhvī trapāyāḥ kāraṇena hi // GarP_2,10.39 //
analyzed: kiñcid kvacid gatā sādhvī trapāyāḥ kāraṇena hi
kim vā na bhojayan viprān sī tām anveṣayāmi aham
vimṛśan evam evam sa svayam viprān abhojayat
gateṣu dvijamukhyeṣu priyām rāmaḥ bravīt idam

original: kathaṃ talāsu līnā tvaṃ munīndṛṣṭvā samāgatān // GarP_2,10.41 //
analyzed: katham talāsu līnā tvam munīn dṛṣṭvā samāgatān

original: tatsarvaṃ mama tanvaṅgi kāraṇaṃ vada mā ciram /
analyzed: tat sarvam mama tanvaṅgi kāraṇam vada mā ciram

original: evamuktā tadā bhartrā sītā sādhomukhī sthitā /
analyzed: evam uktā tadā bhartrā sītā sā adhomukhī sthitā
muñcantī ca aśru saṃghātam rāghavam vākyam abravīt
sītā uvāca

original: śṛṇu tvaṃ nātha yaddṛṣṭamāścaryamiha yādṛśam // GarP_2,10.43 //
analyzed: śṛṇu tvam nātha yat dṛṣṭam āścaryam iha yādṛśam

original: pitā tava mayā dṛṣṭo brāhmaṇāgre tu rāghavaḥ /
analyzed: pitā tava mayā dṛṣṭaḥ brāhmaṇa agre tu rāghavaḥ
sarva ābharaṇa saṃyuktaḥ dvau ca anyau ca tathāvidhau
dṛṣṭvā tvad pitaran ca aham apakrāntā tava antikāt

original: valkalājinasaṃvītā kathaṃ rājñaḥ puraḥ prabho // GarP_2,10.45 //
analyzed: valkala ajina saṃvītā katham rājñaḥ puras prabho
bhavāmi ripu vīra ghna satyam etat uha āhṛtam

original: svahastena kathaṃ deyaṃ rājñe vā bhojanaṃ mayā // GarP_2,10.46 //
analyzed: sva hastena katham deyam rājñe vā bhojanam mayā
dāsānām api ye dāsāḥ na upabhuñjanti karhicit

original: tṛṇapātre kathaṃ tasmai annaṃ dātuṃ hi śakruyām // GarP_2,10.47 //
analyzed: tṛṇa pātre katham tasmai annam dātum hi śakruyām
yā aham rājñā purā dṛṣṭā sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitā
sā sveda mala digdha aṅgī katham yāsyāmi bhūpatim
apakṛṣṭā asmi tena aham trapayā raghunandana
śrī bhāgavān uvāca

original: iti śrutvā priyāvākyaṃ rāmo vismitamānasaḥ // GarP_2,10.49 //
analyzed: iti śrutvā priyā vākyam rāmaḥ vismita mānasaḥ
āścaryam iti tat jñātvā tadā sva sthānam āgamat

original: sītayā pitaro dṛṣṭā yathā tatte niveditam // GarP_2,10.50 //
analyzed: sītayā pitaraḥ dṛṣṭāḥ yathā tat te niveditam
aparam śrāddha māhātmyam kiñcid śṛṇu samāsatas
amāvasyā dine prāpte gṛha dvāre samāsthitāḥ
vāyu bhūtāḥ pravāñchanti śrāddham pitṛ gaṇāḥ nṛṇām
yāvat astamayam bhānoḥ kṣudh pipāsā samākulāḥ

original: tataścāstaṃ gate sūrye nirāśā duḥ khasaṃyutāḥ /
analyzed: tatas ca astam gate sūrye nirāśāḥ duḥ kha saṃyutāḥ

original: niḥ śvasantaściraṃ yānti garhayantastu vaṃśajam // GarP_2,10.53 //
analyzed: niḥ śvasantaḥ ciram yānti garhayantaḥ tu vaṃśajam
tasmāt śrāddham prayatnena amāyām kartum arhati

original: yadi śrāddhaṃ prakurvanti putrādyāstasya bāndhavāḥ // GarP_2,10.54 //
analyzed: yadi śrāddham prakurvanti putra ādyāḥ tasya bāndhavāḥ

original: uddhṛtā ye gayāśrāddhe brahmalokañca taiḥ saha /
analyzed: uddhṛtāḥ ye gayā śrāddhe brahma lokam ca taiḥ saha

original: bhajante kṣutpipāsā vā na teṣāṃ jāyate kvacit // GarP_2,10.55 //
analyzed: bhajante kṣudh pipāsā vā na teṣām jāyate kvacid
tasmāt śrāddham prayatnena samyak kuryāt vicakṣaṇaḥ
tasmāt śrāddham caret bhaktyā śākaiḥ api yathāvidhi

original: kurvīta samaye śrāddhaṃ kule kaścinna sīdati /
analyzed: kurvīta samaye śrāddham kule kaścid na sīdati

original: āyuḥ putrānyaśaḥ svargaṃ kīrtiṃ puṣṭiṃ balaṃ śriyam // GarP_2,10.57 //
analyzed: āyuḥ putrān yaśaḥ svargam kīrtim puṣṭim balam śriyam
paśūn sāraivyam dhanam dhānyam prāpnuyāt pitṛ pūjanāt
deva kāryāt api sadā pitṛ kāryam viśiṣyate
devatābhyaḥ pitṝṇām hi pūrvam āpyāyanam śubham
ye yajanti pitṝn devān brāhmaṇān ca hutāśanam
sarva bhūta antarātmānam mām eva hi yajanti te

original: smārtena vidhinā śrāddhaṃ kṛtvā svavibhavocitam // GarP_2,10.60 //
analyzed: smārtena vidhinā śrāddham kṛtvā sva vibhava ucitam
ā brāhma stamba paryantam jagat prīṇāti mānavaḥ

original: annaprakiraṇaṃ yattu manuṣyaiḥ kriyate bhuvi // GarP_2,10.61 //
analyzed: anna prakiraṇam yat tu manuṣyaiḥ kriyate bhuvi
tena tuptim upāyānti ye piśāca tvam āgatāḥ

original: yaccāmbuḥ snānavastrebhyo bhūmau patati khecara // GarP_2,10.62 //
analyzed: yat ca ambuḥ snāna vastrebhyaḥ bhūmau patati khecara

original: tena ye tarutāṃ prāptāsteṣāṃ tṛptiḥ prajāyate /
analyzed: tena ye taru tām prāptāḥ teṣām tṛptiḥ prajāyate

original: yāni gandhāmbūni caiva patanti dharaṇītale // GarP_2,10.63 //
analyzed: yāni gandha ambūni ca eva patanti dharaṇī tale
tena ca āpyāyanam teṣām ye deva tvam upāgatāḥ

original: ye cāpi svakulādbāhyāḥ kriyāyogyā hyasaṃskṛtāḥ // GarP_2,10.64 //
analyzed: ye ca api sva kulāt bāhyāḥ kriyā yogyāḥ hi asaṃskṛtāḥ
vipannāḥ te tu vikira saṃmārjana jala āśinaḥ

original: bhuktvā cācamanaṃ yacca jalaṃ yaccāhni sevitam // GarP_2,10.65 //
analyzed: bhuktvā ca ācamanam yat ca jalam yat ca ahni sevitam
brāhmaṇānām tathā eva anyat tena tṛptim prayānti vai
piśāca tvam anuprāptāḥ kṛmi kīṭa tvam eva ye
uddhṛteṣu anna piṇḍeṣu bhuvi ye ca anna kāṅkṣiṇaḥ
taiḥ eva āpyāyanam teṣām ye manuṣya tvam āgatāḥ

original: evaṃ vai kriyamāṇānāṃ teṣāṃ caiva dvijanmanām /
analyzed: evam vai kriyamāṇānām teṣām ca eva dvijanmanām
kaścid jala anna vikṣepaḥ śuciḥ ucchiṣṭaḥ eva vā

original: tenānnena kule teṣāṃ ye vai jātyantaraṃ gatāḥ /
analyzed: tena annena kule teṣām ye vai jāti antaram gatāḥ

original: bhavatyāpyāyanaṃ teṣāṃ samyak śrāddhe kṛte sati // GarP_2,10.69 //
analyzed: bhavati āpyāyanam teṣām samyak śrāddhe kṛte sati
anyāya upārjitaiḥ dravyaiḥ yat śrāddham kriyate naraiḥ
takṛpyanti tena caṇḍālāḥ pukkasa ādi upayoniṣu
evam saṃprāpyate pakṣin yat dattam iha bāndhavaiḥ
śrāddham kurvadbhiḥ anna amvu śākaiḥ tṛptiḥ hi jāyate
etat te sarvam ākhyātam yat mām tvam paripṛcchasi
sadyas deha antara prāptiḥ vilaṃbena avanī tale
pṛṣṭavān asi tat te ham pravakṣyāmi samāsatas
sadyas vilambatam ca eva ubhayathā api kalevaram

original: yato hi martyaḥ prāpnoti tadviśeṣañca me śṛṇu /
analyzed: yatas hi martyaḥ prāpnoti tat viśeṣam ca me śṛṇu
adhūmaka jyotiḥ iva aṅguṣṭha mātraḥ pumān tatas
deham ekam sadyas eva vāyavīyam prapadyate

original: yathā nṛṇajalaukā hi paścatpādaṃ tadoddharet // GarP_2,10.75 //
analyzed: yathā nṛṇa jalaukāḥ hi paścat pādam tadā uddharet

original: sthitiragryasya pādasya yadā jātā dṛḍhā bhavet /
analyzed: sthitiḥ agryasya pādasya yadā jātā dṛḍhā bhavet

original: evaṃ dehī pūrvadehaṃ samutsṛjati taṃ yadā // GarP_2,10.76 //
analyzed: evam dehī pūrva deham samutsṛjati tam yadā
bhoga artham agre syāt dehaḥ vāyavīyaḥ upasthitaḥ
viṣaya grāhakam yadvat mriyamāṇasya ca indriyam

original: nirvyāpāraṃ tacca dehe vāyunaiva sa gacchati /
analyzed: nirvyāpāram tat ca dehe vāyunā eva sa gacchati
śarīram yat avāpnoti tat ca api utkvamyati svayam

original: gṛhītvā svaṃ viniryāti jīvo garbha īvāśayāt /
analyzed: gṛhītvā svam viniryāti jīvaḥ garbhaḥ īva āśayāt

original: utkrāmantaṃ sthitaṃ vāpi bhuñjānaṃ vā guṇānvitam // GarP_2,10.79 //
analyzed: utkrāmantam sthitam vā api bhuñjānam vā guṇa anvitam
vimūḍhāḥ na anupaśyanti paśyanti jñāna cakṣuṣaḥ
ātivāhikam iti evam vāyavīyam vadanti hi

original: evaṃ tu yātudhānānāṃ tameva ca vadanti hi /
analyzed: evam tu yātudhānānām tam eva ca vadanti hi

original: suparṇa īdṛśo deho nṛṇāṃ bhavati piṇḍajaḥ // GarP_2,10.81 //
analyzed: suparṇaḥ īdṛśaḥ dehaḥ nṛṇām bhavati piṇḍa jaḥ
putra ādibhiḥ kṛtāḥ ced syuḥ piṇḍāḥ daśa daśa āhikāḥ

original: piṇḍajena tu dehena vāyujaścaikatāṃ vrajet // GarP_2,10.82 //
analyzed: piṇḍa jena tu dehena vāyu jaḥ ca eka tām vrajet
piṇḍa jaḥ yadi nā eva syāt vāyu joḥ hati yātanām
dehinaḥ u smin yathā dehe kaumāram yauvanam jarā
tathā deha antara prāptiḥ pakṣi indra iti avadhāraya

original: vāsāṃsi jīrṇāni yathā vihāya navāni gṛhṇāti naroparāṇi /
analyzed: vāsāṃsi jīrṇāni yathā vihāya navāni gṛhṇāti nara uparāṇi

original: tathā śarīrāṇi vihāya jīrṇānyanyāni saṃyāti navāni dehī // GarP_2,10.84 //
analyzed: tathā śarīrāṇi vihāya jīrṇāni anyāni saṃyāti navāni dehī

original: nainaṃ chindanti śastrāṇi nainaṃ dahati pāvakaḥ /
analyzed: na enam chindanti śastrāṇi na enam dahati pāvakaḥ

original: na cainaṃ kledayantyāpo na śoṣayati mārutaḥ // GarP_2,10.85 //
analyzed: na ca enam kledayanti āpaḥ na śoṣayati mārutaḥ

original: vāyavīyāṃ tanuṃ yāti sadya ityuktameva te /
analyzed: vāyavīyām tanum yāti sadyas iti uktam eva te

original: prāptirvilaṃbato yasya taṃ dehaṃ khalu me śṛṇu // GarP_2,10.86 //
analyzed: prāptiḥ vilaṃbataḥ yasya tam deham khalu me śṛṇu
kvacid vilaṃbataḥ deham piṇḍa jam sa samāpnuyāt
atho gataḥ yāmya lokam svīya karma anusārataḥ
citraguptasya vākyena nirayāṇi bhunakti saḥ
yātanāḥ samavāpya atha paśu pakṣi ādikīm tanum

original: yā gṛhṇāti naraḥ sā syānmohena mamatāspadam /
analyzed: yā gṛhṇāti naraḥ sā syāt mohena mamatā āspadam

original: śubhāśubhaṃ karmaphalaṃ bhuktvā mucyate mānavaḥ // GarP_2,10.89 //
analyzed: śubha aśubham karma phalam bhuktvā mucyate mānavaḥ
garuḍaḥ uvāca
tīrtvā duḥ kha bhava ambhodhim bhavantam katham āpnuyāt
tat vadasva dayā nidhe

original: bhūyo duḥ khasya saṃsargo narasya na bhavedyathā /
analyzed: bhūyaḥ duḥ khasya saṃsargaḥ narasya na bhavet yathā

original: brūhi śuśrūṣamāṇasya pṛcchato me ramāpate // GarP_2,10.91 //
analyzed: brūhi śuśrūṣamāṇasya pṛcchataḥ me ramāpate
śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca
sve sve karmaṇi abhirataḥ saṃsiddhim labhate naraḥ

original: svakarmanirataḥ siddhiṃ yathā vindati tacchṛṇu // GarP_2,10.92 //
analyzed: sva karma nirataḥ siddhim yathā vindati tat śṛṇu
karma vibhraṣṭa kāluṣyaḥ vāsudeva anucintayā

original: buddhyā viśuddhayā yukto dhṛtyātmānaṃ niyamya ca // GarP_2,10.93 //
analyzed: buddhyā viśuddhayā yuktaḥ dhṛtya ātmānam niyamya ca
śabda ādīn viṣayān tyaktvā rāga dveṣau vyudasya ca
virakta sevī labdhvā āśī yata vāc kāya mānasaḥ
dhyāna yoga paraḥ nityam vairagyam samupāśritaḥ

original: ahaṅkāraṃ balaṃ darpaṃ kāmaṃ krodhaṃ parigraham // GarP_2,10.95 //
analyzed: ahaṅkāram balam darpam kāmam krodham parigraham
vimucya nirmamaḥ śāntaḥ brahma bhūyāya kalpate

original: ataḥ paraṃ nṛṇāṃ kṛtyaṃ nāsti kaśyapanandana // GarP_2,10.96 //
analyzed: atas param nṛṇām kṛtyam nā asti kaśyapa nandana

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpu- uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīdṛdharmadṛpretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde śrāddhasya tṛptidatvādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma daśamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahā pu uttara khaṇḍe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde śrāddhasya tṛptidatvādinirūpaṇam nāma daśamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: mriyate kaḥ suraśreṣṭha dehamāśritya kutracit // GarP_2,11.1 //
analyzed: mriyate kaḥ suraśreṣṭha deham āśritya kutracid

original: indriyāṇi kuto yānti hyaspṛśyaḥ sa kathaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: indriyāṇi kutas yānti hi aspṛśyaḥ sa katham bhavet

original: kva karmāṇi kṛtānīha kathaṃ bhuṅkte prasarpati // GarP_2,11.2 //
analyzed: kva karmāṇi kṛtāni iha katham bhuṅkte prasarpati
prasādam kuru me moham chettum arhasi aśeṣatas
kāśyapaḥ ham sura śreṣṭha vinatā garbha saṃbhavaḥ

original: yamalokaṃ kathaṃ yānti viṣṇulokaṃ ca mānavāḥ // GarP_2,11.3 //
analyzed: yama lokam katham yānti viṣṇu lokam ca mānavāḥ
śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: parasya yoṣitaṃ hṛtvā brahmasvamapahṛtya ca // GarP_2,11.4 //
analyzed: parasya yoṣitam hṛtvā brahma svam apahṛtya ca
araṇye nirjane deśe jāyate brahmarākṣasaḥ
hīna jātau prajāyeta ratnānām apahārakaḥ

original: nainaṃ chindanti śastrāṇi nainaṃ dahati pāvakaḥ // GarP_2,11.6 //
analyzed: na enam chindanti śastrāṇi na enam dahati pāvakaḥ

original: na cainaṃ kledayantyāpo na śoṣayati mārutaḥ /
analyzed: na ca enam kledayanti āpaḥ na śoṣayati mārutaḥ

original: vāk cakṣurnāsikā karṇau gudaṃ mūtrasya sañcaraḥ // GarP_2,11.7 //
analyzed: vāc cakṣuḥ nāsikā karṇau gudam mūtrasya sañcaraḥ
aṇḍaja ādika jantūnām chidrāṇi etāni sarvaśas
ānābheḥ mūrdha paryantam ūrdhva chidrāṇi ca aṣṭa vai

original: santaḥ sukṛtino martyā ūrdhvacchidreṇa yānti vai /
analyzed: santaḥ su kṛtinaḥ martyāḥ ūrdhva chidreṇa yānti vai
mṛtāhe vārṣikam yāvat yathā ukta vidhinā khaga

original: dehe yatra vasejjantustatra bhuṅkte śubhāśubham // GarP_2,11.10 //
analyzed: dehe yatra vaset jantuḥ tatra bhuṅkte śubha aśubham
manaḥ vāc kāya jān doṣān tathā ām bhuṅkte khageśvara
mṛtaḥ sa sukham āpnoti māyā pāśaiḥ na badhyate

original: pāśabaddho naro yastu vikarmanirato bhavet // GarP_2,11.11 //
analyzed: pāśa baddhaḥ naraḥ yaḥ tu vikarma nirataḥ bhavet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāhe ūrdhvādhogatijñāpakotkramaṇadvāranirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikādaśo
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāhe ūrdhvādhogatijñāpakotkramaṇadvāranirūpaṇam nāma ekādaśaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam

evam te kathitaḥ tārkṣya jīvitasya vinā ṛṇayaḥ

caturaśīti lakṣāṇi catur bhedāḥ ca jantavaḥ
aṇḍa jāḥ sveda jāḥ ca eva udbhid jāḥ ca jārāyu jāḥ
ekaviṃśati lakṣāṇi aṇḍajāḥ parikīrtitāḥ

original: svedajāśca tathā proktā udbhijjāśca krameṇa tu // GarP_2,12.3 //
analyzed: sveda jāḥ ca tathā proktāḥ udbhid jāḥ ca krameṇa tu

original: sarveṣāmeva jantūnāṃ mānuṣatvaṃ hi durlabham // GarP_2,12.4 //
analyzed: sarveṣām eva jantūnām mānuṣa tvam hi durlabham
pañca indriya nidhāna tvam mahā puṇyaiḥ avāpyate
brāhmaṇāḥ kṣattriyāḥ vaiśyāḥ śūdrāḥ tad para jātayaḥ
rajakaḥ carmakāraḥ ca naṭaḥ buruḍaḥ eva ca
kaivarta medabhillāḥ ca sapta ete hi antyajāḥ smṛtāḥ
mleccha tumba vibhedena jāti bhedāḥ tu anekaśas
jantūnām eva sarveṣām jāti bhedāḥ sahasraśas

original: āhāro maithunaṃ nidrā bhayaṃ krodhastathaiva ca // GarP_2,12.8 //
analyzed: āhāraḥ maithunam nidrā bhayam krodhaḥ tathā eva ca

original: sarveṣā meva jantūnāṃ viveko durlabhaḥ paraḥ /
analyzed: sarveṣām eva jantūnām vivekaḥ durlabhaḥ paraḥ
eka pāda ādi rūpeṇa deha bhedāḥ tu anekaśas

original: kṛṣṇasāro mṛgo yatra dharmadaśaḥ sa ucyate /
analyzed: kṛṣṇa sāraḥ mṛgaḥ yatra dharma daśaḥ saḥ ucyate

original: brahmādyā devatāḥ sarvāstatra tiṣṭhanti sarvaśaḥ // GarP_2,12.10 //
analyzed: brahma ādyāḥ devatāḥ sarvāḥ tatra tiṣṭhanti sarvaśas

original: matimatsu narāḥ śreṣṭhā nareṣu brāhmaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_2,12.11 //
analyzed: matimatsu narāḥ śreṣṭhāḥ nareṣu brāhmaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: tayorna sādhayedekaṃ tenātmā vañcito dhruvam // GarP_2,12.12 //
analyzed: tayoḥ na sādhayet ekam tena ātmā vañcitaḥ dhruvam

original: icchati śatī sahasraṃ sahasrī lakṣamīhate kartum /
analyzed: icchati śatī sahasram sahasrī lakṣam īhate kartum

original: lakṣādhipatī rājyaṃ rājāpi sakalāṃ dharāṃ labdhum // GarP_2,12.13 //
analyzed: lakṣādhipatiḥ rājyam rājā api sakalām dharām labdhum
cakradharaḥ pi sura tvam sura bhāve sakala surapatiḥ bhavitum
surapatiḥ ūrdhva gati tvam tathā api tṛṣṇā
tṛṣṇayā ca abhibhūtaḥ tu narakam pratipadyate

original: tṛṣṇāmuktāstu ye kecitsvargavāsaṃ labhanti te // GarP_2,12.15 //
analyzed: tṛṣṇā muktāḥ tu ye kecid svarga vāsam labhanti te
ātma adhīnaḥ pumān loke sukhī bhavati niścitam

original: śabdaḥ sparśaśca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhaśca tadguṇāḥ // GarP_2,12.16 //
analyzed: śabdaḥ sparśaḥ ca rūpam ca rasaḥ gandhaḥ ca tad guṇāḥ

original: tathā ca viṣayādhīno duḥ khī bhavati niścitam // GarP_2,12.17 //
analyzed: tathā ca viṣaya adhīnaḥ duḥ khī bhavati niścitam
kuraṅga matāṅga pataṅga bhṛṅga mīnāḥ hatāḥ pañcabhiḥ eva pañca

original: ekaḥ pramādī sa kathaṃ na hanyate yaḥ sevate pañcabhireva pañca // GarP_2,12.18 //
analyzed: ekaḥ pramādī sa katham na hanyate yaḥ sevate pañcabhiḥ eva pañca
pitṛ mātṛ mayaḥ bālye yauvane dayitā mayaḥ
putra pautra mayaḥ ca ante mūḍhaḥ na ātma mayaḥ kvacid
loha dāru mayaiḥ pāśaiḥ pumān baddhaḥ vimucyate
putra dāra mayaiḥ pāśaiḥ nā eva baddhaḥ vimucyate

original: ekaḥ karoti pāpāni phalaṃ bhuṅkte mahājanaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ karoti pāpāni phalam bhuṅkte mahājanaḥ

original: bhoktāro viprayujyante kartā doṣeṇa lipyate // GarP_2,12.21 //
analyzed: bhoktāraḥ viprayujyante kartā doṣeṇa lipyate

original: ko 'pi mṛtyuṃ na jayati bālo vṛddho yuvāpi vā /
analyzed: kaḥ pi mṛtyum na jayati bālaḥ vṛddhaḥ yuvā api vā

original: sukhaduḥ khādiko vāpi punarāyāti yāti ca // GarP_2,12.22 //

original: eko 'pi bhuṅkte sukṛtameka eva ca duṣkṛtam /

mṛtam śarīram utsṛjya kāṣṭha loṣṭa samaṅkṣitau

gṛheṣu arthāḥ nivartante śmaśānāt mitra bāndhavāḥ

original: śarīraṃ vahninā dagdhaṃ puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ saha sthitam // GarP_2,12.26 //
analyzed: śarīram vahninā dagdham puṇyam pāpam saha sthitam

original: śubhaṃ vā yadi vā pāpaṃ bhuṅkte sarvatra mānavaḥ /
analyzed: śubham vā yadi vā pāpam bhuṅkte sarvatra mānavaḥ

original: yadanastamite sūrye na dattaṃ dhanamarthinām // GarP_2,12.27 //
analyzed: yat an astamite sūrye na dattam dhanam arthinām

original: na jāne tasya tadvittaṃ prātaḥ kasya bhaviṣyati /

original: rāraṭīti dhanaṃ tasya ko me bhartā bhaviṣyati // GarP_2,12.28 //

original: dhanena dhāryate dharmaḥ śraddhāpūtena cetasā // GarP_2,12.30 //
analyzed: dhanena dhāryate dharmaḥ śraddhā pūtena cetasā

original: dharmācca jāyate hyartho dharmātkāmo 'pi jāyate // GarP_2,12.31 //
analyzed: dharmāt ca jāyate hi arthaḥ dharmāt kāmaḥ pi jāyate
dharmaḥ eva apavargāya tasmāt dharmam samācaret

original: akiñcanā hi munayaḥ śraddhāvanto divaṃ gatāḥ /

original: aśraddhayā hutaṃ dattaṃ tapastaptaṃ kṛtaṃ ca yat /

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakādṛpretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde mṛtasya dharmamātrānuyāyitvanirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvādaśo

original: jīvanvāpi mṛto vāpi vṛṣotsargaṃ karoti yaḥ /

analyzed: sa ardha māsena vaiśyaḥ tu śūdraḥ māsena śudhyati

original: puttro vā sodaro vāpi pautro bandhujanastathā /

original: gotriṇaścārthabhāgī ca mṛte kuryād vṛṣotsavam // GarP_2,13.15 //

original: tānitāni ca sarvāṇi tūpatiṣṭhanti cāgrataḥ // GarP_2,13.19 //
analyzed: tāni tāni ca sarvāṇi tu upatiṣṭhanti ca agratas

original: svahastena pradattāni dehānte cākṣayaṃ phalam // GarP_2,13.20 //
analyzed: sva hastena pradattāni dehānte ca akṣayam phalam

original: vāyubhūtaḥ kṣudhāviṣṭo bhramate ca divāniśam // GarP_2,13.23 //

original: asadgarbhe bhavetso 'pi jātaḥ sadyo vinaśyati // GarP_2,13.24 //

original: yāvatsvasthamidaṃ śarīramarujaṃ yāvajjarā dūrato yāvaccendriyaśaktirapratihatā yāvatkṣayo nāyuṣaḥ /

original: ātmaśreyasi tāvadeva viduṣā kāryaḥ prayatno mahānsandīpte bhavane tu kūpakhananaṃ pratyudyamaḥ kīdṛśaḥ // GarP_2,13.25 //

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde vṛṣotsargadānadharmaputrādipraśaṃsanaṃ nāma trayodaśo

original: dātavyaṃ pratyahaṃ pātre nimitteṣu viśeṣataḥ // GarP_2,14.5 //

na apātre viduṣā kiñcid ātmanaḥ śreyaḥ icchatā

original: apātre jātu gaurdattā dātāraṃ narakaṃ nayet // GarP_2,14.6 //
analyzed: apātre jātu gauḥ dattā dātāram narakam nayet
kula ekaviṃśati yutam grahītāram ca pātayet

original: dehāntaraṃ pariprāpya svahastena kṛtaṃ ca yat // GarP_2,14.7 //
analyzed: deha antaram pariprāpya sva hastena kṛtam ca yat
dhanam bhūmi gatam yadvat sva hastena niveśitam
tadvat phalam avāpnoti hi aham vacmi khageśvara
viśeṣeṇa kriyām ca eva andhvadauhikīm
prakuryāt mokṣa kāmaḥ ca nirdhanaḥ ca viśeṣataḥ

original: svalpenāpi hi vittena svayaṃ hastena yatkṛtam /
analyzed: su alpena api hi vittena svayam hastena yat kṛtam

original: akṣayaṃ yāti tatsarvaṃ yathājyaṃ ca hutāśane // GarP_2,14.10 //
analyzed: akṣayam yāti tat sarvam yathā ājyam ca hutāśane

original: ekā caikasya dātavyā śayyā kanyā payasvinī /
analyzed: ekā ca ekasya dātavyā śayyā kanyā payasvinī

original: sā vikrītā vā dahatyāsaptamaṃ kulam // GarP_2,14.11 //
analyzed: sā vikrītā vā dahati āsaptamam kulam
tasmāt sarvam prakurvīta cañcale jīvite sati
gṛhīta dāna pātheyaḥ sukham yāti mahā adhvani
anyathā kliśyate jantuḥ pātheya rahitaḥ pathi

original: evaṃ jñātvā khagaśreṣṭha vṛṣayajñaṃ samācaret // GarP_2,14.13 //
analyzed: evam jñātvā khaga śreṣṭha vṛṣa yajñam samācaret

original: akṛtvā mriyate yastu aputro naiva muktibhāk /
analyzed: a kṛtvā mriyate yaḥ tu aputraḥ nā eva mukti bhāj

original: aputro 'pi hi yaḥ kuryātsukhaṃ yāti mahāpathe // GarP_2,14.14 //
analyzed: aputraḥ hi yaḥ kuryāt sukham yāti mahāpathe
agnihotra ādhibhiḥ yajñaiḥ dānaiḥ ca vividhaiḥ api

original: na tāṃ gatimavāpnoti vṛṣotsargeṇa yā gatiḥ // GarP_2,14.15 //
analyzed: na tām gatim avāpnoti vṛṣotsargeṇa yā gatiḥ
yajñānām ca eva sarveṣām vṛṣa yajñaḥ tathā uttamaḥ
tasmāt sarva prayatnena vṛṣa yajñam samācaret
garuḍaḥ uvāca
kathayasva prasādena kṣaya aham ca aurdhvadaihikam

original: kasminkāle tithau kasyāṃ vidhinā kena tadbhavet // GarP_2,14.17 //
analyzed: kasmin kāle tithau kasyām vidhinā kena tat bhavet

original: kṛtvā kiṃ phalamāpnoti etanme vada sāmpratam /
analyzed: kṛtvā kim phalam āpnoti etat me vada sāmpratam

original: tvatprasādena govinda mukte bhavati mānavaḥ // GarP_2,14.18 //
analyzed: tvad prasādena govinda mukte bhavati mānavaḥ
śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca
kārtika ādiṣu māseṣu yāmya āyata gate ravau
śukla pakṣe tathā śubhe

original: śubhe lagne muhūrte vā śucau deśe samāhitaḥ /
analyzed: śubhe lagne muhūrte vā śucau deśe samāhitaḥ

original: brāhmaṇaṃ tu samāhūya vidhijñaṃ śubhalakṣaṇam // GarP_2,14.20 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇam tu samāhūya vidhi jñam śubha lakṣaṇam
japa homaiḥ tathā dānaiḥ kuryāt dahesya śodhanam
puṇye bhijit su nakṣatre grahān devān samarcayet
homam kuryāt yathāśakti mantraiḥ ca vividhaiḥ api

original: grahāṇāṃ sthāpanaṃ kuryātpūrvaṃ caiva khageśvara // GarP_2,14.22 //
analyzed: grahāṇām sthāpanam kuryāt pūrvam ca eva khageśvara

original: mātṝṇāṃ pūjanaṃ kāryaṃ vasordhārāṃ ca pātayet /
analyzed: mātṝṇām pūjanam kāryam vasordhārām ca pātayet

original: vahniṃ saṃsthāpya tatraiva pūrṇaṃ homaṃ tu kārayet // GarP_2,14.23 //
analyzed: vahnim saṃsthāpya tatra eva pūrṇam homam tu kārayet
śālagrāmam ca saṃsthāpya vaiṣṇavam śrāddham ācaret
vṛṣam sampūjya tatra eva vastra alaṅkāra bhūṣaṇaiḥ
catasraḥ vatsataryaḥ ca pūrvam samadhivāsayet

original: pradakṣiṇaṃ tataḥ kuryāddhomānte ca visarjanam // GarP_2,14.25 //
analyzed: pradakṣiṇam tatas kuryāt homa ante ca visarjanam
imam mantram samuccārya uttara abhimukhaḥ sthitaḥ

original: dharma tvaṃ vṛṣarūpeṇa brahmaṇā nirmitaḥ purā // GarP_2,14.26 //
analyzed: dharma tvam vṛṣa rūpeṇa brahmaṇā nirmitaḥ purā
tava utsarga prabhāvāt mām uddhara sva bhava arṇāvāt
śubhaiḥ mantraiḥ pāvanaiḥ vidhi pūrvakam
tanakrīḍanti mantreṇa vṛṣotsargam tu kārayet

original: abhiṣiñcettato nīlaṃ rudrakumbho dakena tu // GarP_2,14.28 //
analyzed: abhiṣiñcet tatas nīlam rudra kumbhaḥ dakena tu
nābhimūle samāsthāya tat ambu mūrdhani nyaset

original: anna (ātma) śrāddhaṃ tataḥ kuryāddadyāddānaṃ dvijottame // GarP_2,14.29 //
analyzed: śrāddham tatas kuryāt dadyāt dānam dvijottame
udakena iva eva gantavyam jalam tatra pradāpayet
yat iṣṭam jīvataḥ tu āsīt tat ca dadyāt sva śaktitaḥ

original: nyūnaṃ saṃpūrṇatāṃ yāti vṛṣotsarge kṛte sati /
analyzed: nyūnam saṃpūrṇa tām yāti vṛṣotsarge kṛte sati

original: sutṛpto dustare mārge mṛto yāti na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_2,14.31 //
analyzed: su tṛptaḥ dustare mārge mṛtaḥ yāti na saṃśayaḥ

original: yamalokaṃ na paśyanti sadā dānaratā narāḥ /
analyzed: yama lokam na paśyanti sadā dāna ratāḥ narāḥ

original: yāvanna dīyate jantoḥ śrāddhaṃ caikādaśāhikam // GarP_2,14.32 //
analyzed: yāvat na dīyate jantoḥ śrāddham ca aikādaśāhikam
sva dattam para dattam vā na iha amutra upatiṣṭhati

original: trayodaśā tathā sapta pañca trīṇī krameṇa tu // GarP_2,14.33 //
analyzed: trayodaśā tathā sapta pañca trīṇī krameṇa tu
padadānāni kurvīta śraddhā bhakti samanvitaḥ

original: tilapātrāṇi kurvīta sapta pañca yathākramam // GarP_2,14.34 //
analyzed: tila pātrāṇi kurvīta sapta pañca yathākramam
brāhmaṇān bhojayet paścāt ekām gām ca pradāpayet

original: vṛṣaṃ hi śannodevīti vedoktavidhinā tataḥ // GarP_2,14.35 //
analyzed: vṛṣam hi veda ukta vidhinā tatas
catasṛbhiḥ vatsatarībhiḥ pariṇayanam ācaret

original: vāme cakraṃ pradātavyaṃ triśūlaṃ dakṣiṇe tathā // GarP_2,14.36 //
analyzed: vāme cakram pradātavyam triśūlam dakṣiṇe tathā

original: mūlyaṃ dadyād vṛṣasyāpi taṃ vṛṣaṃ ca visarjayet /
analyzed: mūlyam dadyāt vṛṣasya api tam vṛṣam ca visarjayet
ekoddiṣṭa vidhānena svāhākāreṇa vuddhimān
kuryāt ekādaśa aham ca dvādaśa aham ca yatnataḥ
sapiṇḍīkaraṇāt arvāk kuryāt śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa
brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā tu padadānāni dāpayet
kāposa upari saṃsthāpya tāmra pātre tathā acyutam
vastreṇa ācchādya tatrastham argham dadyāt śubhaiḥ phalaiḥ
nāvam ikṣu mayīm kṛtvā paṭṭasūtreṇa veṣṭayet
kāṃsya pātre ghṛtam sthāpya vaitaraṇyāḥ nimittataḥ
na ava ārohaṇam kuryāt pūjayet garuḍadhvajam
ātma vitta anusāreṇa tat ca dānam anantakam
bhava sāgara magnānām śoka tāpa ārti duḥ khinām
dharma plava vihīnānām tārakaḥ hi janārdanaḥ

original: tilā lohaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca kārpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā // GarP_2,14.43 //
analyzed: tilāḥ loham hiraṇyam ca kārpāsam lavaṇam tathā
saptadhānyam kṣitiḥ gāvaḥ hi ekaikam pāvanam smṛtam

original: tilapātrāṇi kurvīta śayyādānaṃ ca dāpayet // GarP_2,14.44 //
analyzed: tila pātrāṇi kurvīta śayyā dānam ca dāpayet
dīna anātha viśiṣṭebhyaḥ dadyāt śaktyā ca dakṣiṇām

original: evaṃ yaḥ kurute tārkṣya putravānapyaputravān // GarP_2,14.45 //
analyzed: evam yaḥ kurute tārkṣya putravān api aputravān

original: sa siddhiṃ samavāpnoti yathā te brahmacāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: sa siddhim samavāpnoti yathā te brahmacāriṇaḥ
nityam naimittikam kuryāt yāvat jīvati mānavaḥ
yaḥ kaścid kriyate dharmaḥ tad phalam ca akṣayam bhavet
tīrtha yātrā vrata ādīnām śrāddham saṃvatsarasya hi
devatānām gurūṇām ca mātā pitroḥ tathā eva ca

original: puṇyaṃ deyaṃ prayatnena pratyahaṃ vardhate khaga // GarP_2,14.48 //
analyzed: puṇyam deyam prayatnena pratyaham vardhate khaga
asmin yajñeḥ hiyaḥ kaścid bhūri dānam prayacchati

original: tattasya cākṣayaṃ sarvaṃ vedikāyāṃ yathā kila // GarP_2,14.49 //
analyzed: tat tasya ca akṣayam sarvam vedikāyām yathā kila
yathā pūjyatamāḥ loke yatayaḥ brahmacāriṇaḥ

original: tathaiva pratipūjyante loke sarve ca nityaśaḥ // GarP_2,14.50 //
analyzed: tathā eva pratipūjyante loke sarve ca nityaśas
vara daḥ ham sadā tasya caturvaktraḥ tathā haraḥ

original: te yānti paramāṃllokāniti satyaṃ vaco mama // GarP_2,14.51 //
analyzed: te yānti paramān lokān iti satyam vacaḥ mama
utsṛṣṭaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ yatra pibati apaḥ jalāśaye

original: śṛṅgeṇālikhate vāpi bhūmiṃ nityaṃ praharṣitaḥ // GarP_2,14.52 //
analyzed: śṛṅgeṇa ālikhate vā api bhūmim nityam praharṣitaḥ
pitṝṇām anna pānam ca prabhūtam upatiṣṭhati
paurṇamāsyām amāyām vā tila pātrāṇi dāpayet
saṃkrāntīnām sahasrāṇi sūryaparva śatāni ca
dattvā yat phalam āpnoti tat vai nīla visarjane
vatsataryaḥ pradātavyāḥ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ padāni ca
tila pātrāṇi deyāni śiva bhakta dvijeṣu ca
umāmaheśvaram ca ekam paridhāpya
atasī puṣpa saṅkāśam pīta vāsasam acyutam

original: ye namasyanti govindaṃ na teṣāṃ vidyate bhayam /
analyzed: ye namasyanti govindam na teṣām vidyate bhayam
preta tvāt mokṣam icchantaḥ ye kariṣyanti satkriyām

original: yāsyanti te parāṃllokāniti satyaṃ vaco mama /
analyzed: yāsyanti te parān lokān iti satyam vacaḥ mama
etat te sarvam ākhyātam mayā ca eva ūrdhvadaihikam
yat śrutvā sarva pāpebhyaḥ mucyate na atra saṃśayaḥ
śrutvā mahātmyam atulam garuḍaḥ harṣam āgataḥ
mānuṣāṇām hita arthāya punar prapaccha keśavam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde godānavṛṣotsargadaśadānabhūridānādinirūpaṇaṃ  #
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde go dāna vṛṣotsarga daśa dāna bhūri dāna ādi nirūpaṇam
nāma caturdaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
garuḍaḥ uvāca
bagavan brūhi me sarvam yama lokasya nirṇayam
jantoḥ prayāṇam ārabhya māhātmyam vartma vistaram
śrī bhagavān uvāca
śṛṇu tārkṣya pravakṣyāmi yama mārgasya nirṇayam

original: prayāṇakāni sarvāṇi nagarāṇi ca ṣoḍaśa // GarP_2,15.2 //
analyzed: prayāṇakāni sarvāṇi nagarāṇi ca ṣoḍaśa
ṣāḍaśīti sahasrāṇi yojanānām pramāṇataḥ

original: yamalokasya cordhvaṃ vai antarā mānuṣasya ca // GarP_2,15.3 //
analyzed: yama lokasya ca ūrdhvam vai antarā mānuṣasya ca

original: kukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ vāpi bhuktvā loke yathārjitam /
analyzed: kukṛtam duṣkṛtam vā api bhuktvā loke yathā arjitam
karma yogāt yadā kaścid vyādhiḥ utpadyate khaga
nimitta mātram sarveṣām kṛta karma anusārataḥ

original: yasya yo vihito mṛtyuḥ sa taṃ dhruvamavāpnuyāt // GarP_2,15.5 //
analyzed: yasya yaḥ vihitaḥ mṛtyuḥ sa tam dhruvam avāpnuyāt
karma yogāt yadā dehī muñcati atra nijam vapuḥ
tadā bhūmi gatam kuryāt gomayena upalipya ca
tilān darbhān vikīrya atha mukhe svarṇam kṣipet
tulasīm sannidhau kṛtvā śālagrāma śilām tathā
evam sāma ādi sūktaiḥ tu maraṇam mukti dāyakam
śalākā svarṇa vikṣapaiḥ

original: ekā vaktre tu dātavyā ghrāṇayugme tathā punaḥ /
analyzed: ekā vaktre tu dātavyā ghrāṇa yugme tathā punar

original: akṣṇośca karṇayoścaiva dvedve deye yathākramam // GarP_2,15.9 //
analyzed: akṣṇoḥ ca karṇayoḥ ca eva dve dve deye yathākramam

original: atha liṅge tathā caikā tvekāṃ brahmāṇḍakekṣipet /
analyzed: atha liṅge tathā ca ekā tu ekām

original: karayugme ca kaṇṭhe ca tulasīṃ ca pradāpayet // GarP_2,15.10 //
analyzed: kara yugme ca kaṇṭhe ca tulasīm ca pradāpayet
vastra yugmam ca dātavyam kaṅkumaiḥ ca akṣataiḥ yajet
puṣpa mālā yutam kuryāt anya dvāreṇa san nayet
putraḥ tu bāndhavaiḥ sārdham vipraḥ tu pura vāsibhiḥ

original: pituḥ pretaṃ svayaṃ putraḥ skandhamāropya bāndhavaiḥ // GarP_2,15.12 //
analyzed: pituḥ pretam svayam putraḥ skandham āropya bāndhavaiḥ
gatvā śmaśāna deśe tu prāc mukhaḥ ca uttarā mukham

original: adagdhapūrvā yā bhūmiścitāṃ tatraiva kārayet // GarP_2,15.13 //
analyzed: a dagdha pūrvā yā bhūmiḥ citām tatra eva kārayet
śrīkhaṇḍa tulasī kāṣṭha samidh pālāśa saṃbhṛtām
vikala indriya saṅghāte caitanye jaḍa tām gate
pracalanti tatas prāṇāḥ yāmyaiḥ nikaṭa vartibhiḥ
ekībhūtam jagat paśyet daivī dṛṣṭiḥ prajāyate

original: bībhatsaṃ dāruṇaṃ rūpaṃ praṇaiḥ kaṇṭhaṃ samāśritaiḥ /
analyzed: bībhatsam dāruṇam rūpam praṇaiḥ kaṇṭham samāśritaiḥ

original: phenamudgirate kopi mukhaṃ lālākulaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,15.16 //
analyzed: phenam udgirate kopi mukham lālā ākulam bhavet
durātmānaḥ ca tāḍyante kiṅkaraiḥ pāśa bandhanaiḥ
sukhena kṛtinaḥ tatra nīyante nāka nāyakaiḥ

original: duḥ khena pāpino yānti yamamārge ca durgame /
analyzed: duḥ khena pāpinaḥ yānti yama mārge ca durgame
yamaḥ catur bhujaḥ bhūtvā śaṅkha cakra gadā ādi bhṛt
puṇya karma ratān samyak śubhān mitra vat ācaret

original: āhūya pāpinaḥ sarvānyamo daṇḍena rajjayet // GarP_2,15.19 //
analyzed: āhūya pāpinaḥ sarvān yamaḥ daṇḍena rajjayet
pralaya ambuda nirghoṣaḥ tu añjana adri sama prabhaḥ
yojana traya vistāra dehaḥ raudraḥ ti bhīṣaṇaḥ
loha daṇḍa dharaḥ bhīmaḥ pāśa pāṇiḥ durākṛtiḥ
vakra netraḥ ti bhaya daḥ darśanam yāti pāpinām

original: aṅguṣṭhamātraḥ puruṣo hāhā kurvan kalevarāt // GarP_2,15.22 //
analyzed: aṅguṣṭha mātraḥ puruṣaḥ hāhā kurvan kalevarāt
tadā eva nīyate dūtaiḥ yāmyaiḥ vā ukṣan svakam gṛham

original: nirviceṣṭaṃ śarīraṃ tu prāṇairmuktaṃ jugupsitam // GarP_2,15.23 //
analyzed: nirviceṣṭam śarīram tu prāṇaiḥ muktam jugupsitam
aspṛśyam jāyate tūrṇam durgandham sarva ninditam
tridhā avasthā hi dehasya kṛmi viṣ masma saṃjñitā
kaḥ garvaḥ kriyate tārkṣya kṣaṇa vidhvaṃsibhiḥ naraiḥ

original: dānaṃ vittādṛtā vācaḥ kīrtidharmau tathāyuṣaḥ // GarP_2,15.25 //
analyzed: dānam vitta ādṛtāḥ vācaḥ kīrti dharmau tathā āyuṣaḥ
para upakaraṇam kāyāt asataḥ sāram uddhṛtam

original: tasyaivaṃ nīyamānasya dūtāḥ santarjayanti hi // GarP_2,15.26 //
analyzed: tasya evam nīyamānasya dūtāḥ santarjayanti hi

original: darśayanto bhayaṃ tīvraṃ narakāya punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: darśayantaḥ bhayam tīvram narakāya punar punar

original: śīghraṃ pracala duṣṭātman gato 'sitvaṃ yamālaye // GarP_2,15.27 //
analyzed: śīghram pracala duṣṭa ātman gataḥ si tvam yama ālaye
kuṃbhīpāka ādi narakān tvām neṣyāmaḥ ca mā ciram

original: evaṃ vācastadā śṛṇvanbandhūnāṃ ruditaṃ tathā // GarP_2,15.28 //
analyzed: evam vācaḥ tadā śṛṇvan bandhūnām ruditam tathā
uccais hāhā iti vilapan nīyate yama kiṅkaraiḥ

original: sthāne śrāddhaṃ prakurvīta tathā cekādaśe 'hani // GarP_2,15.29 //
analyzed: sthāne śrāddham prakurvīta tathā ca ekādaśe hani
mṛsya utkrānti samayāt ṣaṭ piṇḍān kramaśas dadet

original: mṛtasthāne tathā dvāre catvare tārkṣya kāraṇāt // GarP_2,15.30 //
analyzed: mṛta sthāne tathā dvāre catvare tārkṣya kāraṇāt

original: viśrāme kāṣṭhacayane tathā sañcayane ca ṣaṭ /
analyzed: viśrāme kāṣṭha cayane tathā sañcayane ca ṣaṭ

original: śṛṇu tatkāraṇaṃ tārkṣya ṣaṭ piṇḍaparikalpane // GarP_2,15.31 //
analyzed: śṛṇu tad kāraṇam tārkṣya ṣaṣ piṇḍa parikalpane

original: mṛtasthāne śavo nāma tena nāmnā pradīyate /
analyzed: mṛtasthāne śavaḥ nāma tena nāmnā pradīyate
tena dattena tṛpyanti gṛha vāstu adhidevatāḥ
tena bhūmiḥ bhavet tuṣṭā tad adhiṣṭhātṛ devatā

original: dvāre tu piṇḍaṃ deyaṃ ca pānthamityabhidhāya tu // GarP_2,15.33 //
analyzed: dvāre tu piṇḍam deyam ca pāntham iti abhidhāya tu
dattena tena prīṇanti dvāra sthāḥ gṛha devatāḥ

original: catvare khecaro nāma tamuddiśya pradāpayet // GarP_2,15.34 //
analyzed: catvare khecaraḥ nāma tam uddiśya pradāpayet
na ca upaghātam kurvanti bhūta ādyāḥ devayonayaḥ

original: viśrāme bhūtasaṃjño 'yaṃ tena tatra pradāpayet // GarP_2,15.35 //
analyzed: viśrāme bhūta saṃjñaḥ yam tena tatra pradāpayet

original: piśācā rākṣasā yakṣā ye cānye diśi vāsinaḥ /
analyzed: piśācāḥ rākṣasāḥ yakṣāḥ ye ca anye diśi vāsinaḥ
tasya hotavya dehasya na eva ayogya tva kārakāḥ
citā piṇḍha prabhṛtitas preta tvam upajāyate

original: citāyāṃ sādhakaṃ nāma vadantyeke khageśvara // GarP_2,15.37 //
analyzed: citāyām sādhakam nāma vadanti eke khageśvara
kecid tam pretam eva āhuḥ yathā kalpa vidaḥ budhāḥ
tad ādi tatra tatra api preta nāmnā pradīyate
iti evam pañcabhiḥ piṇḍaiḥ śavasya āhuti yogyatā

original: anyathā copaghātāya pūrvoktāste bhavanti hi // GarP_2,15.39 //
analyzed: anyathā ca upaghātāya pūrva uktāḥ te bhavanti hi

original: utkrāme prathamaṃ piṇḍaṃ tathā cārdhapayepi ca /
analyzed: utkrāme prathamam piṇḍam tathā ca

original: citāyāṃ tu tṛtīyaṃ syāttrayaḥ piṇḍāśca kalpitāḥ // GarP_2,15.40 //
analyzed: citāyām tu tṛtīyam syāt trayaḥ piṇḍāḥ ca kalpitāḥ
vidhātā prathame piṇḍe dvitīye garuḍadhvajaḥ
tṛtīye yamadūtāḥ ca prayogaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
datte tṛtīye piṇḍe smin deha doṣaiḥ pramucyate
ādhāra bhūta jīvaḥ ca jvalanaiḥ jvālayet citām
saṃmṛjya ca upalipya atha ullikhya uddhṛtya vedikām
abhyukṣya upasamādhāya vahnim tatras vidhānataḥ
puṣpa akṣataiḥ ca sampūjya devam kravyāda saṃjñakam
tvam bhūta kṛt jagat yone tvam loka paripālakaḥ
upasaṃhārakaḥ tasmāt enam svargam mṛtam naya
iti kravyādam abhyarcya śarīra āhutim ācaret
ardha dagdhe tathā dehe dadyāt ājya āhutim tatas
lomabhyaḥ svoti vākyena kuryāt homam yathāvidhi
citām āropya tam pretam hunet ājya āhutim tatas

original: yamāya cāntakāyeti mṛtyave brahmaṇe tathā // GarP_2,15.47 //
analyzed: yamāya ca antakāya iti mṛtyave brahmaṇe tathā
jātavedaḥ muke deyā ekā preta mukhe tathā

original: ūrdhvaṃ tu jvālayedvahniṃ pūrvabhāge citāṃ punaḥ // GarP_2,15.48 //
analyzed: ūrdhvam tu jvālayet vahnim pūrva bhāge citām punar
asmāt tvam adhijātaḥ asi tvat ayam jāyatām punar

original: asau svargāya lokāya svāhā jvalati pāvakaḥ // GarP_2,15.49 //
analyzed: asau svargāya lokāya svāhā jvalati pāvakaḥ
evam ājya āhutim dattvā tila miśrām sa mantrakām

original: tato dāhaḥ prakartavyaḥ putreṇa kila niścitam // GarP_2,15.50 //
analyzed: tatas dāhaḥ prakartavyaḥ putreṇa kila niścitam

original: roditavyaṃ tato gāḍhamevaṃ tasya sukhaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: roditavyam tatas gāḍham evam tasya sukham bhavet
dāhasya anantaram tatra kṛtvā sañcayana kriyām
preta piṇḍam pradadyāt ca dāha ārti śamanam khaga

original: tāvadbhūtāḥ pratīkṣante taṃ pretaṃ bāndhavārthinam // GarP_2,15.52 //
analyzed: tāvat bhūtāḥ pratīkṣante tam pretam bāndhava arthinam
dāhasya anantaram kāryam putraiḥ snānam sa cailakam
tila udakam tatas dadyāt nāma gotreṇa tiṣṭhatu
tatas janapadaiḥ sarvaiḥ dātavyā karatālikā
viṣṇuḥ viṣṇuḥ iti brūyāt guṇaiḥ pretam udīrayet
janāḥ sarve samāḥ tasya gṛham āgatya sarvaśas

original: dvārasya dakṣiṇe bhāge gomayaṃ gaurasarṣapān // GarP_2,15.55 //
analyzed: dvārasya dakṣiṇe bhāge gomayam gaurasarṣapān
nidhāya varuṇam devam antardhāya sva veśmani

original: bhakṣayennimbapatrāṇi ghṛtaṃ prāśya gṛhaṃ vrajet // GarP_2,15.56 //
analyzed: bhakṣayet nimba patrāṇi ghṛtam prāśya gṛham vrajet
kecid dugdhena siñcanti citā sthānam khageśvara

original: aśrupātaṃ na kurvīta dadyādasmai jalāñjalīn // GarP_2,15.57 //
analyzed: aśru pātam na kurvīta dadyāt asmai jala añjalīn
śleṣma aśru bāndhavaiḥ muktam pretaḥ bhuṅkte yatas vaśaḥ

original: ato na roditavyaṃ hi kriyāḥ kāryāḥ svaśaktitaḥ // GarP_2,15.58 //
analyzed: atas na roditavyam hi kriyāḥ kāryāḥ sva śaktitaḥ

original: dugdhaṃ ca mṛnmaye pātre toyaṃ dadyāddinatrayam /
analyzed: dugdham ca mṛd maye pātre toyam dadyāt dina trayam

original: sūrye cāstaṃ gate tārkṣya valabhyāṃ catvare 'pi vā // GarP_2,15.59 //
analyzed: sūrye ca astam gate tārkṣya valabhyām catvare vā
baddhaḥ saṃmūḍha hṛdayaḥ deham icchan kṛta anugaḥ

original: śmaśānaṃ catvaraṃ gehaṃ vīkṣanyāmyaiḥ sa nīyate // GarP_2,15.60 //
analyzed: śmaśānam catvaram geham vīkṣan yāmyaiḥ sa nīyate

original: garte piṇḍā daśāhaṃ ca dātavyāśca dinedine /
analyzed: garte piṇḍāḥ daśa aham ca dātavyāḥ ca dine dine
jala añjalīḥ pradātavyāḥ pretam uddiśya nityaśas
tāvat vṛddhiḥ ca kartavyā yāvat piṇḍam daśāhikam

original: puttreṇa hi kriyā kāryā bhāryayā tadabhāvataḥ // GarP_2,15.62 //
analyzed: puttreṇa hi kriyā kāryā bhāryayā tad abhāvataḥ
tad abhāve ca śiṣyeṇa tad abhāve sahodaraḥ

original: śmaśāne cānyatīrthe vā jalaṃ piṇḍaṃ ca dāpayet // GarP_2,15.63 //
analyzed: śmaśāne ca anya tīrthe vā jalam piṇḍam ca dāpayet
odanāni ca saktūn ca śāka mūla phala ādinā
prathame hani yat dadyāt tat dadyāt uttare hani
dināni daśa piṇḍān ca kurvanti atra suta ādayaḥ

original: pratyahaṃ te vibhajyante caturbhāgāḥ khageśvara // GarP_2,15.65 //
analyzed: pratyaham te vibhajyante catur bhāgāḥ khageśvara
bhāga dvayam tu deha artham prīti dam bhūta pañcake
tṛtīyam yamadūtānām caturtham ca upajīvyati
ahorātraiḥ tu navabhiḥ pretaḥ niṣpattim āpnuyāt
jantoḥ niṣpanna dehasya daśame valavat kṣudhā
na vidhiḥ nā eva mantraḥ ca na svadhāvāhana āśiṣaḥ

original: nāma gotraṃ samuccārya yaddattaṃ taddaśāhikam // GarP_2,15.68 //
analyzed: nāma gotram samuccārya yat dattam tat daśāhikam
dagdhe dehe punar deham evam utpadyate khaga

original: prathame 'hani yaḥ piṇḍastena mūrdhā prajāyate // GarP_2,15.69 //
analyzed: prathame hani yaḥ piṇḍaḥ tena mūrdhā prajāyate

original: grīvā skandhau dvitīye ca tṛtīye hṛdayaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: grīvā skandhau dvitīye ca tṛtīye hṛdayam bhavet

original: caturthena bhavetpṛṣṭhaṃ pañcame nābhireva ca // GarP_2,15.70 //
analyzed: caturthena bhavet pṛṣṭham pañcame nābhiḥ eva ca

original: ṣaṭ saptame kaṭī guhyamṛrū cāpyaṣṭame tathā /
analyzed: ṣaṭ saptame kaṭī guhya mṛrū ca api aṣṭame tathā

original: tālū pādau ca navame daśame 'hni kṣudhā bhavet // GarP_2,15.71 //
analyzed: tālū pādau ca navame daśame hni kṣudhā bhavet

original: dehaṃ prāptaḥ kṣudhāviṣṭo gṛhe dvāre ca tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: deham prāptaḥ kṣudhā āviṣṭaḥ gṛhe dvāre ca tiṣṭhati

original: daśame 'hani yaḥ piṇḍastaṃ dadyādāmiṣeṇa tu // GarP_2,15.72 //
analyzed: daśame hani yaḥ piṇḍaḥ tam dadyāt āmiṣeṇa tu
yatas dehe samutpanne tīva kṣudhā anvitaḥ

original: atastvāmiṣabāhyena kṣudhā tasya na naśyati // GarP_2,15.73 //
analyzed: atas tu āmiṣa bāhyena kṣudhā tasya na naśyati
ekādaśe dvādaśa ahe pretaḥ bhuṅkte dina dvayam
yoṣitaḥ puruṣāsyā api preta śabdam samuccaret
dīpam annam jalam vastram yat kiñcid vastu dīyate

original: trayodaśe 'hni sa preto nīyate ca mahāpathe /
analyzed: trayodaśe hni sa pretaḥ nīyate ca mahāpathe

original: piṇḍajaṃ dehamāśritya divā naktaṃ bubhukṣitaḥ // GarP_2,15.76 //
analyzed: piṇḍa jam deham āśritya divā naktam bubhukṣitaḥ
śīta uṣṇa śaṅku kravyāda vahni mārgaḥ tu pāpinām

original: kṣudhā tṛṣṇātmikā caiva savva saumyaṃ kṛtātmanām // GarP_2,15.77 //
analyzed: kṣudhā tṛṣṇā ātmikā ca eva saumyam kṛtātmanām
mārge ca etāni duḥ khāni asipattravana anvite
kṣudh pipāsā arditaḥ nityam yama dṛtaiḥ prapīḍitaḥ
ahani ahani vai pretaḥ yojanānām śata dvayam
catvāriṃśat tathā sapta ahorātreṇa gacchati

original: gṛhīto yamapāśaiśca hāheti rudite tu saḥ /
analyzed: gṛhītaḥ yama pāśaiḥ ca hāhā iti rudite tu saḥ

original: svagṛhaṃ tu parityajya yāmyaṃ puramanuvrajet // GarP_2,15.80 //
analyzed: sva gṛham tu parityajya yāmyam puram anuvrajet

original: krameṇa yāti sa pretaḥ puraṃ yāmyaṃ śubhāśubham /
analyzed: krameṇa yāti sa pretaḥ puram yāmyam śubha aśubham

original: atītya tānitānyeva mārge puravarāṇi ca // GarP_2,15.81 //
analyzed: atītya tāni tāni eva mārge pura varāṇi ca
yāmyam sauri puram naga indra bhavanam gandharva śaila āgamau

original: kroñcaṃ krūrapuraṃ vicitrabhavanaṃ bahvāpadaṃ duḥ khadam // GarP_2,15.82 //
analyzed: kroñcam krūra puram vicitra bhavanam bahu āpadam duḥ kha dam

original: nānākrandapuraṃ sutaprabhavanaṃ raudraṃ payovarṣaṇaṃ śītāḍhyaṃ bahudharmabhītabhavanaṃ yāmyaṃ puraṃ cāgrataḥ // GarP_2,15.83 //
analyzed: nānā ākranda puram suta prabhavanam raudram payaḥ varṣaṇam śīta āḍhyam bahu dharma bhīta bhavanam yāmyam puram ca agratas
trayodaśe hni sa pretaḥ gṛhītaḥ yama kiṅkaraiḥ

original: tasminmārge brajatyeko gṛhīta iva markaṭaḥ // GarP_2,15.84 //
analyzed: tasmin mārge brajati ekaḥ gṛhītaḥ iva markaṭaḥ

original: tathava sa vrajanmārge putraputreti ca bruvan /
analyzed: sa vrajan mārge putra putra iti ca bruvan

original: hāheti krandate nityaṃ kīdṛśaṃ tu mayā kṛtam // GarP_2,15.85 //
analyzed: hāhā iti krandate nityam kīdṛśam tu mayā kṛtam
mānuṣyam labhyate kasmāt iti brūte prasarpati

original: mahatā puṇyayogena mānuṣyaṃ janma labhyate // GarP_2,15.86 //
analyzed: mahatā puṇya yogena mānuṣyam janma labhyate

original: na tatprāpya pradattaṃ hi yācakebhyaḥ svakaṃ dhanam /
analyzed: na tat prāpya pradattam hi yācakebhyaḥ svakam dhanam
para adhīnam tat abhavat iti brūte rauti
sa gadgadaḥ
kiṅkaraiḥ pīḍyate tyartham smarate pūrvadaihikam

original: sukhasya duḥ khasya na kopi dātā paro dadātīti kubuddhireṣā /
analyzed: sukhasya duḥ khasya na kaḥ api dātā paraḥ dadāti iti ku buddhiḥ eṣā

original: purā kṛtaṃ karma sadaiva bhujyate dehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,15.89 //
analyzed: purā kṛtam karma sadā eva bhujyate dehin kvacid nistara yat tvayā kṛtam

original: mayā na dattaṃ na hutaṃ hutāśane tapo na taptaṃ himaśailagahvare /
analyzed: mayā na dattam na hutam hutāśane tapaḥ na taptam himaśaila gahvare

original: na sevitaṃ gāṅgamaho mahājalaṃ dehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,15.90 //
analyzed: na sevitam gāṅgam aho mahā jalam dehin kvacid nistara yat tvayā kṛtam

original: na nityadānaṃ na gāvāhnikaṃ kṛtaṃ na vedadānaṃ na ca śāstrapustakam /
analyzed: na nitya dānam na gāvāhnikam kṛtam na veda dānam na ca śāstra pustakam

original: purā nadṛṣṭaṃ na ca sevito 'dhvā dehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,15.91 //
analyzed: purā na dṛṣṭam na ca sevitaḥ dhvā dehin kvacid nistara yat tvayā kṛtam

original: jalāśayo naiva kṛto hi nirjale manuṣyahetoḥ paśupakṣihetave /
analyzed: jalāśayaḥ nā eva kṛtaḥ hi nirjale manuṣya hetoḥ paśu pakṣi hetave

original: gotṛptihetorna kṛtaṃ hi gocaraṃ dehinkvacinnastara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,15.92 //
analyzed: go tṛpti hetoḥ na kṛtam hi gocaram dehin kvacid naḥ tara yat tvayā kṛtam

original: mayā na bhuktaṃ patisaṅgasaukhyaṃ vahnipraveśo na kṛto mṛte sati /
analyzed: mayā na bhuktam pati saṅga saukhyam vahnipraveśaḥ na kṛtaḥ mṛte sati

original: tasminmṛte tadvratapālanaṃ vā dehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,15.93 //
analyzed: tasmin mṛte tad vrata pālanam vā dehin kvacid nistara yat tvayā kṛtam
māsopavāsaiḥ na viśoṣitam vapuḥ cāndrāyaṇaiḥ vā niyamaiḥ ca saṃhataiḥ

original: nārīśarīraṃ bahuduḥ khabhājanaṃ labdhaṃ mayā pūrvakṛtairvikarmabhiḥ // GarP_2,15.94 //
analyzed: nārī śarīram bahu duḥ kha bhājanam labdham mayā pūrva kṛtaiḥ vikarmabhiḥ

original: uktāni vācyāni mayā narāṇāmataḥ śṛṇuṣvāvahito 'pi pakṣin /
analyzed: uktāni vācyāni mayā narāṇām atas śṛṇuṣva avahitaḥ pi pakṣin

original: strīṇāṃ śarīraṃ pratilabhya dehī bravīti karmāṇi kṛtāni pūrvam // GarP_2,15.95 //
analyzed: strīṇām śarīram pratilabhya dehī bravīti karmāṇi kṛtāni pūrvam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmadṛpretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde yamalokavistāratanmāhātmyatadyānanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcadaśo
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde yamalokavistāratanmāhātmyatadyānanirūpaṇam nāma pañcadaśaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
śrī bhagavān uvāca
evam vilapataḥ tasya pretasya evam khageśvara

original: krandamānasya nitarāṃ pīḍitasya ca kiṅkaraiḥ // GarP_2,16.1 //
analyzed: krandamānasya nitarām pīḍitasya ca kiṅkaraiḥ
saptadaśa dināni ekaḥ vāyumārge vikṛṣyate

original: aṣṭādaśe tvahorātre pūrvaṃ yāmyapuraṃ vrajet // GarP_2,16.2 //
analyzed: aṣṭādaśe tu ahorātre pūrvam yāmya puram vrajet

original: tasminpuravare ramye pretānāṃ ca gaṇo mahān /
analyzed: tasmin pura vare ramye pretānām ca gaṇaḥ mahān
puṣpabhadrā nadī tatra nyagrodhaḥ priyadarśanaḥ

original: pure sa tatra viśrāmaṃ prāpyate yamakiṅkaraiḥ /
analyzed: pure sa tatra viśrāmam prāpyate yama kiṅkaraiḥ

original: jāyāputrādikaṃ saukhyaṃ smarettatra suduḥ khitaḥ // GarP_2,16.4 //
analyzed: jāyā putra ādikam saukhyam smaret tatra su duḥ khitaḥ
rudate karuṇaiḥ vākyaiḥ stṛṣā ārtaḥ śrama pīḍitaḥ

original: svadhanaṃ svakalatrāṇi gṛhaṃ putrāḥ sukhāni ca // GarP_2,16.5 //
analyzed: sva dhanam sva kalatrāṇi gṛham putrāḥ sukhāni ca

original: bhṛtyamitrāṇi cānyacca sarvaṃ śocati vai tadā /
analyzed: bhṛtya mitrāṇi ca anyat ca sarvam śocati vai tadā
kṣudhā ārtasya pure tasmin kiṅkaraiḥ tasya ca ucyate
kiṅkarāḥ ūcuḥ

original: kva dhanaṃ kva sutā jāyā kva gṛhaṃ kva tvamīdṛśaḥ /
analyzed: kva dhanam kva sutā jāyā kva gṛham kva tvam īdṛśaḥ

original: svakarmopārjitaṃ bhuṅkṣva ciraṃ gaccha mahāpathe // GarP_2,16.7 //
analyzed: sva karma upārjitam bhuṅkṣva ciram gaccha mahāpathe

original: jānāsi śaṃbalavaśaṃ balamadhvagānāṃ no śaṃbalaḥ prayatate paralokapāntha /
analyzed: jānāsi śaṃbala vaśam balam adhvagānām no śaṃbalaḥ prayatate para loka pāntha

original: gantavyamasti tava niścitameva tena mārgeṇa yatra bhavataḥ krayavikrayau na // GarP_2,16.8 //
analyzed: gantavyam asti tava niścitam eva tena mārgeṇa yatra bhavataḥ kraya vikrayau na
yama dūta uditam vākyam pakṣin na evam tvayā śrutam
evam uktaḥ tatas sarvaiḥ hanyamānaḥ sa mudgaraiḥ
atra dattam sutaiḥ
snehāt vā kṛpayā atha vā

original: māsikaṃ piṇḍamaśrāti tataḥ sauripuraṃ vrajet // GarP_2,16.10 //
analyzed: māsikam tatas sauri puram vrajet

original: tatra nāmnā tu rājā vai jaṅgamaḥ kālarūpadhṛk /
analyzed: tatra nāmnā tu rājā vai jaṅgamaḥ kāla rūpadhṛk

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhayabhītastu viśrāme kurute matim // GarP_2,16.11 //
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā bhaya bhītaḥ tu viśrāme kurute matim
udakam ca anna saṃyuktam bhuṅkte tasmin pure gataḥ

original: traipakṣike tu yaddattaṃ tatpuraṃ sa vyatikramet // GarP_2,16.12 //
analyzed: traipakṣike tu yat dattam tat puram sa vyatikramet
naga indra nagare ramye pretaḥ yāti divāniśam

original: gacchanvanāni raudrāṇi dṛṣṭvā krandati tatra saḥ // GarP_2,16.13 //
analyzed: gacchan vanāni raudrāṇi dṛṣṭvā krandati tatra saḥ

original: bhīṣaṇaiḥ kliśyamānastu rudate ca punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: bhīṣaṇaiḥ kliśyamānaḥ tu rudate ca punar punar
māsa dvaya avasāne tu tat puram

original: bhuktvā cānnaṃ jalaṃ pītvā yaddattaṃ vāndhavairiha /
analyzed: bhuktvā ca annam jalam pītvā yat dattam vāndhavaiḥ iha
kliśyamānaḥ tatas pāśaiḥ na uyate yama kiṅkaraiḥ
tṛtīye māsi samprāpte gandharvanagaram śubham

original: tṛtīyaṃ māsikaṃ bhuktvā tatra gacchatyasau puraḥ // GarP_2,16.16 //
analyzed: tṛtīyam māsikam bhuktvā tatra gacchati asau puras

original: śailāgamaṃ caturthe sa māse prāpnoti vai puram /
analyzed: śailāgamam caturthe sa māse prāpnoti vai puram
pāṣāṇāḥ tatra varṣanti pretasya upari saṃsthitāḥ

original: caturthamāsike śrāddhaṃ bhukte tatra sukhī bhavet // GarP_2,16.18 //
analyzed: caturthamāsike śrāddham bhukte tatra sukhī bhavet

original: tato yāti puraṃ pretaḥ krūraṃ māse tu pañcame /
analyzed: tatas yāti puram pretaḥ krūram māse tu pañcame

original: iha dattaṃ sutairbhuṅkte preto vai tatpure sthitaḥ /
analyzed: iha dattam sutaiḥ bhuṅkte pretaḥ vai tad pure sthitaḥ

original: ṣaṣṭhe māsi tataḥ preto yāti krauñcābidhaṃ puram // GarP_2,16.19 //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhe māsi tatas pretaḥ yāti krauñcābidham puram
tatra dattena piṇḍena śrāddhena āpyāyitaḥ pure

original: muhūrtārdhaṃ tu viśramya kampamānaḥ suduḥ khitaḥ // GarP_2,16.20 //
analyzed: muhūrta ardham tu viśramya kampamānaḥ su duḥ khitaḥ
tat puram sa vyatikramya tarjitaḥ yama kiṅkaraiḥ

original: prayāti citranagaraṃ vicitro yatra pārthivaḥ // GarP_2,16.21 //
analyzed: prayāti citra nagaram vicitraḥ yatra pārthivaḥ
yamasya eva anujaḥ sauriḥ yatra rājyam praśāsti hi
māsaiḥ tu pañcabhiḥ sārdhaiḥ ūpa ṣāṇmāsikam bhavet
ūna ṣāṇmāsikam tatra bhuṅkte yāmya samāhataḥ

original: mārge punaḥ punastasya bubhukṣā pīḍayatyalam // GarP_2,16.23 //
analyzed: mārge punar punar tasya bubhukṣā pīḍayati alam
santiṣṭhate mṛte kaḥ pi madīyaḥ suta bāndhavaḥ

original: saukhyaṃ yo me janayati patataḥ śokasāgare // GarP_2,16.24 //
analyzed: saukhyam yaḥ me janayati patataḥ śoka sāgare
evam mārge vilapati vāryamāṇaḥ ca kiṅkaraiḥ
āyānti saṃmukhāḥ tatra kaivartāḥ tu sahasraśas
vayam te tartu kāmāya mahāvaitaraṇīm nadīm
śata yojana vistīrṇām pūya śoṇita saṃkulām
nānā jhaṣa samākīrṇām nānā pakṣi gaṇaiḥ vṛtām

original: vayaṃ tvāṃ tārayiṣyāmaḥ sukheneti vadanti te // GarP_2,16.27 //
analyzed: vayam tvām tārayiṣyāmaḥ sukhena iti vadanti te

original: antaraṃ dehi bho pāntha bahulā cedrucistava /
analyzed: antaram dehi bho pāntha bahulā ced ruciḥ tava

original: tena tatra pradattā gaustayā nāvā prasarpati /
analyzed: tena tatra pradattā gauḥ tayā nāvā prasarpati

original: manujānāṃ hitaṃ dānamante vaitaraṇī smṛtā // GarP_2,16.28 //
analyzed: manujānām hitam dānam ante vaitaraṇī smṛtā

original: parāpāpaṃ dahetsarvaṃ viṣṇulokaṃ ca sā nayet /
analyzed: parā pāpam dahet sarvam viṣṇu lokam ca sā nayet

original: na dattā cetkhagaśreṣṭha tāṃ sametya samajjati // GarP_2,16.29 //
analyzed: na dattā ced khaga śreṣṭha tām sametya samajjati
svastha avasthe śarīre vaitaraṇyāḥ vratam caret

original: deyā ca viduṣe dhenustāṃ nadīṃ tartumicchatā // GarP_2,16.30 //
analyzed: deyā ca viduṣe dhenuḥ tām nadīm tartum icchatā
avadān majjamānaḥ tu nindati ātmānam ātmanā

original: pātheyārthaṃ mayā kiñcinna pradattaṃ dvijāyaca // GarP_2,16.31 //
analyzed: pātheya artham mayā kiñcid na pradattam

original: na dattaṃ na hutaṃ japtaṃ na snātaṃ na kṛtaṃ stutam /
analyzed: na dattam na hutam japtam na snātam na kṛtam stutam

original: yādṛśaṃ karma caritaṃ mūḍha bhuṅkṣveti tādṛśam // GarP_2,16.32 //
analyzed: yādṛśam karma caritam mūḍha bhuṅkṣva iti tādṛśam
tadā eva hṛdi saṃmūḍhaḥ tāḍitaḥ bhāṣate bhaṭaiḥ

original: vaitaraṇyāḥ parataṭe bhuṅkte dattaṃ ghaṭādikam // GarP_2,16.33 //
analyzed: vaitaraṇyāḥ para taṭe bhuṅkte dattam ghaṭa ādikam
ūna ṣāṇmāsika śrāddham bhuktvā gacchati ca agratas

original: tārkṣya tatra viśeṣeṇa bhojayīta dvijāñchubhān // GarP_2,16.34 //
analyzed: tārkṣya tatra viśeṣeṇa bhojayīta dvijān śubhān
catvāriṃśat tathā sapta yojanāni śata dvayam

original: prayāti pratyahaṃ tārkṣya ahorātreṇa karśitaḥ // GarP_2,16.35 //
analyzed: prayāti pratyaham tārkṣya ahorātreṇa karśitaḥ

original: saptame māsi samprāpte puraṃ bahvāpadaṃ vrajet /
analyzed: saptame māsi samprāpte puram bahu āpadam vrajet

original: tatra bhuktva pradattaṃ yacchrāddhaṃ saptamamāsikam // GarP_2,16.36 //
analyzed: tatra bhuktvā pradattam yat śrāddham saptamamāsikam
aṣṭame māsi samprāpte nānā ākranda puram vrajet
nānā ākranda gaṇān dṛṣṭvā krandamānān su dāruṇam

original: svayaṃ ca śūnyahṛdayaḥ samākrandati duḥ khitaḥ /
analyzed: svayam ca śūnya hṛdayaḥ samākrandati duḥ khitaḥ

original: tanmāsikaṃ ca yacchrāddhaṃ bhuktvā tatra sukhī bhavet // GarP_2,16.38 //
analyzed: tat māsikam ca yat śrāddham bhuktvā tatra sukhī bhavet

original: vihāya tatpuraṃ preto yāti taptapuraṃ prati /
analyzed: vihāya tad puram pretaḥ yāti tapta puram prati
sutapta nagaram prāpya navame māsi saḥ śnute

original: dvijabhojyaṃ piṇḍadānaṃ kṛtaṃ śrāddhaṃ sutena yat // GarP_2,16.39 //
analyzed: dvija bhojyam piṇḍa dānam kṛtam śrāddham sutena yat

original: māsi vai daśame prāpte raudraṃ sthānaṃ sa gacchati /
analyzed: māsi vai daśame prāpte raudram sthānam sa gacchati

original: daśame māsi yaddattaṃ tadbhuktvā ca prayāti saḥ // GarP_2,16.40 //
analyzed: daśame māsi yat dattam tat bhuktvā ca prayāti saḥ
daśa aikamāsikam bhuktvā payaḥ varṣaṇam ṛcchati

original: meghāstatra pravarṣanti pretānāṃ duḥ khadāyakāḥ // GarP_2,16.41 //
analyzed: meghāḥ tatra pravarṣanti pretānām duḥ kha dāyakāḥ
tatas pracalitaḥ potaḥ bahu rghama tṛṣā arditaḥ

original: dvādaśe māsi yacchrāddhaṃ tatra bhuṅkte suduḥ śitaḥ // GarP_2,16.42 //
analyzed: dvādaśe māsi yat śrāddham tatra bhuṅkte

original: kiñcinnyūne tato varṣe sārdhe caikādaśe 'tha vā /
analyzed: kiñcid nyūne tatas varṣe sa ardhe ca ekādaśe vā

original: yāti śītapuraṃ tatra śītaṃ yatrātiduḥ khadam // GarP_2,16.43 //
analyzed: yāti śītapuram tatra śītam yatra ati duḥkha dam

original: śītārtaḥ kṣudhitaḥ so 'tha vīkṣate hi diśo daśa /
analyzed: śīta ārtaḥ kṣudhitaḥ vīkṣate hi diśaḥ daśa

original: tiṣṭhettu bāndhavaḥ ko 'pi yo me duḥkhaṃ vyapohati // GarP_2,16.44 //
analyzed: tiṣṭhet tu bāndhavaḥ yaḥ me duḥkham vyapohati

original: kiṅkarāstaṃ vadantyevaṃ kva te puṇyaṃ hi tādṛśam /
analyzed: kiṅkarāḥ tam vadanti evam kva te puṇyam hi tādṛśam

original: śrutvā teṣāṃ tu tadvākyaṃ hā daiva iti bhāṣate // GarP_2,16.45 //
analyzed: śrutvā teṣām tu tat vākyam hā daivaḥ iti bhāṣate

original: daivaṃ hi pūrvasukṛtaṃ tanmayā naiva sañcitam /
analyzed: daivam hi pūrva su kṛtam tat mayā nā eva sañcitam

original: evaṃ sañcintya bahuśo dhairyamālambate punaḥ // GarP_2,16.46 //
analyzed: evam sañcintya bahuśas dhairyam ālambate punar
catvāriṃśat yojanāni catur yuktāni vai tatas
dharmarāja puram ramyam gandharva apsarā ākulam
caturaśīti lakṣaiḥ ca mūrta amūrtaiḥ adhiṣṭhitam
trayodaśa pratīhārāḥ dharmarāja pure sthitāḥ

original: śubhāśubhaṃ tu yatkarma te vicārya punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: śubha aśubham tu yat karma te vicārya punar punar

original: śravaṇā brahmaṇaḥ putrā manuṣyāṇāṃ ca ceṣṭitam /
analyzed: śravaṇāḥ brahmaṇaḥ putrāḥ manuṣyāṇām ca ceṣṭitam

original: kathayanti tadā loke pūjitāḥ pūjitāḥ svayam // GarP_2,16.49 //
analyzed: kathayanti tadā loke pūjitāḥ pūjitāḥ svayam

original: naraistuṣṭaiśca puṣṭaiśca yatproktaṃ ca kṛtaṃ ca yat /
analyzed: naraiḥ tuṣṭaiḥ ca puṣṭaiḥ ca yat proktam ca kṛtam ca yat

original: sarvamāvedayanti sma citragupte yame ca tat // GarP_2,16.50 //
analyzed: sarvam āvedayanti sma citragupte yame ca tat
dūrāt śravaṇa vijñānāḥ dūrāt darśana gocarāḥ
evañca iṣṭāḥ tu te hi aṣṭau svar bhū pātāla cāriṇaḥ
teṣām patnyaḥ tathā vā ugrā śravaṇyaḥ pṛthak āhvayāḥ

original: evaṃ teṣāṃ śaktirasti yartye martyādhikāriṇaḥ // GarP_2,16.52 //
analyzed: evam teṣām śaktiḥ asti yartye martya adhikāriṇaḥ
vrataiḥ dānaiḥ stavaiḥ yaḥ ca pūjayet iha mānavaḥ

original: jāyante tasya te saumyāḥ sukhamṛtyupradāyinaḥ // GarP_2,16.53 //
analyzed: jāyante tasya te saumyāḥ sukha mṛtyu pradāyinaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde pretayātrādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣoḍaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde pretayātrādinirūpaṇam nāma ṣoḍaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: eko me saṃśayo deva hṛdaye samprabādhate /
analyzed: ekaḥ me saṃśayaḥ deva hṛdaye samprabādhate

original: śramaṇāḥ kasya putrāśca kathaṃ yamapure sthitāḥ // GarP_2,17.1 //
analyzed: śramaṇāḥ kasya putrāḥ ca katham yamapure sthitāḥ

original: mānuṣaiśca kṛtaṃ karma kasmājjānanti te prabho /
analyzed: mānuṣaiḥ ca kṛtam karma kasmāt jānanti te prabho

original: kathaṃ śṛṇvanti te sarve kasmājjñānaṃ samāgatam // GarP_2,17.2 //
analyzed: katham śṛṇvanti te sarve kasmāt jñānam samāgatam
kutra bhuñjanti deveśa krathayasva prasādataḥ
pakṣirāja vacaḥ śrutvā bhagavān vākyam abravīt
śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca
śṛṇuṣva vacanam satyam sarveṣām saukhya dāyakam
tat aham kathayiṣyāmi śravaṇānām viceṣṭitam
ekībhūtam yadā sarvam jagat sthāvara jaṅgamam

original: kṣīrodasāgare pūrvaṃ mayi supte jagatpatau // GarP_2,17.5 //
analyzed: kṣīroda sāgare pūrvam mayi supte jagatpatau
nābhi stha ujaḥ tapaḥ tepe varṣāṇi su bahūni api
ekībhūtam jagat sṛṣṭam bhūta grāma caturvidham

original: brahmaṇā nirmitaṃ pūrvaṃ viṣṇunā pālitaṃ tadā /
analyzed: brahmaṇā nirmitam pūrvam viṣṇunā pālitam tadā

original: rudraḥ saṃhāramūrtiśca nirmito brahmaṇā tataḥ // GarP_2,17.7 //
analyzed: rudraḥ saṃhāra mūrtiḥ ca nirmitaḥ brahmaṇā tatas
vāyuḥ sarva gataḥ sṛṣṭaḥ sūryaḥ tejobhiḥ vṛddhimān
dharmarājaḥ tatas sṛṣṭaḥ citraguptena saṃyuta
sṛṣṭvā etat ādikam sarvam tapaḥ tepe tu padmajaḥ
gatāni bahu varṣāṇi brahmaṇaḥ nābhi paṅkaje

original: yoyo hi nirmitaḥ pūrvaṃ tattatkarma samācaret /
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ hi nirmitaḥ pūrvam tad tad karma samācaret
kasmiṃścid samaye tatra brahmā loka samanvitaḥ
rudraḥ viṣṇuḥ tathā dharmaḥ śāsayanti vasundharām
na jānīmaḥ vayam kiñcid loka kṛtyam iha ucyatām
iti cintā parāḥ sarve devāḥ vimamṛśuḥ tadā

original: saṃcintya brahmaṇo mantraṃ vibudhaiḥ preritastadā // GarP_2,17.12 //
analyzed: saṃcintya brahmaṇaḥ mantram vibudhaiḥ preritaḥ tadā
gṛhītvā puṣpa patrāṇi saḥ usṛjat dvādaśa ātmajān
tejaḥ rāśīn viśāla akṣān brahmaṇaḥ vacanāt tu te

original: yoyaṃ vadati lokesmiñchubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham /
analyzed: yaḥ iyam vadati loke ismin śubham vā yadi vā aśubham

original: prāpayanti tataḥ śīghraṃ brahmaṇaḥ karṇagocaram // GarP_2,17.14 //
analyzed: prāpayanti tatas śīghram brahmaṇaḥ karṇa gocaram
dūrāt śravaṇa vijñānam dūrāt darśana gocaram

original: sarve śṛṇvanti yatpakṣiṃstenaiva śravaṇā matāḥ // GarP_2,17.15 //
analyzed: sarve śṛṇvanti yat pakṣin tena eva śravaṇāḥ matāḥ

original: sthitvā caiva tathākāśe jantūnāṃ ceṣṭitaṃ ca yat /
analyzed: sthitvā ca eva tathā ākāśe jantūnām ceṣṭitam ca yat

original: tajjñātvā dharmarājāgre mṛtyukāle vadanti ca // GarP_2,17.16 //
analyzed: tat jñātvā dharmarāja agre mṛtyu kāle vadanti ca

original: dharmaṃ cārthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca mokṣaṃ ca kathayanti te /
analyzed: dharmam ca artham ca kāmam ca mokṣam ca kathayanti te
ekaḥ hi dharma mārgaḥ ca dvitīyaḥ ca artha mārgakaḥ
aparaḥ kāma mārgaḥ ca mokṣa mārgaḥ caturthakaḥ

original: uttamā dhamamārgeṇa vainateya prayānti hi // GarP_2,17.18 //
analyzed: uttamāḥ dhama mārgeṇa vainateya prayānti hi
artha dātā vimānaiḥ tu aśvaiḥ kāma pradāyakaḥ
haṃsa yukta vimānaiḥ ca mokṣa ākāṅkṣī visarpati
itaraḥ pāda cāreṇa tu asipatravanāni ca

original: pāṣāṇaiḥ kaṇṭakaiḥ kliṣṭaḥ pāśabaddho 'tha yāti vai // GarP_2,17.20 //
analyzed: pāṣāṇaiḥ kaṇṭakaiḥ kliṣṭaḥ pāśa baddhaḥ yāti vai
yaḥ kaścid mānuṣe loke śravaṇān pūjayet iha
vardhanyā jala pātrā ima pakva anna paripūrṇayā
śravaṇān pūjayet tatra mayā saha khageśvara
tasya aham tat pradāsyāmi yat suraiḥ api durlabham
saṃbhojya brāhmaṇān bhaktyā tu ekādaśa śubhān śucīn

original: dvādaśaṃ sakalatraṃ ca mama prītyai prapūjayet // GarP_2,17.23 //
analyzed: dvādaśam sa kalatram ca mama prītyai prapūjayet

original: devaiḥ sarvaiśca saṃpūjya svargaṃ yānti sukhepsayā /
analyzed: devaiḥ sarvaiḥ ca saṃpūjya svargam yānti sukha īpsayā
taiḥ pūjitaiḥ aha tuṣṭaḥ citraguptena dharmarāj
taiḥ tuṣṭaiḥ mad puram yānti lokāḥ dharma pārāyaṇāḥ

original: śravaṇānāṃ ca māhātmyamutpattiṃ ceṣṭitaṃ śubham // GarP_2,17.25 //
analyzed: śravaṇānām ca māhātmyam utpattim ceṣṭitam śubham

original: śṛṇoti pakṣiśārdūla sa ca pāpairna lipyate /
analyzed: śṛṇoti pakṣi śārdūla sa ca pāpaiḥ na lipyate

original: iha loke sukhaṃ bhuktvā svargaloke mahīyate // GarP_2,17.26 //
analyzed: iha loke sukham bhuktvā svarga loke mahīyate

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretaklape śravaṇamahātmyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptadaso 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretaklape śravaṇamahātmyanirūpaṇam nāma saptadasaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: śravaṇānāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā kṣaṇaṃ dhyātvā punastataḥ /
analyzed: śravaṇānām vacaḥ śrutvā kṣaṇam dhyātvā punar tatas
yat kṛtam tu manuṣyaiḥ ca puṇyam pāpam aharniśam
tat sarvam ca parijñāya citraguptaḥ nivedayet

original: citraguptastataḥ sarvaṃ karma tasmai vadatyatha // GarP_2,18.2 //
analyzed: citraguptaḥ tatas sarvam karma tasmai vadati atha

original: vācaiva yatkṛtaṃ karma kṛtaṃ caiva tu kāyikam /
analyzed: vācā eva yat kṛtam karma kṛtam ca eva tu kāyikam

original: mānasaṃ ca tathā karma kṛtaṃ bhuṅkte śubhāśubham // GarP_2,18.3 //
analyzed: mānasam ca tathā karma kṛtam bhuṅkte śubha aśubham
evam te kathitaḥ tārkṣya preta mārgasya nirṇayaḥ

original: viśrānti dāni sarvāṇi sthānāni kathitāni te // GarP_2,18.4 //
analyzed: sarvāṇi sthānāni kathitāni te
tam uddiśya dadāti annam sukham yāti mahā adhvani

original: divā rātrau tamuddiśya sthāne dīpaprado bhavet // GarP_2,18.5 //
analyzed: divā rātrau tam uddiśya sthāne dīpa pradaḥ bhavet
andhakāre mahā ghore śva pūrṇe lakṣya varjite

original: dīpte 'dhvani ca te yānti dīpo dattaśca yairnaraiḥ // GarP_2,18.6 //
analyzed: dīpte dhvani ca te yānti dīpaḥ dattaḥ ca yaiḥ naraiḥ

original: kārtike ca caturdaśyāṃ dīpadānaṃ sukhāya vai /
analyzed: kārtike ca caturdaśyām dīpa dānam sukhāya vai
atha vakṣyāmi saṃkṣepāt yama mārgasya niṣkṛtim
vṛṣotsargasya puṇyena pitṛ lokam sa gacchati
ekādaśa aha piṇḍena śuddha dehaḥ bhavet tatas
uda kumbha pradānena kiṅkarāḥ tṛptim āpnuyuḥ
śayyā dānāt bimāna sthaḥ yāti svargeṣu mānavaḥ

original: tadahni dīyate sarvaṃ dvādaśāhe viśeṣataḥ // GarP_2,18.10 //
analyzed: tad ahni dīyate sarvam dvādaśa ahe viśeṣataḥ
padāni sarva vastūni variṣṭhāni trayodaśe
yaḥ dadāti mṛtasya iha jīvan api ātma hetave
tad āśritaḥ mahā mārge vainateya sa gacchati

original: eka evāsti sarvatre vyavahāraḥ khagādhipa // GarP_2,18.12 //
analyzed: ekaḥ evā asti vyavahāraḥ khagādhipa
uttama adhama madhyānām tad tad āvarjanam bhavet
yāvat bhāgyam bhavet yasya tāvat mārge tiricyate
svayam svasyena yat dattam tat tatra adhikaroti tam

original: mṛte yadbāndhavairdattaṃ tadāśritya sukhī bhavet // GarP_2,18.14 //
analyzed: mṛte yat bāndhavaiḥ dattam tat āśritya sukhī bhavet
garuḍaḥ uvāca
