original: dīyate kasya deveśa tadvadasva yathātatham // GarP_2,18.15 //

śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: āsanaṃ bhājanaṃ caiva padaṃ saptavidhaṃ smṛtam // GarP_2,18.16 //
analyzed: āsanam bhājanam ca eva padam saptavidham smṛtam

original: ātapastatra yo raudro dahyate yena mānavaḥ /

original: aśvārūḍhāśca gacchanti dadate ya upānahau // GarP_2,18.18 //
analyzed: aśva ārūḍhāḥ ca gacchanti dadate ye upānahau
āsane svāgate bhojane

original: sukhena bhuṅkte sa pretaḥ pathi gacchañchanaiḥ śanaiḥ // GarP_2,18.19 //
analyzed: sukhena bhuṅkte sa pretaḥ pathi gacchan śanais śanais
bahu dharma samākīrṇe nirvāte toya varjite
kamaṇḍalu pradānena sukhī bhavati niścitam
mṛta uddeśena yaḥ dadyāt uda pātram tu tāmra jam
prapā dāna sahasrasya tat phalam saḥ śnute dhruvam
yama dūtāḥ mahā raudrāḥ karālāḥ kṛṣṇa piṅgalāḥ
na pīḍayanti dākṣiṇyāt vastra ābhāraṇa dānataḥ
sa āyudhāḥ dhāvamānāḥ ca na mārge dṛṣṭi gocarāḥ
prayānti yamadūtāḥ te mudrikāyāḥ pradānataḥ
bhājana āsana dānena āma anna bhojanena ca
ājya yajñopavītābhyām padam sampūrṇa tām vrajet
evam mārge gacchamānaḥ tṛṣā ārtaḥ śrama pīḍitaḥ
mahiṣī ratha dugdha
dānāt ca sukhī bhavati niścitam
garuḍaḥ uvāca
mṛta uddeśena yat kiñcid dīyate sva gṛhe vibho

original: sa gacchati mahāmārge taddattaṃ kena gṛhyate // GarP_2,18.26 //
analyzed: sa gacchati mahā mārge tat dattam kena gṛhyate

original: gṛhṇāti varuṇo dānaṃ mama haste prayacchati /

original: ahaṃ ca bhāskare deve bhāskarātso 'śnute sukham // GarP_2,18.27 //

original: sarve te narakaṃ yānti yāvatpāpasya saṃkṣayaḥ // GarP_2,18.28 //

original: teṣāṃ madhye śreṣṭhatamā ghorā yā ekaviṃśatiḥ // GarP_2,18.30 //
analyzed: teṣām madhye śreṣṭhatamāḥ ghorāḥ yāḥ ekaviṃśatiḥ

rauravam kuḍvalam kālasūtrakam pūtimṛtikā

original: jāmadagnyasyeva rāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā tejaḥ prasarpati // GarP_2,18.39 //
analyzed: jāmadagnyasya iva rāmam dṛṣṭvā tejaḥ prasarpati

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmadṛpretadṛśrīkṛṣṇagaruḍa saṃvāde vṛṣotsarganānādānaphalayamalokagamanakarmajadehaprāptinirūpaṇaṃ  #
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma dṛ preta dṛ śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde vṛṣotsarga nānā dāna phala yama loka gamana karma ja deha prāpti nirūpaṇam
nāma aṣṭādaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: te dehaṃ sa samāsādya yamena saha gacchati // GarP_2,19.1 //
analyzed: te deham sa samāsādya yamena saha gacchati

original: dattaṃ tenaiva tṛpyanti yamasya puracāriṇaḥ // GarP_2,19.4 //

original: pibanti te ca pānīyaṃ bhojanocchiṣṭayojitam // GarP_2,20.11 //

analyzed: jñāyate kena vidhinā jalpanti na vadanti vā

original: kṛtādau dvāparānte ca na preto naiva pīḍanam /

original: virodho bandhubhiḥ sārdhaṃ pretadoṣeṇa kāśyapa // GarP_2,20.20 //
analyzed: virodhaḥ bandhubhiḥ sārdham preta doṣeṇa kāśyapa

akasmāt vyasana prāptiḥ sā pīḍā preta sambhavā

original: syāddhantakalaho nityaṃ sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.23 //

original: paradravyāṇāṃ ca hartā sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.25 //

original: loke kalahakārī ca sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.26 //
analyzed: loke kalahakārī ca sā pīḍā preta sambhavā

original: pretapīḍā tu sā jñeyā satyaṃsatyaṃ khageśvara // GarP_2,20.27 //
analyzed: pretapīḍā tu sā jñeyā satyam satyam khageśvara

original: hīnajātyā ca sambandho hīnakarma karoti yaḥ /

original: adharme ramate nityaṃ sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.28 //
analyzed: adharme ramate nityam sā pīḍā preta sambhavā
vyasanaiḥ dravya nāśaḥ syāt upakrāntam vinaśyati

original: jāyā saṃpīḍhyate yacca sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.30 //

original: abhāvo jāyate dharme sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.31 //

original: pratyakṣaṃ vā parokṣaṃ vā sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.32 //
analyzed: pratyakṣam vā parokṣam vā sā pīḍā preta sambhavā

original: strīṇāṃ garbhavināśaḥ syānna puṣpaṃ dṛśyate tathā /
analyzed: strīṇām garbha vināśaḥ syāt na puṣpam dṛśyate tathā

original: bālānāṃ maraṇaṃ yatra sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.34 //
analyzed: bālānām maraṇam yatra sā pīḍā preta sambhavā

original: svayameva na kurvīta sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.35 //
analyzed: svayam eva na kurvīta sā pīḍā preta sambhavā

original: tīrthe gattvā parāsaktaḥ svakṛtyaṃ ca parityajet /
analyzed: tīrthe gattvā para āsaktaḥ sva kṛtyam ca parityajet

original: dharmakārye na sampattiḥ sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.36 //
analyzed: dharma kārye na sampattiḥ sā pīḍā preta sambhavā
dampatyoḥ kalahaḥ ca eva bhojane kopa saṃyutaḥ

original: paradrohe matiścaiva sā pīḍā pretasaṃbhavā // GarP_2,20.37 //
analyzed: para drohe matiḥ ca eva sā pīḍā preta saṃbhavā

original: puṣpaṃ yatra na dṛśyena phalaṃ tathā /
analyzed: puṣpam yatra na dṛśyena phalam tathā

original: viraho bhāryayā yatra sā pīḍā pretasagbhavā // GarP_2,20.38 //
analyzed: virahaḥ bhāryayā yatra sā pīḍā

original: yeṣāṃ vai jāyate cihnaṃ sadoccāṭaparaṃ nṛṇām /
analyzed: yeṣām vai jāyate cihnam sadā uccāṭa param nṛṇām

original: svakṣetre niṣphalaṃ tejaḥ sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.39 //
analyzed: sva kṣetre niṣphalam tejaḥ sā pīḍā preta sambhavā
sva gotra ghātakaḥ ca eva hanti śatrum iva ātmajam

original: na prītirnāpi saukhyaṃ ca sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.40 //
analyzed: na prītiḥ nā api saukhyam ca sā pīḍā preta sambhavā

original: pitṛvākyaṃ na kurute svapatnīṃ ca na sevate /
analyzed: pitṛ vākyam na kurute sva patnīm ca na sevate

original: sadā krūramatirvyagraḥ sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.41 //
analyzed: sadā krūra matiḥ vyagraḥ sā pīḍā preta sambhavā
vikarmā jāyate pretaḥ hi avidhi kriyayā tathā
tad kāla duṣṭa saṃsargāt vṛṣotsargāt ṛte tathā
dṛṣṭa gṛtyu vaśāt vā api adagdha vapuṣaḥ tathā

original: pretatvaṃ jāyate tārkṣya pīḍyante yena jantavaḥ // GarP_2,20.43 //
analyzed: preta tvam jāyate tārkṣya pīḍyante yena jantavaḥ
evam jñātvā khaga śreṣṭha preta muktim samācaret

original: yo vai na manyate pretānmṛtaḥ pretatvamāpnuyāt // GarP_2,20.44 //
analyzed: yaḥ vai na manyate pretān mṛtaḥ preta tvam āpnuyāt

original: pretadoṣaḥ kule yasya sukhaṃ tasya na vidyate /
analyzed: preta doṣaḥ kule yasya sukham tasya na vidyate
matiḥ prītiḥ ratiḥ buddhiḥ lakṣmīḥ pañca vināśanam

original: tṛtīye pañcame puṃsi vaṃśacchedo hi jāyate /
analyzed: tṛtīye pañcame puṃsi vaṃśa chedaḥ hi jāyate
daridraḥ nirdhanaḥ ca eva pāpa karmā bhavebhave

original: ye kecitpetarūpā vikṛtamukhadṛśo raudrarūpāḥ karālā manyante naiva gotraṃ sutaduhitṛpitṝn bhrātṛjāyāṃ vadhūṃ vā /
analyzed: ye kecid peta rūpāḥ vikṛta mukha dṛśaḥ raudra rūpāḥ karālāḥ manyante na eva gotram suta duhitṛ pitṝn bhrātṛ jāyām vadhūm vā

original: kṛtvā kāmyaṃ ca rūpaṃ sukhagatirahitā bhāṣamāṇā yatheṣṭaṃ hā kaṣṭaṃ bhoktukāmā vidhivaśapatitāḥ saṃsmaranti svapākam // GarP_2,20.47 //
analyzed: kṛtvā kāmyam ca rūpam sukha gati rahitāḥ bhāṣamāṇāḥ yatheṣṭam hā kaṣṭam bhoktu kāmāḥ vidhi vaśa patitāḥ saṃsmaranti sva pākam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pratakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde pretāvāsatadbādhāprakāranirūpaṇaṃ nāma viṃśo
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe prata kalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde pretāvāsatadbādhāprakāranirūpaṇam nāma viṃśaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
garuḍaḥ uvāca
muktim yānti katham pretāḥ tat aham praṣṭum utsukaḥ

original: yanmuktau ca manuṣyāṇāṃ na pīḍā jāyate punaḥ // GarP_2,21.1 //
analyzed: yat muktau ca manuṣyāṇām na pīḍā jāyate punar
etaiḥ ca lakṣaṇaiḥ deva pīḍā uktā preta jā tvayā

original: teṣāṃ kadā bhavenmuktiḥ pretatvaṃ na kathaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,21.2 //
analyzed: teṣām kadā bhavet muktiḥ preta tvam na katham bhavet

original: pretatve hi pramāṇaṃ ca kati varṣāṇi saṃkhyayā /
analyzed: preta tve hi pramāṇam ca kati varṣāṇi saṃkhyayā
ciram preta tvam āpannaḥ katham muktim avāpnuyāt
śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: muktiṃ prāyanti te pretāstadahaṃ kathayāmi te /
analyzed: muktim prāyanti te pretāḥ tat aham kathayāmi te

original: yadaiva manujo 'vaiti mama pīḍā kṛtā tviyam // GarP_2,21.4 //
analyzed: yadā eva manujaḥ vā eti mama pīḍā kṛtā tu iyam
pṛcchā artham hitam anvicchan dai vajñe vinivadayet

original: svapne dṛṣṭaḥ śubho vṛkṣaḥ phalitaścūtacampakaḥ // GarP_2,21.5 //
analyzed: svapne dṛṣṭaḥ śubhaḥ vṛkṣaḥ phalitaḥ cūta campakaḥ

original: vipro vā vṛṣabho devo bhramate tīrthago yadi /
analyzed: vipraḥ vā vṛṣabhaḥ devaḥ bhramate tīrtha gaḥ yadi

original: evaṃ dṛṣṭo yadā svapno mṛtaḥ ko 'pisvagotrajaḥ // GarP_2,21.6 //
analyzed: evam dṛṣṭaḥ yadā svapnaḥ mṛtaḥ
svapne satyam parijñāya dṛṣṭam preta prabhāvataḥ
adbhutāni pradṛśyante preta doṣāt viniścitam
tīrtha snāne matiḥ yāvat cittam dharma parāyaṇam

original: dharmāpāyaṃ prakurute pretapīḍā tadā vrajet // GarP_2,21.8 //
analyzed: dharma apāyam prakurute preta pīḍā tadā vrajet

original: tadā tatra vināśāya cittabhaṅgaṃ karoti sā /
analyzed: tadā tatra vināśāya citta bhaṅgam karoti sā
śreyāṃsi bahu vighnāni sambhavanti pade pade

original: aśreyasi pravṛtti ca prerayanti punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: aśreyasi pravṛtti ca prerayanti punar punar

original: uccāṭanaṃ ca krūratvaṃ sarvaṃ pretakṛtaṃ khaga // GarP_2,21.10 //
analyzed: uccāṭanam ca krūra tvam sarvam preta kṛtam khaga
sarva vighnāni santyajya mukti upāyam karoti yaḥ

original: tasya karmaphalaṃ sādhu pretavṛttiśca śāśvatī // GarP_2,21.11 //
analyzed: tasya karma phalam sādhu preta vṛttiḥ ca śāśvatī

original: sa bhavettena muktastu dattaṃ śreyaskaraṃ param /
analyzed: sa bhavet tena muktaḥ tu dattam śreyaskaram param

original: svayaṃ tṛpyati bhoḥ pakṣinyasyoddeśena dīyate // GarP_2,21.12 //
analyzed: svayam tṛpyati bhoḥ pakṣin yasya uddeśena dīyate

original: śṛṇu satyamidaṃ tārkṣya yaddadāti bhunakti saḥ /
analyzed: śṛṇu satyam idam tārkṣya yat dadāti bhunakti saḥ

original: ātmānaṃ śreyasā yuñjyātpretastṛptiṃ ciraṃ vrajet // GarP_2,21.13 //
analyzed: ātmānam śreyasā yuñjyāt pretaḥ tṛptim ciram vrajet
te tṛptāḥ śubham icchanti nija bandhuṣu sarvadā

original: ajñātayastu ye duṣṭāḥ pīḍayanti svavaṃśajān // GarP_2,21.14 //
analyzed: ajñātayaḥ tu ye duṣṭāḥ pīḍayanti sva vaṃśa jān
nivārayanti tṛptāḥ te jāyamāna anukampakāḥ
paścāt te muktim āyanti kāle prāpte sva putrataḥ

original: sadā bandhuṣu yacchanti vṛddhimṛddhiṃ khagādhipa // GarP_2,21.15 //
analyzed: sadā bandhuṣu yacchanti vṛddhim ṛddhim khaga adhipa
darśanāt bhāṣaṇāt yaḥ tu ceṣṭātaḥ pīḍanāt gatim

original: na prāpayati mūḍhātmā pretaśāpaiḥ sa lipyate // GarP_2,21.16 //
analyzed: na prāpayati mūḍha ātmā preta śāpaiḥ sa lipyate
paśuḥ ca eva daridraḥ vyādhitaḥ tathā
vṛtti hīnaḥ ca hīnaḥ ca bhavet janmani janmani

original: evaṃ bruvanti te pretāḥ punaryābhyaṃ samāśritāḥ /
analyzed: evam bruvanti te pretāḥ punar yābhyam samāśritāḥ
tatrasthānām bhavet muktiḥ sva kāle karma saṃkṣaye
garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: nāma gotraṃ na dṛśyeta pratītirnaiva jāyate /
analyzed: nāma gotram na dṛśyeta pratītiḥ nā eva jāyate
kecid vadanti daivajñāḥ pīḍām preta samudbhavām

original: na svapnaścaiṣṭitaṃ naiva darśanaṃ na kadācana /
analyzed: na svapnaḥ ca eṣṭitam na eva darśanam na kadācana

original: kiṃ kartavyaṃ suraśreṣṭha tatra me brūhi niścitam // GarP_2,21.20 //
analyzed: kim kartavyam suraśreṣṭha tatra me brūhi niścitam
śrī bhagavān uvāca
satyam vā api anṛtam vā api vadanti kṣitidevatāḥ
tadā sañcintya hṛdaye satyam etat dvija īritam
bhāva bhaktim puraskṛtya pitṛ bhakti parāyaṇaḥ

original: kṛtvā kṛṣṇabaliṃ caiva puraścaraṇa pūrvakam // GarP_2,21.22 //
analyzed: kṛtvā kṛṣṇa balim ca eva puraścaraṇa pūrvakam
japa homaiḥ tathā dānaiḥ prakuryāt deha sodhanam

original: kṛtena tena vighnāni vinaśyanti khageśvara // GarP_2,21.23 //
analyzed: kṛtena tena vighnāni vinaśyanti khageśvara
bhūta preta piśācaiḥ vā sa ced anyaiḥ prapīḍyate
pitṛ uddeśena vai kuryāt nārāyaṇa balim tadā

original: vimuktaḥ sarvapīḍābhya iti satyaṃ vaco mama // GarP_2,21.24 //
analyzed: vimuktaḥ sarva pīḍābhyaḥ iti satyam vacaḥ mama
pitṛ pīḍā bhavet yatra kṛtyaiḥ anyaiḥ na mucyate
tasmāt sarva prayatnena pitṛ bhakti paraḥ bhavet

original: navame daśame varṣe pikṣuddeśena vai pumān /
analyzed: navame daśame varṣe pikṣudh deśena vai pumān

original: gāyattrīmayutaṃ japtvā daśāṃśena ca homayet // GarP_2,21.26 //
analyzed: gāyattrīm ayutam japtvā daśa aṃśena ca homayet
kṛtvā kṛṣṇa balim pūrvam vṛṣotsarga ādikāḥ kriyāḥ
sarva upadrava hīnaḥ tu sarva saukhyam avāpnuyāt
uttamam lokam āpnoti jñāti prādhānyam eva ca
pitṛmā tṛ samam loke na asti anyat daivatam param
tasmāt sarva prayatnena pūjayet pitarā sadā
hitānām upadeṣṭā hi pratyakṣam daivatam pitā

original: anyā yā devatā loke na dehaprabhavo hi tāḥ // GarP_2,21.29 //
analyzed: anyāḥ yāḥ devatāḥ loke na deha prabhavaḥ hi tāḥ
śarīram eva jantūnām svarga mokṣa eka sādhanam

original: deho datto hi yenaivaṃ ko 'nyaḥ pūjyatamastataḥ // GarP_2,21.30 //
analyzed: dehaḥ dattaḥ hi yena evam kaḥ nyaḥ pūjyatamaḥ tatas
iti sañcintya hṛdaye pakṣin yat yat prayacchati

original: tatsarvamātmanā bhuṅkte dānaṃ vedavido viduḥ // GarP_2,21.31 //
analyzed: tat sarvam ātmanā bhuṅkte dānam veda vidaḥ viduḥ
punnāma narakāt yasmāt pitaram trāyate sutaḥ

original: tasmātputtra iti prokta iha cāpi paratra ca // GarP_2,21.32 //
analyzed: tasmāt puttraḥ iti proktaḥ iha ca api paratra ca
apamṛtyu mṛtau syātām pitarau kasyacid khaga
vrata tīrtha a vivāha ādi śrāddham saṃvatsaram tyajet
svapnādhyāyam imam yaḥ tu preta liṅga nidarśakam

original: yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādvāpi pretacihnaṃ na paśyati // GarP_2,21.34 //
analyzed: yaḥ paṭhet śṛṇuyāt vā api preta cihnam na paśyati

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakādṛpretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde svapnādhyāyo nāmaikaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde svapnādhyāyaḥ nāma ekaviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: sambhavanti kathaṃ pretāḥ kena teṣāṃ gatirbhavet /
analyzed: sambhavanti katham pretāḥ kena teṣām gatiḥ bhavet

original: kīdṛkteṣāṃ bhavedrūpaṃ bhojanaṃ kiṃ bhavetprabho // GarP_2,22.1 //
analyzed: kīdṛś teṣām bhavet rūpam bhojanam kim bhavet prabho

original: suprītāste kathaṃ pretāḥ kva tiṣṭhanti sureśvara /
analyzed: su prītāḥ te katham pretāḥ kva tiṣṭhanti sureśvara

original: prasannaḥ kṛpayā deva praśramenaṃ vadasva me // GarP_2,22.2 //
analyzed: prasannaḥ kṛpayā deva praśrama enam vadasva me
śrī bhagavān uvāca
pāpa karma ratāḥ ye vai pūrva karma vaśa anugāḥ

original: jāyante te mṛtāḥ pretāstāñchṛṇuṣva vadāmyaham // GarP_2,22.3 //
analyzed: jāyante te mṛtāḥ pretāḥ tān śṛṇuṣva vadāmi aham
vāpī kūpa taḍāgān ca ārāmam sura mandiram

original: prapāṃ sadma suvṛkṣāṃśca tathā bhojanaśālikāḥ // GarP_2,22.4 //
analyzed: prapām sadma su vṛkṣān ca tathā bhojana śālikāḥ
pitṛpaitāmaham dharmam kikrīṇāti sa pāpa bhāj
mṛtaḥ preta tvam āpnoti yāvat ābhūtasaṃplavam
gocaram grāma sīmām taḍāga ārāma gahvaram

original: karṣayanti ca ye lobhātpretāste vai bhavanti hi // GarP_2,22.6 //
analyzed: karṣayanti ca ye lobhāt pretāḥ te vai bhavanti hi
caṇḍālāt udakāt sarpāt brāhmaṇāt baidyuta agnitaḥ
daṃṣṭribhyaḥ ca paśubhyaḥ ca maraṇam pāpa karmiṇām
udbandhana mṛtāḥ ye ca viṣa śastra hatāḥ ca ye
ātma upaghātinaḥ ye ca viṣūcī ādi hatāḥ tathā
mahā rogaiḥ mṛtāḥ ye ca pāpa rogaiḥ ca dasyubhiḥ
a saṃskṛta pramītāḥ ye vihita ācāra varjitāḥ
vṛṣotsarga ādi luptāḥ ca lupta māsika piṇḍakāḥ
yasya ānayati śūdraḥ ugnim tṛṇa kāṣṭha havīṃṣi saḥ
patanāt parvatānām ca bhitti pātena ye mṛtāḥ

original: rajasvalādidoṣaiśca na ca bhūmau matāśca ye // GarP_2,22.11 //
analyzed: rajasvalā ādi doṣaiḥ ca na ca bhūmau matāḥ ca ye
antarikṣe mṛtāḥ ye ca viṣṇu smaraṇa varjitāḥ

original: sūtakaiḥ śvādisaṃparkaiḥ pretabhāvā iha kṣitau // GarP_2,22.12 //
analyzed: sūtakaiḥ śva ādi saṃparkaiḥ preta bhāvāḥ iha kṣitau
evamādibhiḥ anyaiḥ ca kumṛtyu vaśagāḥ ca ye

original: te sarve pretayonisthā vicaranti marusthale // GarP_2,22.13 //
analyzed: te sarve preta yoni sthāḥ vicaranti maru sthale

original: mātaraṃ bhaginīṃ bhāryāṃ snuṣāṃ duhitaraṃ tathā /
analyzed: mātaram bhaginīm bhāryām snuṣām duhitaram tathā

original: adṛṣṭadoṣāṃ tyajati sa preto jāyatedhruvam // GarP_2,22.14 //
analyzed: adṛṣṭa doṣām tyajati sa pretaḥ jāyate dhruvam
bhrātṛ druh brahma hā go ghnaḥ surā paḥ gurutalpa gaḥ
hema kṣauma haraḥ tārkṣya sa vai preta tvam āpnuyāt
nyāsa apahartā para dāra rataḥ tathā

original: viśvāsaghātī krūrastu sa preto jāyate dhruvam // GarP_2,22.16 //
analyzed: viśvāsa ghātī krūraḥ tu sa pretaḥ jāyate dhruvam
kula mārgān ca santyajya para dharma rataḥ tathā
vidyā vṛtta vihīnaḥ ca sa pretaḥ jāyate dhruvam
atra eva udāharanti imam itihāsam purātanam
yudhiṣṭhirasya saṃvādam bhīṣmeṇa saha suvrata
tat aham kathayiṣyāmi yat śrutvā saukhyam āpnuyāt
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca
kena karma vipākena preta tvam upajāyate

original: kena vā mucyate kasmāttanme brūhi pitāmaha /
analyzed: kena vā mucyate kasmāt tat me brūhi pitāmaha

original: yacchrutvā na punarmohamevaṃ yāsyā mi suvrata // GarP_2,22.19 //
analyzed: yat śrutvā na punar moham evam yāsyāmi suvrata
bhīṣmaḥ uvāca

original: yenaiva jāyate preto yenaiva sa vimucyate /
analyzed: yena eva jāyate pretaḥ yena eva sa vimucyate

original: prāpnoti narakaṃ ghoraṃ dustaraṃ daivatairapi // GarP_2,22.20 //
analyzed: prāpnoti narakam ghoram dustaram daivataiḥ api
satatam śravaṇa ādyasya puṇya śravaṇa kīrtanāt
mānavāḥ vipramucyante āpannāḥ preta yoniṣu

original: śrūyate hi purā vatsa brāhmaṇaḥ śaṃsitavrataḥ /
analyzed: śrūyate hi purā vatsa brāhmaṇaḥ śaṃsita vrataḥ

original: nāmnā santaptakaḥ khyāta stapor'the vanamāśritaḥ // GarP_2,22.22 //
analyzed: nāmnā santaptakaḥ khyātaḥ stapaḥ rthe vanam āśritaḥ
svādhyāya yuktaḥ homena yaḥ yā
ga yuktaḥ dayā anvitaḥ

original: yajansa sakalānyajñānyuktyā kālaṃ ca vikṣipan // GarP_2,22.23 //
analyzed: yajan sa sakalān yajñān yuktyā kālam ca vikṣipan
brahā āmacarya samāyuktaḥ yuktaḥ tapasi mārdave
para loka bhaya upetaḥ satya śaucaiḥ ca nirmalaḥ
yuktaḥ hi guru vākyena yuktaḥ ca atithi pūjane
ātma yoge sadā udyuktaḥ sarva dvandva vivarjitaḥ
yoga abhyāse sadā yuktaḥ saṃsāra vijigīṣayā
evaṃvṛttaḥ sat ācāraḥ mokṣa kāṅkṣī jita indriyaḥ

original: bahūnyabdāni vijane vane tasya gatāni vai /
analyzed: bahūni abdāni vijane vane tasya gatāni vai

original: tasya buddhistato jātā tīrthānugamanaṃ prati // GarP_2,22.27 //
analyzed: tasya buddhiḥ tatas jātā tīrtha anugamanam prati
puṇyaiḥ tīrtha jalaiḥ eva śoṣayiṣye kalevaram
sa tīrtha itvaritam snātvā tapasvī bhāskara udaye
kṛta jāpya namaskāraḥ hi adhvānam pratyapadyata
ekasmin divase vipraḥ mārga bhraṣṭaḥ mahā tapāḥ

original: dadarśādhvani gacchansa pañca pretān sudāruṇān // GarP_2,22.29 //
analyzed: dadarśa adhvani gacchan sa pañca pretān su dāruṇān
araṇye nirjane deśe saṃkaṭe vṛkṣa varjite
pañca etān vikṛta ākārān dṛṣṭvā vai ghora darśanān
īṣat santrasta hṛdayaḥ tiṣṭhat unmīlya locane

original: svakarmāṇi parityajya mukhyavṛttāni yāni ca // GarP_2,24.15 //
analyzed: sva karmāṇi parityajya mukhya vṛttāni yāni ca
para karma rataḥ nityam yama lokam sa gacchati
śūdraḥ vinā
uttama adhama madhye vā yama loke sa pacyate

original: snānaṃ dānaṃ japo homo svādhyāyo davartāccanam // GarP_2,24.17 //
analyzed: snānam dānam japaḥ svādhyāyaḥ

original: yasmindine na sevyante sa vṛthā divaso nṛṇām /
analyzed: yasmin dine na sevyante sa vṛthā divasaḥ nṛṇām
anityam adhruvam deham anādhāram rasa udbhavam
anna udaka maye dehe guṇān etān vadāmi aham

original: yatprātaḥ saṃskṛtaṃ sāyaṃ nūnamannaṃ vinaśyati // GarP_2,24.19 //
analyzed: yat prātar saṃskṛtam sāyam nūnam annam vinaśyati
tadīya rasa sampuṣṭa kāye kā bata nitya tā

original: gataṃ jñātvā tu pakṣīndra vapurardhaṃ svakarmabhiḥ // GarP_2,24.20 //
analyzed: gatam jñātvā tu pakṣi indra vapuḥ ardham sva karmabhiḥ
naraḥ pāpa vināśāya kurvīta parama auṣadham
dehaḥ kim anna dātuḥ svid niṣektuḥ mātuḥ eva vā
ubhayoḥ vā prabhoḥ vā api vā
kaḥ tatra paramaḥ yajñaḥ kṛmi viṣ bhasma saṃjñake
kartavyaḥ paramaḥ yatnaḥ pātakasya vināśane

original: anekabhavasambhūtaṃ pātakaṃ tu tridhā kṛtam // GarP_2,24.23 //
analyzed: aneka bhava sambhūtam pātakam tu tridhā kṛtam

original: yadā prāpnoti mānuṣyaṃ tadā sarvaṃ tapatyapi /
analyzed: yadā prāpnoti mānuṣyam tadā sarvam tapati api
sarva janmāni saṃsmṛtya viṣādī kṛta cetanaḥ
avekṣya garbha vāsān ca karma jāḥ gatayaḥ tathā
mānuṣodara vāsī ced tadā bhavati pātakī
aṇḍaja ādiṣu bhūteṣu yatra yatra prasarpati
ādhayaḥ vyādhayaḥ kleśāḥ jarā rūpa viparyayaḥ
garbha vāsāt vinirmuktaḥ tu ajñāna timira āvṛtaḥ

original: na jānātiḥ khagaśreṣṭha bālabhāvaṃ samāśritaḥ // GarP_2,24.27 //
analyzed: na jānātiḥ khaga śreṣṭha bāla bhāvam samāśritaḥ

original: yauvane timirāndhaśca yaḥ paśyati sa muktibhāk /
analyzed: yauvane timira andhaḥ ca yaḥ paśyati sa mukti bhāj

original: ādhānānmṛtyumāpnoti bālo vā sthaviro yuvā // GarP_2,24.28 //
analyzed: ādhānāt mṛtyum āpnoti bālaḥ vā sthaviraḥ yuvā
sa dhanaḥ nirdhanaḥ ca eva su kumāraḥ ku rūpavān
a vidvān ca eva vidvān ca brāhmaṇāḥ tu itaraḥ janaḥ

original: taporato yogaśīlo mahājñānī ca yo naraḥ /
analyzed: tapaḥ rataḥ yoga śīlaḥ mahā jñānī ca yaḥ naraḥ

original: vinā mānupadehaṃ tu sukhaṃ duḥ khaṃ na vindati // GarP_2,24.30 //
analyzed: vinā mānupa deham tu sukham duḥ kham na vindati
prākṛtaiḥ karma pāśaiḥ tu mṛtyum āpnoti mānavaḥ
ādhānāt pañca varṣāṇi su alpa pāpaiḥ vipacyate
pañca varṣa adhikaḥ bhūtvā mahā pāpaiḥ vipacyate

original: yoniṃ pūrayate yasmānmṛto 'pyāyāti yāti ca // GarP_2,24.32 //
analyzed: yonim pūrayate yasmāt mṛtaḥ pyāyāti yāti ca
mṛtaḥ dāna prabhāveṇa jīvan martyaḥ ciram bhuvi
sūtaḥ uvāca

original: iti kṛṣṇavacaḥ śrutvā garuḍo vākyamabravīt // GarP_2,24.33 //
analyzed: iti kṛṣṇa vacaḥ śrutvā garuḍaḥ vākyam abravīt
garuḍaḥ uvāca
mṛte bāle katham kuryāt piṇḍa dāna ādikāḥ kriyāḥ
garbheṣu ca vipannānām ācūḍākaraṇāt śiśoḥ

original: kathaṃ kiṃ kena dātavyaṃ mṛtānte ko vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: katham kim kena dātavyam mṛta ante kaḥ vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ
garuḍa uktam iti śrutvā viṣṇuḥ vākyam athā bravīt
śrī viṣṇuḥ uvāca

original: yadi garbho vipadyate stravate vāpi yoṣitaḥ /
analyzed: yadi garbhaḥ vipadyate stravate vā api yoṣitaḥ
yāvat māsam sthitaḥ garbhaḥ tāvat dinam aśaucakam
tasya kiñcid na kartavyam ātmanaḥ śreyaḥ icchatā

original: tato jāte vipanne tu ā cūḍākaraṇācchiśoḥ // GarP_2,24.37 //
analyzed: tatas jāte vipanne tu ā cūḍākaraṇāt śiśoḥ

original: dugdhaṃ bhojyaṃ tāśakti bālānāṃ ca pradīyate /
analyzed: dugdham bhojyam bālānām ca pradīyate

original: ā cūḍātpañcavarṣe tu dehadāho vidhīyate // GarP_2,24.38 //
analyzed: ā cūḍāt pañca varṣe tu deha dāhaḥ vidhīyate

original: dugdhaṃ tasya pradeyaṃ syādbālānāṃ bhojanaṃ śubham /
analyzed: dugdham tasya pradeyam syāt bālānām bhojanam śubham
pañca varṣa adhike prete sva jāti vihitāni ca
kuryāt karmāṇi sarvāṇi ca uda kumbha ādi pāyasam

original: dātavyaṃ tu khagaśreṣṭha ṛṇasambandhakastu saḥ // GarP_2,24.40 //
analyzed: dātavyam tu khaga śreṣṭhaḥ ṛṇa sambandhakaḥ tu saḥ

original: jātasya hi dhruvo mṛtyurdhruvaṃ janma mṛtasya ca /
analyzed: jātasya hi dhruvaḥ mṛtyuḥ dhruvam janma mṛtasya ca
kartavyam pakṣi śārdūla punar deha kṣayāya vai
tasmai yat rocate deyam a dattvā nirdhane kule
su alpa āyuḥ nirdhanaḥ bhūtvā rati bhakti vivarjitaḥ
punarjanma āpnuyāt martyaḥ tasmāt deyam ṛte śiśoḥ

original: purāṇe gīyate gāthā sarvathā pratibhāti me // GarP_2,24.43 //
analyzed: purāṇe gīyate gāthā sarvathā pratibhāti me

original: miṣṭānnaṃ bhojanaṃ deyaṃ dāne śaktistu durlabhā /
analyzed: miṣṭānnam bhojanam deyam dāne śaktiḥ tu durlabhā
bhojye bhojana śaktiḥ ca rati śaktiḥ vara striyaḥ
vibhave dāna śaktiḥ ca na alpasya tapasaḥ phalam
dānāt bhogān avāpnoti saukhyam tīrthasya sevanāt
subhāṣaṇāt mṛtaḥ yaḥ tu sa vidvān dharma vittamaḥ
a datta dānāt ca bhavet daridraḥ daridra bhāvāt ca karoti pāpam

original: pāpaprabhāvānnarakaṃ prayāti punardaridraḥ punareva pāpī // GarP_2,24.46 //
analyzed: pāpa prabhāvāt narakam prayāti punar daridraḥ punar eva pāpī

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśākhye dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde 'lpāyurmaraṇahe tubālāntyeṣṭyornirūpaṇaṃ  #
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśa ākhye dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde lpa āyuḥ maraṇa he tu bāla antyeṣṭyoḥ nirūpaṇam
nāma caturviśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
śrī viṣṇuḥ uvāca
atas param pravakṣyāmi puruṣa strī vinirṇayam

original: jīvanvāpi mṛto vāpi pañcavarṣādhiko 'pi vā // GarP_2,25.1 //
analyzed: jīvan vā api mṛtaḥ vā api vā

original: pūrṇe tu pañcame varṣe pumāṃścaiva pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
analyzed: pūrṇe tu pañcame varṣe pumān ca eva pratiṣṭhitaḥ
sarva aindriyāṇi jānāti rūpa arūpa viparyayau
pūrva karma vipākena prāṇinām vadha bandhanam
vipra ādīn antyajān sarvān pāpam mārayati dhruvam

original: garbhe naṣṭe kriyā nāsti dugdhaṃ deyaṃ mṛte śiśau /
analyzed: garbhe naṣṭe kriyā nā asti dugdham deyam mṛte śiśau

original: paraṃ ca pāyasaṃ kṣīraṃ dadyādvalavipattitaḥ // GarP_2,25.4 //
analyzed: param ca pāyasam kṣīram dadyāt vala vipattitaḥ
ekādaśa aham dvādaśa aham vṛṣam vṛṣa vidhim vinā
mahā dāna vihīnam ca kumāre kṛtyam ādiśet
kumārāṇām ca eva bālānām bhojanam vastra veṣṭanam

original: bāle vā taruṇe vṛddhe ghaṭo bhavati vai mṛte // GarP_2,25.6 //
analyzed: bāle vā taruṇe vṛddhe ghaṭaḥ bhavati vai mṛte
bhūmau kṣipet bālam dvi māsa ūnam dvi vārṣikam

original: tataḥ paraṃ khagaśreṣṭha dehadāho vidhoyate // GarP_2,25.7 //
analyzed: tatas param khaga śreṣṭha deha dāhaḥ vidhoyate
śiśuḥ ā danta jananāt bālaḥ syāt yāvat āśikham
kathyate sarva śāstreṣu kumāraḥ mauñjibandhanāt
śūdra ādīnām katham kuryāt saṃśayaḥ mauñji varjanāt
garbhāt ca navamam hitvā śiśurām āsa ṣoḍaśam
bālaḥ ca atha ā māsa saptaviṃśati

original: ā pañca varṣātkaumāraḥ paugaṇḍo navahāṃyanaḥ // GarP_2,25.10 //
analyzed: ā pañca varṣāt kaumāraḥ paugaṇḍaḥ nava hāṃyanaḥ
kiśoraḥ ṣoḍaśa abdaḥ syāt tatas yauvanam ādiśet

original: mṛto 'pi pañcame varṣe avṛtaḥ savṛto 'pi vā // GarP_2,25.11 //
analyzed: mṛtaḥ u pi pañcame varṣe a vṛtaḥ sa vṛtaḥ u pi vā
pūrva uktam eva kartavyam īhate daśa piṇḍakam
su alpa karma prasaṅgāt ca su alpāt viṣaya bandhanāt
su alṣāt vapuṣi vastrāt ca kriyām su alpām api icchati
yāvat upacayaḥ jantuḥ yāvat viṣaya veṣṭitaḥ
yat yat yasya upajīvyam syāt tat tat deyam iha icchati

original: brahmabījodbhavāḥ putrā devarṣoṇāṃ ca vallabhāḥ // GarP_2,25.14 //
analyzed: brahma bīja udbhavāḥ putrāḥ deva ṛṣoṇām ca vallabhāḥ
yamena yama dūtaiḥ ca śāsyante niścitam khaga

original: bālo vṛddho yubā vāpi ghaṭamicchanti dehinaḥ // GarP_2,25.15 //
analyzed: bālaḥ vṛddhaḥ vā api ghaṭam icchanti dehinaḥ

original: sukhaṃ duḥ khaṃ sadā vetti dehī vai sarvagastviha /
analyzed: sukham duḥ kham sadā vetti dehī vai sarva gaḥ tu iha
parityajya tad ātmānam jīrṇām tvacam iva uragaḥ
aṅguṣṭha mātraḥ puruṣaḥ vāyu bhṛtaḥ kṣudhā anvitaḥ

original: tasmāddeyāni dānāni mṛte bāle suniścitam // GarP_2,25.17 //
analyzed: tasmāt deyāni dānāni mṛte bāle su niścitam
janmataḥ pañca varṣāṇi bhuṅkte dattam asaṃskṛtam
pañca varṣa adhike bāle vipattiḥ yadi jāyate
vṛṣotsarga ādikam karma sapiṇḍīkaraṇam vinā

original: dvādaśe hani samprāpte kuryācchrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa // GarP_2,25.19 //
analyzed: dvādaśe hani samprāpte kuryāt śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa
pāyasena guḍena api piṇḍān dadyāt yathākramam
uda kumbha pradānam ca pade upa
dānāni yāni ca
bhojanāni dvije dadyāt mahā dāna ādi śaktitaḥ
dīpa dāna ādi yat kiñcid pañca varṣa adhike sadā
kartavyam ca khaga śreṣṭha vratāt prāk preta tṛptaye

original: yadā nakriyate sarvaṃ mudgalatvaṃ sa gacchati // GarP_2,25.22 //
analyzed: yadā na kriyate sarvam mudgala tvam sa gacchati

original: vratātprāṅgeva deyaṃ tu tataḥ pitṛgaṇasya ca /
analyzed: vratāt prāṅk eva deyam tu tatas pitṛ gaṇasya ca
svāhākāreṇa vai kuryāt ekoddiṣṭāni ṣoḍaśa
ṛju darbhaiḥ tilaiḥ śuklaiḥ prācīnāvītī niścitam

original: apasavyaṃ ca kartavyaṃ kṛte yānti parāṃ gatim // GarP_2,25.24 //
analyzed: apasavyam ca kartavyam kṛte yānti parām gatim
punar cira āyuṣaḥ bhūtvā jāyante sva kule dhruvam
sarva saukhya pradaḥ putraḥ pitroḥ prīti vivardhanaḥ
ākāśam ekam hi yathā candra ādityau yathā ekatas

original: ghaṭādiṣu pṛthak sarvaṃ paśya rūpaṃ ca tatsamam // GarP_2,25.26 //
analyzed: ghaṭa ādiṣu pṛthak sarvam paśya rūpam ca tad samam
ātmā tathā eva sarveṣu puttreṣu vicaret sadā

original: yā yasya prakṛtiḥ pūrvaṃ śukraśoṇitasaṅgame // GarP_2,25.27 //
analyzed: yā yasya prakṛtiḥ pūrvam śukra śoṇita saṅgame
sā sa tena bhāva yogena puttrāḥ tad karma kāriṇaḥ
pitṛ rūpam samādāya kasyacid jāyate sutaḥ
pitṛtaḥ rūpa āḍhyaḥ guṇa jñaḥ dāna tatparaḥ

original: sadṛśaḥ ko 'pi loke 'sminna bhūto na bhaviṣyati // GarP_2,25.29 //
analyzed: sadṛśaḥ kaḥ api loke smin na bhūtaḥ na bhaviṣyati

original: andhādandho na bhavati mūkānmūko na jāyate /
analyzed: andhāt andhaḥ na bhavati mūkāt mūkaḥ na jāyate
badhirāt badhiraḥ na eva vidyāvān viduṣaḥ na hi

original: anurūpā na dṛśyante madīyaṃ vacanaṃ śṛṇu // GarP_2,25.30 //
analyzed: anurūpāḥ na dṛśyante madīyam vacanam śṛṇu
garuḍaḥ uvāca
aurasa kṣetraja ādyāḥ ca puttrāḥ daśavidhāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: saṃgṛhītaḥ suto yastu dāsīputtraśca tena kim // GarP_2,25.31 //
analyzed: saṃgṛhītaḥ sutaḥ yaḥ tu dāsī puttraḥ ca tena kim
kāṅkām gatim avāpnoti jāyaḥ mṛtyu vaśam gataḥ

original: bhavenna duhitā yasya na dauhitro na vā sutaḥ // GarP_2,25.32 //
analyzed: bhavet na duhitā yasya na dauhitraḥ na vā sutaḥ

original: śrāddhaṃ tasya kathaṃ kāryaṃ vidhinā kena tadbhavet /
analyzed: śrāddham tasya katham kāryam vidhinā kena tat bhavet
śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: mukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu putrasya mucyate paitṛkādṛṇāt // GarP_2,25.33 //
analyzed: mukham dṛṣṭvā tu putrasya mucyate paitṛkāt ṛṇāt
pauttrasya darśanāt jantuḥ mucyate caḥ ṛṇa trayāt

original: lokānantyaṃ divaḥ prāptiḥ puttrapauttra prapauttrakaiḥ // GarP_2,25.34 //
analyzed: loka ānantyam divaḥ prāptiḥ puttra pauttra prapauttrakaiḥ
anya kṣetra udbhava ādyāḥ ye bhukti mātra pradāḥ sutāḥ
kurvīta pārvaṇam śrāddham āraisaḥ vidhivat sutaḥ

original: kurvantyanye sutāḥ śrāddhame koddiṣṭaṃ na pārvaṇam /
analyzed: kurvanti anye sutāḥ śrāddham e koddiṣṭam na pārvaṇam
brāhma ūḍhā jastu unnayati saṃgṛhītaḥ tu adhas nayet

original: śrāddhaṃ sāṃvatsaraṃ kurvañjāyate narakāya vai // GarP_2,25.36 //
analyzed: śrāddham sāṃvatsaram kurvan jāyate narakāya vai
sarva dānāni deyāni hi anna dānāt ṛte khaga

original: saṃgṛhītaḥ sutaḥ kuryādekoddiṣṭaṃ na pārvaṇam // GarP_2,25.37 //
analyzed: saṃgṛhītaḥ sutaḥ kuryāt ekoddiṣṭam na pārvaṇam

original: pratyabdaṃ pitṛmātṛbhyāṃ śrāddhaṃ dattvā na lipyate /
analyzed: pratyabdam pitṛ mātṛbhyām śrāddham dattvā na lipyate

original: ekoddiṣṭaṃ parityajya pārvaṇaṃ kurute yadi // GarP_2,25.38 //
analyzed: ekoddiṣṭam parityajya pārvaṇam kurute yadi
ātmānam ca pitṝn ca eva sa nayet yama mandiram
saṃgṛhītaḥ tu yaḥ kecid dāsī puttra ādayaḥ ca ye
tīrthe kuryuḥ pitṛ śrāddham dānam māsam
dadyuḥ dvijanmane

original: saṃgṛhītasuto bhūtvā pākaṃ vā yaḥ prayacchati // GarP_2,25.40 //
analyzed: saṃgṛhīta sutaḥ bhūtvā pākam vā yaḥ prayacchati
vṛthā śrāddham vijānīyāt śūdra annena yathā dvijaḥ
na prīṇayati tat śrāddham pitāmaha mukhān pitṝn
evam jñātvā svaga śreṣṭha hīna jātīn sutān tyajet
brāhmaṇyām brāhmaṇāt jātaḥ cāṇḍālāt adhamaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: yastu pravrajitājjāto brāhmaṇyāṃ śūdrataśca yaḥ // GarP_2,25.42 //
analyzed: yaḥ tu pravrajitāt jātaḥ brāhmaṇyām śūdrataḥ ca yaḥ
dvau etau viddhi cāṇḍālau sagotrāt yaḥ tu jāyate
svaryāti vihitān putraḥ samutpādya khageśvara

original: taiḥ suvṛttaiḥ sukhaṃ prāpyaṃ kuvṛttairnarakaṃ vrajet /
analyzed: taiḥ su vṛttaiḥ sukham prāpyam ku vṛttaiḥ narakam vrajet
hīna jāti samudbhūtaiḥ su vṛttaiḥ sukham edhate
kali kaluṣa vimuktaḥ pūjitaḥ siddha saṅghaiḥ amara camara mālā vījyamānaḥ psarobhiḥ
pitṛ śatam api bandhūn puttra pauttra prapauttrān api naraka nimagnān uddharet ekaḥ eva

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dhamakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasavāde mṛtabālāntyeṣṭibhinnābhinnasutakṛtāntyeṣṭyorvarṇanaṃ  #
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dhama kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa savāde mṛta bāla antyeṣṭi bhinna abhinna suta kṛta antyeṣṭyoḥ varṇanam
nāma pañcaviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
garuḍaḥ uvāca

original: satyaṃ brūhi suraśreṣṭha kṛpāṃ kṛtvā mayi prabho /
analyzed: satyam brūhi suraśreṣṭha kṛpām kṛtvā mayi prabho

original: mṛtānāṃ caiva jantūnāṃ kadā kuryātsapiṇḍanam // GarP_2,26.1 //
analyzed: mṛtānām ca eva jantūnām kadā kuryāt sapiṇḍanam

original: sapiṇḍatve kuto yānti asapiṇḍe kuto gatiḥ /
analyzed: sapiṇḍa tve kutas yānti asapiṇḍe kutas gatiḥ
kena eva sahapiṇḍatvam strī pusoḥ vaktum arhasi
strī pumāṃśau saha eka tvam pāpnutaḥ katham uttamam
jīvet bhartari nārīṇām sapiṇḍīkaraṇam kutas
bhartṛ lokam katham yānti svarga lokam sureśvara

original: agnyārohe kathaṃ śrāddhaṃ vṛṣotsargaḥ kathaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,26.4 //
analyzed: agnyārohe katham śrāddham vṛṣotsargaḥ katham bhavet
ghaṭa dānam katham kāryam sapiṇḍīkaraṇe kṛte

original: kathayasva prasādena hītāya jagatāṃ prabho // GarP_2,26.5 //
analyzed: kathayasva prasādena hītāya jagatām prabho
śrī bhagavān uvāca
yathāvat kathayiṣyāmi sapiṇḍīkaraṇam khaga
varṣam yāvat khaga śreṣṭha yat ācarati mānavaḥ

original: sapiṇḍane tato vṛtte pitṛlokaṃ sa gacchati /
analyzed: sapiṇḍane tatas vṛtte pitṛ lokam sa gacchati
tasmāt puttreṇa kartavyam sapiṇḍīkaraṇam pituḥ
saṃvatsare tu sampūrṇe kuryāt piṇḍa praveśanam
piṇḍapraveśa vidhanā tasya nityam mṛta āhnikam
niścitam pakṣi śārdūla varṣa ante piṇḍa melanam

original: sahapiṇḍe kṛte pretastato yāti parāṃ gatim /
analyzed: saha piṇḍe kṛte pretaḥ tatas yāti parām gatim

original: tannāma samparityajya tataḥ pitṛgaṇo bhavet // GarP_2,26.9 //
analyzed: tad nāma samparityajya tatas pitṛ gaṇaḥ bhavet
tri pakṣe vā api ṣaṣ māse melayet prapitāmahaiḥ
jñātvā vṛddhi vivāha ādi sva gotra vihitāni ca

original: vivāhaṃ naiva kurvīta mṛte ca gṛhamedhini /
analyzed: vivāham na eva kurvīta mṛte ca gṛhamedhini
bhikṣuḥ bhikṣām na gṛhṇāti yāvat kuryāt sapiṇḍanam
sva gotre pi aśuciḥ tāvat yāvat piṇḍam na melayet
melanāt preta śabdaḥ tu nivarteta khageśvara
ānantyāt kula dharmāṇām puṃsām ca eva āyuṣaḥ kṣayāt
asthira tvāt śarīrasya dvādaśa ahaḥ praśasyate

original: niragnikaḥ sāgniko vā dvādaśāhe sapiṇḍayet // GarP_2,26.14 //
analyzed: niragnikaḥ sa agnikaḥ vā dvādaśa ahe sapiṇḍayet

original: dvādaśāhe tripakṣe vā ṣaṇmāse vatsare 'pi vā /
analyzed: dvādaśa ahe tri pakṣe vā ṣaṣ māse vatsare vā
sapiṇḍīkaraṇam proktam ṛṣibhiḥ tattva darśibhiḥ
sa puttrasya na kartavyam ekoddiṣṭam kadācana
sapiṇḍīkaraṇāt ūrdhvam yatra yatra pradīyate
tatra tatra trayam kāryam anyathā pitṛ ghātakaḥ
tribhiḥ kuryāt aśaktaḥ ca pārvaṇam muninā uditam
tad dine tad dine kuryāt pitāmaha mukhāni atas
ajñānāt dina māsānām tasmāt pārvaṇam iṣyate
an utpanna śarīrasya na dānam pitṛbhiḥ saha

original: etaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ śrāddhaiḥ preto muktastu jāyate // GarP_2,26.19 //
analyzed: etaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ śrāddhaiḥ pretaḥ muktaḥ tu jāyate
aputtrasya sapiṇḍa tvam na eva kuryāt striyāḥ vā

original: yāvajjīva ca sadbhatryā na kuryātsahapiṇḍatām // GarP_2,26.20 //
analyzed: yāvat jīva ca na kuryāt sahapiṇḍatām
brāhma ādiṣu vivāheṣu yā vadhūḥ iha saṃskṛtā
bhartṛ gotreṇa kartavyāḥ tasyāḥ piṇḍa udaka kriyāḥ

original: āsurādivivā heṣu yā vyūḍhā kanyakā bhavet /
analyzed: yā vyūḍhā kanyakā bhavet
tasyāḥ tu pitṛ gotreṇa kuryāt piṇḍa udaka kriyāḥ
pituḥ puttreṇa kartavyam sapiṇḍīkaraṇam sadā

original: puttrābhāve tu patnī syātpatnyabhāve sahodaraḥ // GarP_2,26.23 //
analyzed: puttra abhāve tu patnī syāt patnī abhāve sahodaraḥ

original: bhrātā vā bhrātṛputtro vā sapiṇḍaḥ śiṣya eva vā /
analyzed: bhrātā vā bhrātṛ puttraḥ vā sapiṇḍaḥ śiṣyaḥ eva vā
sapiṇḍana kriyām kṛtvā kuryāt nāndīmukham tatas
jyeṣṭhasya eva kaniṣṭhena bhrātṛ puttreṇa bhāryayā

original: sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kāryaṃ putrahīne nare khaga // GarP_2,26.25 //
analyzed: sapiṇḍīkaraṇam kāryam putra hīne nare khaga
bhrātṝṇām ekajātānām ekaḥ ced putravān bhavet

original: sarvete tena putreṇa putriṇo manurabravīt // GarP_2,26.26 //
analyzed: sarvete tena putreṇa putriṇaḥ manuḥ abravīt
sarveṣām putra hīnānām patnī kuryāt sapiṇḍanam
ṛtvijā kārayet vā api purohitam atha api vā
kṛta cūḍā upanītaḥ ca pituḥ śrāddham samācaret
uccārayet svadhākāram na tu veda akṣarāṇi asau
bhartṛ ādibhiḥ tribhiḥ kāryam sapiṇḍīkaraṇam striyāḥ
pitṛvya bhrātṛ putreṇa sodareṇa kanīyasā
arvāk saṃvatsarāt sandhau pūrṇe saṃvatsare vā

original: ye sapiṇḍīkṛtāḥ pretāsteṣāṃ na syātpṛthak kriyā // GarP_2,26.30 //
analyzed: ye sapiṇḍīkṛtāḥ pretāḥ teṣām na syāt pṛthak kriyā

original: sapiṇḍane kṛte vatsa pṛthaktvaṃ tu vigarhitam /
analyzed: sapiṇḍane kṛte vatsa pṛthaktvam tu vigarhitam

original: yastu kuryātpṛthak piṇḍaṃ pitṛhā so 'bhijāyate // GarP_2,26.31 //
analyzed: yaḥ tu kuryāt pṛthak piṇḍam pitṛ hā saḥ abhijāyate
sapiṇḍīkaraṇe vṛtte pṛthaktvam na upapadyate

original: pṛthak piṇḍe kṛte paścātpunaḥ kuryātsapiṇḍanam // GarP_2,26.32 //
analyzed: pṛthak piṇḍe kṛte paścāt punar kuryāt sapiṇḍanam
sapiṇḍīkaraṇam kṛtvā ekoddiṣṭam karoti yaḥ

original: ātmānaṃ ca tathā pretaṃ sa nayeddamaśāsanam // GarP_2,26.33 //
analyzed: ātmānam ca tathā pretam sa nayet dama śāsanam
varṣam yāvaktriyā kāryā nāma gotreṇa dhīmatā

original: ghaṭādi bhojanaṃ nityaṃ padadānāni yāni ca /
analyzed: ghaṭa ādi bhojanam nityam pada dānāni yāni ca

original: sapiṇḍīkaraṇe vṛtte ekasyaiva tu dāpayet // GarP_2,26.34 //
analyzed: sapiṇḍīkaraṇe vṛtte ekasya eva tu dāpayet
annam pānīya sahitam saṃkhyām kṛtvā ābdikasya ca
dātavyam brāhmaṇe pakṣin jala pūrṇa ghaṭa ādikam
piṇḍa ante tasya sakalā varṣa vṛttiḥ sva śaktitaḥ

original: divyadeho vimānasthaḥ sukhaṃ yāti yamālayam // GarP_2,26.36 //
analyzed: divya dehaḥ vimāna sthaḥ sukham yāti yama ālayam

original: jīvamāne ca pitari na hi puttre sapiṇḍatā /
analyzed: jīvamāne ca pitari na hi puttre sapiṇḍa tā

original: strīṇāṃ sapiṇḍanaṃ nāsti tathā bhartari jīvati // GarP_2,26.37 //
analyzed: strīṇām sapiṇḍanam na asti tathā bhartari jīvati
hutāśam yā samārūḍhā caturthe hni pativratā

original: tasyā bhartṛdine kāryaṃ vṛṣotsargādikaṃ ca yat // GarP_2,26.38 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ bhartṛ dine kāryam vṛṣotsarga ādikam ca yat
puttrikā pati gotrā syāt adhastāt putra janmanaḥ
putra utpatteḥ parastāt sā pitṛ gotram vrajet punar
pati patnyoḥ sadā eka tvam hutāśam yā adhirohati

original: putreṇaiva pṛthak śrāddhaṃ kṣayākhye tasya vāsare // GarP_2,26.40 //
analyzed: putreṇa eva pṛthak śrāddham kṣaya ākhye tasya vāsare
aputtrau ced mṛtau syātām ekacityām same hani

original: pṛthak śrāddhāni kurvīta sāpiḍyaṃ patinā saha // GarP_2,26.41 //
analyzed: pṛthak śrāddhāni kurvīta sāpiḍyam patinā saha

original: pṛthakpṛthak ca piṇḍena dampatī patinā saha /
analyzed: pṛthak pṛthak ca piṇḍena dampatī patinā saha

original: na lipyate mahādoṣairetatsatyaṃ vaco mama // GarP_2,26.42 //
analyzed: na lipyate mahā doṣaiḥ etat satyam vacaḥ mama
ekacityām samārūḍhau dampatī nidhanam gatau
eka pākam prakurvīta piṇḍān dadyāt pṛthak pṛthak
ekādaśe vṛṣotsargam preta śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa
ghaṭa ādi pada dānāni mahādānāni yāni ca
varṣam yāvat pṛthakkuryāt pretaḥ tṛptim vrajet ciram

original: ekagotre mṛtānāṃ tu striyā vā puruṣasya vā /
analyzed: eka gotre mṛtānām tu striyāḥ vā puruṣasya vā
sthaṇḍilam ca ekatas kuryāt homam kuryāt pṛthak pṛthak
ekādaśe hni yat śrāddham pṛthak piṇḍāḥ ca bhojanam
pākaiḥ ena pati strīṇām anyeṣām ca vigarhitam

original: ekenaiva tu pākena śrāddhāni kurute sutaḥ /
analyzed: ekena eva tu pākena śrāddhāni kurute sutaḥ
ekam tu vikiram kuryāt piṇḍān dadyat bahūn api

original: tīrthe cāparapakṣe vā candrasūryagrahe 'pi vā // GarP_2,26.47 //
analyzed: tīrthe ca aparapakṣe vā candra sūrya grahe vā
nārī bhartāram āsādya kuṇapam dahate yadā

original: agnirdahati gātrāṇi ātmānaṃ naiva pīḍayet // GarP_2,26.48 //
analyzed: agniḥ dahati gātrāṇi ātmānam na eva pīḍayet

original: dahyate dhmāyamānānāṃ dhātūnāṃ hi yathā malam /
analyzed: dahyate dhmāyamānānām dhātūnām hi yathā malam

original: tathā nārī daheddehaṃ hutāśe hyamṛtopame // GarP_2,26.49 //
analyzed: tathā nārī dahet deham hutāśe hi amṛta upame
divya ādau divya dehaḥ tu śuddhaḥ bhavati pūruṣaḥ

original: taptatailena lohena vahninā naiva dahyate // GarP_2,26.50 //
analyzed: tapta tailena lohena vahninā nā eva dahyate

original: tathā sā patisaṃyuktā dahyate na kadācana /
analyzed: tathā sā pati saṃyuktā dahyate na kadācana
antarātmā mṛte tasmin mṛtaḥ pi ekatvam āgataḥ
bhartṛ saṃgam parityajya anyatra mriyate yadi

original: bhartṛlokaṃ na sā yāti yāvadābhūtasaṃplavam // GarP_2,26.52 //
analyzed: bhartṛ lokam na sā yāti yāvat ābhūtasaṃplavam
lakṣmī yutān parityajya mātaram pitaram tathā

original: mṛtaṃ patimanuvrajya sā ciraṃ sukhamedhate // GarP_2,26.53 //
analyzed: mṛtam patim anuvrajya sā ciram sukham edhate
divya varṣa pramāṇena tisraḥ koṭyā ūrddha koṭayaḥ

original: tāvatkālaṃ vasetsvarge nakṣatraiḥ saha sarvadā // GarP_2,26.54 //
analyzed: tāvatkālam vaset svarge nakṣatraiḥ saha sarvadā

original: tadante carate loke kule bhavati bhoginām /
analyzed: tad ante carate loke kule bhavati bhoginām

original: sā hi labdhamahāprītirbhartrā saha pativratā // GarP_2,26.55 //
analyzed: sā hi labdha mahā prītiḥ bhartrā saha pativratā

original: evaṃ na kurute nārī dharmoḍhā patisaṃgamam /
analyzed: evam na kurute nārī dharma ūḍhā pati saṃgamam
janma janmani dus kha ārta a dus śīla apriya vādinī

original: valgulī gṛhasodhā vā godhā vā dvimukhī bhavet /
analyzed: valgulī gṛhasodhā vā godhā vā dvi mukhī bhavet
sva bhartāram parityajya para puṃsaḥ anuvartinī
tasmāt sarva prayatnena sva patim strī niṣevate

original: manasā karmaṇā vācā mṛtaṃ jīvantameva vā // GarP_2,26.58 //
analyzed: manasā karmaṇā vācā mṛtam jīvantam eva vā

original: jīvamāne mṛte vāpi kilbiṣaṃ kurute tu yā /
analyzed: jīvamāne mṛte vā api kilbiṣam kurute tu yā

original: sa ca vaidhavyamāpnoti janmajanmani durbhagā // GarP_2,26.59 //
analyzed: sa ca vaidhavyam āpnoti janma janmani durbhagā
yat devebhyaḥ yat pitṛbhyaḥ śraddhayā eva pradīyate
tad phalam bhartṛ pūjātaḥ kuryāt bhartṛ arcanam tatas

original: evaṃ kṛte khagaśreṣṭha pitṛloke ciraṃ vaset /
analyzed: evam kṛte khaga śreṣṭha pitṛ loke ciram vaset
yāvat āditya candrau ca tāvat deva samāḥ divi
punar cira āyuṣaḥ jāyante vipule kule

original: pativratā yathā nārī bhartṛduḥkhaṃ na vindati // GarP_2,26.62 //
analyzed: pativratā yathā nārī bhartṛ duḥkham na vindati
sarvam etat hi kathitam mayā tava khageśvara
viśeṣam kathayiṣyāmi mṛtasya eva sukha pradam
dvādaśa ahe kṛtam sarvam varṣam yāvat sapiṇḍanam

original: punaḥ kuryātsadā nityaṃ ghaṭānnaṃ pratimāsikam // GarP_2,26.64 //
analyzed: punar kuryāt sadā nityam ghaṭānnam pratimāsikam
kṛtasya karaṇam nā asti pretakāryāt ṛte khaga

original: yaḥ karoti naraḥ kaścitkṛt pūrvaṃ vinaśyati // GarP_2,26.65 //
analyzed: yaḥ karoti naraḥ kaścit kṛt pūrvam vinaśyati
mṛtasya eva punar kuryāt preto kṣayyam avāpnuyāt

original: pratimāsaṃ ghaṭā deyā sodanā jalapūritāḥ // GarP_2,26.66 //
analyzed: pratimāsam ghaṭā deyā sodanāḥ jala pūritāḥ

original: arvākca vṛddheḥ karaṇācca tārkṣya sapiṇḍanaṃ yaḥ kurute hi putraḥ /
analyzed: arvāk ca vṛddheḥ karaṇāt ca tārkṣya sapiṇḍanam yaḥ kurute hi putraḥ

original: tathāpi māsaṃ pratipiṇḍamekamannaṃ ca kumbhaṃ sajalaṃ ca dadyāt // GarP_2,26.67 //
analyzed: tathā api māsam pratipiṇḍam ekam annam ca kumbham sa jalam ca dadyāt

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍedvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde pretakalpe sapiṇḍananirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaḍviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharmakāṇḍe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde pretakalpe sapiṇḍananirūpaṇam nāma ṣaḍviṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
tārkṣyaḥ uvāca

original: kathaṃ pretā vasantyatra kīdṛgrūpā bhavanti te /
analyzed: katham pretāḥ vasanti atra kīdṛś rūpāḥ bhavanti te
mahā pretāḥ piśācāḥ ca kaiḥ kaiḥ karma phalaiḥ vibho
sarveṣām anukampā artham brūhi me madhusūdana

original: pretatvānmucyate yena dānena ca śubhe na ca /
analyzed: preta tvāt mucyate yena dānena ca śubhe na ca

original: tanme kathaya deveśa mama cedicchasi priyam // GarP_2,27.2 //
analyzed: tat me kathaya deveśa mama ced icchasi priyam
śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā tārkṣya mānuṣāṇāṃ hitāya vai /
analyzed: sādhu pṛṣṭam tvayā tārkṣya mānuṣāṇām hitāya vai
śṛṇuca avahitaḥ bhūtvā yat vacmi preta lakṣaṇam
guhyat guhyataram hi etat na ākhyeyam yasya kasyacid

original: bhaktastvaṃ hi mahābāho tena te kathayāmyaham // GarP_2,27.4 //
analyzed: bhaktaḥ tvam hi mahā bāho tena te kathayāmi aham
purā tretā yuge tāta rājā āsīt babhruvāhanaḥ
mahodaya pure ramye dharma niṣṭhaḥ mahā balaḥ
yajvā dānapatiḥ śrīmān brahmaṇyaḥ sādhu saṃmataḥ
śīla ācāra guṇa upetaḥ dayā dākṣiṇya saṃyutaḥ
prajāḥ pālayate nityam putrān iva mahā balaḥ
kṣattra dharma rataḥ nityam sa daṇḍyān daṇḍayan nṛpaḥ
sa kadācid mahā bāhuḥ sa sainyaḥ mṛgayām gataḥ
vanam viveśa gahanam nānā vṛkṣa samanvitam
śārdūla śata saṃjuṣṭam nānā pakṣi nināditam

original: vanamadhye tadā rājā mṛgaṃ dūrādapaśyata // GarP_2,27.9 //
analyzed: vana madhye tadā rājā mṛgam dūrāt apaśyata

original: tena viddho mṛgo 'tīva bāṇena sudṛḍhena ca /
analyzed: tena viddhaḥ mṛgaḥ tīva bāṇena su dṛḍhena ca

original: bāṇamādāya taṃ tasya sa vane 'darśanaṃ yayau // GarP_2,27.10 //
analyzed: bāṇam ādāya tam tasya sa vane darśanam yayau
kakṣe tad śoṇitaḥ trāvāt sa rājā anujagāma tam
tatas mṛga prasaṅgena vanam anyat viveśa saḥ
kṣudh kṣāma kaṇṭhaḥ nṛpatiḥ śrama santāpa mūrchitaḥ
jala sthānam samāsādya sa aśvaḥ eva avagāhata
pītvā tat u dakam śītam padma gandha adhivāsitam
tatas uttīrya salilāt vimalāt babhruvāhanaḥ
nyagrodha vṛkṣam āsādya śīta chāyam manoharam
mahā viṭapinam hṛdyam pakṣi saṅghāta nāditam
vanasya tasya sarvasya ketu bhūtam iva ucchritam
tam mahā tarum āsādya niṣasāda mahīpatiḥ
atha pretam dadarśa asau kṣudh tṛṣṇā vyākula indriyam
utkacam malinam kubjam rūkṣam
nirmāṃsam bhīma darśanam
snāyu baddha asthi caraṇam dhāvamānam itas tatas
anyaiḥ ca bahubhiḥ pretaiḥ samantāt parivāritam

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā vikṛtaṃ ghoraṃ vismito babhruvāhanaḥ /
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā vikṛtam ghoram vismitaḥ babhruvāhanaḥ

original: preto 'pi dṛṣṭvā tāṃ ghorāmaṭavīmāgataṃ nṛpam // GarP_2,27.18 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tām ghorām aṭavīm āgatam nṛpam
tadā hṛṣṭa manāḥ bhūtvā tasya antikam upāgataḥ

original: abravītsa tadā tārkṣya pretarājo nṛpaṃ vacaḥ // GarP_2,27.19 //
analyzed: abravīt sa tadā tārkṣya pretarājaḥ nṛpam vacaḥ

original: pretabhāvo mayā tyaktaḥ prāpto 'smi paramāṃ gatim /
analyzed: preta bhāvaḥ mayā tyaktaḥ prāptaḥ smi paramām gatim
tvad saṃyogāt mahā bāho na asti dhanyataraḥ mama
nṛpatiḥ uvāca
kṛṣṇa varṇaḥ karāla āsyaḥ tvam pretaḥ iva lakṣyase

original: kathayasva mama prītyā yathaivaṃ cāsi tattvataḥ // GarP_2,27.21 //
analyzed: kathayasva mama prītyā yathā evam ca asi tattvataḥ

original: tathā pṛṣṭaḥ sa vai rājñā provāca sakalaṃ svakam // GarP_2,27.22 //
analyzed: tathā pṛṣṭaḥ sa vai rājñā provāca sakalam svakam
pretaḥ uvāca
kathayāmi nṛpa śreṣṭha sarvam evā āditas tava

original: pretatve kāraṇaṃ śrutvā dayāṃ kartuṃ mamārhasi // GarP_2,27.23 //
analyzed: preta tve kāraṇam śrutvā dayām kartum mama arhasi
vaidiśam nāma nagaram sarva sampad samanvitam
nānā janapada ākīrṇam nānā ratna samākulam
nānā puṇya samāyuktam nānā vṛkṣa samākulam
tatra aham nyavasam bhūyas deva arcana rataḥ sadā

original: vaiśyo jātyā sudevo 'haṃ nāmnā viditamastu te // GarP_2,27.25 //
analyzed: vaiśyaḥ jātyā sudevaḥ ham nāmnā viditam astu te
havyena tarpitāḥ devāḥ kavyena pitaraḥ tathā

tat sarvam viphalam tāta mama daivāt upāgatam

original: yathā me niṣphalaṃ jātaṃ sukṛtaṃ tadvadāmi te // GarP_2,27.28 //

original: na ca mitraṃ hi me tādṛgyaḥ kuryādaurdhvadaihikam // GarP_2,27.29 //

original: pretatvaṃ susthiraṃ tena mama jātaṃ nṛpottama /

original: tāpasīṃ ca sagotrāṃ ca agamyāṃ ye bhajanti hi /

original: bhavanti te mahāpretā ambujāni haranti ye // GarP_2,27.37 //
analyzed: bhavanti te mahā pretāḥ ambujāni haranti ye

śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā bhadra mānuṣāṇāṃ hitāya vai /
analyzed: sādhu pṛṣṭam tvayā bhadra mānuṣāṇām hitāya vai
śṛṇuṣva avahitaḥ bhūtvā sarvam eva aurdhvadaihikam
kamyak vibheda rahitam śruti smṛti samuddhṛtam
yat na dṛṣṭam suraiḥ sa indraiḥ yogibhiḥ yoga cintakaiḥ
guhyāt guhyataram vatsa na ākhyātam kasyacid kvacid

original: bhaktastvaṃ hi mahābhāga sarvaṃ te kathayāmyaham // GarP_2,29.3 //
analyzed: bhaktaḥ tvam hi mahābhāga sarvam te kathayāmi aham

original: aputrasya gatirnāsti svargo naiva ca naiva ca /
analyzed: aputrasya gatiḥ nā asti svargaḥ nā eva ca nā eva ca

original: yena kenāpyupāyena kāryaṃ janma sutasya ca // GarP_2,29.4 //
analyzed: yena kena api upāyena kāryam janma sutasya ca
tārayet narakāt putraḥ yadi mokṣaḥ na vidyate

original: dāhaḥ putreṇa kartavyo deyaḥ pautreṇa pāvakaḥ // GarP_2,29.5 //
analyzed: dāhaḥ putreṇa kartavyaḥ deyaḥ pautreṇa pāvakaḥ

original: tilairdarbhaiśca bhūmyāṃ vai kuṭī dhātumatī bhavet /
analyzed: tilaiḥ darbhaiḥ ca bhūmyām vai kuṭī dhātumatī bhavet

original: pañcaratnāni vaktre tu yena jīvaḥ prarohati // GarP_2,29.6 //
analyzed: pañcaratnāni vaktre tu yena jīvaḥ prarohati
lipyāt tu gomayaiḥ bhūmim tilān darbhān ca niḥ kṣipet

original: tasyāmevāturo muktaḥ sarvaṃ dahati pātakam // GarP_2,29.7 //
analyzed: tasyām eva āturaḥ muktaḥ sarvam dahati pātakam
darbha mūlī nayet svargam saṃsthitam na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: darbhāṃstatra hi ye bhūmyāṃ tilayuktāna saṃśayaḥ // GarP_2,29.8 //
analyzed: darbhān tatra hi ye bhūmyām tila yuktān saṃśayaḥ

original: sarvatra vasudhā pūtā yatra lepo na vidyate /
analyzed: sarvatra vasudhā pūtā yatra lepaḥ na vidyate

original: yatra lepaḥ sthitastatra punarlepena śudhyati // GarP_2,29.9 //
analyzed: yatra lepaḥ sthitaḥ tatra punar lepena śudhyati
yātudhānāḥ piśācāḥ ca rākṣasāḥ krūra karmiṇaḥ

original: alipte āturaṃ muktaṃ viśantyete na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_2,29.10 //
analyzed: alipte āturam muktam viśanti ete na saṃśayaḥ
nitya homam tathā śrāddham viprāṇām pāda śodhanam

original: maṇḍalena vinā bhūmyāṃ kurvantyetacca niṣphalam // GarP_2,29.11 //
analyzed: maṇḍalena vinā bhūmyām kurvanti etat ca niṣphalam

original: āturo mucyate naiva maṇḍalena vinā bhuvi /
analyzed: āturaḥ mucyate nā eva maṇḍalena vinā bhuvi

original: brahmā rudraśca viṣṇuśca śrīrhutāśana eva ca /
analyzed: brahmā rudraḥ ca viṣṇuḥ ca śrīḥ hutāśanaḥ eva ca
maṇḍale ca upatiṣṭhantaḥ tasmāt kurvīta maṇḍalam

original: anyathā mriyate yastu bālo vṛddho yuvāpi vā /
analyzed: anyathā mriyate yaḥ tu bālaḥ vṛddhaḥ yuvā api vā

original: yonyantaraṃ sa vai gacchetkrīḍate vāyunā saha // GarP_2,29.13 //
analyzed: yoni antaram sa vai gacchet krīḍate vāyunā saha

original: miśritaṃ lohatāmraṃ tu tathaiva janma jāyate /
analyzed: miśritam loha tāmram tu tathā eva janma jāyate

original: tasmaivaṃ vāyubhūtasya na śrāddhaṃ nodaka kriyā // GarP_2,29.14 //
analyzed: vāyu bhūtasya na śrāddham na udaka kriyā
mama sveda samudbhūtāḥ tilāḥ tārkṣya pavitrakāḥ
asurāḥ dānavāḥ daityāḥ tṛpyanti tila dānataḥ
tilāḥ śvetāḥ tilāḥ kṛṣṇāḥ tilāḥ go mūtra sannibhāḥ

original: te me dahantu pāṣāni śarīreṇa kṛtāni ca // GarP_2,29.16 //
analyzed: te me dahantu pāṣāni śarīreṇa kṛtāni ca
ekaḥ eva tila droṇaḥ hema droṇa tilaiḥ samaḥ

original: tarpaṇe dānahome ca datto bhavati cākṣayaḥ // GarP_2,29.17 //
analyzed: tarpaṇe dāna home ca dattaḥ bhavati ca akṣayaḥ
darbhāḥ mad loma sambhūtāḥ tilāḥ sveda samudbhavāḥ
tṛptāḥ syuḥ devatāḥ dānaiḥ śrāddhena pitaraḥ tathā
prayoga vidhinā brahmā
savya yajñopavītena brahma ādyāḥ tṛptimān puyuḥ
apasavyena tṛpyanti pitaraḥ dividevatāḥ
apasavya āditas brahmā darbha madhye tu keśavaḥ

original: darbhāgre śaṅkaraṃ vidyāttrayo devāḥ kuśe sthitāḥ // GarP_2,29.20 //
analyzed: darbha agre śaṅkaram vidyāt trayaḥ devāḥ kuśe sthitāḥ

original: viprā mantrāḥ kuśā vahnistulasī ca khageśvara /
analyzed: viprāḥ mantrāḥ kuśāḥ vahniḥ tulasī ca khageśvara

original: naite nirmālyatāṃ yānti kriyamāṇāḥ punaḥ punaḥ // GarP_2,29.21 //
analyzed: na ete nirmālya tām yānti kriyamāṇāḥ punar punar
kuśāḥ piṇḍeṣu nirmālyāḥ brāhmaṇāḥ pretabhojane
mantrāḥ śūdreṣu patitāḥ citāyāḥ ca hutāśanaḥ
tulasī brāhmaṇāḥ gāvaḥ viṣṇuḥ ekādaśī khaga

original: pañca pravahaṇānyeva bhavābdhau majjatāṃ satām // GarP_2,29.23 //
analyzed: pañca pravahaṇāni eva bhava abdhau majjatām satām
viṣṇuḥ ekādaśī gītā tulasī vipra dhenavaḥ
apāre durga saṃkāre ṣaṭpadī mukti dāyinī
tilāḥ pavitrāḥ trividhāḥ darbhāḥ ca tulasī dālam
nivārayanti ca etāni durgatim yāntam āturam
hastābhyām uddhṛtaiḥ darbhaiḥ toyena prokṣayet bhuvam
mṛtyu kāle kṣipet darbhān āturasya kara dvaye
darbheṣu kṣipyate yaḥ sau dabhaḥ tu pariveṣṭitaḥ

original: viṣṇulokaṃ sa vai yāti mantrahīno 'pi mānavaḥ // GarP_2,29.27 //
analyzed: viṣṇu lokam sa vai yāti mantra hīnaḥ u pi mānavaḥ
darbha mūlī gataḥ bhūmau darbha pāṇiḥ tu yaḥ mṛtaḥ
saṃsāre pāra sāgare
gomayena upalipte tu darbhasya āstaraṇe sthitaḥ

original: tatra dattena dānena sarvaṃ pāpaṃ vyapohati // GarP_2,29.29 //
analyzed: tatra dattena dānena sarvam pāpam vyapohati
lavaṇam tad rasam divyam sarva kāma pradam nṛṇām

original: yasmādannarasāḥ sarve notkaṭā lavaṇaṃ vinā // GarP_2,29.30 //
analyzed: yasmāt anna rasāḥ sarve na utkaṭāḥ lavaṇam vinā

original: pitṝṇāṃ ca priyaṃ bhavyaṃ tasmātsvargapradaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: pitṝṇām ca priyam bhavyam tasmāt svarga pradam bhavet
viṣṇu deha samudbhūtaḥ yatas yam lavaṇaḥ rasaḥ
viśeṣāt lavaṇam dānam tena śaṃsanti yoginaḥ

original: brāhmaṇa kṣattriyaviśāṃ strīṇāṃ śūdrajanasya ca // GarP_2,29.32 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇa kṣattriya viśām strīṇām śūdra janasya ca
āturāṇām yadā prāṇāḥ prayānti vasudhā tale

original: lavaṇaṃ tu tadā deyaṃ dbārasyoddhāṭanaṃ divaḥ // GarP_2,29.33 //
analyzed: lavaṇam tu tadā deyam dbārasya uddhāṭanam divaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe pretakalpe dharmakāṇḍe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe pretakalpe dharmakāṇḍe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde
aurdhvadehika karmaṇi putra darbha tila tulasī go bhū lepa tāmra pātra dāna ādīnām āvaśyaka tva nirūpaṇam
nāma ekonatriśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: śṛṇu tārkṣya paraṃ guhyaṃ dānānāṃ dānamuttamam /
analyzed: śṛṇu tārkṣya param guhyam dānānām dānam uttamam

original: paramaṃ sarvadānānāṃ paraṃ gopyaṃ divaukasām // GarP_2,30.1 //
analyzed: paramam sarva dānānām param gopyam divaukasām
deyam ekam mahādānam kārpāsam ca uttamottamam

original: yena dattena prīyante bhūrbhuvaḥ svariti kramāt // GarP_2,30.2 //
analyzed: yena dattena prīyante bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar iti kramāt
brahma ādyāḥ devatāḥ sarvāḥ kāryāt ca prītim āpnuyuḥ
deyam etat mahā dānam preta uddharaṇa hetave
ciram vaset rudra loke tatas rājā bhavet iha
rūpavān subhagaḥ vāgmī śrīmān atula vikramaḥ

original: yamalokaṃ vinirjitya svargaṃ tākṣya sa gacchati // GarP_2,30.4 //
analyzed: yama lokam vinirjitya svargam sa gacchati

original: gāṃ tilāṃśca kṣitaṃ hema yo dadāti dvijanmane /
analyzed: gām tilān ca kṣitam hema yaḥ dadāti dvijanmane
tasya pāpam tad kṣaṇāt eva naśyati
tilāḥ gāvaḥ mahā dānam mahāpātaka nāśanam

original: taddvayaṃ dīyate vipre nānyavarṇe kadācana // GarP_2,30.6 //
analyzed: tat dvayam dīyate vipre na anya varṇe kadācana
kalpitam dīyate dānam tilāḥ gāvaḥ ca medinī

original: anyeṣu naiva varṇeṣu poṣyavarge kadācana // GarP_2,30.7 //
analyzed: anyeṣu nā eva varṇeṣu poṣya varge kadācana
poṣya varge tathā strīṣu dānam deyam akalpitam

original: āture voparāge ca dvayaṃ dānaṃ viśiṣyate /
analyzed: āture vā uparāge ca dvayam dānam viśiṣyate

original: āture dīyate dānaṃ tatkāle copatiṣṭhati // GarP_2,30.8 //
analyzed: āture dīyate dānam tad kāle ca upatiṣṭhati
jīvataḥ tu punar dattam upatiṣṭhati asaṃskṛtam

original: satyaṃsatyaṃ punaḥ satyaṃ yaddattaṃ vikalendriye // GarP_2,30.9 //
analyzed: satyam satyam punar satyam yat dattam vikala indriye
yat ca anu modate putraḥ tat ca dānam anantakam

original: ato dadyāt sa putro vā yāvajjīvatsasau ciram /
analyzed: atas dadyāt sa putraḥ vā yāvat jīvat sa asau ciram

original: ativāhastathā preto bhogāṃśca labhate yataḥ // GarP_2,30.10 //
analyzed: ativāhaḥ tathā pretaḥ bhogān ca labhate yatas
asvasthā tura kāle tu dehapāte kṣiti sthite

original: dehe tathātivāhasya parataḥ prīṇanaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,30.11 //
analyzed: dehe tathā ativāhasya paratas prīṇanam bhavet
paṅgau andhe ca kāṇe ca hi ardha unmīlita locane
tileṣu darbhān saṃstīrya dānam uktam tat akṣayam

original: tilā lauhaṃ hiraṇyañca kārpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā /
analyzed: tilāḥ lauham hiraṇyam ca kārpāsam lavaṇam tathā

original: saptadhānyaṃ kṣitirgāva ekaikaṃ pāvanaṃ smṛtam // GarP_2,30.13 //
analyzed: saptadhānyam kṣitiḥ gāvaḥ ekaikam pāvanam smṛtam
loha dānāt yamaḥ tuṣyet dharma rājaḥ tila arpaṇāt

original: lavaṇe dīyamāne tu na bhayaṃ vidyate yamāt // GarP_2,30.14 //
analyzed: lavaṇe dīyamāne tu na bhayam vidyate yamāt

original: karpāsasya tu dānena na bhūtebhyo bhayaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: karpāsasya tu dānena na bhūtebhyaḥ bhayam bhavet
tārayanti naram gāvaḥ trividhāḥ ca eva pātakāt
hema dānāt sukham svarge bhūmi dānāt nṛpaḥ bhavet

original: hemabhūmipradānācca na pīḍā narake bhavet // GarP_2,30.16 //
analyzed: hema bhūmi pradānāt ca na pīḍā narake bhavet
sarve yama dūtāḥ ca yama rūpāḥ vibhīṣaṇāḥ

original: sarve te varadā yānti saptadhānyena prīṇitāḥ // GarP_2,30.17 //
analyzed: sarve te vara dāḥ yānti saptadhānyena prīṇitāḥ
viṣṇoḥ smaraṇa mātreṇa prāpyate paramā gatiḥ
etat te sarvam ākhyātam martyaiḥ yā gatiḥ āpyate
tasmāt putram praśaṃsanti dadāti pituḥ ājñayā
bhūmiṣṭham pitaram dṛṣṭvā hi ardha unmīlita locanam

original: tasmin kāle suto yastu sarvadānāni dāpayet /
analyzed: tasmin kāle sutaḥ yaḥ tu sarva dānāni dāpayet
gayā śrāddhāt viśiṣyeta sa putraḥ kula nandanaḥ
sva sthānāt calitaḥ ca asau vikalasya pituḥ tadā

original: putrairyatnena kartavyā pitaraṃ tārayanti te // GarP_2,30.21 //
analyzed: putraiḥ yatnena kartavyā pitaram tārayanti te
kim dattaiḥ bahubhiḥ dānaiḥ pituḥ antyeṣṭim ācaret

original: aśvamedho mahāyajñaḥ kalāṃ nārhati ṣoḍaśīm // GarP_2,30.22 //
analyzed: aśvamedhaḥ mahā yajñaḥ kalām na arhati ṣoḍaśīm

original: dharmātmā sa nu putro vaidevairapi supūjyate /
analyzed: dharma ātmā sa nu putraḥ vaidevaiḥ api su pūjyate

original: dāpayedyastu dānāni hyāturaṃ pitaraṃ bhuvi // GarP_2,30.23 //
analyzed: dāpayet yaḥ tu dānāni hi āturam pitaram bhuvi
loha dānam ca dātavyam bhūmi yuktena pāṇinā

original: yamaṃ bhīmañca nāpnoti na gacchet tasya veśmani // GarP_2,30.24 //
analyzed: yamam bhīmam ca na āpnoti na gacchet tasya veśmani

original: kuṭhāro musalo daṇḍaḥ khaḍgaśca cchurikā tathā /
analyzed: kuṭhāraḥ musalaḥ daṇḍaḥ khaḍgaḥ ca churikā tathā
etāni yama hasteṣu dṛśyāni pāpa karmiṇām
tasmāt lohasya dānam tu brāhmaṇāya āturaḥ dadet
yama āyudhānām santuṣṭyai dānam etat udāhṛtam

original: garbhasthāḥ śiśavo ye ca yuvānaḥ sthavirāstathā /
analyzed: garbha sthāḥ śiśavaḥ ye ca yuvānaḥ sthavirāḥ tathā
ebhiḥ dāna viśeṣaiḥ tu nirdaheyuḥ sva pātakam
churiṇaḥ śyāma śabalau ṣaṇḍāmarkāḥ udumbarāḥ

original: śabalā śyāmadūtā ye lohadānena prīṇitāḥ // GarP_2,30.28 //
analyzed: śyāmadūtāḥ ye loha dānena prīṇitāḥ
putrāḥ pautrāḥ tathā bandhuḥ sagotrāḥ suha hṛdaḥ tathā

original: dadate nāture dānaṃ brahmaghnaistu samā hi te // GarP_2,30.29 //
analyzed: dadate na āture dānam brahma ghnaiḥ tu samāḥ hi te

original: pañcatve bhūmiyuktasya śṛṇu tasya ca yā gatiḥ /
analyzed: pañcatve bhūmi yuktasya śṛṇu tasya ca yā gatiḥ

original: ativāhaḥ punaḥ pretovarṣordhvaṃ sukṛtaṃ labhet // GarP_2,30.30 //
analyzed: ativāhaḥ punar sukṛtam labhet
agni trayam trayaḥ lokāḥ trayaḥ vedāḥ trayaḥ marāḥ

original: kālatrayaṃ trisandhyaṃ ca trayo varṇāstriśaktayaḥ // GarP_2,30.31 //
analyzed: kāla trayam tri sandhyam ca trayaḥ varṇāḥ tri śaktayaḥ
pādāt ūrdhvam kaṭim yāvat tāvat brahyā adhitiṣṭhati

original: grīvāṃ yāvaddharirnābheḥ śarīre manujasya ca // GarP_2,30.32 //
analyzed: grīvām yāvat hariḥ nābheḥ śarīre manujasya ca
mastake tiṣṭhati īśānaḥ vyakta avyaktaḥ maheśvaraḥ
eka mūrteḥ trayaḥ bhāgāḥ brahmā viṣṇu ha īśvarāḥ
aham prāṇaḥ śarīra sthaḥ bhūta grāma catuṣṭaye

original: dharmādharme matiṃ dadyāt sukhaduḥkhe kṛtākṛte // GarP_2,30.34 //
analyzed: dharma adharme matim dadyāt sukha duḥkhe kṛta akṛte
jantoḥ vuddhim samāsthāya pūrva marma adhivāsitām
aham eva tathā jīvān prerayāmi ca karmasu

original: svargaṃ ca narakaṃ mokṣaṃ prayānti prāṇino dhruvam // GarP_2,30.35 //
analyzed: svargam ca narakam mokṣam prayānti prāṇinaḥ dhruvam

original: svargasthaṃ narakasthaṃ vā śrāddhe vāpyāyanaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: svarga stham naraka stham vā śrāddhe vā āpyāyanam bhavet
tasmāt śrāddhāni kurvīta trividhāni vicakṣaṇaḥ

original: matsyaṃ karmaṃ ca vārāhaṃ nārasiṃhañca vāmanam /
analyzed: matsyam karmam ca vārāham nārasiṃham ca vāmanam

original: rāmaṃ rāmaṃ ca kṛṣṇaṃ ca buddhaṃ caiva sakalkinam /
analyzed: rāmam rāmam ca kṛṣṇam ca buddham ca eva sa kalkinam

original: etāni daśa nāmāni smartavyāni sadā budhaiḥ // GarP_2,30.37 //
analyzed: etāni daśa nāmāni smartavyāni sadā budhaiḥ

original: svargaṃ jīvāḥ sukhaṃ yānti cyutāḥ svargācca mānavāḥ /
analyzed: svargam jīvāḥ sukham yānti cyutāḥ svargāt ca mānavāḥ

original: labdhvā sukhaṃ ca vittaṃ ca dayādākṣiṇyasaṃyutāḥ /
analyzed: labdhvā sukham ca vittam ca dayā dākṣiṇya saṃyutāḥ
putra pautraiḥ dhanaiḥ āḍhyāḥ jīveyuḥ śaradām śatam
āture ca dadet dānam viṣṇu pūjām ca kārayet

original: aṣṭākṣaraṃ tathā mantraṃ japedvā dvādaśākṣaram // GarP_2,30.39 //
analyzed: aṣṭa akṣaram tathā mantram japet vā dvādaśa akṣaram
pūjayet śukla puṣpaiḥ ca naivedyaiḥ ghṛta pācitaiḥ
tathā gandhaiḥ ca dhūpaiḥ ca śruti smṛti manūditaiḥ
viṣṇuḥ mātā pitā viṣṇuḥ viṣṇuḥ sva jana bāndhavāḥ

original: yatra viṣṇuṃ na paśyāmi tena vāsena kiṃ mama // GarP_2,30.41 //
analyzed: yatra viṣṇum na paśyāmi tena vāsena kim mama
jale viṣṇuḥ sthale viṣṇuḥ viṣṇuḥ parvata mastake

original: jvālāmālākule viṣṇuḥ sarvaṃ viṣṇumayaṃ jagat // GarP_2,30.42 //
analyzed: jvālā mālā kule viṣṇuḥ sarvam viṣṇu mayam jagat

original: vayamāpo vayaṃ pṛthvī vayaṃ darbhā vayaṃ tilāḥ /
analyzed: vayam āpaḥ vayam pṛthvī vayam darbhāḥ vayam tilāḥ

original: vayaṃ gāvo vayaṃ rājā vayaṃ vāyurvayaṃ prajāḥ // GarP_2,30.43 //
analyzed: vayam gāvaḥ vayam rājā vayam vāyuḥ vayam prajāḥ

original: vayaṃ hema vayaṃ dhānyaṃ vayaṃ madhu vayaṃ ghṛtam /
analyzed: vayam hema vayam dhānyam vayam madhu vayam ghṛtam

original: vayaṃ viprā vayaṃ devā vayaṃ śambhuśca bhūrbhuvaḥ // GarP_2,30.44 //
analyzed: vayam viprāḥ vayam devāḥ vayam śambhuḥ ca bhūḥ bhuvaḥ

original: ahaṃ dātā ahaṃ grāhī ahaṃ yajvā ahaṃ kratuḥ /
analyzed: aham dātā aham grāhī aham yajvā aham kratuḥ

original: ahaṃ hartā ahaṃ dharmo ahaṃ pṛthvī hyahaṃ jalam // GarP_2,30.45 //
analyzed: aham hartā aham dharmaḥ aham pṛthvī hi aham jalam
dharma adharme matim dadyām karmabhiḥ tu śubha aśubhaiḥ

original: yat karma kriyate kvāpi pūrvajanmārjitaṃ khaga // GarP_2,30.46 //
analyzed: yat karma kriyate kvāpi pūrva janma arjitam khaga
dharme matim aham dadyām adharme pi aham eva ca

original: yātanāṃ kurute so 'pi dharme muktiṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_2,30.47 //
analyzed: yātanām kurute dharme muktim dadāmi aham

original: manujānāṃ hitā tārkṣya ante vaitaraṇī smṛtā /
analyzed: manujānām hitā tārkṣya ante vaitaraṇī smṛtā

original: tayāvamatya pāpaughaṃ viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati // GarP_2,30.48 //
analyzed: tayā avamatya pāpa ogham viṣṇu lokam sa gacchati

original: bālatve yacca kaumāre yacca pariṇatau ca yat /
analyzed: bāla tve yat ca kaumāre yat ca pariṇatau ca yat
sarva avamthā kṛtam pāpam yat ca janmāntareṣu api
yat niśāyām tathā prātar yat madhyāhna aparāhnayoḥ

original: sandhyayoryat kṛtaṃ karma karmaṇā manasā girā // GarP_2,30.50 //
analyzed: sandhyayoḥ yat kṛtam karma karmaṇā manasā girā
dattvā varām sakṛt api kapilām sarva kāmikām
uddharet antakāle saḥ ātmānam pāpa sañcayāt
gāvaḥ mama agratas santu pṛṣṭhatas pārśvatas tathā

original: gāvo me hṛdaye santu gavāṃ madhye vasāmyaham // GarP_2,30.52 //
analyzed: gāvaḥ me hṛdaye santu gavām madhye vasāmi aham

original: yā lakṣmīḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yā ca deve vyavasthitā /
analyzed: yā lakṣmīḥ sarva bhūtānām yā ca deve vyavasthitā

original: dhenurūpeṇa sā devī mama pāpaṃ vyapohatu // GarP_2,30.53 //
analyzed: dhenu rūpeṇa sā devī mama pāpam vyapohatu

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde nānādānanirūpaṇaṃ nāma triṃso 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde nānādānanirūpaṇam nāma triṃsaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
śrī viṣṇuḥ uvāca
ye narāḥ pāpa saṃyuktāḥ te gacchanti yama ālayam
nṛṇām mad sākṣikam dattam ananta phala dam bhavet
yāvat rajaḥ pramāṇa abdam svarge tiṣṭhati bhūmi daḥ

original: aśvārūḍhāśca te yānti dadate ye hyupānahau // GarP_2,31.2 //
analyzed: aśva ārūḍhāḥ ca te yānti dadate ye hi upānahau

original: ātape śramayogena na dahyante ca kutracit /
analyzed: ātape śrama yogena na dahyante ca kutracid

original: chattradānena vai pretā vicaranti sukhaṃ pathi // GarP_2,31.3 //
analyzed: chattra dānena vai pretāḥ vicaranti sukham pathi

original: yamuddiśya dadātyannaṃ tena cāpyāyito bhavet // GarP_2,31.4 //
analyzed: yam uddiśya dadāti annam tena ca āpyāyitaḥ bhavet
andhakāre mahā ghore amūrte lakṣya varjite

original: uddyotenaiva te yānti dīpadānena mānavāḥ // GarP_2,31.5 //
analyzed: uddyotena eva te yānti dīpa dānena mānavāḥ
āśvine kartike vā api māghe mṛta tithau api

original: caturdaśyāñca dīyeta dīpadānaṃ sukhāya vai // GarP_2,31.6 //
analyzed: caturdaśyām ca dīyeta dīpa dānam sukhāya vai
pratyaham ca pradātavyam mārge su viṣame naraiḥ

original: yāvat saṃvatsaraṃ vāpi pretasya sukhalipsayā // GarP_2,31.7 //
analyzed: yāvat saṃvatsaram vā api pretasya sukha lipsayā

original: kule dyotati śuddhātmā prakāśatvaṃ sa gacchati /
analyzed: kule dyotati śuddha ātmā prakāśa tvam sa gacchati
prāc mukha udak mukham dīpam devāgāre dvijātaye

original: kuryādyāmyamukhaṃ pitre adbhiḥ saṅkalpya susthiram // GarP_2,31.9 //
analyzed: kuryāt yāmya mukham pitre adbhiḥ saṅkalpya su sthiram
sarva upahāra yuktāni padāni atra trayodaśa
yaḥ dadāti mṛtasya iha jīvan api ātma hetave
sa gacchati mahā mārge mahā kaṣṭa vivarjitaḥ
āsanam bhājanam bhojyam dīyate yat dvijāyate

original: sukhe na bhuñjamānastu dena gacchatyalaṃ pathi // GarP_2,31.11 //
analyzed: sukhe na bhuñjamānaḥ tu gacchati alam pathi
kamaṇḍalu pradānena tṛṣitaḥ pibate jalam
bhājanam vastra dānam ca kusumam ca aṅgulīyakam
dātavyam preta uddharaṇa hetave
trayodaśa padāni ittham pretasya śubham icchatā

original: dātavyāni yathāśaktyā preto 'sau prīṇito bhavet // GarP_2,31.14 //
analyzed: dātavyāni yathāśaktyā pretaḥ sau prīṇitaḥ bhavet
tilān ca eva uda kumbhān trayodaśa

original: mudrikāṃ vastrayugmañca tayā yāti parāṃ gatim // GarP_2,31.15 //
analyzed: mudrikām vastra yugmam ca tayā yāti parām gatim

original: yo 'śvaṃ nāvaṃ gajaṃ vāpi brāhmaṇe pratipādayet /
analyzed: yaḥ śvam nāvam gajam vā api brāhmaṇe pratipādayet
sa mahimnaḥ nusāreṇa tat tat sukham upāśnute
nānā lokān vicarati mahiṣīn ca dadāti yaḥ

original: yamaputtrasya yā mātā mahiṣī sugatipradā // GarP_2,31.17 //
analyzed: yamaputtrasya yā mātā mahiṣī sugati pradā
tāmbūlam kusumam deyam yāmyānām harṣa vardhanam

original: tena samprīṇitāḥ sarve tasmin kleśaṃ na kurvate // GarP_2,31.18 //
analyzed: tena samprīṇitāḥ sarve tasmin kleśam na kurvate
go bhū tila hiraṇyāni dānāni āhuḥ sva śaktitaḥ
mṛta uddeśena yaḥ yat yāt jala pātram ca mṛd mayam
udapātra sahasrasya phalam āpnoti mānavaḥ
yama dūtāḥ mahā raudrāḥ karālāḥ kṛṣṇa piṅgalāḥ

original: na bhīṣayanti taṃ yāmyā vastradāne kṛte sati // GarP_2,31.21 //
analyzed: na bhīṣayanti tam yāmyāḥ vastra dāne kṛte sati
mārge hi gacchamānaḥ tu tṛṣṇā ārtaḥ śrama pīḍitaḥ
ghaṭa anna dāna yogena sukhī bhavati niścitam
śayyā dakṣiṇayā yuktā āyudha ambara saṃyutā
haimaśrīpatinā yuktā deyā viprāya śarmaṇe

original: tathā pretatvamukto 'sau modate saha daivataiḥ // GarP_2,31.23 //
analyzed: tathā preta tva muktaḥ sau modate saha daivataiḥ
etat te kathitam tārkṣya dānam antyeṣṭi karma jam
adhunā kathayiṣye hamanya deha praveśanam

original: jātasya mṛtyuloke vai prāṇino maraṇaṃ dhruvam /
analyzed: jātasya mṛtyu loke vai prāṇinaḥ maraṇam dhruvam

original: mṛtiḥ kuryāt svadharmeṇa yāsyataśca parantapa // GarP_2,31.25 //
analyzed: mṛtiḥ kuryāt svadharmeṇa yāsyataḥ ca parantapa
pūrva kāle mṛtānām ca prāṇinām ca khageśvara
sūkṣmaḥ bhūtvā tu asau vāyuḥ nirgacchati āsya maṇḍalāt
nava dvāraiḥ romabhiḥ ca janānām tālurandhrake
pāpiṣṭhānām apānena jīvaḥ niṣkrāmati dhruvam
śarīram ca patet paścāt nirgate maruti īśvare

original: vātāhataḥ patatyeva nirādhāro yathā drumaḥ // GarP_2,31.28 //
analyzed: vāta āhataḥ patati eva nirādhāraḥ yathā drumaḥ

original: pṛthivyāṃ līyate pṛthvī āpaścaiva tathāpsu ca /
analyzed: pṛthivyām līyate pṛthvī āpaḥ ca eva tathā apsu ca
tejaḥ tejasi līyate samīraṇaḥ samīraṇe

original: ākāśe ca tathā kāśaḥ sarvavyāpī ca śaṅkare // GarP_2,31.29 //
analyzed: ākāśe ca tathā kāśaḥ sarvavyāpī ca śaṅkare

original: tatra kāmastathā krodhaḥ kāye pañcendriyāṇi ca /
analyzed: tatra kāmaḥ tathā krodhaḥ kāye pañca indriyāṇi ca

original: ete tārkṣya samākhyātā dehe tiṣṭhanti taskarāḥ // GarP_2,31.30 //
analyzed: ete tārkṣya samākhyātāḥ dehe tiṣṭhanti taskarāḥ
kāmaḥ krodhaḥ hi ahaṅkāraḥ manaḥ tatra eva nāyakaḥ
saṃhārakaḥ ca kālaḥ yam puṇya pāpa samanvitaḥ
jagataḥ ca sva rūpam tu nirmitam svena karmaṇā
punar deha antaram yāti sukṛtaiḥ duṣkṛtaiḥ naraḥ
pañca indriya samāyuktam sakalaiḥ viṣyaiḥ saha

original: praviśet sa navaṃ dehaṃ gṛhe dagdhe yathā gṛhī // GarP_2,31.33 //
analyzed: praviśet sa navam deham gṛhe dagdhe yathā gṛhī
śarīre ye samāsīnā sambhavet sarva dhātavaḥ

original: ṣāṭkauśiko hyayaṃ kāyo mātā pitrośca dhātavaḥ // GarP_2,31.34 //
analyzed: ṣāṭkauśikaḥ hi ayam kāyaḥ mātā pitroḥ ca dhātavaḥ
sambhaveyuḥ tathā tārkṣya sarve vātāḥ ca dehinām

original: mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ tadyogā ye cānye vyādhayastathā // GarP_2,31.35 //
analyzed: mūtram purīṣam tad yogāḥ ye ca anye vyādhayaḥ tathā

original: asthi śukraṃ tathā snāyuḥ dehena saha dahyate /
analyzed: asthi śukram tathā snāyuḥ dehena saha dahyate

original: eṣa te kathitastārkṣya vināśaḥ sarvadehinām // GarP_2,31.36 //
analyzed: eṣa te kathitaḥ tārkṣya vināśaḥ sarva dehinām
kathayāmi punar teṣām śarīrañca yathā bhavet
eka stambham snāyu baddham sthūṇā dvaya samuddhṛtam
indriyaiḥ ca samāyuktam nava dvāram śarīrakam
viṣayaiḥ ca samākrāntam kāma krodha samākulam
rāga dveṣa samākīrṇam tṛṣṇā durga su dustaram
lobha jāla samāyuktam puram puruṣa saṃjñitam
etat guṇa samāyuktam śarīram sarva dehinām

original: tiṣṭhanti devatāḥ sarvā bhuvanāni caturdaśa // GarP_2,31.40 //
analyzed: tiṣṭhanti devatāḥ sarvāḥ bhuvanāni caturdaśa

original: ātmānaṃ ye na jānanti te narāḥ paśavaḥ smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: ātmānam ye na jānanti te narāḥ paśavaḥ smṛtāḥ
evam etat mayā ākhyātam śarīram te caturvidham
caturaśīti lakṣāṇi nirmitāḥ yonayaḥ purā
udbhid jāḥ sveda jāḥ ca eva aṇḍa jāḥ ca jarāyu jāḥ
etat te sarvam ākhyātam yat pṛṣṭaḥ aham tvayā anagha

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde dānapha lānyadehapraveśādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmai katriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde dānapha lānyadehapraveśādinirūpaṇam nāma e katriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
tārkṣyaḥ uvāca
katham utpadyate jantuḥ bhūta grāme caturvidhe

original: tvacā raktaṃ tathā māṃsaṃ medo majjāsthi jīvitam // GarP_2,32.1 //
analyzed: tvacā raktam tathā māṃsam medaḥ majja asthi jīvitam

original: pādau pāṇī tathā guhyaṃ jihvā-keśa-nakhāḥ śiraḥ /
analyzed: pādau pāṇī tathā guhyam jihvā keśa nakhāḥ śiraḥ
sandhi mārgāḥ ca bahuśas rekhāḥ nā ekavidhāḥ tathā

original: kāmaḥ krodho bhayaṃ lajjā mano harṣaḥ sukhāsukham /
analyzed: kāmaḥ krodhaḥ bhayam lajjā manaḥ harṣaḥ sukha asukham
citritam chidritam ca api nānā jālena veṣṭitam
