original: kartā ko 'tra hṛṣīkeśa saṃsāre duḥ khasaṃkule // GarP_2,32.4 //
analyzed: kartā kaḥ tra hṛṣīkeśa saṃsāre duḥkha saṃkule
śrī viṣṇuḥ uvāca
kathayāmi param gopyam kośasya asya vinirṇayam
yasya vijñāna mātreṇa sarvajña tvam prajyate

original: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā loke sadayaṃ jīvakāraṇam /
analyzed: sādhu pṛṣṭam tvayā loke sadayam jīva kāraṇam
vainateya śṛṇuṣva tvam ekāgra kṛta mānasaḥ
ṛtu kāle ca nārīṇām varjyam dina catuṣṭayam
yatas tasmin brahmahatyām purā vṛtra samutthitām
brahmā śakrāt samuttārya caturtha aṃśena dattavān

original: tāvannālokyate vaktraṃ pāpaṃ yāvadvapuḥ sthitam // GarP_2,32.8 //
analyzed: tāvat na ālokyate vaktram pāpam yāvat vapuḥ sthitam
prathame hani cāṇḍālī dvitīye brahma ghātinī

original: tṛtīye rajakī jñeyā caturthe 'hani śudhyati // GarP_2,32.9 //
analyzed: tṛtīye rajakī jñeyā caturthe hani śudhyati
sapta ahāt pitṛ devānām bhavet yogyā kṛta arcane
sapta aha madhye yaḥ garbhaḥ tad saṃmbhūtiḥ malimlucā
niṣaka samaye pitroḥ yādṛś citta vikalpanā
tādṛś garbha samutpattiḥ jāyate na atra saṃśayaḥ
yugmāsu puttrāḥ jāyante striyaḥ yugmāsu rātriṣu
pūrva saptamam utsṛjya tasmāt yugmāsu saṃviśet
ṣoḍaśa ṛtuḥ niśāḥ strīṇām sāmānyāt samudāhṛtaḥ

original: yā caturdaśamī rātrirgarbhastiṣṭhati tatra cet // GarP_2,32.13 //
analyzed: yā caturdaśamī rātriḥ garbhaḥ tiṣṭhati tatra ced
guṇa bhāgya nidhiḥ putraḥ tatra jāyeta dhārmikaḥ

original: sā niśā tatra sāmānyairna labhyeta khagādhipa // GarP_2,32.14 //
analyzed: sā niśā tatra sāmānyaiḥ na labhyeta khaga adhipa
prāyaśas sambhavati atra garbhaḥ tu aṣṭa aha madhyatas
pañcame hani nārīṇām kāryam mādhurya bhojanam
kaṭu kṣāram ca tīkṣṇañca tyājyam uṣṇañca dūratas
tad kṣetram oṣadhī pātram bījam ca api amṛtāyitam
tasmin uptvā naraḥ svāmī samyak phalam avāpnuyāt

original: tasyāścaivātapo varjya śītalaṃ kevalaṃ caret // GarP_2,32.17 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca eva ātapaḥ varjya śītalam kevalam caret
tāmbūla puṣpa śrīkhaṇḍaiḥ saṃyuktaḥ śuci vastra bhṛt

original: dharmamādāya manasi sutalpaṃ saṃviśet pumān // GarP_2,32.18 //
analyzed: dharmam ādāya manasi sutalpam saṃviśet pumān
niṣeka samaye yādṛś nara citta vikalpanā
tādṛś svabhāva sambhūtiḥ jantuḥ viśati kukṣi gaḥ
śukra soṇita saṃyoge piṇḍa utpattiḥ prajāyate
vardhate jaṭhare jantuḥ tārāpatiḥ iva ambare

original: caitanyaṃ bījarūpaṃ hi śukre nityaṃ vyavasthitam /
analyzed: caitanyam bīja rūpam hi śukre nityam vyavasthitam
kāmaḥ cittam ca śukram ca yadā hi eka tvam āpnuyuḥ
tadā drāvam avāpnoti yoṣā garbhāśaye naraḥ

original: raktādhikye bhavennārī śukrādhikye bhavet pumān // GarP_2,32.22 //
analyzed: rakta ādhikye bhavet nārī śukra ādhikye bhavet pumān
śukra soṇitayoḥ sāmye garbhāḥ ṣaṇḍa tvam āpnuyuḥ
ahorātreṇa kalilam pañcabhiḥ dinaiḥ
caturdaśe bhavet māṃsam miśra dhātu samanvitam

original: ghanaṃ māṃsañca viṃśāhe garbhastho vardhate kramāt // GarP_2,32.24 //
analyzed: ghanam māṃsam ca viṃśa ahe garbha sthaḥ vardhate kramāt
pañcaviṃśatime ca ahni balam puṣṭiḥ ca jāyate

original: tathā māse tu sampūrṇe pañcatattvaṃ nidhārayet // GarP_2,32.25 //
analyzed: tathā māse tu sampūrṇe pañcatattvam nidhārayet

original: māsadvaye tu sañjāte tvacā medaśca jāyate /
analyzed: māsa dvaye tu sañjāte tvacā medaḥ ca jāyate
majja asthīni tribhiḥ māsaiḥ keśa aṅgulyaḥ caturthake

original: karṇau ca nāsike vakṣo jāyeran māsi pañcame /
analyzed: karṇau ca nāsike vakṣaḥ jāyeran māsi pañcame
kaṇṭha randhra udaram ṣaṣṭhe guhya ādiḥ māsi saptame
aṅga pratyaṅga sampūrṇaḥ garbhaḥ māsaiḥ atha aṣṭabhiḥ

original: aṣṭame calate jīvo dhātrīgarbhe punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: aṣṭame calate jīvaḥ dhātrī garbhe punar punar

original: navamemāsi samprāpte garbhasthaujau dṛḍhaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,32.28 //
analyzed: navame māsi samprāpte garbha stha ojau dṛḍham bhavet
cikitsā jāyate tasya garbha vāsa parikṣaye

original: nārī vātha naro vātha napuṃstvaṃ vābhijāyate // GarP_2,32.29 //
analyzed: nārī vā atha naraḥ vā atha napuṃstvam vā abhijāyate
śakti trayam viśāla akṣam ṣāṭkauśika samāyutam
pañca indriya samopetam daśa nāḍī vibhūṣitam
daśa prāṇa guṇa upetam yaḥ jānāti sa yoga vid

original: majjāsthiśukramāṃsāni roma raktaṃ balaṃ tathā // GarP_2,32.31 //
analyzed: majja asthi śukra māṃsāni roma raktam balam tathā
ṣāṭkauśikam idam piṇḍam syāt jantoḥ pāñcabhautikam

original: navame daśame māsi jāyate pāñcabhautikaḥ // GarP_2,32.32 //
analyzed: navame daśame māsi jāyate pāñcabhautikaḥ
sūtivātaiḥ samākṛṣṭaḥ pīḍayā vihvalīkṛtaḥ
puṣṭaḥ nāḍyāḥ suṣumṇāyāḥ yoṣit garbha sthitaḥ tvaran
kṣitiḥ vāri haviḥ bhoktā pavana ākāśam eva ca
ebhiḥ bhūtaiḥ pīḍitaḥ tu nibaddhaḥ snāyu bandhanaiḥ

original: mūlabhūtā ime proktāḥ sapta nāḍyantare sthitāḥ /
analyzed: mūla bhūtāḥ ime proktāḥ sapta nāḍī antare sthitāḥ
tvacā asthi nāḍyaḥ romāṇi māṃsam ca eva atra pañcamam

original: ete pañca guṇāḥ proktā mayā bhūmeḥ khageśvara /
analyzed: ete pañca guṇāḥ proktāḥ mayā bhūmeḥ khageśvara

original: yathā pañca guṇāścāpastathā tacchṛṇu kāśyapa // GarP_2,32.36 //
analyzed: yathā pañca guṇāḥ ca apaḥ tathā tat śṛṇu kāśyapa

original: lālā mūtraṃ tathā śukraṃ majjāra raktañca pañcamam /
analyzed: lālā mūtram tathā śukram majjāra raktam ca pañcamam

original: āpaḥ pañcaguṇāḥ proktā jñātavyāste prayatnataḥ // GarP_2,32.37 //
analyzed: āpaḥ pañca guṇāḥ proktāḥ jñātavyāḥ te prayatnataḥ

original: kṣudhā tṛṣā tathā nidrā ālasyaṃ kāntireva ca /
analyzed: kṣudhā tṛṣā tathā nidrā ālasyam kāntiḥ eva ca

original: tejaḥ pañcaguṇaṃ proktaṃ tārkṣya sarvatrayogibhiḥ // GarP_2,32.38 //
analyzed: tejaḥ pañcaguṇam proktam tārkṣya sarvatra yogibhiḥ

original: rāgadveṣau tathā lajjā bhayaṃ mohastathaiva ca /
analyzed: rāga dveṣau tathā lajjā bhayam mohaḥ tathā eva ca

original: ityetat kathitaṃ tārkṣya vāyujaṃ guṇapañcakam // GarP_2,32.39 //
analyzed: iti etat kathitam tārkṣya vāyu jam guṇa pañcakam
ākuñcanam dhāvanañca laṅghanañca prasāraṇam

original: nirodhaḥ pañcamaḥ prokto vāyoḥ pañca guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_2,32.40 //
analyzed: nirodhaḥ pañcamaḥ proktaḥ vāyoḥ pañca guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ
ghoṣaḥ cintā ca gāmbhīryam śravaṇam satya saṃkramaḥ

original: ākāśasya guṇāḥ pañca jñāta vyāstārkṣya yatnataḥ // GarP_2,32.41 //
analyzed: ākāśasya guṇāḥ pañca jñāta vyāstārkṣya yatnataḥ

original: śrotraṃ tvak cakṣuṣī jihvā nāsā buddhīndriyāṇi ca /
analyzed: śrotram tvac cakṣuṣī jihvā nāsā buddhīndriyāṇi ca

original: pāṇī pādau gudaṃ prāk ca guhyaṃ karmendriyāṇi ca // GarP_2,32.42 //
analyzed: pāṇī pādau gudam prāk ca guhyam karmendriyāṇi ca

original: iḍāca piṅgalā caiva suṣumṇā ca tṛtīyakā /
analyzed: iḍāca piṅgalā ca eva suṣumṇā ca tṛtīyakā

original: gāndhārī gajajihvā ca pūṣā caiva yasā tathā // GarP_2,32.43 //
analyzed: gāndhārī gajajihvā ca pūṣā ca eva yasā tathā
alamvuśā kuhūḥ ca eva śaṅkhinī daśamī smṛtā

original: piṇḍa madhye sthitā hyetāḥ pradhānā daśa nāḍayaḥ // GarP_2,32.44 //
analyzed: piṇḍa madhye sthitāḥ hi etāḥ pradhānāḥ daśa nāḍayaḥ

original: prāṇāpānau samānaśca udāno vyāna eva ca /
analyzed: prāṇa apānau samānaḥ ca udānaḥ vyānaḥ eva ca

original: nāgaḥ kūrmaśca kṛkaro devadatto dhanañjayaḥ // GarP_2,32.45 //
analyzed: nāgaḥ kūrmaḥ ca kṛkaraḥ devadattaḥ dhanañjayaḥ

original: ityete vāyavaḥ proktā daśa deheṣu susthitāḥ /
analyzed: iti ete vāyavaḥ proktāḥ daśa deheṣu susthitāḥ
kevalam bhuktam annam ca puṣṭi dam sarva dehinām
nayate prāṇa daḥ vāyuḥ śarīre sarva sandhiṣu

original: āhāro bhuktamātrastu vāyunā kriyate dvidhā // GarP_2,32.47 //
analyzed: āhāraḥ bhukta mātraḥ tu vāyunā kriyate dvidhā

original: sa praviśya guhe samyak pṛthagannaṃ pṛthagjalam /
analyzed: sa praviśya guhe samyak pṛthak annam pṛthak jalam
ūrdhvam agneḥ jalam kṛtvā tad annam ca jala upari
agneḥ ca adhas svayam prāṇaḥ tam agnin ca dhamet śanais
vāyunā dhamyamānaḥ gniḥ pṛthak kiṭṭam pṛthak rasam
malaiḥ dvādaśabhiḥ kiṭṭam bhinnam dehāt pṛthak bhavet
karṇa akṣi nāsikāḥ jihvā danta nābhi vapuḥ gudam
nakhāḥ mala āśrayāḥ hi ete viṣ mūtram ca iti anantakam
śukra śoṇita saṃyogāt etat ṣāṭkauśikam smṛtam
koṭyaḥ tathā tisraḥ samanvitāḥ
dvātriṃśat daśanāḥ proktāḥ sāmānyāt vinatā suta

original: sapta lakṣāṇi keśāḥ syurnakhāḥ proktāstu viṃśatiḥ /
analyzed: sapta lakṣāṇi keśāḥ syuḥ nakhāḥ proktāḥ tu viṃśatiḥ
māṃsam pala sahasra ekam sāmānyāt deha saṃsthitam
raktam pala śatam tārkṣyam buddham eva purātanaiḥ

original: palāni daśa medaśca tvacā caiva tu tatsamā // GarP_2,32.54 //
analyzed: palāni daśa medaḥ ca tvacā ca eva tu tad samā

original: śukraṃ dvikuḍavaṃ jñeyaṃ śoṇitaṃ kuḍavaṃ smṛtam // GarP_2,32.55 //

analyzed: śleṣmāṇaḥ ca ṣaṭ ūrdhvan ca viṣ mūtram tad pramāṇataḥ

original: asthnāṃ hi hyadhikaṃ proktaṃ ṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatrayāt // GarP_2,32.56 //
analyzed: asthnām hi hi adhikam proktam ṣaṣṭi uttara śata trayāt
evam piṇḍaḥ samākhyātaḥ vaibhavam sampracakṣmahe

original: sukhaṃ duḥ khaṃ bhayaṃ kṣemaṃ karmaṇaiva hi prāpyate // GarP_2,32.57 //
analyzed: sukham duḥ kham bhayam kṣemam karmaṇā eva hi prāpyate
adhomukham ca ūrdhva pādam garbhāt vāyuḥ prakarṣati

original: tale tu karayornyasya vardhate jānupārśvayoḥ // GarP_2,32.58 //
analyzed: tale tu karayoḥ nyasya vardhate jānu pārśvayoḥ
aṅguṣṭhau ca upari nyastau kara aṅgulī

original: jānupṛṣṭhe tathā netre jānumadhye ca nāsikā // GarP_2,32.59 //
analyzed: jānu pṛṣṭhe tathā netre jānu madhye ca nāsikā
evam vṛddhim kramāt yāti jantuḥ strī garbha saṃsthitaḥ
kāṭhinyam asthīni āyānti bhukta pītena jīvati

original: nāḍī vāpyāyanī nāma nābhyāṃ tatra nibadhyate /
analyzed: nāḍī vāpyāyanī nāma nābhyām tatra nibadhyate

original: strīṇāṃ tathāntrasuṣire sa nibaddhaḥ prajāyate // GarP_2,32.61 //
analyzed: strīṇām tathā antra suṣire sa nibaddhaḥ prajāyate
krāmanti bhukta pītāni strīṇām garbha udare tathā
taiḥ āpyāyita dehaḥ sau jantuḥ vṛddhim upaiti ca
smṛtyaḥ tatra prayānti asya bahvyaḥ saṃsāra bhūtayaḥ
tatas nirvedam āyāti pīḍyamānaḥ itas tatas
punar nā evam kariṣyāmi bhukta mātraḥ iha udarāt

original: tathātathā yatiṣyāmi garbhaṃ nāpnomyahaṃ yathā // GarP_2,32.64 //
analyzed: tathā tathā yatiṣyāmi garbham na āpnomi aham yathā
iti sañcintayan jīvaḥ smṛtvā janma śatāni vai
yāni pūrva anubhūtāni deva bhūta ātmajāni vai
tatas kāla kramāt jantuḥ parivartyatu adhomukhaḥ

original: navame daśame vāpi māsi saṃjāyate tataḥ // GarP_2,32.66 //
analyzed: navame daśame vā api māsi saṃjāyate tatas
niṣkramyamāṇaḥ vātena prājāpatyena pīḍyate
niṣkramate ca vilapan tadā duḥkha nipīḍitaḥ
niṣkrāman ca udarāt mūrchām asahyām pratipadyate
prāpnoti cetanām ca asau vāyu sparśa sukha anvitaḥ
tatas tam vaiṣṇavī māyā samāskandati mohinī
tayā vimohita ātmā asau jñāna bhraṃśam avāpnute
bhraṣṭa jñānam bāla bhāve tatas jantuḥ prapadyate
tatas kaumāraka avasthām yauvanam vṛddha tām api
punar ca tadvat maraṇam janma prāpnoti mānavaḥ
tatas saṃsāra cakre smin bhrāmyate ghaṭa yantra vat
kadācid svargam āpnoti kadācid nirayam naraḥ

original: svargaṃ ca nirayaṃ caiva svakarmaphalamaśnute // GarP_2,32.72 //
analyzed: svargam ca nirayam ca eva sva karma phalam aśnute
kadācid bhukta karmā ca bhuvam su alpena gacchati

original: svarloke narake caiva bhuktaprāye dvijottamāḥ // GarP_2,32.73 //
analyzed: svar loke narake ca eva bhukta prāye dvijottamāḥ
narakeṣu mahat duḥkham etat yat svarga vāsinaḥ

original: dṛśyate nātra modante pātyamānāstu nārakaiḥ // GarP_2,32.74 //
analyzed: dṛśyate na atra modante pātyamānāḥ tu nārakaiḥ
svarge duḥ kham atulam yad ārohaṇa kālataḥ
prabhṛti aham patiṣyāmi iti etat manasi vartate
nāra kān ca eva samprekṣya mahat duḥ kham avāpyate
evam gatim aham gantā iti aharniśam anirvṛtaḥ
garbha vāse mahat duḥ kham jāyamānasya yoni jam

original: jātasya bālabhāve 'pi vṛddhatve duḥkhameva ca // GarP_2,32.77 //
analyzed: jātasya bāla bhāve vṛddha tve duḥkham eva ca
kāma īrṣyā krodha sambandhāt yauvane pi ca duḥ saham

original: duḥsvapnaṃ yā vṛddhatā ca maraṇe duḥ khamutkaṭam // GarP_2,32.78 //
analyzed: duḥsvapnam yā vṛddha tā ca maraṇe duḥ kham utkaṭam

original: kṛṣyamāṇaśca yāmyaiḥ sa narake 'pi ca yātyadhaḥ /
analyzed: kṛṣyamāṇaḥ ca yāmyaiḥ sa narake ca yāti adhas

original: punaśca garbhājjanma syānmaraṇaṃ duṣkaraṃ tathā // GarP_2,32.79 //
analyzed: punar ca garbhāt janma syāt maraṇam duṣkaram tathā
evam saṃsāra cakre smit jantavaḥ ghaṭa yantra vat
bhrāmyante prāktanaiḥ badhaiḥ baddhāḥ vidhyanti ca asakṛt
na asti pakṣin sukham kiñcid kṣetre duḥ kha śata ākule

original: vinatāsuta mokṣāya yatitavyaṃ tato naraiḥ // GarP_2,32.81 //
analyzed: vinatā suta mokṣāya yatitavyam tatas naraiḥ
etat te sarvam ākhyātam yathā garbhasya saṃsthitiḥ

original: kathayāmi kramapraśraṃ pṛṣṭaṃ vā vartate spṛhā // GarP_2,32.82 //
analyzed: kathayāmi kramapraśram pṛṣṭam vā vartate spṛhā
garuḍaḥ uvāca
madhye kṛta mahā praśra dvayasya āptam mayā uttaram

original: praśrasyāpi tṛtīyasya uttaraṃ ca vidhīyatām // GarP_2,32.83 //
analyzed: praśrasya api tṛtīyasya uttaram ca vidhīyatām
śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca
mriyamāṇasya kim kṛtyam iti tvam pṛṣṭavān asi

original: śṛṇu tatrottaraṃ tūktaṃ kathayāmi samāsataḥ // GarP_2,32.84 //
analyzed: śṛṇu tatra uttaram tu uktam kathayāmi samāsatas
āsanna maraṇam jñātvā puruṣam snāpayet tatas
go mūtra gomaya su mṛd tīrtha udaka kuśa udakaiḥ

original: vāsasī paridhāryātha dhaute tu śuci nī śubhe /
analyzed: vāsasī paridhārya atha dhaute tu śuci nī śubhe
darbhāṇi ādau samāstīrya dakṣiṇa agrān vikīrya ca

original: tilān gomayaliptāyāṃ bhūmau tatra niveśayet // GarP_2,32.87 //
analyzed: tilān gomaya liptāyām bhūmau tatra niveśayet

original: prāgudakśirasaṃ vāpi mukhe svarṇaṃ viniḥ kṣepet /
analyzed: prāc udak śirasam vā api mukhe svarṇam kṣepet

original: śālagrāmaśilā tatra tulasī ca khageśvara // GarP_2,32.88 //
analyzed: śālagrāma śilā tatra tulasī ca khageśvara
vidheyā sannidhau sarpiḥ dīpam prajvālayet punar
namaḥ bhagavate vāsudevāya iti japaḥ tathā

original: ādau tu praṇavaṃ kṛtvā pūjādāne tataḥ smṛte /
analyzed: ādau tu praṇavam kṛtvā pūjā dāne tatas smṛte
samabhyarcya hṛṣīkeśam puṣpa dhūpa ādibhiḥ tatas
praṇipātaiḥ stavaiḥ puṇyaiḥ dhyā na yogena pūjayet

original: dattvā dānaṃ ca viprebhyo dīnānāthebhya eva ca // GarP_2,32.91 //
analyzed: dattvā dānam ca viprebhyaḥ dīna anāthebhyaḥ eva ca
puttre mitre kalatre ca kṣetra dhānya dhana ādiṣu

original: nivartayenmamatvaṃ ca viṣṇoḥ pādau hṛdi smaran // GarP_2,32.92 //
analyzed: nivartayet mamatvam ca viṣṇoḥ pādau hṛdi smaran
uccais puruṣasūktam ca yadi śreṣṭhā padaḥ tadā

original: puttrādyāḥ prapaṭheyuste mriyamāṇe nije jane // GarP_2,32.93 //
analyzed: puttra ādyāḥ prapaṭheyuḥ te mriyamāṇe nije jane
etat te sarvam ākhyātam kṛtyam mṛtyau upasthite
phalam api asya kṛtsnasya samāsāt te vadāmi aham
snānena śuci tā prāptiḥ apāvitrya hṛtiḥ tatas
tatas viṣṇoḥ smṛtiḥ tasya jñānāt sarva phala pradā
darbha tūlī nayet svargam āturam tu na saṃśayaḥ

original: tilairdarbhaiśca niḥ kṣiptaiḥ snānaṃ kratumayaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,32.96 //
analyzed: tilaiḥ darbhaiḥ ca niḥ kṣiptaiḥ snānam kratu mayam bhavet
brahmā viṣṇuḥ ca rudraḥ ca śrīḥ hutāśaḥ tathā eva ca
maṇḍale ca upatiṣṭhanti tasmāt kurvīta maṇḍalam
prāk udak vā kṛtena iha śirasā lokam uttamam

original: vrajate yadi pāpasyālpatvaṃ puṃso bhavetkhaga // GarP_2,32.98 //
analyzed: vrajate yadi pāpasya alpa tvam puṃsaḥ bhavet khaga

original: pañcaratne mukhe mukte jive jñānaṃ prarohati /
analyzed: pañcaratne mukhe mukte jive jñānam prarohati

original: tulasī brāhmaṇā gāvo viṣṇurekādaśī khaga // GarP_2,32.99 //
analyzed: tulasī brāhmaṇāḥ gāvaḥ viṣṇuḥ ekādaśī khaga
pañca pravahaṇāni eva bhava abdhau majjatām nṛṇām
viṣṇuḥ ekādaśī gītā tulasī vipra dhenavaḥ
namaḥ bhagavate vāsudevāya iti japan naraḥ
oṅkāra pūrvam sāyujyam prāpnuyāt na atra saṃśayaḥ
pūjayā api ca mad loka prāptiḥ ārāt divam vrajet
bandha abhāve mamatve tu jñānam puruṣasūktataḥ
tu sādhaneṣu eṣu kāśyapa
tad tad phalasya api ādhikyam bhavati iti avadhāraya

original: dātavyāni yathāśaktyā prīto 'sau sarvadā bhavet // GarP_2,32.104 //
analyzed: dātavyāni yathāśaktyā prītaḥ sau sarvadā bhavet
etat te sarvam ākhyātam snāna ādiṣu phalam mayā

original: brahmāṇḍe ye guṇāḥ santi śarīre te vyavasthitāḥ // GarP_2,32.105 //
analyzed: brahmāṇḍe ye guṇāḥ santi śarīre te vyavasthitāḥ
pātāla bhūdharāḥ lokāḥ tathā anye dvīpa sāgarāḥ
āditya ādi grahāḥ sarve piṇḍa madhye vyavasthitāḥ

original: pādādhastu talaṃ jñeyaṃ pādordhvaṃ vitalaṃ tathā /
analyzed: pāda adhas tu talam jñeyam pāda ūrdhvam vitalam tathā

original: jānubhyāṃ sutalaṃ viddhi sakthideśe mahātalam // GarP_2,32.107 //
analyzed: jānubhyām sutalam viddhi sakthi deśe mahātalam
tathā guhya deśe rasātalam
pātālam kaṭi saṃstham tu pāda ādau lakṣayet budhaḥ
bhūrlokam nābhi madhye tu bhuvarlokam tad ūrdhvatas

original: svargalokaṃ hṛdaye vidyāt kaṇṭhadeśe mahastathā // GarP_2,32.109 //
analyzed: svarga lokam hṛdaye vidyāt kaṇṭha deśe mahar tathā
janalokam vaktra deśe tapolokam lalāṭake
satya lokam mahā randhre bhuvanāni caturdaśa

original: trikoṇe saṃsthito meruradhaḥ koṇe ca mandaraḥ /
analyzed: trikoṇe saṃsthitaḥ meruḥ adhas koṇe ca mandaraḥ

original: dakṣiṇe ceva kailāso vāmabhāge himācalaḥ // GarP_2,32.111 //
analyzed: dakṣiṇe ca iva kailāsaḥ vāma bhāge himācalaḥ
niṣadhaḥ ca ūrdhva bhāge ca dakṣiṇe gandhamādanaḥ
malayaḥ ramaṇaḥ
vāma rekhāyām saptā ete kulaparvatāḥ

original: asthisthāne sthito jambūḥ śāko majjāsu saṃsthitaḥ /
analyzed: asthi sthāne sthitaḥ jambūḥ śākaḥ majjāsu saṃsthitaḥ

original: kuśadvīpaḥ sthito māṃse krauñcadvīpaḥ śirāsthitaḥ // GarP_2,32.113 //
analyzed: kuśadvīpaḥ sthitaḥ māṃse krauñcadvīpaḥ śirā sthitaḥ

original: tvacāyāṃ śālmalidvāpo plakṣaḥ romṇāṃ ca sañcaye /
analyzed: tvacāyām plakṣaḥ romṇām ca sañcaye
nakha sthaḥ puṣkaradvīpaḥ sāgarāḥ tad anantaram
kṣārodaḥ ca tathā mūtre kṣāre kṣīroda sāgaraḥ
surā udadhiḥ ca śleṣma sthaḥ majjāyām ghṛta sāgaraḥ
rasa udadhim rase vidyāt śoṇite dadhi sagaram
svādulam lambikā sthāne garbhodam śukra saṃsthitam

original: nādacakre sthitaḥ sūryo binducakre ca candramāḥ /
analyzed: nādacakre sthitaḥ sūryaḥ binducakre ca candramāḥ

original: locanasthaḥ kujo jñeyo hṛdaye ca budhaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_2,32.117 //
analyzed: locana sthaḥ kujaḥ jñeyaḥ hṛdaye ca budhaḥ smṛtaḥ
viṣṇu sthāne gurum vidyāt śrukre śukraḥ vyavasthitaḥ

original: nābhisthāne sthito mando mukhe rāhuḥ sthitaḥ sadā // GarP_2,32.118 //
analyzed: nābhi sthāne sthitaḥ mandaḥ mukhe rāhuḥ sthitaḥ sadā

original: pāyu (da) sthāne sthitaḥ ketuḥ śarīre grahamaṇḍalam /
analyzed: pāyu da sthāne sthitaḥ ketuḥ śarīre graha maṇḍalam
vibhaktam ca samākhyātam āpādatalamastakam

original: utpannā ye hi saṃsāre mriyante te na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: utpannāḥ ye hi saṃsāre mriyante te na saṃśayaḥ

original: bubhukṣā ca tṛṣā raudrā dāhodbhūtā ca mūrchanā // GarP_2,32.120 //
analyzed: bubhukṣā ca tṛṣā raudrā dāha udbhūtā ca mūrchanā
yatra pīḍāḥ tu imāḥ raudrāḥ tāḥ vai vṛścika daṃśa jāḥ

original: vināśaḥ pūrṇakāle ca jāyate sarvadehinām // GarP_2,32.121 //
analyzed: vināśaḥ pūrṇa kāle ca jāyate sarva dehinām
agre agre hi dhāvanti
tapta vāluka madhyena prajvalat vahni madhyataḥ
keśa grāhaiḥ samākrāntāḥ nīyante yama kiṅkaraiḥ
pāpiṣṭhāḥ tu adhamāḥ tārkṣya dayā dharma vivirjitāḥ

original: yamaloke vasantyete kuṭyāṃ janma na vidyate /
analyzed: yama loke vasanti ete kuṭyām janma na vidyate

original: evaṃ sañjāyate tārkṣya martye jantuḥ svakarmabhiḥ // GarP_2,32.124 //
analyzed: evam sañjāyate tārkṣya martye jantuḥ sva karmabhiḥ

original: utpannā ye hi saṃsāre mriyante te na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: utpannāḥ ye hi saṃsāre mriyante te na saṃśayaḥ

original: āyuḥ karma ca vittañca vidyā nidhanameva ca // GarP_2,32.125 //
analyzed: āyuḥ karma ca vittam ca vidyā nidhanam eva ca
pañca etāni hi sṛjyante garbha sthasya eva dehinaḥ

original: karmaṇā jāyate jantuḥ karmaṇaiva pralīyate // GarP_2,32.126 //
analyzed: karmaṇā jāyate jantuḥ karmaṇā eva pralīyate

original: sukhaṃ duḥ khaṃ bhayaṃ kṣemaṃ karmaṇaivābhipadyate /
analyzed: sukham duḥ kham bhayam kṣemam karmaṇā eva abhipadyate
adhomukham ca ūrdhva pādam garbhāt vāyuḥ prakarṣati
janmataḥ vaiṣṇavī māyā saṃmohayati satvaram
sva karma kṛta sambandhaḥ jantuḥ janma prapadyate
sukṛtāt uttamaḥ bhoga bhogyavān su kule bhavet

original: yathāyathā duṣkṛtaṃ tat kule hīne prajāyate // GarP_2,32.129 //
analyzed: yathā yathā duṣkṛtam tat kule hīne prajāyate
daridraḥ vyādhitaḥ mūrkhaḥ pāpa kṛt duḥkha bhājanam

original: ataḥ paraṃ kimarthaṃ te kathayāmi khageśvara // GarP_2,32.130 //
analyzed: atas param kim artham te kathayāmi khageśvara

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīdṛ dharmadṛpretadṛśrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde jantūtpattitadgadhātvādivibhāgabhuvanādivibhāgavarṇanaṃ  #
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dharmadṛ pretadṛ śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde
nāma dvātriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
garuḍaḥ uvāca
utpatti lakṣaṇam jantoḥ kathitam mayi puttrake
yama lokaḥ kiyat mātraḥ trailokye sacarācare

original: vistaraṃ tasya me brūhi adhvā caiva kiyān smṛtaḥ // GarP_2,33.1 //
analyzed: vistaram tasya me brūhi adhvā ca eva kiyān smṛtaḥ

original: kaiśca pāpaiḥ kṛtairdeva kena vā śubhakarmaṇā /
analyzed: kaiḥ ca pāpaiḥ kṛtaiḥ deva kena vā śubha karmaṇā
gacchanti mānavāḥ tatra kathayasva viśeṣataḥ
śrī bhagavān uvāca
ṣaṭaśīti sahasrāṇi yojanānām pramāṇataḥ
yama lokasya ca adhvānam antarā mānuṣasya ca
dhmāta tāmram iva ātaptaḥ jvalat durgaḥ mahā pathaḥ

original: tatra gacchanti pāpiṣṭhā mānavā mūḍhacetasaḥ // GarP_2,33.4 //
analyzed: tatra gacchanti pāpiṣṭhāḥ mānavāḥ mūḍha cetasaḥ
kaṇṭakāḥ ca su tīkṣṇāḥ vai vividhāḥ ghora darśanāḥ
taiḥ tuvālu kṣitiḥ vyāptā hutāśaḥ ca tathā ulbaṇaḥ

original: vṛkṣacchāyā na tatrāsti yatra viśramate naraḥ /
analyzed: vṛkṣa chāyā na tatra asti yatra viśramate naraḥ
gṛhītaḥ kāla pāśaiḥ ca kṛtaiḥ karmabhiḥ ulbaṇaiḥ

original: tasmin mārge na cānnādyaṃ yena prāṇān prapoṣayet /
analyzed: tasmin mārge na ca annādyam yena prāṇān prapoṣayet

original: na jalaṃ dṛśyate tatra tṛṣā yena vilīyate // GarP_2,33.7 //
analyzed: na jalam dṛśyate tatra tṛṣā yena vilīyate

original: kṣudhayā pīḍito yāti tṛṣṇayā ca mahāpathe /
analyzed: kṣudhayā pīḍitaḥ yāti tṛṣṇayā ca mahāpathe
śītena kampate kvāpi yama mārge ti durgame

original: yadyasya yādṛśaṃ pāpaṃ sa panthāstasya tādṛśaḥ /
analyzed: yat yasya yādṛśam pāpam sa panthāḥ tasya tādṛśaḥ

original: sudīnāḥ kṛpaṇā mūḍhā duḥ khairvyāptāstaranti tam // GarP_2,33.9 //
analyzed: su dīnāḥ kṛpaṇāḥ mūḍhāḥ duḥ khaiḥ vyāptāḥ taranti tam

original: rudanti dāruṇaṃ kecit keciddrohaṃ vadanti ca /
analyzed: rudanti dāruṇam kecid kecid droham vadanti ca
ātma karma kṛtaiḥ deṣaiḥ pacyamānāḥ muhur muhur

original: īdṛgvidhaḥ sa vai panthā vijñeyo dāruṇaḥ khaga /
analyzed: īdṛgvidhaḥ sa vai panthāḥ vijñeyaḥ dāruṇaḥ khaga

original: vitṛṣṇā ye narā loke sukhaṃ tasmin vrajanti te // GarP_2,33.11 //
analyzed: vitṛṣṇāḥ ye narāḥ loke sukham tasmin vrajanti te

original: yāniyāni ca dānāni dattāni bhuvi mānavaiḥ /
analyzed: yāni yāni ca dānāni dattāni bhuvi mānavaiḥ
tāni tāni upatiṣṭhanti yama loke puras pathi
pāpinaḥ na upatiṣṭhanti dāha śrāddha jala añjali

original: bhramanti vāyubhūtāste ye kṣudrāḥ pāpakarmiṇaḥ // GarP_2,33.13 //
analyzed: bhramanti vāyu bhūtāḥ te ye kṣudrāḥ pāpa karmiṇaḥ

original: īdṛśaṃ vartma tadraudraṃ kathitaṃ tava suvrata /
analyzed: īdṛśam vartma tat raudram kathitam tava suvrata

original: punaśca kathayiṣyāmi yamamārgasya yā sthitiḥ // GarP_2,33.14 //
analyzed: punar ca kathayiṣyāmi yama mārgasya yā sthitiḥ
yāmya nairṛtayoḥ madhye puram vaivasvatasya tu

original: sarvaṃ vajramayaṃ divyamabhedyaṃ tat surāsuraiḥ // GarP_2,33.15 //
analyzed: sarvam vajra mayam divyam abhedyam tat sura asuraiḥ
caturaśram catur dvāram sapta prākāra toraṇam

original: svayaṃ tiṣṭhati vai yasyāṃ yamo dūtaiḥ samanvitaḥ // GarP_2,33.16 //
analyzed: svayam tiṣṭhati vai yasyām yamaḥ dūtaiḥ samanvitaḥ
yojanānām sahasram vai pramāṇena tat ucyate
sarva ratna mayam divyam vidyut jvālā arka taijasam
tat guham dharmarājasya vistīrṇam kāñcana prabham
yojanānām pañca śata pramāṇena samucchritam
vṛtam stambha sahasraiḥ tu vaidūrya maṇi maṇḍitam
muktā jāla gavākṣam ca patākā śata bhūṣitam
ghaṇṭā śata nināda āḍhyam toraṇānām śataiḥ vṛtam
evamādibhiḥ anyaiḥ ca bhūṣaṇaiḥ bhūṣitam sadā

original: tatrastho bhagavān dharma āsane tu same śubhe /
analyzed: tatrasthaḥ bhagavān dharmaḥ āsane tu same śubhe
daśayaḥ jana vistīrṇe nīla jīmūta sannibhe
dharma jñaḥ dharma śīlaḥ ca dharma yuktaḥ hitaḥ yamaḥ
bhaya daḥ pāpa yuktānām dhārmikāṇām sukha pradaḥ
manda māru ta saṃyogaiḥ utsavaiḥ vividhaiḥ tathā
vyākhyānaiḥ vividhaiḥ yuktaḥ śaṅkha vāditra niḥ svanaiḥ
pura madhya praveśe tu citraguptasya vai gṛham
pañcaviṃśati saṃkhyānām yojanānām su vistaram
daśa ucchritam mahā divyam loha prākāra voṣṭitam
pratolī śata saṃcāram patatākā śata śobhitam
dīpikā śata saṅkīrṇam gīta dhvani samākulam
vicitra citra kuśalaiḥ citraguptasya vai gṛham
maṇi muktā maye divye āsane parama adbhute
tatrasthaḥ gaṇayati āyuḥ mānuṣeṣu itareṣu ca

original: na muhyati kadācit sa sukṛte duṣkṛte 'pi vā /
analyzed: na muhyati kadācid sa sukṛte duṣkṛte vā

original: yadyenopārjitaṃ yāvat tāvadvai vetti tasya tat // GarP_2,33.28 //
analyzed: yat yena upārjitam yāvat tāvat vai vetti tasya tat
daśa aṣṭa doṣa rahitam karma likhati asau
citragupta ālayāt ācyām jvarasya asti mahā gṛham
dakṣiṇe ca api śūlasya latā visphoṭakasya ca
paścime kāla pāśasya ajīrṇasya aruceḥ tathā
madhya pīṭha uttare tathā ca anyā viṣacikā

original: aiśanyāṃ vai śiro 'rtiśca āgneyyāñcaiva mṛkatā // GarP_2,33.31 //
analyzed: aiśanyām vai śiraḥ ṛtiḥ ca āgneyyām ca eva mṛka tā
atisāraḥ ca nairṛtyām vāyavyām dāha saṃjñakaḥ

original: ebhiḥ parivṛto nityaṃ citraguptaḥ sa tiṣṭhati // GarP_2,33.32 //
analyzed: ebhiḥ parivṛtaḥ nityam citraguptaḥ sa tiṣṭhati

original: yat karma kurute kaścittat sarvaṃ vilakhatyasau /
analyzed: yat karma kurute kaścid tat sarvam vilakhati asau
dharmarāja gṛha dvāri dūtāḥ tārkṣya tathā niśi
tiṣṭhanti pāpa karmāṇaḥ pacyamānāḥ nara adhamāḥ
yamadūtaiḥ mahā pāśaiḥ hanyamānāḥ ca mudgaraiḥ
vadhyante vividhaiḥ pāpaiḥ pūrva karma kṛtaiḥ narāḥ
nānā prahāraṇa agraiḥ ca nānā yantraiḥ tathā pare
chidyante pāpa karmāṇaḥ krakacaiḥ kāṣṭha vat dvidhā
anye jvaladbhiḥ aṅgāraiḥ veṣṭitāḥ paritas bhṛśam
pūrva karma vipākena dhmāyante loha piṇḍa vat
kṣiptvā anye ca dharā pṛṣṭhe kuṭhāreṇa avakartitāḥ
krandamānāḥ ca dṛśyante pūrva karma vipākataḥ
kecid guḍa mayaiḥ pākaiḥ taila pākaiḥ tathā pare

original: pīḍyante yamadūtaiśca pāpiṣṭhāḥ subhṛśaṃ narāḥ // GarP_2,33.38 //
analyzed: pīḍyante yamadūtaiḥ ca pāpiṣṭhāḥ su bhṛśam narāḥ
kṣaṇa ahni prārthayanti anye dehi dehi iti koṭiśas

original: yamaloke mayā dṛṣṭā mamasvaṃ bhakṣitaṃ tvayā // GarP_2,33.39 //
analyzed: yama loke mayā dṛṣṭā mama svam bhakṣitam tvayā
iti evam bahuśas tārkṣya narakāḥ pāpinām smṛtāḥ
karmabhiḥ bahubhiḥ proktaiḥ sarva śāstreṣu bhāṣitaiḥ

original: dānopakāraṃ vakṣyāmi yathā tatra sukhaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,33.40 //
analyzed: dāna upakāram vakṣyāmi yathā tatra sukham bhavet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pratakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde yamalokavistṛtidṛvarṇanaṃ nāma trayastriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharmakāṇḍe prata kalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde yamalokavistṛtidṛvarṇanam nāma trayastriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca
śṛṇu tārkṣya yathānyāyam dharma adharmsya lakṣaṇam

original: sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ nṝṇāmagre dhāvati dhāvatām // GarP_2,34.1 //
analyzed: sukṛtam duṣkṛtam nṝṇām agre dhāvati dhāvatām
kṛte tapaḥ praśaṃsanti tretāyām jñāna sādhanam

original: dvāpare yajñadāne ca dānamekaṃ kalau yuge // GarP_2,34.2 //
analyzed: dvāpare yajña dāne ca dānam ekam kalau yuge
gṛhasthānām smṛtaḥ dharmaḥ uttamānām vicakṣaṇaiḥ

original: iṣṭāpūrte svaśaktyā hi kurvatāṃ nāsti pātakam // GarP_2,34.3 //
analyzed: iṣṭāpūrte sva śaktyā hi kurvatām na asti pātakam
vṛkṣaḥ tu ropitaḥ yena khani kūpa jalāśayāḥ

original: yamamārge sukhaṃ tasya vrajato nitarāṃ bhavet // GarP_2,34.4 //
analyzed: yama mārge sukham tasya vrajataḥ nitarām bhavet
agni tāpa pradātāre yaiḥ śīta pīḍite dvije

original: tapyamānāḥ sukhaṃ yānti sarva kāmaiḥ prapūritāḥ // GarP_2,34.5 //
analyzed: tapyamānāḥ sukham yānti sarva kāmaiḥ prapūritāḥ
suvarṇa maṇi muktā ādi vastrāṇi ābharaṇāni ca

original: tena sarvamidaṃ dattaṃ yena dattā vasundharā // GarP_2,34.6 //
analyzed: tena sarvam idam dattam yena dattā vasundharā

original: yāniyāni ca bhūtāni dattāni bhuvi mānavaiḥ /
analyzed: yāni yāni ca bhūtāni dattāni bhuvi mānavaiḥ
yama loka pathe tāni tiṣṭhanti eṣām samīpatas
vyañjanāni vicitrāṇi bhakṣya bhojyāni yāni ca

original: dadāti vidhinā putra prete tadu patiṣṭhati // GarP_2,34.8 //
analyzed: dadāti vidhinā putra prete tat u patiṣṭhati
ātmā vai putra nāmā asti putraḥ trātā yama ālaye

original: tārayet pitaraṃ ghorāt tena puttraḥ pravakṣyate // GarP_2,34.9 //
analyzed: tārayet pitaram ghorāt tena puttraḥ pravakṣyate
atas deyam ca putreṇa śrāddham ājī

original: ativāhastadā preto bhogān vai labhate hi saḥ // GarP_2,34.10 //
analyzed: ativāhaḥ tadā pretaḥ bhogān vai labhate hi saḥ
dahyamānasya pretasya sva janaiḥ yaḥ jala añjaliḥ

original: dīyate pretarūpo 'sau prīto yāti yamālaye // GarP_2,34.11 //
analyzed: dīyate sau prītaḥ yāti yama ālaye

original: apakve mṛnmaye pātre dugdhaṃ dattaṃ dinatrayam /
analyzed: apakve mṛd maye pātre dugdham dattam dina trayam

original: kāṣṭhatrayaṃ guṇairbaddhvā prītyai rātrau catuṣpathe // GarP_2,34.12 //
analyzed: kāṣṭha trayam guṇaiḥ baddhvā prītyai rātrau catuṣpathe

original: prathame 'hni dvitīye ca tṛtīye ca tathā khaga /
analyzed: prathame hni dvitīye ca tṛtīye ca tathā khaga
ākāśa stham pibet dugdham pretaḥ vāyu vapuḥ dharaḥ
caturthe sañcayaḥ kāryaḥ caturthe
vā api sa agnike
asthisañcayanam kāryam dadyāt āpāñjalim tatas

original: na pūrvāhne na madhyāhne nāparāhne na sandhiṣu /
analyzed: na pūrvāhne na madhyāhne na aparāhne na sandhiṣu
yāte prathama yāme tu dadyāt āpa jala añjaṃlīn

original: puttreṇa datte te sarve gotriṇo hitabāndhavāḥ /
analyzed: puttreṇa datte te sarve gotriṇaḥ hita bāndhavāḥ

original: svajātyaiḥ parajātyaiśca deyo nadyāṃ jalāñjaliḥ // GarP_2,34.16 //
analyzed: sva jātyaiḥ para jātyaiḥ ca deyaḥ nadyām jala añjaliḥ

original: gantavyaṃ naiva vipreṇa dātuṃ śīghraṃ jalāñjalim /
analyzed: gantavyam nā eva vipreṇa dātum śīghram jala añjalim

original: nivṛttāśca yadā nāryo lokācāraḥ sadābhavet // GarP_2,34.17 //
analyzed: nivṛttāḥ ca yadā nāryaḥ loka ācāraḥ sadā bhavet

original: pañcatvañca gate śūdre yaḥ kāṣṭhaṃ nayate citām /
analyzed: pañcatvam ca gate śūdre yaḥ kāṣṭham nayate citām
anuvrajet yadā vipraḥ tri rātram aśuciḥ bhavet

original: trirātre ca tataḥ pūrṇe nadīṃ gacchet samudragām /
analyzed: tri rātre ca tatas pūrṇe nadīm gacchet samudra gām

original: prāṇāyāmaśataṃ kṛtvā ghṛtaṃ prāśya viśudhyati // GarP_2,34.19 //
analyzed: prāṇāyāma śatam kṛtvā ghṛtam prāśya viśudhyati

original: śūdro gacchati sarvatra vaiśyastriṣu dvayoḥ paraḥ /
analyzed: śūdraḥ gacchati sarvatra vaiśyaḥ triṣu dvayoḥ paraḥ

original: gacchati svīyavarṇeṣu dātuṃ prete jalāñjalim // GarP_2,34.20 //
analyzed: gacchati svīya varṇeṣu dātum prete jala añjalim
datte jala añjalau paścāt vidadhyāt dantadhāvanam

original: tyajanti gotriṇaḥ sarve dināni nava kāśyapa // GarP_2,34.21 //
analyzed: tyajanti gotriṇaḥ sarve dināni nava kāśyapa
jala añjalim tathā dātum gacchanti dvijasattamāḥ

original: yatra sthāne mṛto yastu adhvanyapi gṛhe 'pi vā /
analyzed: yatra sthāne mṛtaḥ yaḥ tu adhvani api gṛhe vā

original: viśleṣastu tataḥ sthānānna kvacidvihito budhaiḥ // GarP_2,34.22 //
analyzed: viśleṣaḥ tu tatas sthānāt na kvacid vihitaḥ budhaiḥ
strī janaḥ ca agratas gacchet pṛṣṭhatas nava sañcayaḥ
ācamanam vidhātavyam pāṣāṇa upari saṃsthitaiḥ
yavān ca sarṣapān dūrvāḥ pūrṇa pātre vilokayet
prāśayet nimba patrāṇi sneha snānam samācaret

original: gotribhirna ca kartavyaṃ gṛhānnañca na bhojayet /
analyzed: gotribhiḥ na ca kartavyam gṛha annam ca na bhojayet

original: bhuñjīta mṛnmaye pātre uttānañca vivarjayet // GarP_2,34.25 //
analyzed: bhuñjīta mṛd maye pātre uttānam ca vivarjayet
mṛtakasya guṇāḥ grāhyāḥ yama gāthām samudgiret
śubha aśubhe ca dhyātavye pūrva karma upasañcite
labdhena eva ca dehena bhuṅkte sukṛta duṣkṛte

original: vāyurūpo bhramatyeva vāyurūrdhvaṃ sa gacchati // GarP_2,34.27 //
analyzed: vāyu rūpaḥ bhramati eva vāyuḥ ūrdhvam sa gacchati
daśa aha karma kriyayā kuṭī niṣpādyate dhruvam

original: navakaiḥ ṣoḍaśaśrāddhaiḥ prayāti hi kuṭīṃ naraḥ // GarP_2,34.28 //
analyzed: navakaiḥ ṣoḍaśa śrāddhaiḥ prayāti hi kuṭīm naraḥ

original: tilairdarbhaiśca bhūmyāṃ vai kuṭī dhātumayī bhavet /
analyzed: tilaiḥ darbhaiḥ ca bhūmyām vai kuṭī dhātu mayī bhavet

original: pañca ratnāni vaktre tu yena jīvaḥ prarohati // GarP_2,34.29 //
analyzed: pañca ratnāni vaktre tu yena jīvaḥ prarohati

original: yadā puṣpaṃ pranaṣṭaṃ hi tadā garbhaṃ na dhārayet /
analyzed: yadā puṣpam pranaṣṭam hi tadā garbham na dhārayet

original: ādarācca tato bhūmau tiladarbhānviniḥ kṣipet // GarP_2,34.30 //
analyzed: ādarāt ca tatas bhūmau tila darbhān viniḥ kṣipet

original: paśutve sthāvaratve ca yatra kvāpi sa jāyate /
analyzed: paśu tve sthāvara tve ca yatra kvāpi sa jāyate
tatra eva jantuḥ utpannaḥ śrāddham tatra upatiṣṭhati
dhanvinā lakṣyam uddiśya muktaḥ bāṇaḥ tat āpnuyāt

original: yathā śrāddhaṃ yamuddiśya kṛtaṃ tasyopatiṣṭhati // GarP_2,34.32 //
analyzed: yathā śrāddham yam uddiśya kṛtam tasya upatiṣṭhati
yāvat na utpāditaḥ dehaḥ tāvat śrāddhaiḥ na prīṇanam
kṣudhā vibhramam āpannaḥ daśa ahena ca tarpitaḥ

original: piṇḍadānaṃ na yasyābhūdākāśe bhramate tu saḥ /
analyzed: piṇḍa dānam na yasya abhūt ākāśe bhramate tu saḥ
dina trayam vasan toye agnau api dina trayam

original: ākāśe vasate trīṇi dinamekantu vāsake // GarP_2,34.34 //
analyzed: ākāśe vasate trīṇi dinam ekam tu vāsake

original: dagdhe dehe ca vahnau ca jalenaiva tu tarpitaḥ /
analyzed: dagdhe dehe ca vahnau ca jalena eva tu tarpitaḥ
sneha snānam jalena eva pūpakaiḥ kṛsaraiḥ gṛhe

original: prathame 'hni tṛtīye ca pañcame saptame 'pi vā /
analyzed: prathame hni tṛtīye ca pañcame saptame vā
navama ekādaśe ca eva śrāddham navakam ucyate

original: gṛhadvāre śmaśāne vā tīrthe devālaye 'pi vā /
analyzed: gṛha dvāre śmaśāne vā tīrthe devālaye vā

original: yatrādyo dīyate piṇḍastatra sarvān samāpayet // GarP_2,34.37 //
analyzed: yatra ādyaḥ dīyate piṇḍaḥ tatra sarvān samāpayet
ekādaśa ahe yat śrāddham tat sāmānyam udāhṛtam
caturṇām eka varṇānām śuddhi artham snānam ucyate
kṛtvā ca ekādaśa ahan ca punar snātvā śuciḥ bhavet

original: dadyādviprāya yaḥ śayyāṃ yathoktaṃ pretamokṣadām // GarP_2,34.39 //
analyzed: dadyāt viprāya yaḥ śayyām yathoktam preta mokṣa dām

original: na bhavet yadā sa gotro paro 'pi vidhimācaret /
analyzed: na bhavet yadā vidhim ācaret

original: bhāryā vā puruṣaḥ kaścit tuṣṭaśca kurute striyaḥ // GarP_2,34.40 //
analyzed: bhāryā vā puruṣaḥ kaścid tuṣṭaḥ ca kurute striyaḥ
prathame hani yaḥ piṇḍaḥ dīyate vidhi pūrvakam

original: annādyena ca tenaiva sarvaśrāddhāni kārayet // GarP_2,34.41 //
analyzed: annādyena ca tena eva sarva śrāddhāni kārayet
amantram kārayet śrāddham daśa aham nāma gotrataḥ

original: śrāddhaṃ kṛtantu yairvastraistāni tyaktvā gṛhaṃ viśet // GarP_2,34.42 //
analyzed: śrāddham yaiḥ vastraiḥ tāni tyaktvā gṛham viśet

original: asagotraḥ sagotro vā yadi strī yadi vā pumān /
analyzed: asagotraḥ sagotraḥ vā yadi strī yadi vā pumān

original: prathame 'hani yaḥ kuryāt sa daśāhaṃ samāpayet // GarP_2,34.43 //
analyzed: prathame hani yaḥ kuryāt sa daśa aham samāpayet
jīvasya daśabhiḥ piṇḍaiḥ dehaḥ niṣpādyate dhruvam
vṛddhiḥ ca daśabhiḥ māsaiḥ garbha sthasya yathā bhavet
āśaucam yāvat etasya tāvat piṇḍa udakakriyā

original: caturṇāmapi varṇānāmeṣa eva vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_2,34.45 //
analyzed: caturṇām api varṇānām eṣaḥ eva vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ
yatra tri rātram āśaucam tatra ādau trīn pradāpayet

original: caturastu dvitīye 'hni tṛtīye trīṃśtathaiva ca // GarP_2,34.46 //
analyzed: caturaḥ tu dvitīye hni tṛtīye trīn tathā eva ca
pṛthak śarāvayoḥ dadyāt eka aham kṣīram ambu ca

original: ekoddiṣṭantu vai śrāddhaṃ caturthe 'hani kārayet // GarP_2,34.47 //
analyzed: ekoddiṣṭam tu vai śrāddham caturthe hani kārayet
prathame hani yaḥ piṇḍaḥ tena mūrdhā prajāyate

original: cakṣuḥ śrotrañca nāsā ca dvitīye 'hni prajāyate // GarP_2,34.48 //
analyzed: cakṣuḥ śrotram ca nāsā ca dvitīye hni prajāyate

original: gaṇḍau vaktraṃ tathā grīvā tṛtīye 'hani jāyate /
analyzed: gaṇḍau vaktram tathā grīvā tṛtīye hani jāyate

original: hṛdayaṃ kukṣirudaraṃ caturthe tadvadeva hi // GarP_2,34.49 //
analyzed: hṛdayam kukṣiḥ udaram caturthe tadvat eva hi
kaṭi pṛṣṭham gudam ca api pañcame hani jāyate

original: ṣaṣṭhe ūrū ca vijñeye saptame gulphasambhavaḥ // GarP_2,34.50 //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhe ūrū ca vijñeye saptame gulpha sambhavaḥ

original: aṣṭame divase prāpte jaṅghe ca bhavato 'ṇḍaja /
analyzed: aṣṭame divase prāpte jaṅghe ca bhavataḥ ṇḍaja

original: pādau ca navame jñeyau daśame balavatkṣudhā // GarP_2,34.51 //
analyzed: pādau ca navame jñeyau daśame balavat kṣudhā
ekādaśa ahe yaḥ piṇḍaḥ tam dadyāt āmiṣeṇa tu

original: siddhānnaṃ tasya dātavyaṃ kṛśarāḥ pūpakāḥ payaḥ /
analyzed: siddhānnam tasya dātavyam kṛśarāḥ pūpakāḥ payaḥ
prakṣālya vipracaraṇau arghyam dhūpam ca dīpakram
dvādaśa pratimāsyāni śrāddhāni aikādaśe tathā

original: tripakṣañcāpi ṣaṇmāse dve śrāddhāni ca ṣoḍaśa // GarP_2,34.53 //
analyzed: tri pakṣam ca api ṣaṣ māse dve śrāddhāni ca ṣoḍaśa

original: prati māsaṃ pradātavyaṃ mṛtāhe yā tithirbhavet /
analyzed: prati māsam pradātavyam mṛtāhe yā tithiḥ bhavet

original: sa māsaḥ prathamo jñeya iti vedavido viduḥ // GarP_2,34.54 //
analyzed: sa māsaḥ prathamaḥ jñeyaḥ iti veda vidaḥ viduḥ
śava haste ca yat śrāddham mṛti sthāne dvija āsane

original: tadeva prathamaṃ śrāddhaṃ tat syādekādaśe 'hani // GarP_2,34.55 //
analyzed: tat eva prathamam śrāddham tat syāt ekādaśe hani

original: sā tithirmāsike śrāddhe mṛto yasmin dine naraḥ /
analyzed: sā tithiḥ māsike śrāddhe mṛtaḥ yasmin dine naraḥ

original: riktayośca tripakṣe ca sā tithirnādriyeta vai // GarP_2,34.56 //
analyzed: riktayoḥ ca tri pakṣe ca sā tithiḥ na ādriyeta vai

original: paurṇamāsyāṃ mṛto yo 'sau caturthī tasya conakā /
analyzed: paurṇamāsyām mṛtaḥ sau caturthī tasya conakā

original: caturthyāntu mṛto yastu navamī tasya conakā // GarP_2,34.57 //
analyzed: caturthyām tu mṛtaḥ yaḥ tu navamī tasya conakā

original: navamyāñca mṛto yaśca riktā tasya caturdaśī /
analyzed: navamyām ca mṛtaḥ yaḥ ca riktā tasya caturdaśī

original: etā riktāśca vijñeyā antyeṣṭau kuśalena ca // GarP_2,34.58 //
analyzed: etāḥ riktāḥ ca vijñeyāḥ antyeṣṭau kuśalena ca
ekādaśa ahe yat śrāddham navakam tat prakīrtitam

original: catuṣpathe tyajedannaṃ punaḥ snānaṃ samācaret // GarP_2,34.59 //
analyzed: catuṣpathe tyajet annam punar snānam samācaret
ekādaśa ahāt ārabhya ghaṭasya annam jala anvitam
dine dine ca dātavyam abdam yāvat dvijottame
mānuṣasya śarīre tu vidyate hi asthi sañcayaḥ
tad saṃkhyaḥ sarva deheṣu ṣaṣṭi adhika śata trayam
uda kumbhena puṣṭāni tāni asthīni bhavanti hi

original: etasmāddīyate kumbhaḥ prītiḥ pretasya jāyate // GarP_2,34.62 //
analyzed: etasmāt dīyate kumbhaḥ prītiḥ pretasya jāyate

original: yasmin dine mṛto janturaṭavyāṃ viṣame 'pi vā /
analyzed: yasmin dine mṛtaḥ jantuḥ aṭavyām viṣame vā

original: yadā tadā bhaveddāhaḥ sūtakaṃ mṛtavāsarāt // GarP_2,34.63 //
analyzed: yadā tadā bhavet dāhaḥ sūtakam mṛta vāsarāt
tila pātram tathā annādyam yat

original: ekādaśāhe dātavyaṃ tena śūddho dvijo bhavet // GarP_2,34.64 //
analyzed: ekādaśa ahe dātavyam tena śūddhaḥ dvijaḥ bhavet

original: kṣattriyo dvādaśāhe tu vaiśyaḥ pañcadaśe tathā /
analyzed: kṣattriyaḥ dvādaśa ahe tu vaiśyaḥ pañcadaśe tathā

original: śuddhiḥ śūdrasya māsena mṛtake jātasūtake // GarP_2,34.65 //
analyzed: śuddhiḥ śūdrasya māsena mṛtake jāta sūtake

original: māsatraye trirātraṃ syāt ṣaṇmāsena tu pakṣiṇī /
analyzed: māsa traye tri rātram syāt ṣaṣ māsena tu pakṣiṇī
ahar saṃvatsarāt arbudh pūrṇe dattvā udakam śuciḥ

original: anenaivā nusāreṇa śuddhiḥ syāt sārvavarṇikī // GarP_2,34.66 //
analyzed: anena eva anusāreṇa śuddhiḥ syāt sārvavarṇikī
ekādaśa aha prabhṛti puratas prativatsaram
viśvedevān tu sampūjya piṇḍam ekam ca nirvapet
yathā tārā gaṇāḥ sarve chādyante ravi raśmibhiḥ

original: evaṃ pracchādyate sarvaṃ na preto bhavati kvacit // GarP_2,34.68 //
analyzed: evam pracchādyate sarvam na pretaḥ bhavati kvacid
śayyā dānam praśaṃsanti sarvadā eva dvijottamāḥ

original: anityaṃ jīvanaṃ ysamāt paścāt ko nu pradāsyati // GarP_2,34.69 //
analyzed: anityam jīvanam ysamāt paścāt kaḥ nu pradāsyati
tāvat vandhuḥ pitā tāvat yāvat jīvati mānavaḥ

original: mṛte mṛta iti jñātvā kṣaṇāt sneho nivartate // GarP_2,34.70 //
analyzed: mṛte mṛtaḥ iti jñātvā kṣaṇāt snehaḥ nivartate
ātmā eva hi ātmanaḥ bandhuḥ evam jñātvā muhur muhur
jīvan api iti sañcintya svīyam hita manuḥ tam aret
mṛtānām kaḥ sutaḥ dadyāt dvijeśayyām sa tūlikām

original: evaṃ jānannidaṃ sarvaṃ svahastenaiva dāpayet // GarP_2,34.72 //
analyzed: evam jānan idam sarvam sva hastena eva dāpayet
tasmāt śayyām samāsādya sāradāru maryaḥ dṛḍhām
danta ādi rucirām ramyām hema paṭṭaiḥ ralaṅkṛtām

original: tasyāṃ saṃsthāpya haimañca hariṃ lakṣmyā samanvitam // GarP_2,34.73 //
analyzed: tasyām saṃsthāpya haimam ca harim lakṣmyā samanvitam
ghṛta pūrṇam ca kalaśam parikalpayet

original: vijñeyo garuḍa prītyai sa nidrākalaśo budhaiḥ // GarP_2,34.74 //
analyzed: vijñeyaḥ garuḍa prītyai sa nidrā kalaśaḥ budhaiḥ
dīpikā upānaha chatra cāmara āsana bhājanam
pārśveṣu sthāpayet śaktyā saptadhānyāni ca eva hi
śayana sthasya bhavati yat ca anyat upakārakam
bhṛṅgāra karaka ādarśam pañca varṇam vitānakam
śayyām evaṃvidhām kṛtvā brāhmaṇāya nivedayet
sa patnīkāya sampūjya svar loka sukha dāyinīm

original: vastraiḥ suśobhanaiḥ pūjya cailakaṃ paridhāpayet // GarP_2,34.78 //
analyzed: vastraiḥ su śobhanaiḥ pūjya cailakam paridhāpayet
karṇa kaṇṭha aṅgulī bāhu bhūṣaṇaiḥ citra bhūṣaṇaiḥ
gṛha upakaraṇaiḥ yuktam gṛham dhenvā samanvitam
sampradātavyaḥ pañcaratna phala akṣataiḥ
yathā na kṛṣṇa śayanam śūnyam sāgarakanyayā
śayyā mama api a śūnyā astu tathā janmani janmani
dattvā evam talpam amalam kṣamāpya ca visarjayet

original: tathā caikādaśāhe tu vidhireṣa prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_2,34.82 //
analyzed: tathā ca ekādaśa ahe tu vidhiḥ eṣa prakīrtitaḥ

original: dadāti yo hi dharmārthe bāndhavo bāndhave mṛte /
analyzed: dadāti yaḥ hi dharma arthe bāndhavaḥ bāndhave mṛte

original: viśeṣamatra pakṣe tu kathyamānaṃ mayā śṛṇu // GarP_2,34.83 //
analyzed: viśeṣam atra pakṣe tu kathyamānam mayā śṛṇu

original: upayuktañca tasyāsīt yat kiñcit svagṛhe purā /
analyzed: upayuktam ca tasya āsīt yat kiñcid sva gṛhe purā
tasya yat gātra sam lagnam vastram bhājana vāhanam

original: yadabhīṣṭañca tasyāsīt tat sarvaṃ parikalpayet // GarP_2,34.84 //
analyzed: yat abhīṣṭam ca tasya āsīt tat sarvam parikalpayet

original: sthāpayet puruṣaṃ haimaṃ śayyopari śubhaṃ budhaḥ /
analyzed: sthāpayet puruṣam haimam śayyā upari śubham budhaḥ
pūjayitvā pradātavyā mṛtaśayyā yathā uditā
purandara gṛhe sarvam sūryaputra ālaye tathā
upatiṣṭhet sukham jantoḥ śayyā dāna prabhāvataḥ

original: pīḍayanti na taṃ yāmyāḥ puruṣā bhīṣaṇānanāḥ /
analyzed: pīḍayanti na tam yāmyāḥ puruṣāḥ bhīṣaṇa ānanāḥ

original: na gharmeṇa na śītena bādhyate sa naraḥ kvacit // GarP_2,34.87 //
analyzed: na gharmeṇa na śītena bādhyate sa naraḥ kvacid
śayyā dāna prabhāveṇa pretaḥ mucyate bandhanāt

original: apiḥ pāpasamāyuktaḥ svargalokaṃ sa gacchati // GarP_2,34.88 //
analyzed: apiḥ pāpa samāyuktaḥ svarga lokam sa gacchati
vimāna varam ārūḍhaḥ psaraḥ gaṇaiḥ
ābhūtasaṃplavam yāvat tiṣṭhet pātaka varjitaḥ
