original: bharturyā kurute nārī tasyāḥ śreyo hyanantakam // GarP_2,34.90 //
analyzed: bhartuḥ yā kurute nārī tasyāḥ śreyaḥ hi anantakam

original: upakārāya sā bharturjīvantī na mṛtā tathā /
analyzed: upakārāya sā bhartuḥ jīvantī na mṛtā tathā

original: uddharejjīvamānā sā satī satyavatī priyam // GarP_2,34.91 //
analyzed: uddharet jīvamānā sā satī satyavatī priyam
striyāḥ dadhi anna śayane hema kuṅkumam añjanam

original: vastrabhūṣā tathā śayyā sarvametaddhi dāpayet // GarP_2,34.92 //
analyzed: vastra bhūṣā tathā śayyā sarvam etat hi dāpayet
upakāra karam strīṇām kiñcana

original: bhūṣaṇaṃ gātralagnañca vastu bhogyādikañca yat // GarP_2,34.93 //
analyzed: bhūṣaṇam gātra lagnam ca vastu bhogya ādikañca yat

original: tat sarvaṃ melayitvā tu svesve sthāne niyojayet /
analyzed: tat sarvam melayitvā tu sve sve sthāne niyojayet
pūjayet lokapālān ca grahān devīm vināyakam
tatas śukla ambara dharaḥ gṛhīta kusuma añjaliḥ
imam uccārayet mantram viprasya puratas budhaḥ
pretasya pratimā hi eṣā sarva upakaraṇaiḥ yutā
sarva ratna samāyuktā tava vipra niveditā

original: ātmā śambhuḥ śivā gaurī śakraḥ suragaṇaiḥ saha /
analyzed: ātmā śambhuḥ śivā gaurī śakraḥ sura gaṇaiḥ saha
tasmāt śayyā pradānena saḥ eṣaḥ ātmā prasīdatu
ācāryāya pradātavyā brāhmaṇāya kuṭumbine

original: gṛhīte brāhmaṇastatra ko 'dāditi ca kīrtayet // GarP_2,34.98 //
analyzed: gṛhīte brāhmaṇaḥ tatra kaḥ dāt iti ca kīrtayet
tatas pradakṣiṇīkṛtya praṇipatya visarjayet

original: vidhinānena vai pakṣin dānamekasya dāpayet // GarP_2,34.99 //
analyzed: vidhinā anena vai pakṣin dānam ekasya dāpayet

original: bahubhyo na pradeyāni gaurgṛhaṃ śayanaṃ striyaḥ /
analyzed: bahubhyaḥ na pradeyāni gauḥ gṛham śayanam striyaḥ

original: vibhaktadakṣiṇā hyete dātāraṃ pātayanti hi // GarP_2,34.100 //
analyzed: vibhakta dakṣiṇāḥ hi ete dātāram pātayanti hi

original: evaṃ yo vitaret tārkṣya śṛṇu tasya ca yat phalam /
analyzed: evam yaḥ vitaret tārkṣya śṛṇu tasya ca yat phalam

original: sāgraṃ varṣaśataṃ divyaṃ svargaloke mahīyate // GarP_2,34.101 //
analyzed: sāgram varṣa śatam divyam svarga loke mahīyate
yat vyatīpāte kārtikyām ayana dvaye

original: dvārakāyāntu yat puṇyaṃ candrasūryagrahe tathā // GarP_2,34.102 //
analyzed: dvārakāyān tu yat puṇyam candra sūrya grahe tathā
prayāge naimiṣe yat ca kurukṣetre tarthābude
gaṅgāyām yamunāyām ca sindhu sāgara saṃgame
teṣu yat dīyate dānam tasmāt api adhikan tu idam
etat śayyā pradānasya na āpnoti ṣoḍaśīm kalām

original: yatrāsau jāyate prāṇī bhuṅkte tatraiva tat phalam /
analyzed: yatra asau jāyate prāṇī bhuṅkte tatra eva tat phalam

original: karmakṣaye kṣitau yāti mānuṣaḥ śubhadarśanaḥ // GarP_2,34.105 //
analyzed: karma kṣaye kṣitau yāti mānuṣaḥ śubha darśanaḥ
mahā dhanī ca dharma jñaḥ sarva śāstra viśāradaḥ

original: punaḥ sa yāti vaikuṇṭhaṃ mṛto 'sau narapuṅgavaḥ // GarP_2,34.106 //
analyzed: punar sa yāti vaikuṇṭham mṛtaḥ sau nara puṅgavaḥ
divyam vimānam āruhya apsarobhiḥ samāvṛtaḥ

original: aho 'sau havyakavyeṣu pitṛbhiḥ saha modate // GarP_2,34.107 //
analyzed: aho sau havya kavyeṣu pitṛbhiḥ saha modate
aṣṭakāsu kṛtam śrāddham amāvāsyā dine tathā

original: maghāsu pitṛparvāṇi yāniyāni ca teṣu ca // GarP_2,34.108 //
analyzed: maghāsu pitṛparvāṇi yāni yāni ca teṣu ca

original: śṛṇu tārkṣya yathānyāyaṃ pretatve pitaro yadi /
analyzed: śṛṇu tārkṣya yathānyāyam preta tve pitaraḥ yadi
na upatiṣṭhanti śrāddhāni sapiṇḍīkaraṇam vinā

original: sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kāryaṃ pūrṇe varṣe na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: sapiṇḍīkaraṇam kāryam pūrṇe varṣe na saṃśayaḥ

original: ādyantu śavaśuddhyarthaṃ kṛtvā caivākṣa ṣoḍaśīm // GarP_2,34.110 //
analyzed: ādyantu śava śuddhi artham kṛtvā ca eva akṣa ṣoḍaśīm
pitṛ pāṅkti viśurdhyam śata ardhena tu yojayet

original: vṛddhiṃ prāpyāgrataḥ kuryācchūdrasya svacchayaiva hi // GarP_2,34.111 //
analyzed: vṛddhim prāpya agratas kuryāt śūdrasya svacchayā eva hi
sāmpratam sa agnike kāryam dvādaśa ahe sapiṇḍanam

original: na cāsau kurute yāvat preta eva sa vahnimān /
analyzed: na ca asau kurute yāvat pretaḥ eva sa vahnimān

original: dvādaśāhe tataḥ kāryaṃ sāgnikena sapiṇḍanam // GarP_2,34.112 //
analyzed: dvādaśa ahe tatas kāryam sa agnikena sapiṇḍanam
asthipokṣe gayāśrāddham śrāddham ca āparapakṣikam

original: abdamadhye na kurvīta sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ vinā // GarP_2,34.113 //
analyzed: abda madhye na kurvīta sapiṇḍīkaraṇam vinā

original: sapatnyo yadi bahvyaḥ syurekā putravatī bhavet /
analyzed: sapatnyaḥ yadi bahvyaḥ syuḥ ekā putravatī bhavet
sarvāḥ tāḥ putravatyaḥ syuḥ tena ekena ātmajena hi
na asapiṇḍa agnimān putraḥ pitṛ yajñam samācaret

original: samācārādbhavet pāpī pitṛhā cāpi jāyate // GarP_2,34.115 //
analyzed: samācārāt bhavet pāpī pitṛ hā ca api jāyate

original: mṛte bhartari yā nārī prāṇāṃścaiva parityajet /
analyzed: mṛte bhartari yā nārī prāṇān ca eva parityajet

original: bhartraiva hi samaṃ tasyāḥ prakurvīta sapiṇḍanam // GarP_2,34.116 //
analyzed: bhartrā eva hi samam tasyāḥ prakurvīta sapiṇḍanam

original: asthānikāpi yā vyūḍhā vaiśyā vā kṣattriyāpi vā /
analyzed: a sthānikā api yā vyūḍhā vaiśyā vā kṣattriyā api vā

original: yāḥ patnyo vai pituḥ kaścit kuryāt putraḥ sapiṇḍanam // GarP_2,34.117 //
analyzed: yāḥ patnyaḥ vai pituḥ kaścid kuryāt putraḥ sapiṇḍanam
vipreṇa eva yadā śūdrā pariṇītā pramādataḥ

original: ekoddiṣṭantu tacchrāddha sā tu tenaiva yujyate // GarP_2,34.118 //
analyzed: ekoddiṣṭam tu tat śrāddha sā tu tena eva yujyate

original: anye tu daśa ye putrā jātā varṇa catuṣṭaye /
analyzed: anye tu daśa ye putrāḥ jātā varṇa catuṣṭaye

original: te tāsutāsu yoktvayāḥ sapiṇḍīkaraṇe sadā // GarP_2,34.119 //
analyzed: te tāsu tāsu sapiṇḍīkaraṇe sadā
anvaṣṭakāsu yat śrāddha yat śrāddham vṛddhi hetukam

original: pituḥ pṛthak pradāvyaṃ striyāḥ piṇḍaṃ sapiṇḍane // GarP_2,34.120 //
analyzed: pituḥ pṛthak pradāvyam striyāḥ piṇḍam sapiṇḍane
pitāmahyā samam mātuḥ pituḥ saha pitāmahaiḥ

original: sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kāryamiti tārkṣya mataṃ mama // GarP_2,34.121 //
analyzed: sapiṇḍīkaraṇam kāryam iti tārkṣya matam mama

original: aputrāyāṃ mṛtāyāṃ tu patiḥ kuryāt sapiṇḍanam /
analyzed: aputrāyām mṛtāyām tu patiḥ kuryāt sapiṇḍanam
mātrāt itisṛbhiḥ sārdham evam dharmeṇa yojayet

original: putro nāsti na bhartā ca strīṇāṃ tārkṣya sapiṇḍanam /
analyzed: putraḥ nā asti na bhartā ca strīṇām tārkṣya sapiṇḍanam
kārayet vṛddhi samaye bhrātṛ dāyāda devaraiḥ
pati putra vihīnānām gotrī na asti na devaraḥ

original: ekoddiṣṭena dātavyaṃ pareṇa saha bhrātṛbhiḥ // GarP_2,34.124 //
analyzed: ekoddiṣṭena dātavyam pareṇa saha bhrātṛbhiḥ
ajñānāt vighnataḥ vā api na kṛtam ced sapiṇḍanam
navakam ṣoḍaśa śrāddham ābdikam kārayet tatas

original: adāhe na ca kartavyaṃ sadāhe kārayedbudhaḥ /
analyzed: adāhe na ca kartavyam sa dāhe kārayet budhaḥ
darbha puttalakam kṛtvā vahninā dāhayet śavam

original: pituḥ putreṇa kartavyaṃ na kurbvīta pitā sute /
analyzed: pituḥ putreṇa kartavyam na kurbvīta pitā sute
atisnehāt na kartavyam sapiṇḍīkaraṇam sate
bahavaḥ pi yadā putrāḥ vidhim ekaḥ samācaret
navaśrāddham sapiṇḍa tvam śrāddhāni anyāni ṣoḍaśa
ekena eva tu kāryāṃṇi avibhakta dhaneṣu api

original: antyeṣṭiṃ kurute hyeko munibhaiḥ samudāhṛtam // GarP_2,34.129 //
analyzed: antyeṣṭim kurute hi ekaḥ muni bhaiḥ samudāhṛtam
vibhaktaiḥ ca pṛthak kāryā kriyā sāṃvatsara ādikā

original: ekaikena ca kartavyā putreṇa ca svayaṃsvayam // GarP_2,34.130 //
analyzed: ekaikena ca kartavyā putreṇa ca svayam svayam
yasya etāni na dattāni pretaśrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa
piśāca tvam sthiram tasya kṛtaiḥ śrāddha śataiḥ api

original: bhrātā vā bhrātṛputro vā sapiṇḍaḥ śiṣya eva vā /
analyzed: bhrātā vā bhrātṛ putraḥ vā sapiṇḍaḥ śiṣyaḥ eva vā
sapiṇḍīkaraṇam kuryāt putra hīne khageśvara
sarveṣām putra hīnānām patrī kuryāt sapiṇḍanam
ṛtvijam karāyet vā atha purohitam atha api vā
mṛte pitari abda madhye hi uparāgaḥ yadā bhavet

original: pārvaṇaṃ na sutaiḥ kāryaṃ śrāddhaṃ nāndīmukhaṃ na ca // GarP_2,34.134 //
analyzed: pārvaṇam na sutaiḥ kāryam śrāddham nāndīmukham na ca
tīrtha śrāddham gayā śrāddham śrāddham anyat ca paitṛkam
abda madhye na kurvīta mahā guru vipattiṣu
yamake ca gajacchāyā manu ādiṣu yuga ādiṣu

original: pitṛpiṇḍo na dātavyaḥ sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ vinā // GarP_2,34.136 //
analyzed: pitṛ piṇḍaḥ na dātavyaḥ sapiṇḍīkaraṇam vinā
yajñapuruṣasya yat dānam deva ādīnām ca yat tathā

original: apūrṇe 'pyabdamadhyepi kartavyamiti ke ca na // GarP_2,34.137 //
analyzed: a pūrṇe pi abda madhye pi kartavyam iti ke ca na
pitṛbhyaḥ api hi yat dattam argha piṇḍa vivarjitam

original: kartavyaṃ tacca vai sarvameṣa eva vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_2,34.138 //
analyzed: kartavyam tat ca vai sarvam eṣaḥ eva vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ
devānām pitaraḥ devāḥ pitṝṇām ṛṣayaḥ tathā

original: ṛṣīṇāṃ pitaro devāḥ pitā jayati tena vai // GarP_2,34.139 //
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām pitaraḥ devāḥ pitā jayati tena vai
pitṛ deva manuṣyāṇām yajñanathaḥ vibhuḥ bhavet
yajñanāthasya yat dattam tat dattam sarva dehinām

original: mṛte pitaryabdamadhye yaḥ śrāddhaṃ kārayet sutaḥ /
analyzed: mṛte pitari abda madhye yaḥ śrāddham kārayet sutaḥ

original: saptajanmakṛtā dharmāt hīyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_2,34.141 //
analyzed: sapta janma kṛtā dharmāt hīyate na atra saṃśayaḥ
pretībhūtāḥ tu pitaraḥ lupta piṇḍa udaka kriyāḥ

original: bhramanti vāyunā sarve kṣuttṛḍbhyāṃ paripīḍitāḥ // GarP_2,34.142 //
analyzed: bhramanti vāyunā sarve kṣudh tṛḍbhyām paripīḍitāḥ
pitari preta tā āpanne lupyate paitṛkī kriyā

original: atha māturvipattiḥ syāt pitṛkāryaṃ na lupyate // GarP_2,34.143 //
analyzed: atha mātuḥ vipattiḥ syāt pitṛ kāryam na lupyate

original: mṛtā mātā pitā tiṣṭhejjīvantī ca pitāmahī /
analyzed: mṛtā mātā pitā tiṣṭhet jīvantī ca pitāmahī

original: sapiṇḍanantu kartavyaṃ pitāmahyā sahaiva tu // GarP_2,34.144 //
analyzed: sapiṇḍanam tu kartavyam pitāmahyā saha eva tu

original: satyaṃsatyaṃ punaḥ satyaṃ śrūyatāṃ vacanaṃ mama /
analyzed: satyam satyam punar satyam śrūyatām vacanam mama

original: na piṇḍo milito yeṣāṃ mṛtānāntu nṛṇāṃ bhuvi // GarP_2,34.145 //
analyzed: na piṇḍaḥ militaḥ yeṣām mṛtānām tu nṛṇām bhuvi
upatiṣṭhet na teṣām putraiḥ dattam anekadhā
hantakāraḥ tad uddeśe śrāddham na eva jala añjaliḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde aurdhvadehikādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma catustriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde aurdhvadehikādinirūpaṇam nāma catustriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
tarkṣyaḥ uvāca
aparam mama sandeham kathayasva janārdana

original: puruṣasya ca kasyāpi matā pañcatvamāgatā // GarP_2,35.1 //
analyzed: puruṣasya ca kasya api matā pañcatvam āgatā

original: pitāmahī jīvati ca tathā ca prapitāmahī /
analyzed: pitāmahī jīvati ca tathā ca prapitāmahī
vṛddha prapitāmahī tadvat mātṛ saktaḥ pitā tathā
pramātāmahaḥ ca tathā vṛddhapramātāmahaḥ tathā

original: kena sā melyate mātā etat kathaya me prabho // GarP_2,35.3 //
analyzed: kena sā melyate mātā etat kathaya me prabho
śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca
punar uktam pravakṣyāmi sapiṇḍīkaraṇam khaga
umā lakṣmīḥ ca sāvitrī iti a tābhiḥ melayet dhruvam
trayaḥ piṇḍa bhujaḥ jñeyāḥ tyajākāḥ ca trayaḥ smṛtāḥ
trayaḥ piṇḍa anulepāḥ ca daśamaḥ paṅkti saṃnnidhaḥ
iti ete puruṣāḥ khyātāḥ pitṛ mātṛ kuleṣu ca
tārayet yajamānaḥ tu daśa pūrvān daśa avarān
sapiṇḍaḥ sa bhavet ādau sapiṇḍīkaraṇe kṛte

original: antyastu tyājako jñeyo yo vṛddhaprapitāmahaḥ // GarP_2,35.7 //
analyzed: antyaḥ tu tyājakaḥ jñeyaḥ yaḥ vṛddhaprapitāmahaḥ
antimaḥ tyājakaḥ jñeyaḥ lepakaḥ prathamaḥ bhavet

original: lepakastvantimo yastu sa bhavet paṅktisannidhaḥ // GarP_2,35.8 //
analyzed: lepakaḥ tu antimaḥ yaḥ tu sa bhavet paṅkti sannidhaḥ
yajamānaḥ bhavet ekaḥ daśa pṛrtve daśa avare

original: ityete pitaro jñeyā ekaviṃśati saṃkhyakāḥ // GarP_2,35.9 //
analyzed: iti ete pitaraḥ jñeyāḥ ekaviṃśati saṃkhyakāḥ
vidhinā kurute yaḥ tu saṃsāre śrāddham uttamam

original: jāyate 'tra na sandehaḥ śṛṇu tasyāpi yat phalam // GarP_2,35.10 //
analyzed: jāyate na sandehaḥ śṛṇu tasya api yat phalam

original: pitā dadāti puttrān vai vicchinnasantatiḥ khaga /
analyzed: pitā dadāti puttrān vai vicchinna santatiḥ khaga
homa dātā bhavet saḥ api yaḥ tasya prapitāmahaḥ

original: kṛte śrāddhe guṇā hyete pitṝṇāṃ tapeṇe smṛtāḥ /
analyzed: kṛte śrāddhe guṇāḥ hi ete pitṝṇām smṛtāḥ
dadyāt vipulam annādyam vṛddhaḥ tu prapitāmahaḥ

original: yasya puṃsaśca martye vai vicchinnā santatiḥ khaga /
analyzed: yasya puṃsaḥ ca martye vai vicchinnā santatiḥ khaga

original: sa vasennarake ghore paṅke magnaḥ karī yathā // GarP_2,35.13 //
analyzed: sa vaset narake ghore paṅke magnaḥ karī yathā
yoni antareṣu jāyate yatra vṛkṣa sarīsṛpāḥ

original: na santatiṃ vinā so 'tra mucyate narakāddhruvam // GarP_2,35.14 //
analyzed: na santatim vinā mucyate narakāt dhruvam

original: ācāryastasya śiṣyo vā yo dūre 'pi hi gātrejaḥ /
analyzed: ācāryaḥ tasya śiṣyaḥ vā yaḥ dūre hi gātra ījaḥ
nārāyaṇa balim kuryāt tasya āddeśena bhaktitaḥ
viśuddhaḥ sarva pāpebhyaḥ muktaḥ sa narakāt dhruvam

original: nivasennākaloke ca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_2,35.16 //
analyzed: nivaset nāka loke ca na atra kāryā vicāraṇā
ādau kṛtvā dhaniṣṭhān ca etat nakṣatra pañcakam

original: revatyantaṃ sadā dūṣyamaśubhaṃ sarvadā bhavet // GarP_2,35.17 //
analyzed: revatī antam sadā dūṣyam aśubham sarvadā bhavet
dāha baliḥ statra na kartavyaḥ vipra di sarva jātiṣu

original: dīyate na jalaṃ tatra aśubhaṃ jāyate dhruvam /
analyzed: dīyate na jalam tatra aśubham jāyate dhruvam

original: lokayātrā na kartavyā duḥ khārtaḥ svajano yadi // GarP_2,35.18 //
analyzed: lokayātrā na kartavyā duḥ kha ārtaḥ sva janaḥ yadi
pañcaka anantaram tasya kartavyam sarvam anyathā
putrāṇām gotriṇām tasya santāpaḥ upi upajāyate
gṛhe hāniḥ bhavet tasya ṛkṣeṣu eṣu mṛtaḥ ca yaḥ
athavā ṛkṣa madhye dāhaḥ tasya vidhīyate
kriyate mānuṣāṇām tu sadyas āhuti kāraṇāt

original: sadyāhutikaraṃ puṇyaṃ tīrthe taddāha uttamaḥ // GarP_2,35.21 //
analyzed: sadya āhuti karam puṇyam tīrthe tad dāhaḥ uttamaḥ
vipraiḥ niyamatas kāryaḥ sa mantraḥ vidhi pūrvakaḥ

original: śavasya ca samīpe tu kṣipyante puttalāstataḥ // GarP_2,35.22 //
analyzed: śavasya ca samīpe tu kṣipyante puttalāḥ tatas
darbha mayāḥ ca catvāraḥ viprāḥ mantra abhimantritāḥ

original: tato dāhaḥ prakartavyaḥ taiśca puttalakaiḥ saha // GarP_2,35.23 //
analyzed: tatas dāhaḥ prakartavyaḥ taiḥ ca puttalakaiḥ saha
sūtaka ante tatas putraḥ kuryāt śāntikam uttamam

original: pañcakeṣu mṛto yo 'sau na gatiṃ labhate naraḥ /
analyzed: pañcakeṣu mṛtaḥ na gatim labhate naraḥ

original: tilān gāśca suvarṇaṃ ca tamuddiśya ghṛtaṃ dadet // GarP_2,35.25 //
analyzed: tilān gāḥ ca suvarṇam ca tam uddiśya ghṛtam dadet
viprāṇām dīyate dānam sarva upadrava nāśanam

original: sūtakānte ca satputraiḥ sa preto labhate gatim // GarP_2,35.26 //
analyzed: sūtaka ante ca sat putraiḥ sa pretaḥ labhate gatim
bhājana upānahau chatram hema mudrā ca vāsasī
dakṣiṇā dīyate vipra sarva pātaka mocanī
bāla vṛddha āturāṇām ca mṛtānām pañcakeṣu hi

original: vidhānaṃ yo na kurvīta vighnastasya prajāyate // GarP_2,35.28 //
analyzed: vidhānam yaḥ na kurvīta vighnaḥ tasya prajāyate
aṣṭādaśa eva vastūni pretaśrāddhe vivarjayet

original: āśiṣo dviguṇān darbhān praṇavān naikapiṇḍatām // GarP_2,35.29 //
analyzed: āśiṣaḥ dviguṇān darbhān praṇavān na eka piṇḍa tām
agnaukaraṇam ucchiṣṭam śrāddham vai vaiśvadaivikam

original: vikiraṃ ca svadhākāraṃ pitṛśabdaṃ na coccaret // GarP_2,35.30 //
analyzed: vikiram ca svadhākāram pitṛ śabdam na ca uccaret
anuśabdam na kurvīta na āvāhanam atha ulmukam
āsīmāntam na kurvīta pradakṣiṇa visarjanam

original: na kuryāt tilahomañca dvijaḥ pūrṇāhutiṃ tathā /
analyzed: na kuryāt tila homan ca dvijaḥ pūrṇāhutim tathā
na kuryāt vaiśvadevam ced kartā gacchati adhogatim
malina śrāddha saṃjñānam pūrva ṣoḍaśakam tathā

original: sthāne dvāre cārdhamārge citāyāṃ śavahastake // GarP_2,35.33 //
analyzed: sthāne dvāre ca ardha mārge citāyām śava hastake
śmaśāna vāsi bhūtebhyaḥ pañcamam prativeśyakam

original: ṣaṣṭhaṃ sañcayane proktaṃ daśa piṇḍā daśāhikāḥ /
analyzed: ṣaṣṭham sañcayane proktam daśa piṇḍāḥ daśa āhikāḥ
śrāddha ṣoḍaṣakam ca etat prathamam parikīrtitam

original: anyacca ṣoḍaśaṃ madhye dvitīyaṃ tārkṣya me śṛṇu /
analyzed: anyat ca ṣoḍaśam madhye dvitīyam tārkṣya me śṛṇu
kartavyāni iha vidhinā śrāddhāni ekādaśa eva tu
brahma viṣṇu śiva ādyam ca tathā anyat śrāddha pañcakam

original: evaṃ ṣoḍaśakaṃ prāhuretat tattvavido janāḥ // GarP_2,35.36 //
analyzed: evam ṣoḍaśakam prāhuḥ etat tattva vidaḥ janāḥ
dvādaśa pratimāsyāni śrāddham ekādaśe tathā

original: tripakṣasambhavañcaiva dve rikte khaga ṣoḍaśa // GarP_2,35.37 //
analyzed: tri pakṣa sambhavañca eva dve rikte khaga ṣoḍaśa
ādyam śava viśuddhi artham kṛtvā anyat ca tri ṣoḍaśam
pitṛ pāṅkti viśuddhi artham tu yojayet

original: śatārdhena vihīno yo militaḥ paṅktibhāṅna hi /
analyzed: śatārdhena vihīnaḥ yaḥ militaḥ paṅkti bhāj na hi
catvāriṃśat tathā eva aṣṭa śrāddham preta tva nāśanam
sakṛt ūna śata ardhena sambhavet paṅkti sannidhaḥ

original: melanīyaḥ śatārdhena sandhiḥ śrāddhena tattvataḥ // GarP_2,35.40 //
analyzed: melanīyaḥ śata ardhena sandhiḥ śrāddhena tattvataḥ
atha śavāvidhiḥ
śavasya śibikāyām kara caraṇa bandhanam tatra kartavyam

original: evaṃ cenna vidhānaṃ vidhīyate tatpiśācaparibhavanam // GarP_2,35.41 //
analyzed: evam ced na vidhānam vidhīyate tat piśāca paribhavanam
saṃjāyate rajanyāt ca śava nirgamane rāṣṭram bhaya śūnyam

original: śavaṃ na muñceta mucyate cet duḥ sparśāddurgatirbhavet // GarP_2,35.42 //
analyzed: śavam na muñceta mucyate ced duḥ sparśāt durgatiḥ bhavet

original: grāmamadhye sthite prete śrute bhuṅkte yadṛcchayā /
analyzed: grāma madhye sthite prete śrute bhuṅkte yadṛcchayā
tat annam māṃsa vat jñeyam tat toyam rudhira upamam
tāmbūlam dantakāṣṭhañca bhojanam ṛtu sevanam

original: grāmamadhye sthite prete varjayet piṇḍapātanam // GarP_2,35.42 // (35.44)
analyzed: grāma madhye sthite prete varjayet piṇḍapātanam
snānam dānam japaḥ homaḥ tarpaṇam sura pūjanam

original: grāmamadhye sthite prete śuddhyarthaṃ jñātidharmataḥ // GarP_2,35.43 // (35.45)
analyzed: grāma madhye sthite prete śuddhi artham jñāti dharmataḥ
jñāti sambandhinām evam vyavahāraḥ khageśvara
vilupya jñāti dharman ca preta pāpena lipyate

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīdṛ dhadṛpretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde sapiṇḍanaśavavidhyornirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde sapiṇḍanaśavavidhyornirūpaṇam nāma pañcatriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
tārkṣyā uvāca
kasmāt anaśanam puṇyam akṣayya gati dāyakam

original: svagṛhantu parityajya tīrthe vai mriyate yadi // GarP_2,36.1 //
analyzed: sva gṛham tu parityajya tīrthe vai mriyate yadi

original: aprāpya tīrthaṃ mriyate gṛhe vā mṛtyu māgataḥ /
analyzed: a prāpya tīrtham mriyate gṛhe vā mṛtyu mā āgataḥ

original: būtvā kuṭīcaro yastu sa kāṃ gatimavāpnuyāt // GarP_2,36.2 //
analyzed: būtvā kuṭīcaraḥ yaḥ tu sa kām gatim avāpnuyāt

original: saṃnyāsaṃ kurute yastu tīrthe vāpi gṛhe 'pi vā /
analyzed: saṃnyāsam kurute yaḥ tu tīrthe vā api gṛhe vā
katham tasya prakartavyam aprāpta nidhane vā

original: niyame cet kṛte deva cittabhaṅgo hi jāyate /
analyzed: niyame ced kṛte deva citta bhaṅgaḥ hi jāyate

original: kena tasya bhavet siddhiḥ kṛtenāpyakṛtena vā // GarP_2,36.4 //
analyzed: kena tasya bhavet siddhiḥ kṛtena api akṛtena vā
śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

original: kṛtvā niraśanaṃ yo vai mṛtyumāpnoti ko 'pi cet /
analyzed: kṛtvā niraśanam yaḥ vai mṛtyum āpnoti kaḥ ced

original: mānupīṃ tanumutsṛjya mama tulyo virājate // GarP_2,36.5 //
analyzed: mānupīm tanum utsṛjya mama tulyaḥ virājate
yāvanti ahāni jīvet vrate niraśane kṛte
kratubhiḥ tāni tulyāni samagra vat akṣiṇaiḥ

original: tīrthe gṛhe vā saṃnyāsaṃ nītvā cenmriyate yadi /
analyzed: tīrthe gṛhe vā saṃnyāsam nītvā ced mriyate yadi

original: pratyahaṃ labhate so 'pi pūrvoktaṃ dviguṇaṃ phalam // GarP_2,36.7 //
analyzed: pratyaham labhate saḥ pi pūrva uktam dviguṇam phalam
mahā roga upapattau ca gṛhīte naśane kṛte

original: punarna jāyate rogo devavaddhi virājate // GarP_2,36.8 //
analyzed: punar na jāyate rogaḥ deva vat hi virājate

original: ya āturaḥ san sannyāsaṃ gṛhṇāti yadi mānavaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ āturaḥ san sannyāsam gṛhṇāti yadi mānavaḥ

original: punarna jāyate bhūmau saṃsāre duḥ khasāgare // GarP_2,36.9 //
analyzed: punar na jāyate bhūmau saṃsāre duḥ kha sāgare
ahani ahani dātavyam brāhmaṇānām ca bhojanam
tila pātram yathāśakti dīpa dānam sura arcanam
evam vṛttasya dahyante pāpāni uccāvacāni ca

original: mṛto muktimavāpnoti yathā sarve maharṣayaḥ // GarP_2,36.11 //
analyzed: mṛtaḥ muktim avāpnoti yathā sarve mahā ṛṣayaḥ
tasmāt anaśanam nṝṇām vaikuṇṭha pada dāyakam

original: tasmāt svasthe cottare vā sādhayenmokṣalakṣaṇam // GarP_2,36.12 //
analyzed: tasmāt svasthe ca uttare vā sādhayet mokṣa lakṣaṇam

original: puttradravyādi santyajya tīrthaṃ vrajati yo naraḥ /
analyzed: puttra dravya ādi santyajya tīrtham vrajati yaḥ naraḥ
brahma ādyāḥ devatāḥ tasya bhaveyuḥ tuṣṭi puṣṭi dāḥ
yaḥ tīrtha saṃmukhaḥ bhūtvā vrate hi anaśane kṛte
ced mriyeta antarāle ṛṣīṇām maṇḍale vaset

original: vrataṃ niraśana kṛtvā svagṛhe 'pi mṛto yadi /
analyzed: vratam kṛtvā sva gṛhe mṛtaḥ yadi
sva kulāni parityajya ekākī vicaret divi

original: annañcaiva tathā toyaṃ parityajya naro yadi /
analyzed: annam ca eva tathā toyam parityajya naraḥ yadi
pīta mad pāda toyaḥ ca na punar jāyate kṣitau
kṛtti āsīnam tad tīrtha gatam rakṣanti vana devatāḥ

original: yamadūtā viśeṣeṇa na yāmyāstasya pārśvagāḥ // GarP_2,36.17 //
analyzed: yamadūtāḥ viśeṣeṇa na yāmyāḥ tasya pārśva gāḥ
tīrtha sevī naraḥ yaḥ tu sarva kilbiṣa varjitaḥ
tatra mriyate dahyeta tad tīrtha phala bhāj bhavet

original: sevite 'pi sadā tathi hyanyatra mriyate yadi /
analyzed: sevite hi anyatra mriyate yadi

original: śubhe deśe kule dhīmān sa bhavedvedaviddvijaḥ // GarP_2,36.19 //
analyzed: śubhe deśe kule dhīmān sa bhavet veda vid dvijaḥ
kṛtvā niraśanam tārkṣya punar jīvati mānavaḥ

original: brāhmaṇān sa samāhūya sarvasvaṃ yat parityajet // GarP_2,36.20 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇān sa samāhūya sarva svam yat parityajet
cāndrāyaṇam caret kṛtsnam anujñātaḥ ca taiḥ dvijaiḥ

original: anṛtaṃ na vadet paścāddharmameva samācaret // GarP_2,36.21 //
analyzed: anṛtam na vadet paścāt dharmam eva samācaret

original: tīrthe gatvā ca yaḥ ko 'pi punarāyāti vai gṛham /
analyzed: tīrthe gatvā ca yaḥ punar āyāti vai gṛham

original: anujñātaḥ sa vai vipraiḥ prāyaścittamathācaret // GarP_2,36.22 //
analyzed: anujñātaḥ sa vai vipraiḥ prāyaścittam atha ācaret
dattvā vā svarṇa dānāni go mahī gaja vājinaḥ

original: tīrthaṃ yadi labhed yastu mṛtyukāle sa bhāgyavān // GarP_2,36.23 //
analyzed: tīrtham yadi labhet yaḥ tu mṛtyu kāle sa bhāgyavān
gṛhāt pracalitaḥ tīrtham maraṇe samupasthite

original: padepade tu godānaṃ yadi hiṃsā na jāyate // GarP_2,36.24 //
analyzed: pade pade tu go dānam yadi hiṃsā na jāyate

original: gṛhe tu yat kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tīrthasnānena śudhyati /
analyzed: gṛhe tu yat kṛtam pāpam tīrtha snānena śudhyati

original: kurute tatra pāpañcedvajralepasamaṃ hi tat // GarP_2,36.25 //
analyzed: kurute tatra pāpam ced vajra lepa samam hi tat
kliśyet sa na atra sandehaḥ yāvat candra arka tārakam

original: tatra dattāni dānāni jāyante cākṣayāṇi vai // GarP_2,36.26 //
analyzed: tatra dattāni dānāni jāyante ca akṣayāṇi vai
āture sati dātavyam nirdhanaiḥ api mānavaiḥ
gāvaḥ tilāḥ hiraṇyam ca saptadhānyam viśeṣataḥ

original: dānavantaṃ naraṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭāḥ sarve divaukasaḥ /
analyzed: dānavantam naram dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭāḥ sarve divaukasaḥ

original: ṛṣibhiḥ saha dharmaṇa citraguptena sarvadā // GarP_2,36.28 //
analyzed: ṛṣibhiḥ saha dharmaṇa citraguptena sarvadā
ātma āyattam dhanam yāvat tāvat vipre samarpayet

original: parādhīnaṃ mṛte sarvaṃ kṛpayā kaḥ pradāsyati // GarP_2,36.29 //
analyzed: para adhīnam mṛte sarvam kṛpayā kaḥ pradāsyati
pitṛ uddeśena yaḥ puttraiḥ dhanam vipra kare rpitam

original: ātmānaṃ sadhanaṃ tena cakre putraprapautrakaiḥ // GarP_2,36.30 //
analyzed: ātmānam sa dhanam tena cakre putra prapautrakaiḥ
pituḥ śataguṇam dattam sahasram mātuḥ ucyate
bhaginyā śata sāhasram sodarye dattam akṣayam
yadi lobhāt na yacchanti pramādāt mohataḥ vā

original: mṛtāḥ śocanti te sarve kadaryāḥ pāpinastviti // GarP_2,36.32 //
analyzed: mṛtāḥ śocanti te sarve kadaryāḥ pāpinaḥ tu iti
ati kleśena labdhasya prakṛtyā cañcalasya ca
gatiḥ ekā eva vittasya dānam anyāḥ vipattayaḥ
mṛtyuḥ śarī goptāram vasu rakṣam vasundharā
duścāriṇī iva hasati sva patim putra vatsalam

original: udāse dhārmikaḥ saumyaḥ prāpyāpi vipulaṃ dhanam /
analyzed: udāse dhārmikaḥ saumyaḥ prāpya api vipulam dhanam
tṛṇa vat manyate tārkṣyaḥ ātmānam vittam api atha

original: na caivopadravāstasya mohajālo na caiva hi /
analyzed: na ca eva upadravāḥ tasya moha jālaḥ na ca eva hi

original: mṛtyukāle na ca bhayaṃ yamadūtasamudbhavam // GarP_2,36.36 //
analyzed: mṛtyu kāle na ca bhayam yama dūta samudbhavam

original: samāḥ sahasrāṇi ca sapta vai jale daśaikamagnau pavane ca ṣoḍaśa /
analyzed: samāḥ sahasrāṇi ca sapta vai jale daśa ekam agnau pavane ca ṣoḍaśa

original: mahāhave paṣṭiraśītirgogṛhe anāśake kāśyapa cākṣayā gatiḥ // GarP_2,36.37 //
analyzed: mahā āhave paṣṭiḥ aśītiḥ go gṛhe anāśake kāśyapa ca akṣayā gatiḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde 'naśanamṛta gatinirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭtriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde naśanamṛta gatinirūpaṇam nāma ṣaṭtriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
tārkṣyaḥ uvāca
uda kumbha pradānam me kathayasva yathātatham

original: vidhinā kena kartavyā kṛtireṣā janārdana // GarP_2,37.1 //
analyzed: vidhinā kena kartavyā kṛtiḥ eṣā janārdana

original: kiṃlakṣaṇāḥ kena pūrṇāḥ kasya deyā janārdana /
analyzed: kiṃlakṣaṇāḥ kena pūrṇāḥ kasya deyāḥ janārdana
kasmin kāle pradātavyā preta tṛpti prasādhakāḥ
śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca
satyam punar pravakṣyāmi uda kumbha pradānakam
preta uddeśena dātavyāḥ anna pānīya saṃyutāḥ
viśeṣeṇa mahā pakṣin preta mukti pradāyakāḥ

original: dvādaśāhe ca paṇmāse traipakṣe vāpi vatsare /
analyzed: dvādaśa ahe ca paṣ māse traipakṣe vā api vatsare

original: udakumbhāḥ pradātavyā mārge tasya sukhāya vai // GarP_2,37.4 //
analyzed: uda kumbhāḥ pradātavyāḥ mārge tasya sukhāya vai
ahani ahani dātavyāḥ uda kumbhāḥ tilaiḥ yutāḥ
su lipte bhūmi bhāge tu pakka anna jala pūritāḥ
pretasya tatra dātavyam bhājanam ca yadṛcchayā

original: suprītastena dattena preto yāmyaiḥ sa gacchati // GarP_2,37.6 //
analyzed: su prītaḥ tena dattena pretaḥ yāmyaiḥ sa gacchati
dvādaśa ahe viśeṣeṇa uda kambhān pradāpayet

original: vidhinā tatra saṅkalpaya ghaṭān dvādaśasaṃkhyakān // GarP_2,37.7 //
analyzed: vidhinā tatra saṅkalpaya ghaṭān dvādaśa saṃkhyakān
bardhanī tatra pakva anna phala pūritā

original: viṣṇumuddiśya dātavyā saṃkalpya brāhmaṇe śubhe // GarP_2,37.8 //
analyzed: viṣṇum uddiśya dātavyā saṃkalpya brāhmaṇe śubhe

original: eko vai dharmarājāya tena tuṣṭena muktibhāk /
analyzed: ekaḥ vai dharmarājāya tena tuṣṭena mukti bhāj

original: citraguptāya caikaṃ tu gatastatra sukhī bhavet // GarP_2,37.9 //
analyzed: citraguptāya ca ekam tu gataḥ tatra sukhī bhavet
ṣoḍaśa ādyāḥ pradātavyāḥ māṣa anna jala pūritāḥ
uktra antiśrāddham ārabhya śrāddha ṣoḍa ṣoḍaśakasya tu
ṣoḍaśa brāhmaṇānām tu ekaikam vinivadayet
ekādaśa ahāt prabhṛti deyaḥ nityam dṛḍha āhvayaḥ

original: pakvānnajalapūrṇo hi yāvat saṃvatsaraṃ dinam // GarP_2,37.12 //
analyzed: pakva anna jala pūrṇaḥ hi yāvat saṃvatsaram dinam
jala pātrāṇi vṛddhāni ca

original: ekā vai vardhanī tatra tasyāṃ pātrantu vaṃśajam // GarP_2,37.13 //
analyzed: ekā vai vardhanī tatra tasyām pātram tu vaṃśa jam
vastreṇa ācchādayet tāntu pūjayitvā sugandhibhiḥ
brāhmaṇebhyaḥ viśeṣeṇa jala pūrṇāni dāpayet
ahani ahani saṅkalpya vidhi pūrvam khageśvara
brāhmaṇāya kulīnāya veda vṛtta yutāya ca
vidyā vṛttavate deyam mūrkhe tat na kadācana
samarthaḥ veda vṛtta āḍhyaḥ tāraṇe taraṇe ca

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe dvitīyāṃśe pretakalpe dharmakāṇḍe sodakumbhaśrāddhanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe dvitīya aṃśe pretakalpe dharma kāṇḍe sodakumbhaśrāddhanirūpaṇam nāma saptatriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
tārkṣyaḥ uvāca

original: dānatīrthārthitaṃ mokṣaṃ svargañca vada me prabho /
analyzed: dāna tīrtha arthitam mokṣam svargan ca vada me prabho

original: kena mokṣamavāpnoti kena svarge vasecciram // GarP_2,38.1 //
analyzed: kena mokṣam avāpnoti kena svarge vaset ciram
kena gacchati tejaḥ tu svarlokāt satyalokataḥ

original: mānuṣyaṃ kena labhate narakeśu nimajjati // GarP_2,38.2 //
analyzed: mānuṣyam kena labhate nara keśu nimajjati
etat me vat a niścitya bhaktānām mokṣa dāyaka

original: brūhi kasmin mṛte svarge punarjanma na vidyate // GarP_2,38.3 //
analyzed: brūhi kasmin mṛte svarge punarjanma na vidyate
śrī viṣṇuḥ uvāca

original: mānuṣyaṃ bhārate varṣe trayodaśasu jātiṣu // GarP_2,38.4 //
analyzed: mānuṣyam bhārate varṣe trayodaśasu jātiṣu

original: tat prāpya mriyate kṣetre punarjanma na vidyate /
analyzed: tat prāpya mriyate kṣetre punarjanma na vidyate

original: ayodhyā mathurā māyā kāśī kāñcī avantikā // GarP_2,38.5 //
analyzed: ayodhyā mathurā māyā kāśī kāñcī avantikā
purī dvāravatī jñeyā saptā etāḥ mokṣa dāyikāḥ

original: sannyastamiti yo bruyāt prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭhagatairapi // GarP_2,38.6 //
analyzed: sannyastam iti yaḥ bruyāt prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭha gataiḥ api

original: mṛto viṣṇupuraṃ yāti na punarjāyate kṣitau /
analyzed: mṛtaḥ viṣṇu puram yāti na punar jāyate kṣitau
sakṛt uccaritam yena hariḥ iti akṣara dvayam
baddhaḥ parikaraḥ tena mokṣāya gamanam prati

original: kṛṣṇakṛṣṇeti kṛṣṇeti yo māṃ smarati nityaśaḥ // GarP_2,38.8 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa iti kṛṣṇa iti yaḥ mām smarati nityaśas
bhittvā yathā padmam narakāt uddharāmi aham

original: śālagrāmajilā yatra yatra dvāravatī śilā // GarP_2,38.9 //
analyzed: śālagrāma jilā yatra yatra dvāravatī śilā

original: ubhayoḥ saṅgamo yatra muktistatra na saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: ubhayoḥ saṅgamaḥ yatra muktiḥ tatra na saṃśayaḥ
śālagrāma śilā yatra pāpa doṣa kṣaya āvahā
tad sannidhāna maraṇāt muktiḥ jantoḥ su niśca tā
ropaṇāt pālanāt sekāt dhyāna sparśana kīrtanāt

original: tulasī dahate pāpaṃ nṛṇāṃ janmārjitaṃ khaga // GarP_2,38.11 //
analyzed: tulasī dahate pāpam nṛṇām janma arjitam khaga

original: yaḥ snāto mānase tīrthe na sa lipyeta pātakaiḥ // GarP_2,38.12 //
analyzed: yaḥ snātaḥ mānase tīrthe na sa lipyeta pātakaiḥ

original: na kāṣṭhe vidyate devo na śilāyāṃ kadācana /
analyzed: na kāṣṭhe vidyate devaḥ na śilāyām kadācana

original: bhāve hi vidyate devastasmādbhāvaṃ samācaret // GarP_2,38.13 //
analyzed: bhāve hi vidyate devaḥ tasmāt bhāvam samācaret
prātar prātar prapaśyanti narmadām matsya ghātinaḥ

original: na te śivapurīṃ yānti cittavṛttirgarīyasī // GarP_2,38.14 //
analyzed: na te śiva purīm yānti cittavṛttiḥ garīyasī

original: yādṛk cittapratītiḥ syāt tādṛk karmaphalaṃ nṛṇām /
analyzed: yādṛś citta pratītiḥ syāt tādṛś karma phalam nṛṇām
para loka gatiḥ tādṛka sūcī sūtra vicāra vat

original: brāhmaṇārthe gavārthe ca strīṇāṃ balavadheṣu ca /
analyzed: brāhmaṇa arthe gavā arthe ca strīṇām bala vadheṣu ca

original: prāṇatyāgaparo yastu sa vai mokṣamavāpnuyāt // GarP_2,38.16 //
analyzed: prāṇatyāga paraḥ yaḥ tu sa vai mokṣam avāpnuyāt

original: anāśake mṛtau yastu sa vai mokṣamavāpnuyāt /
analyzed: anāśake mṛtau yaḥ tu sa vai mokṣam avāpnuyāt

original: anāśake mṛto yastu sa muktaḥ sarvabandhanaiḥ // GarP_2,38.17 //
analyzed: anāśake mṛtaḥ yaḥ tu sa muktaḥ sarva bandhanaiḥ
dattvā dānāni viprebhyaḥ tatas mokṣam avāpnuyāt

original: ete vai mokṣamārgāśca svargamārgāstathaiva ca // GarP_2,38.18 //
analyzed: ete vai mokṣa mārgāḥ ca svarga mārgāḥ tathā eva ca
gograhe deśa vidhvaṃse maraṇam raṇa tīrthayoḥ
uttama adhama madhyasya bādhyamānasya dehinaḥ

original: ātmānaṃ tatra santyajya svargavāsaṃ labhecciram // GarP_2,38.19 //
analyzed: ātmānam tatra santyajya svarga vāsam labhet ciram
jīvitam maraṇam ca eva dvayam śikṣeta paṇḍitaḥ
jīvitam dāna bhogābhyām maraṇam raṇa tīrthayoḥ
harikṣetre kurukṣetre bhṛgukṣetre tathā eva ca

original: prabhāse śrīsthale caiva arbude ca tripuṣkare // GarP_2,38.21 //
analyzed: prabhāse śrīsthale ca eva arbude ca tripuṣkare

original: bhūteśvare mṛto yastu svarge vasati mānavaḥ /
analyzed: bhūteśvare mṛtaḥ yaḥ tu svarge vasati mānavaḥ

original: brahmaṇo divasaṃ yāvat tataḥ patati bhūtale // GarP_2,38.22 //
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ divasam yāvat tatas patati bhū tale
varṣa vṛttim tu yaḥ dadyāt brāhmaṇe doṣa varjite

original: sarvaṃ kalaṃ sa muddhṛtya svargaloke mahīyate // GarP_2,38.23 //
analyzed: sarvam kalam sa muddhṛtya svarga loke mahīyate
kanyām vivāhayet yaḥ tu brāhmaṇam vedapāragam

original: indraloke vaset so 'pi svakulaiḥ pariveṣṭitaḥ // GarP_2,38.24 //
analyzed: indra loke vaset saḥ pi sva kulaiḥ pariveṣṭitaḥ
mahā dānāni da tvā ca naraḥ tat phalam āmuyāt
vāpī kūpa taḍāgānām ārāma surasadmanām
jīrṇoddhāram prakurvāṇaḥ pūrva kartuḥ phalam labhet

original: jīrṇoddhāreṇa vā teṣāṃ tat puṇyaṃ dviguṇaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,38.26 //
analyzed: jīrṇa uddhāreṇa vā teṣām tat puṇyam dviguṇam bhavet
tāta paharam api parṇa kuṭīrakam

original: kṛtvā viprāya viduṣe pradadāti kuṭumbine // GarP_2,38.27 //
analyzed: kṛtvā viprāya viduṣe pradadāti kuṭumbine

original: tisraḥ koṭyordhakoṭī ca naraḥ svarge mahīyate // GarP_2,38.28 //
analyzed: tisraḥ ca naraḥ svarge mahīyate

original: yā strī savarṇā saṃśubā mṛtaṃ patimanuvrajet /
analyzed: yā strī savarṇā saṃśubā mṛtam patim anuvrajet

original: sā mṛtā svargamāpnoti varṣāṇāṃ romasaṃkhyatā // GarP_2,38.29 //
analyzed: sā mṛtā svargam āpnoti varṣāṇām roma saṃkhya tā
putra pautra ādikam tyaktvā sva patim yā anugacchati

original: svargaṃ labhetāṃ tau cobhau divyastrībhiralaṅkṛtau // GarP_2,38.30 //
analyzed: svargam labhetām tau ca ubhau divya strībhiḥ alaṅkṛtau
kṛtvā pāpāni anekāni bhartṛ droha matiḥ sadā

original: prakṣālayati sarvāṇi yā svaṃ patimanuvrajet // GarP_2,38.31 //
analyzed: prakṣālayati sarvāṇi yā svam patim anuvrajet
mahā pāpa samācāraḥ bhartā ced duṣkṛtī bhavet
tasya api anuvratā nārī na ārāyet sarva kilbiṣam
grāsa mātram niyamataḥ nitya dānam karoti yaḥ
catur cāmara saṃyukta vimānena adhigacchati
yat kṛtam hi manuṣyeṇa pāpam āmaraṇāntikam
tat sarvam nāśam āyāti varṣa vṛtti pradānataḥ
bhūtam bhavyam baviṣyat ca pāpam janma traya arjitam
pakṣālayati tat sarvam vipra kanyā upanāyanāt
daśa kūpa samāḥ vā api daśa vāpī samam saraḥ

original: saro bhirdaśabhistulyā yā prapā nirjale vane // GarP_2,38.36 //
analyzed: saro bhiḥ daśabhiḥ tulyā yā prapā nirjale vane

original: yā vāpī nirjale deśe yaddānaṃ nirdhane dvije /
analyzed: yā vāpī nirjale deśe yat dānam nirdhane dvije

original: prāṇināṃ yo dayāṃ dhatte sa bhavennākanāyakaḥ // GarP_2,38.37 //
analyzed: prāṇinām yaḥ dayām dhatte sa bhavet nākanāyakaḥ
evamādibhiḥ anyaiḥ ca sukṛtaiḥ svarga bhāj bhavet

original: sa tat sarvaṃ phalaṃ prāpya pratiṣṭhāṃ paramāṃ labhet // GarP_2,38.38 //
analyzed: sa tat sarvam phalam prāpya pratiṣṭhām paramām labhet

original: phalgu kāryaṃ parityajya satataṃ dharmavān bhavet /
analyzed: phalgu kāryam parityajya satatam dharmavān bhavet

original: dānaṃ damo dayā ceti sārametat trayaṃ bhuvi // GarP_2,38.39 //
analyzed: dānam damaḥ dayā ca iti sāram etat trayam bhuvi
dānam sādhoḥ daridrasya śūnya liṅgasya pūjanam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde uttamalokagatyāgatimokṣamānuṣyahetunirūpaṇaṃ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde uttama loka gati āgati mokṣa mānuṣya hetu nirūpaṇam
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
tārkṣyaḥ uvāca

original: sūtakānāṃ vidhiṃ brūhi dayāṃ kṛtvā mayiprabho /
analyzed: sūtakānām vidhim brūhi dayām kṛtvā mayi prabho

original: vivekāya hi cittasya mānavānāṃ hitāya ca // GarP_2,39.1 //
analyzed: vivekāya hi cittasya mānavānām hitāya ca
śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca
mṛte janmanī pakṣi indra sūtakam syāt caturvidham
caturṇām api varṇānām sāmānyate vivarjitam
ubhayatra daśa ahāni kulasya annam

original: dānaṃ pratigraho homaḥ svādhyāyaśca nivartate // GarP_2,39.3 //
analyzed: dānam pratigrahaḥ homaḥ svādhyāyaḥ ca nivartate
deśam kālam tathā ātmānam dravyam dravya prayājanam
jñātvā karma samācaret
guhā vahni pravese ca deśa antara mṛteṣu ca

original: snānaṃ sacelaṃ kartavyaṃ sadyaḥ śaucaṃ vidhīyate // GarP_2,39.5 //
analyzed: snānam sa celam kartavyam sadyas śaucam vidhīyate

original: āmagarbhāśca ye jīvā ye ca garbhādviniḥ sṛtāḥ /
analyzed: āma garbhāḥ ca ye jīvāḥ ye ca garbhāt viniḥ sṛtāḥ
na teṣām agni saṃskāraḥ na āśaucam na udakakriyā
śilpinaḥ kāravaḥ vaidyāḥ dāsī dāsāḥ tathā eva ca

original: rājānaḥ śrotiyāścaiva sadyaḥ śaucāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // GarP_2,39.7 //
analyzed: rājānaḥ śrotiyāḥ ca eva sadyas śaucāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
satrī ca vratī
mantra pūtaḥ ca āhitāgniḥ nṛpaḥ tathā

original: eteṣāṃ sūtakaṃ nāsti yasya cecchanti pārthivāḥ // GarP_2,39.8 //
analyzed: eteṣām sūtakam na asti yasya ca icchanti pārthivāḥ

original: prasave ca sapiṇḍānāṃ na kuryāt saṅkaraṃ dvijaḥ /
analyzed: prasave ca sapiṇḍānām na kuryāt saṅkaram dvijaḥ

original: daśāhācchrudhyate mātā avagāhya pitā śuciḥ // GarP_2,39.9 //
analyzed: daśa ahāt śrudhyate mātā avagāhya pitā śuciḥ
vivāha utsava yajñeṣu antarā mṛta sūtake
pūrva saṅkalpitam vittam bhojyam tat manuḥ abravīt
sarveṣām evam āśaucam mātā pitroḥ tu sūtakam
sūkatam mātuḥ eva syāt upaspṛśya pitā śuciḥ
antar daśa ahe syātām ced punarmaraṇa janmanī

original: tāvat syādaśucirvipro yāvat tat syādanirdaśam // GarP_2,39.12 //
analyzed: tāvat syāt aśuciḥ vipraḥ yāvat tat syāt anirdaśam

original: udite niyame dāne ārte vipre nivedayet /
analyzed: udite niyame dāne ārte vipre nivedayet

original: tathaiva ṛṣibhiḥ proktaṃ yathākālaṃ na duṣyati // GarP_2,39.13 //
analyzed: tathā eva ṛṣibhiḥ proktam yathākālam na duṣyati
mṛd mayena tu pātreṇa tilaiḥ miśra jalaiḥ saha

original: mṛttikayā tathānte ca naraḥ snātvā śucirbhavet // GarP_2,39.14 //
analyzed: mṛttikayā tathā ante ca naraḥ snātvā śuciḥ bhavet

original: dānaṃ pariṣade dadyāt suvarṇaṃ govṛṣaṃ dvije /
analyzed: dānam pariṣade dadyāt suvarṇam go vṛṣam dvije

original: kṣattriyo dviguṇaṃ caiva vaiśyastu triguṇaṃ tathā // GarP_2,39.15 //
analyzed: kṣattriyaḥ dviguṇam ca eva vaiśyaḥ tu triguṇam tathā
caturguṇam tu śūdreṇa dātavyam brāhmaṇe dhanam
eva manukrameṇa eva cāturvarṇyam viśudhyati

original: ahastu sūtakaṃ tasya tvabdānāṃ saṃkhyayā smṛtam // GarP_2,39.17 //
analyzed: ahar tu sūtakam tasya tu abdānām saṃkhyayā smṛtam

original: brāhmaṇārthe vipannā ye nārīṇāṃ gograheṣu ca /
analyzed: brāhmaṇa arthe vipannāḥ ye nārīṇām gograheṣu ca
āhaveṣu vipannānām eka rāttram aśaucakam
na teṣām aśubham kiñcid viprāṇām śubha karmaṇi
anātha preta saṃskāram ye kurvantu nara uttamaḥ
na teṣām aśubham kiñcid vipreṇa sahakāriṇā
jala avagāhanāt teṣām sadyas śuddhiḥ udāhṛtā
vinivṛttāḥ yadā śūdrāḥ udaka antam upasthitāḥ
tadā a vipreṇa draṣṭavyāḥ iti veda vidaḥ viduḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīdṛ dhadṛpretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde sūtakakālādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmai konacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde sūtakakālādinirūpaṇam nāma e konacatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
tārkṣyaḥ uvāca
bhagavan brāhmaṇāḥ kecid apamṛtyu vaśam gatāḥ

original: kathaṃ teṣāṃ bhavenmārgaḥ kiṃ sthānaṃ kā gatirbhavet // GarP_2,40.1 //
analyzed: katham teṣām bhavet mārgaḥ kim sthānam kā gatiḥ bhavet

original: kiñca yuktaṃ bhavetteṣāṃ vidhānaṃ vāpi kīdṛśam /
analyzed: kiñca yuktam bhavet teṣām vidhānam vā api kīdṛśam

original: tadahaṃ śrotumicchāmi brūhi me madhusūdana // GarP_2,40.2 //
analyzed: tat aham śrotum icchāmi brūhi me madhusūdana
śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca
pretībhūta a dvijātīnām sambhūte mṛtyu vaikṛte
teṣām mārga gati sthānam vidhānam kathayāmi aham

original: śṛṇu tārkṣya paraṃ gopyaṃ jāte durmaraṇe sati /
analyzed: śṛṇu tārkṣya param gopyam jāte durmaraṇe sati
laṅghanaiḥ ye mṛtāḥ viprāḥ daṃṣṭribhiḥ ca abhighātitāḥ
kaṇṭhagrāha vimagnānām kṣīṇānām tuṇḍa ghātinām
viṣa agni vṛṣa viprebhyaḥ viṣūcyā ca ātma ghātakāḥ
patana udvandhana jalaiḥ mṛtānām śṛṇu saṃsthitim

original: yānti te narakeghore ye ca mlecchādibhirhatāḥ // GarP_2,40.6 //
analyzed: yānti te narake ghore ye ca mleccha ādibhiḥ hatāḥ
śva śṛgāla ādi saṃspṛṣṭāḥ adagdhāḥ kṛmi saṃṅkulāḥ

original: ullaṅghitā mṛtā ye ca mahārogaiśca pīḍitāḥ // GarP_2,40.7 //
analyzed: ullaṅghitāḥ mṛtāḥ ye ca mahā rogaiḥ ca pīḍitāḥ
abhisastāḥ tathā avyaṅgāḥ ye ca pāpa anna poṣitāḥ
caṇḍālāt udakāt sarpāt brāhmaṇāt vaidyuta agnitaḥ
daṣṭribhyaḥ ca paśubhyaḥ ca vṛkṣa ādi patanāt mṛtāḥ
udakyā mūtakī śūdrā rajakī saṅga dūṣitāḥ

original: na teṣāṃ kārayeddāhaṃ sūtakaṃ nodakakriyām // GarP_2,40.10 //
analyzed: na teṣām kārayet dāham sūtakam na udakakriyām

original: na vidhānaṃ mṛtādyaṃ ca na kuryādaurdhvadaihikam /
analyzed: na vidhānam mṛta ādyam ca na kuryāt aurdhvadaihikam
teṣām tārkṣya prakurvīta nārāyaṇa bali kriyām
sarva loka hita arthāya śṛṇu pāpa bhaya apahām

original: ṣaṇmāsaṃ brāhmaṇe dāhastrimāsaṃ kṣattriye mataḥ // GarP_2,40.12 //

original: sārdha māsaṃ tu vaiśyasya sadyaḥ śūdre vidhīyate /
analyzed: sārdha māsam tu vaiśyasya sadyas śūdre vidhīyate

original: gaṅgāyāṃ yamunāyāñca naimiṣe puṣkare 'tha ca // GarP_2,40.13 //
analyzed: gaṅgāyām yamunāyām ca naimiṣe puṣkare ca

original: taḍāge jalūpūrṇe vā hrade vā vimalodake /
analyzed: taḍāge jalūpūrṇe vā hrade vā vimala udake

original: vāpyāṃ kūpe gavāṃ goṣṭhe gṛhe vā pratimālaye // GarP_2,40.14 //
analyzed: vāpyām kūpe gavām goṣṭhe gṛhe vā pratimā ālaye

original: pretāya tarpaṇaṃ kāryaṃ mantraiḥ paurāṇavaidikaiḥ // GarP_2,40.15 //
analyzed: pretāya tarpaṇam kāryam mantraiḥ paurāṇa vaidikaiḥ

kāryam puruṣasūktena mantraiḥ vā vaiṣṇavaiḥ api
dakṣiṇa abhimukhaḥ bhūtvā pretam viṣṇuḥ iti smaret
bhavet
tarpaṇasya avasāne ca vīta rāgaḥ vimatsaraḥ
jita indriya manāḥ bhūtvā śucipmān dharma tatparaḥ

original: dānadharmarataḥ śāntaḥ praṇamya vāgyataḥ śuciḥ // GarP_2,40.19 //
analyzed: dāna dharma rataḥ śāntaḥ praṇamya vāgyataḥ śuciḥ

original: bhaktyā tatra prakurvīta śrāddhatyekādaśaiva tu // GarP_2,40.20 //
analyzed: bhaktyā tatra prakurvīta tu
sarva karma vipākena eka eka agre samāhitaḥ

original: haviṣyānnaṃ śubhaṃ mudrāṃ chatroṣṇīṣe ca calekam /
analyzed: haviṣya annam śubham mudrām chatra uṣṇīṣe ca calekam
dāpayet sarva sasyāni kṣīra kṣaudra yutāni ca
vastra upānaha saṃyuktam dadyāt aṣṭavidham padam
dāpayet sarva viprebhyaḥ na kuryāt paṅktibandhanam
bhūmau sthiteṣu piṇḍeṣu gandha puṣpa akṣata anvitam

original: śaṅkhapātre tathā tāmre tarpaṇañca pṛthakpṛthak // GarP_2,40.24 //
analyzed: śaṅkha pātre tathā tāmre tarpaṇam ca pṛthak pṛthak

āpaḥ devīḥ madhumatīḥ ādi pīṭhe prakalpitam

yena a pāvaka cakṣuṣā tṛtīye ca

original: ye devāsaścaturthe tu samudraṃ gaccha pañcame /
analyzed: ye devāsaḥ caturthe tu samudram gaccha pañcame

original: agnirjyoti stathā ṣaṣṭhe hiraṇyagarbhaḥ saptame // GarP_2,40.28 //
analyzed: agniḥ jyotiḥ tathā ṣaṣṭhe hiraṇyagarbhaḥ saptame

original: taśame yāḥ phalinīti piṇḍe caikādaśe tataḥ // GarP_2,40.29 //
analyzed: yāḥ phalinī iti piṇḍe ca ekādaśe tatas
bhadram karṇebhiḥ iti ca kuryāt piṇḍa visarjanam
kṛtvā ekādaśa devatyam śrāddham kuryāt pare hani
viprān āvāhayet pañca catur veda viśāradān
vidyā śīla guṇa upetān sva kīyān śīla sattamān
abyaṅgān sa praśastān ca na t varjyān kadācana
viṣṇuḥ svarṇa mayaḥ kāryaḥ rudaḥ tāmra mayaḥ tathā
brahmā rūpya mayaḥ tadvat yamaḥ loha mayaḥ bhavet

original: sīsakaṃ tu bhavetpretaṃ tvatha vā darbhakaṃ tathā /
analyzed: sīsakam tu bhavet pretam tu atha vā darbhakam tathā

original: śannodevīti mantreṇa govindaṃ paścime nyaset // GarP_2,40.33 //
analyzed: śan naḥ devī iti mantreṇa govindam paścime nyaset
agne āyāhi iti rudram uttaratra eva vinyaset
agnim īḍa iti mantreṇa pūrveṇa eva prajāpatim

original: madhye maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā sthāpyo darbhamayo naraḥ // GarP_2,40.35 //
analyzed: madhye maṇḍalakam kṛtvā sthāpyaḥ darbha mayaḥ naraḥ

original: brahmā viṣṇustathā rudro yamaḥ pretaśca pañcamaḥ /
analyzed: brahmā viṣṇuḥ tathā rudraḥ yamaḥ pretaḥ ca pañcamaḥ
pṛthak kumbhe tatas sthāpyāḥ pañcaratna samanvitāḥ

original: japaṃ karyātpṛthaktatra brahmādau devatāsu ca // GarP_2,40.37 //
analyzed: japam karyāt pṛthak tatra brahma ādau devatāsu ca
pañca śrāddhāni kurvīta devatānām yathāvidhi
jala dhārām tatas dadyat pīṭhe pīṭhe pṛthak pṛthak

original: śaṅkhe vā tāmrapātre vā alābhe mṛnmaye 'pi vā /
analyzed: śaṅkhe vā tāmra pātre vā alābhe mṛd maye vā
tila udakam samādāya sarva oṣadhi samanvitam
āsana upānahau chatram mudrikā ca kamaṇḍaluḥ
bhājanam bhājanādhāram vastrāṇi aṣṭavidham padam
tāmra pātram tilaiḥ pūrṇam sa hiraṇyam sa dakṣiṇam
dadyāt brāhmaṇa mukhyāya vidhi yuktam khageśvara
ṛgveda pārage dadyāt jāta sasyām vasundharām
yajurveda maye vipre gān ca dadyāt payasvinīm
sāmagāya śiva uddeśāt pradadyāt kaladhautakam
yama uddeśāt tilān loham tatas dadyāt ca dakṣiṇām
paścāt puttalakam kāryam sarva oṣadhi samanvitam

original: palāśasya ca vṛntānāṃ vibhāgaṃ śṛṇu kāśyapa // GarP_2,40.44 //
analyzed: palāśasya ca vṛntānām vibhāgam śṛṇu kāśyapa
kṛṣṇājinam samāstīrya kuśaiḥ ca puruṣa ākṛtim

original: śatatrayeṇa ṣaṣṭyā ca vṛntaiḥ prokto 'sthisañcayaḥ // GarP_2,40.45 //
analyzed: śata trayeṇa ṣaṣṭyā ca vṛntaiḥ proktaḥ sthi sañcayaḥ
vinyasya tāni vṛntāni aṅgeṣu eṣu pṛthak pṛthak
catvāriṃśat śiraḥ deśe grīvāyām daśa vinyaset
viṃśati uraḥ sthale dadyāt viṃśatim jaṭhare ca

original: bāhuyugme śataṃ dadyātkaṭi deśe ca viṃśatim // GarP_2,40.47 //
analyzed: bāhu yugme śatam dadyāt kaṭi deśe ca viṃśatim
ūru dvaye śatam ca api triṃśat jaṅghā dvaye nyaset
dadyāt catuṣṭayam ṣaṭ dadyāt vṛṣaṇa dvaye
daśa pāda aṅgulī bhāge evam asthīni vinyaset

original: nārikelaṃ śiraḥ sthāne tumbaṃ dadyācca tāluke /
analyzed: nārikelam śiraḥ sthāne tumbam dadyāt ca tāluke
pañcaratnam mukhe dadyāt jihvāyām kadalī phalam

original: antreṣu nālakaṃ dadyādbālakaṃ prāṇa eva ca /
analyzed: antreṣu nālakam dadyāt bālakam prāṇe eva ca

original: vasāyīṃ medakaṃ dadyādgomūtreṇa tu mūtrakam // GarP_2,40.50 //
analyzed: vasāyīm medakam dadyāt go mūtreṇa tu mūtrakam

original: gandhakaṃ dhātavo deyo haritālaṃ manaḥ śilā /
retaḥ sthāne pāradañca purīṣe pittalaṃ tathā // GarP_2,40.51 //
analyzed: retaḥ sthāne pāradam ca purīṣe pittalam tathā

original: manaḥ śilāṃ tathā gātre tilakalkañca sandhiṣu /
analyzed: manaḥ śilām tathā gātre tila kalkam ca sandhiṣu

original: yavapiṣṭaṃ tathā māṃse madhu vai kṣaudrameva ca // GarP_2,40.52 //
analyzed: yava piṣṭam tathā māṃse madhu vai kṣaudram eva ca
keśeṣu vai vaṭa jaṭā tvaci dadyāt mṛga tvacam
karṇayoḥ tālapattram ca stanayoḥ ca eva guñjikāḥ

original: vṛntākaṃ vṛṣaṇadvandve liṅge syādgṛñjanaṃ śubham // GarP_2,40.54 //
analyzed: vṛntākam vṛṣaṇa dvandve liṅge syāt gṛñjanam śubham

original: ghṛtaṃ nābhyāṃ pradeyaṃ syātkaupīne ca trapu smṛtam /
analyzed: ghṛtam nābhyām pradeyam syāt kaupīne ca trapu smṛtam
mauktikam stanayoḥ mūrdhni kuṅkumena vilepanam
karpūra aguru dhūpaiḥ ca śubhaiḥ mālyaiḥ sugandhibhiḥ

original: paridhānaṃ paṭṭasūtraṃ hṛdaye rukmakaṃ nyaset // GarP_2,40.56 //
analyzed: paridhānam paṭṭasūtram hṛdaye rukmakam nyaset

original: ṛddhivṛddhī bhujau dvau ca cakṣuṣośca kapardakau /
analyzed: ṛddhi vṛddhī bhujau dvau ca cakṣuṣoḥ ca kapardakau
sindūram netra koṇe ca tāmbūla ādi upahārakaiḥ
sarva oṣadhi yutam pretam kṛtvā pūjā yathā uditā
sa agnike kaiḥ ca
ca api vidhinā yajña pātram nyaset kramāt

original: śirome śrīriti ṛcā punantu varuṇeti ca /
analyzed: śiraḥ me śrīḥ iti ṛcā punantu varuṇa iti ca
pretasya pāvanam kṛtvā śāli śāla śilā udakaiḥ
viṣṇum uddiśya dātavyā suśīlā gauḥ payasvinī

original: (tilā lohaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca kārpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā /
analyzed: tilāḥ loham hiraṇyam ca kārpāsam lavaṇam tathā

original: saptadhānyaṃ kṣitirgāva ekaikaṃ pānaṃ samṛtam // GarP_2,40.61 //
analyzed: sapta dhānyam kṣitiḥ gāvaḥ ekaikam pānam samṛtam

original: tilapātraṃ tato dattvā padadānaṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_2,40.61*1 //
analyzed: tila pātram tatas dattvā pada dānam tathā eva ca
mahādānāni deyāni tila pātram tathā iti ca
tatas vaitaraṇī deyā sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitā
kartavyam vaiṣṇavam śrāddham preta mukti artha mā ātmavān

original: pretaṃmokṣaṃ tataḥ kuryāddhṛdi viṣṇuṃ prakalpya ca // GarP_2,40.63 //
analyzed: pretaṃmokṣam tatas kuryāt hṛdi viṣṇum prakalpya ca

original: oṃ viṣṇuriti saṃsmṛtya pretaṃ tanmṛtyumeva ca /
analyzed: om viṣṇuḥ iti saṃsmṛtya pretam tad mṛtyum eva ca
agni dāham tatas kuryāt sūtakam tu dina trayam
daśa aha kartrā piṇḍāḥ ca kartavyāḥ preta bhuktaye

original: sarvaṃ varṣavidhiṃ kuryādevaṃ pretaśca muktibhāk // GarP_2,40.65 //
analyzed: sarvam varṣa vidhim kuryāt evam pretaḥ ca mukti bhāj

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde 'pamṛtyau sukhaduḥ khalābhālābhanirūpaṇaṃ nāma  #
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde sukhaduḥ khalābhālābhanirūpaṇam nāma
catvāriṃśattamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
śrī viṣṇuḥ uvāca
vṛṣotsargam prakurvīta vidhi pūrvam khageśvara

original: kārtikādiṣu māseṣu paurṇamāsyāṃ śubhe dine // GarP_2,41.1 //
analyzed: kārtika ādiṣu māseṣu paurṇamāsyām śubhe dine
vivāha utsarjanam śrāddham nāndīmukham upakramet
kuryāt bhuvaḥ ca saṃskārān agni sthāpanam eva ca

original: vāpyāṃ kūpe gavāṃ goṣṭhe sthāpyāgniṃ vidhivattataḥ /
analyzed: vāpyām kūpe gavām goṣṭhe sthāpya agnim vidhivat tatas
vivāha vidhinā sarvam kuryāt brāhmaṇa vācanam
pātra āsādanam śrapaṇam upayamana kuśa ādikam

original: puryukṣaṇānte homaṃ ca karyā dvai brāhmaṇena tu // GarP_2,41.4 //
analyzed: puryukṣaṇa ante homam ca brāhmaṇena tu

original: āghārāvājyabhāgau ca cakṣuṣī ca pradā payet /
analyzed: āghārau ājyabhāgau ca cakṣuṣī ca pradā payet
prathame hariti mantreṇa hotavyāḥ ca ṣaḍ āhutīḥ tayaḥ
āghārau ājyabhāgau tu pāyasena aṅga devatāḥ

original: agnaye rudrāya śarvāya paśupataye ugrāya śivāya /
analyzed: agnaye rudrāya śarvāya paśupataye ugrāya śivāya
bhavāya mahādevāya īśānāya yamāya ca
piṣṭakena sakṛt homam pūṣā āgāḥ iti mantrataḥ
ubhayoḥ su iṣṭikūddhomaḥ caruṇā pāyasena ca
prathamam vyāhṛti homaḥ prāyaścittam prajāpatiḥ
saṃstrava prāśanam kuryāt praṇītā parimokṣaṇam
pavitra pratipattiḥ ca brāhmaṇe dakṣa eṇā tatas
ṣaṣ aṅga rudra jāpyena protaḥ mokṣam avāpnuyāt
eka varṇam vṛṣan ca eva sakṛt vatsatarīm khaga
snāpayitvā tatas kuryāt sarva alaṅkāra bhūṣitam
pratiṣṭhāpya ca tat yugmam pretaḥ mokṣam avāpnuyāt
pucche ca tarpaṇam kāryam ucchrite mantra pūrvakam
brāhmaṇān bhojayet paścāt dakṣiṇābhiḥ ca toṣayet
tatas śrāddham samuddiṣṭam ekoddiṣṭam yathāvidhi
jalam annam tathā deyam preta uddharaṇa hetave
dvādaśa ahe tatas kuryāt māse māse pṛthak pathak

original: evaṃ vidhiḥ samāyuktaḥ pretamokṣe karoti hi // GarP_2,41.13 //
analyzed: evam vidhiḥ samāyuktaḥ preta mokṣe karoti hi

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde vṛṣotsarganirūpaṇaṃ nāmai kacatvāriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde vṛṣotsarganirūpaṇam nāma ekacatvāriṃśattamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
śrī viṣṇuḥ uvāca
yathā dhenu sahasreṣu vatsaḥ vindati mātaram
tathā pūrva kṛtam karma kartāram anugacchati
ādityaḥ varuṇaḥ viṣṇuḥ brahmā somaḥ hutāśanaḥ
śūlapāṇiḥ ca bhagavān abhinandati bhūmi dam

original: nāsti bhamisamaṃ dānaṃ nāsti bhamisamo nidhiḥ /
analyzed: na asti bhami samam dānam na asti bhami samaḥ nidhiḥ

original: nāsti satyasamo dharmo nānṛtātpātakaṃ param // GarP_2,42.3 //
analyzed: na asti satya samaḥ dharmaḥ na anṛtāt pātakam param

original: agnerapatyaṃ prathamaṃ suvarṇaṃ bhūrvaiṣṇavī sūryasutāśca gāvaḥ /
analyzed: agneḥ apatyam prathamam suvarṇam bhūḥ vaiṣṇavī sūrya sutāḥ ca gāvaḥ

original: lokatrayaṃ tena bhavetpradattaṃ yaḥ kāñcanaṃ gāṃ ca mahīṃ ca dadyāt // GarP_2,42.4 //
analyzed: loka trayam tena bhavet pradattam yaḥ kāñcanam gām ca mahīm ca dadyāt
trīṇi āhuḥ atidānāni gāvaḥ pṛthvī sarasvatī
narakāt uddharanti ete japa pūjana homataḥ

original: kṛtvā bahūni pāpāni raudrāṇi vipulāni ca /
analyzed: kṛtvā bahūni pāpāni raudrāṇi vipulāni ca
api gocarma mātreṇa bhūmi dānena śudhyati
harantam api lobhena nirudhya enam nivārayet

original: sa yāti narake ghore yastaṃ na parirakṣati // GarP_2,42.7 //
analyzed: sa yāti narake ghore yaḥ tam na parirakṣati
akartavyam na kartavyam prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭha gataiḥ api
kartavyam eva kartavyam iti dharma vidaḥ viduḥ
ākāra pravartane pāpam go sahasra vadhaiḥ samam

original: vṛtticchede tathā vṛtteḥ karaṇaṃ lakṣadhenukam // GarP_2,42.9 //
analyzed: vṛtti chede tathā vṛtteḥ karaṇam lakṣadhenukam

original: varamekāpyapahṛtā na tu dattaṃ gavāṃ śatam /
analyzed: varam ekā api apahṛtā na tu dattam gavām śatam

original: ekāṃ hṛtvā śataṃ dattvā na tena samatā bhavet // GarP_2,42.10 //
analyzed: ekām hṛtvā śatam dattvā na tena sama tā bhavet

original: svayameva tu yo dattvā svayameva prabādhate /
analyzed: svayam eva tu yaḥ dattvā svayam eva prabādhate

original: sa pāpī narakaṃ yāti yāvadābhūtasaṃplavam // GarP_2,42.11 //
analyzed: sa pāpī narakam yāti yāvat ābhūtasaṃplavam
na ca aśvamedhena tathā vidhivat dakṣiṇāvatā

original: avṛttikarśite dīne brāhmaṇe gakṣite yathā // GarP_2,42.12 //
analyzed: avṛtti karśite dīne brāhmaṇe yathā
na tat bhavati vedeṣu yajñe su bahu dakṣiṇe

original: yatpuṇyaṃ durbale traste brāhmaṇe parirakṣite // GarP_2,42.13 //
analyzed: yat puṇyam durbale traste brāhmaṇe parirakṣite
brahma svaiḥ ca su puṣṭāni vāhanāni balāni ca

original: yuddhakāle viśīryante saikatāḥ setavo yathā // GarP_2,42.14 //
analyzed: yuddha kāle viśīryante saikatāḥ setavaḥ yathā

original: svadattāṃ paradattāṃ vā yo harecca vasundharām /
analyzed: sva dattām para dattām vā yaḥ haret ca vasundharām
ṣaṣṭi varṣa sahasrāṇi viṣṭhāyām jāyate kṛmiḥ
brahma svam praṇayāt bhuktam dahati āsaptamam kulam
tat eva caurya rūpeṇa dahati ācandratārakam
loha cūrṇa aśma cūrṇāni kadācid jarayet pumān
kaḥ pumān jarayiṣyati
deva dravya vināśena brahma sva haraṇena ca
kulāni akula tām yānti brāhmaṇa atikrameṇa ca
brāhmaṇa ati kramaḥ na asti vipre vidyā vivarjite

original: jvalantamagnimutsṛjya na hi bhasmani hūyate // GarP_2,42.19 //
analyzed: jvalantam agnim utsṛjya na hi bhasmani hūyate

original: saṃkrāntau yāni dānāni havyakavyāni yāni ca /
analyzed: saṃkrāntau yāni dānāni havya kavyāni yāni ca
sapta kalpa kṣayam yāvat dadāti arkaḥ punar punar
pratigraha adhyāpana yājaneṣu pratigraham sveṣṭatamam vadanti

original: pratigrahācchrudhyati jāpyahomaṃ na yājanaṃ karma punanti vedāḥ // GarP_2,42.21 //
analyzed: pratigrahāt śrudhyati jāpya homam na yājanam karma punanti vedāḥ
sadā jāpī sadā homī para pāka vivarjitaḥ
ratna pūrṇām api mahīm pratigṛhṇan na lipyate

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde bhūdānādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvicatvāriṃśatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde bhūdānādinirūpaṇam nāma dvicatvāriṃśatamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
śrī viṣṇuḥ uvāca
jala agni bandhana bhraṣṭā pravrajyā anāśaka cyutāḥ

original: aindavābhyāṃ viśudhyanti dattvā dhenuṃ tathā vṛṣam // GarP_2,43.1 //
analyzed: aindavābhyām viśudhyanti dattvā dhenum tathā vṛṣam
ūna dvādaśa varṣasya catur varṣa adhikasya ca

original: prāyaścittaṃ carenmātā pitā vānyo 'pi bāndhavaḥ // GarP_2,43.2 //
analyzed: prāyaścittam caret mātā pitā bāndhavaḥ
atas bāla narasya api na aparādhaḥ na pātakam

original: rājadaṇḍo na tasyāsti prāyaścittaṃ na vidyate // GarP_2,43.3 //
analyzed: rāja daṇḍaḥ na tasya asti prāyaścittam na vidyate

original: raktasya darśane daṣṭe āturā strī bhaved yadi /
analyzed: raktasya darśane daṣṭe āturā strī bhavet yadi

original: caturthe 'hni padādīṃśca tyaktvā snātvā viśudhyati // GarP_2,43.4 //
analyzed: caturthe hni pada ādīn ca tyaktvā snātvā viśudhyati
āture snāne utpanne daśa kṛtvas hi anāturaḥ

original: snātvāsnātvāspṛśedenaṃ tataḥ śudhyet sa āturaḥ // GarP_2,43.5 //
analyzed: snātvā a snātvā spṛśet enam tatas śudhyet saḥ āturaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde śuddhinirūpaṇaṃ nāma tricatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde śuddhinirūpaṇam nāma tricatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
śrī viṣṇuḥ uvāca
sva icchayā tārkṣya maraṇam śṛṅgi daṃṣṭri sarīsṛpaḥ
cāṇḍāla ādi ātmaghātaiḥ ca viṣa ādyaiḥ tāḍanaiḥ tathā
jala agni pāta vātaiḥ ca nirāhāra ādibhiḥ tathā
yeṣām eva bhavet mṛtyuḥ proktāḥ te pāpa karmiṇaḥ
pāṣaḍi anāśramāḥ ca eva mahāpātakinaḥ tathā
striyaḥ ca vyabhicāriṇyaḥ ārūḍha patitāḥ tathā

original: na teṣāṃ syānnava śrāddhaṃ na saṃskāraḥ sapiṇḍanam /
analyzed: na teṣām syāt nava śrāddham na saṃskāraḥ sapiṇḍanam

original: śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśoktāni na bhavanti ca tānyapi // GarP_2,44.4 //
analyzed: śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa uktāni na bhavanti ca tāni api
vetanam yat kṣipet apsu gṛhya agniḥ ca catuṣpathe
pātrāṇi nirdahet agnau sa agnike pāpa karmaṇi
pūrṇe saṃvatsare teṣām ittham kāryam dayālubhiḥ

original: ekādaśīṃ samāsādya śuklapakṣe ca kāśyapa // GarP_2,44.6 //
analyzed: ekādaśīm samāsādya śukla pakṣe ca kāśyapa
viṣṇum yamam ca sampūjya gandha puṣpa akṣata ādibhiḥ

original: daśa piṇḍān ghṛtāktāṃśca darbheṣu madhusaṃyutān // GarP_2,44.7 //
analyzed: daśa piṇḍān ghṛta aktān ca darbheṣu madhu saṃyutān

original: yajñopavīti satilān dhyāyan viṣṇuṃ yamaṃ tathā /
analyzed: yajña upavīti sa tilān dhyāyan viṣṇum yamam tathā
dakṣiṇa abhimukhaḥ tūṣṇīm ekaikam nirvapet tutān

original: uddhṛtya miśritān paścāt tīrthe 'bhmaḥ su viniḥ kṣipet /
analyzed: uddhṛtya miśritān paścāt tīrthe bhmaḥ su viniḥ kṣipet

original: kṣipan saṃkīrtayennāma gotraṃ ca mṛtakasya ca // GarP_2,44.9 //
analyzed: kṣipan saṃkīrtayet nāma gotram ca mṛtakasya ca
punar api arcayet viṣṇum yamam kusuma candanaiḥ
dhūpa dīpaiḥ sa naivedyaiḥ bhakṣya bhojya samanvitaiḥ
tasmin upavaset ahni viprān ca iva nimantrayet
kula vidyā tapaḥ yuktān sādhu śīla samanvitān
nava sapta athavā pañca sva sāmarthya anusārataḥ

original: apare 'hani madhyāhne yamaṃ viṣṇuṃ tathārcayet // GarP_2,44.12 //
analyzed: apare hani madhyāhne yamam viṣṇum tathā arcayet
udak mukhān tathā viprān tān samyak upaveśayet
āvāhana argha dāna ādau viṣṇum yama samanvitam
yajña upavītī kurvīta preta nāma prakīrtayet

original: pretaṃ yamaṃ ca viṣṇuṃ ca smaran śrāddhaṃ samāpayet // GarP_2,44.14 //
analyzed: pretam yamam ca viṣṇum ca smaran śrāddham samāpayet
anyebhyaḥ ca api sarvebhyaḥ piṇḍa dāna artham uddharet

original: pṛthagvā daśa piṇḍāṃśca pañca dadyāt krameṇa tu // GarP_2,44.15 //
analyzed: pṛthak vā daśa piṇḍān ca pañca dadyāt krameṇa tu

original: prathamaṃ viṣṇave dadyādbrahmaṇe ca śivāya ca /
analyzed: prathamam viṣṇave dadyāt brahmaṇe ca śivāya ca

original: sabhṛtyāya śivāyātha pretāyāpi ca pañcamam // GarP_2,44.16 //
analyzed: sa bhṛtyāya śivāya atha pretāya api ca pañcamam

original: nāma gotraṃ smaret tasya viṣṇuśabdaṃ prakīrtayet /
analyzed: nāma gotram smaret tasya viṣṇu śabdam prakīrtayet
namaskāra śiraskam tu pañcamam piṇḍam uddharet
go bhūmi piṇḍa dāna ādyaiḥ śaktyā pretam smaran ca tam
tilaiḥ tilān tu viprāṇām darbha yukteṣu pāṇiṣu

original: dadyādannaṃ dvijānāṃ ca tāmbūlaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ tathā /
analyzed: dadyāt annam dvijānām ca tāmbūlam dakṣiṇām tathā

original: evaṃ śiṣṭatamaṃ vipraṃ hariṇyena prapūjayet // GarP_2,44.19 //
analyzed: evam śiṣṭatamam vipram hariṇyena prapūjayet
nāma gotram smaran dadyāt viṣṇu prītostu iti bruvan

original: anuvrajya dvijān paścāt tyaktāmbho dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ // GarP_2,44.20 //
analyzed: anuvrajya dvijān paścāt tyakta ambhaḥ dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ
kīrtayat nāma gotre tu bhuvi kṣipet
mitra bandhu janaiḥ sārdham śeṣam bhuñjīta vāgyataḥ
prati saṃvatsara ādi syāt ekoddiṣṭa vidhānataḥ
evam kṛte gamiṣyanti svar lokam pāpa karmiṇaḥ
sapiṇḍīkaraṇa ādau tu kṛte ca eva āpnuvanti te
atha kaścid pramādena mriyate hi udaka ādibhiḥ
saṃsāra pramukhaḥ tasya sarvam kuryāt yathāvidhi
pramādāt icchayā martyaḥ na gacchet sarpa saṃmukhaḥ
pakṣayoḥ ubhayoḥ nāgam pañcamīṣu prapūjayet
kuryāt piṣṭa mayīm lekhām nāgānām ākṛtim bhuvi

original: arcayet tāṃ sitaiḥ puṣpaiḥ sugandhaiścandanenaca // GarP_2,44.25 //
analyzed: arcayet tām sitaiḥ puṣpaiḥ su gandhaiḥ candanena ca
pradadyāt dhūpa dīpam tu taṇḍulān ca sitān kṣipet
āma piṣṭam tathā eva annam kṣīram ca vinivedayet
upasthāya vadet evam muñcan mudrā aṃśukāni ca
madhuram tad dine śrīyāt deva śrāddham samāpayet
sauvarṇam śaktitas nāgam tatas dadyāt dvijottame

original: dhenuṃ dattvā tato brūyāt prīyatāṃ nāgarāḍiti // GarP_2,44.28 //
analyzed: dhenum dattvā tatas brūyāt prīyatām nāgarāj iti
yathāvibhavyam kurvīta karmāṇi anyāni pūrvavat
sva śākhā ukta vidhānena ittham kuryāt yathātatham

original: pretatvānmocayet tāṃstu svargamārgaṃ nayet ca // GarP_2,44.29 //
analyzed: preta tvāt mocayet tān tu svarga mārgam nayet ca

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśākhye dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde durmaraṇe kāryākāryakriyādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma  #
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśa ākhye dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde durmaraṇe kāryākāryakriyādinirūpaṇam nāma
catuścatvāriṃśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
śrī viṣṇuḥ uvāca
pratyabdam śrāddham evam te kathayāmi khageśvara
pratyabdam pārvaṇena eva kuryātām kṣetraja urasau
vidhinā ca itaraiḥ evam ekoddiṣṭam na pārvaṇam
anagneḥ ca sutau syātām anagnī kṣetraja urasau

original: ekoddiṣṭaṃ na kuryātāṃ pratyabdaṃ tau tu pārvaṇam // GarP_2,45.3 //
analyzed: ekoddiṣṭam na kuryātām pratyabdam tau tu pārvaṇam

original: yadā tvanyataraḥ sāgniḥ putro vāpyathavā pitā /
analyzed: yadā tu anyataraḥ sa agniḥ putraḥ vā api athavā pitā

original: pratyabdaṃ pārvaṇaṃ tatra kuryātāṃ kṣetrajaurasau // GarP_2,45.4 //
analyzed: pratyabdam pārvaṇam tatra kuryātām kṣetraja aurasau

original: anagnayaḥ sāgnayo vā putrā vā pitaro 'pi vā /
analyzed: anagnayaḥ sa agnayaḥ vā putrāḥ vā pitaraḥ pi vā

original: ekoddiṣṭaṃ sutaiḥ kāryaṃ kṣayāha iti kecana // GarP_2,45.5 //
analyzed: ekoddiṣṭam sutaiḥ kāryam kṣaya ahe iti kecana

original: darśakāle kṣayo yasya pretapakṣe 'tha vā punaḥ /
analyzed: darśa kāle kṣayaḥ yasya pretapakṣe vā punar

original: pratyabdaṃ pārvaṇaṃ kāryaṃ tasya sarvaiḥ sutairapi // GarP_2,45.6 //
analyzed: pratyabdam pārvaṇam kāryam tasya sarvaiḥ sutaiḥ api
ekoddiṣṭam aputrāṇām puṃsām syāt yopitām api

original: bahirlūnāḥ sakṛllanāḥ śrāddhaṃ vṛddhimṛte sadā // GarP_2,45.7 //
analyzed: bahis lūnāḥ sakṛt lanāḥ śrāddham vṛddhim ṛte sadā

original: kartavye pārvaṇe śrāddhe āśaucaṃ yadi jāyate /
analyzed: kartavye pārvaṇe śrāddhe āśaucam yadi jāyate

original: ekoddiṣṭe tu samprāpte yadi vighnaḥ prajāyate /
analyzed: ekoddiṣṭe tu samprāpte yadi vighnaḥ prajāyate

original: māsenyasmin tithau tasyāṃ kuryācchrāddhaṃ tadaiva hi // GarP_2,45.9 //
analyzed: tithau tasyām kuryāt śrāddham tadā eva hi
tūṣṇīm śrāddhān tu śūdrasya bhāryāyāḥ tad sutasya ca

original: ekakāle gatā sūnāṃ bahūnāmatha vā dvayoḥ /
analyzed: eka kāle gatā sūnām bahūnām atha vā dvayoḥ

original: tantreṇa śrapaṇaṃ kuryācchrāddhaṃ kuryāt pṛthakpṛthak // GarP_2,45.11 //
analyzed: tantreṇa śrapaṇam kuryāt śrāddham kuryāt pṛthak pṛthak

original: dadyāt pūrvaṃ mṛtasyādau dvitīyasya tataḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: dadyāt pūrvam mṛtasya ādau dvitīyasya tatas punar

original: tṛtīyasya tataḥ kuryāt saṃnipāte tvayaṃ vidhiḥ (kramaḥ) // GarP_2,45.12 //
analyzed: tṛtīyasya tatas kuryāt saṃnipāte tu ayam vidhiḥ kramaḥ

original: tārayitvā pitṝn sarvān prāpnoti paramāṃ gatim // GarP_2,45.13 //
analyzed: tārayitvā pitṝn sarvān prāpnoti paramām gatim

original: yadā māso na vijñāto vijñātaṃ dinameva ca /

original: tadā mārgaśire māsi māghe vā taddinaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,45.15 //
analyzed: tadā mārgaśire māsi māghe vā tat dinam bhavet

original: prasthānadinamāsau tu grāhyau śrāddhe mayoditau // GarP_2,45.16 //
analyzed: prasthāna dina māsau tu grāhyau śrāddhe mayā uditau

original: prasthānasyāpi na jñātau dinamāsau yadā punaḥ /
analyzed: prasthānasya api na jñātau dina māsau yadā punar

original: tadānīmapi tau grāhyau pūrvavat tu mṛtāhike // GarP_2,45.18 //
analyzed: tadānīm api tau grāhyau pūrvavat tu mṛtāhike

original: gṛhasthe proṣite yacca kaścittu mriyate gṛhe /
analyzed: gṛhasthe proṣite yat ca kaścid tu mriyate gṛhe
āsauca apagame yatra prārabdhe śrāddha karmaṇi

original: āśaucaṃ gṛhiṇasteṣāṃ na dravyādestadā bhavet // GarP_2,45.20 //
analyzed: āśaucam gṛhiṇaḥ teṣām na dravya ādeḥ tadā bhavet

original: samāpanīyaṃ tatrāpi śrāddhaṃ gṛhītu dūrataḥ // GarP_2,45.21 //
analyzed: samāpanīyam tatra api śrāddham dūratas

original: dātrā boktrā ca na jñātaṃ sūtakaṃ mṛtakaṃ tathā /
analyzed: dātrā boktrā ca na jñātam sūtakam mṛtakam tathā
ubhayoḥ api tad doṣam na āropayati karhicit

original: bhoktureva tadā doṣo nānyo dātā praduṣyati // GarP_2,45.23 //
analyzed: bhoktuḥ eva tadā doṣaḥ na anyaḥ dātā praduṣyati
iti uktena prakāreṇa yaḥ kuryāt mṛta vāsaram

original: sarvān pitṛgaṇān samyak sahaivoddiśya yojayet // GarP_2,45.25 //
analyzed: sarvān pitṛ gaṇān samyak saha eva uddiśya yojayet
āvāhanam svadhākāraḥ piṇḍa agnaukaraṇa ādikam

original: dattvā tu dakṣiṇāṃ śaktyā namaskārairvisarjayet // GarP_2,45.27 //
analyzed: dattvā tu dakṣiṇām śaktyā namaskāraiḥ visarjayet
devān uddiśya viśva ādīn yat dadyāt dvija bhojanam

original: mātāmahebhyaśca tathā dadyāditthaṃ krameṇa tu // GarP_2,45.31 //
analyzed: mātāmahebhyaḥ ca tathā dadyāt ittham krameṇa tu

original: patiputrānvitāḥ sādhvyo yoṣito 'ṣṭau ca bhāvayet // GarP_2,45.32 //
analyzed: pati putra anvitāḥ sādhvyaḥ yoṣitaḥ ṣṭau ca bhāvayet

original: nityaṃ daivañca vṛddhiñca kāmyaṃ naimittikaṃ tathā /

analyzed: iti te kathitam tārkṣya kim anyat paripṛcchasi

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde pratyābdikādiśrāddhanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcacatvāriṃśo
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde pratyābdikādiśrāddhanirūpaṇam nāma pañcacatvāriṃśaḥ

analyzed: bhogāḥ rūpañca balam buddhaiḥ parākramaḥ

original: satyaṃ puṇyavatāṃ deva jāyate 'tra paratra ca /

śrī kṛṣṇaḥ uvāca

analyzed: tāni aham tava cihnāni kathayiṣye khaga uttama

original: soḍhvā vai yātanāḥ sarvā gatvā vaivasvatakṣayam /

original: brahmahā jāyate kuṣṭhī śyāvadantaśca madyapaḥ // GarP_2,46.12 //

original: adattvā bhakṣyamaśrāti anapatyo bhavettu saḥ // GarP_2,46.18 //

original: aprāptayauvanāṃ sevan bhavetsarpa iti śrutiḥ // GarP_2,46.20 //

original: ayonigo vṛko hi syādulūkaḥ krayavañcanāt // GarP_2,46.22 //

original: yadvā tadvāpi pārakyaṃ svalpaṃ vā harate bahu /

original: evaṃ duṣkṛtakarmā hi bhuktvā ca narakānkramāt /

original: indriyāṇi manaḥ prāṇā jñānamāyuḥ sukhaṃ dhṛtiḥ /

original: dhāraṇā preraṇaṃ duḥ khaṃ mithyāhaṅkāra eva ca // GarP_2,46.31 //
analyzed: dhāraṇā preraṇam duḥ kham mithyā ahaṅkāraḥ eva ca

original: purā yathā mayā proktaṃ tava jantorhi lakṣaṇam // GarP_2,46.33 //

original: yā dṛśyante vainateya tatsarvaṃ karmajaṃ phalam // GarP_2,46.36 //

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe jīvasya śubhāśubhagatinirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭcatvāriṃśodhyāyaḥ

analyzed: kvāthyate satvaram toyam pātra madhye ghṛtam yathā

original: krimibhiḥ saṅkulaṃ pūyaṃ vajratuṇḍaiḥ samāvṛtam // GarP_2,47.4 //

original: udyānti dvādaśādityāḥ pralayānte tathā hi te /
analyzed: udyānti dvādaśa ādityāḥ pralaya ante tathā hi te

original: tapanti tatra vai martyāḥ kranda mānāstu pāpinaḥ // GarP_2,47.6 //
analyzed: tapanti tatra vai martyāḥ kranda mānāḥ tu pāpinaḥ

original: hā bhrātaḥ putra tāteti pralapanti muhurmuhuḥ /

analyzed: taranti go pradānena tu anyathā ca patanti te
