analyzed: mohāt vinā aṣṭam yadi garbha cintitam smṛtam punar mṛtyu gate ca dehe

original: tasminpranaṣṭe hṛdi cintitaṃ gataṃ smṛtaṃ punargarbhagate ca dehe // GarP_2,48.23 //
analyzed: tasmin pranaṣṭe hṛdi cintitam gatam smṛtam punar garbha gate ca dehe

original: tasminpranaṣṭe hṛdi cintitaṃ punarmayā svakośe paravañcanaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: tasmin pranaṣṭe hṛdi cintitam punar mayā sva kośe para vañcanam kṛtam

original: dyūtaiśchalenāpi ca cauryavṛttyā dharmaṃ vyatikramya śarīrarakṣaṇe // GarP_2,48.24 //
analyzed: dyūtaiḥ chalena api ca caurya vṛttyā dharmam vyatikramya śarīra rakṣaṇe

original: kṛcchreṇa lakṣmīḥ samupārjitā svayaṃ mayā na bhuktaṃ manasepsitaṃ dhanam /
analyzed: kṛcchreṇa lakṣmīḥ samupārjitā svayam mayā na bhuktam manasā īpsitam dhanam
tāmbūlam annam madhuram sa gorasam dattvā agni deva atithi bandhu varge

original: somagrahe sūryasamāgamepi vā na sevitaṃ tīrthavariṣṭhamuttamam /
analyzed: soma grahe sūrya samāgame api vā na sevitam tīrtha variṣṭham uttamam

original: kośaṃ svakīyaṃ malamūtrapūritaṃ dehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,48.26 //
analyzed: kośam svakīyam mala mūtra pūritam dehin kvacid nistara yat tvayā kṛtam

original: mayā na dṛṣṭā na natā na pūjitā traivikramī mūrtiriha sthitā bhuvi /
analyzed: mayā na dṛṣṭā na natā na pūjitā traivikramī mūrtiḥ iha sthitā bhuvi

original: prabhāsanātho na ca bhaktisaṃstuto dehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,48.27 //
analyzed: prabhāsa nāthaḥ na ca bhakti saṃstutaḥ dehin kvacid nistara yat tvayā kṛtam

original: gatvā variṣṭhe bhuvi tīrthasannidhau dhanaṃ na dattaṃ viduṣāṃ kare mayā /
analyzed: gatvā variṣṭhe bhuvi tīrtha sannidhau dhanam na dattam viduṣām kare mayā

original: āplutya dehaṃ vidhinā dvije gurau dihinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,48.28 //
analyzed: āplutya deham vidhinā dvije gurau dihin kvacid nistara yat tvayā kṛtam

original: na mātṛpūjā na ca viṣṇuśaṅkarau gaṇeśacaṇaḍyau na ca bhāskaro 'pi vā /
analyzed: na mātṛ pūjā na ca viṣṇu śaṅkarau gaṇeśa caṇaḍyau na ca vā
yat ca upacāraiḥ bali yukta candanaiḥ dehin kvacid nistara yat tvayā kṛtam

original: labdhā mayā mānavadevatopamā mohādgatā sarvamidañca pārthiva /
analyzed: labdhā mayā mānava devatā upamā mohāt gatā sarvam idan ca pārthiva

original: gatiṃ na vīkṣeta sa vai vimūḍhadhīrdehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,48.30 //
analyzed: gatim na vīkṣeta sa vai vimūḍha dhīḥ dehin kvacid nistara yat tvayā kṛtam
etāni pakṣin manasā vicintya vākyāni dharma artha yaśaskarāṇi

original: muktiṃ samāyānti manuṣyaloke vasanti ye dharmaratāḥ sudeśe // GarP_2,48.31 //
analyzed: muktim samāyānti manuṣya loke vasanti ye dharma ratāḥ sudeśe
iti bruvāṇaiḥ yama dhūta vargaiḥ vihanyate kāla mayaiḥ ca mudgaraiḥ

original: hā daiva hā daiva iti smaran vai dhanaṃ na dattaṃ svayamarjitaṃ yat // GarP_2,48.32 //
analyzed: hā daiva hā daiva iti smaran vai dhanam na dattam svayam arjitam yat

original: na bhūmidānaṃ na ca gopradānaṃ na vāridānaṃ na ca vastradānam /
analyzed: na bhūmi dānam na ca go pradānam na vāri dānam na ca vastra dānam

original: phalaṃ satāmbūlavilepanaṃ vā tvayā na dattaṃ bhuvi śocase katham // GarP_2,48.33 //
analyzed: phalam sa tāmbūla vilepanam vā tvayā na dattam bhuvi śocase katham

original: pitā mṛtaste ca pitāmahaḥ sā yayā dhṛto vāpyudare svakīye /
analyzed: pitā mṛtaḥ te ca pitāmahaḥ sā yayā dhṛtaḥ vā api udare svakīye

original: mṛto 'pyasau bandhujanaḥ samasto dṛṣṭaṃ tvayā sarvamidaṃ gatāyaḥ // GarP_2,48.34 //
analyzed: mṛtaḥ pi asau bandhu janaḥ samastaḥ dṛṣṭam tvayā sarvam idam gata ayaḥ

original: kośaṃ tvadīyaṃ jvalitañca vahninā puttrairgṛhīto dhanadhānya sañcayaḥ /
analyzed: kośam tvadīyam jvalitam ca vahninā puttraiḥ gṛhītaḥ dhana dhānya sañcayaḥ

original: subhāṣitaṃ dharmacayaṃ kṛtañca yattadeva gacchettava pṛṣṭhasaṃstham // GarP_2,48.35 //
analyzed: su bhāṣitam dharma cayam kṛtam ca yat tat eva gacchet tava pṛṣṭha saṃstham

original: na dṛśyate ko 'pi mṛtaḥ samāgato rājā yatirvā dvijapuṅgavo 'pi vā /
analyzed: na dṛśyate kaḥ pi mṛtaḥ samāgataḥ rājā yatiḥ vā vā

original: yo vai mṛtaḥ sāhasikaḥ sa martyako nāśaṃ yo 'pi dharātale sthitaḥ // GarP_2,48.36 //
analyzed: yaḥ vai mṛtaḥ sāhasikaḥ sa martyakaḥ nāśam dharā tale sthitaḥ

original: evaṃ gaṇāste bruvate sakinnarā dhairyaṃ samālambya vipādapūritaḥ /
analyzed: evam gaṇāḥ te bruvate sa kinnarāḥ dhairyam samālambya vipāda pūritaḥ

original: śrutvā gaṇānāṃ vacanaṃ mahādbhutaṃ bravīti pakṣīndra manuṣyatāṃ gataḥ // GarP_2,48.37 //
analyzed: śrutvā gaṇānām vacanam mahā adbhutam bravīti pakṣi indra manuṣya tām gataḥ
dāna prabhāveṇa vimāna saṃsthitaḥ dharmaḥ pitā mātṛ dayā anurūpiṇī

original: vāṇī kalatraṃ madhurārthabhāṣiṇī snānaṃ sutīrthe ca subandhavargaḥ // GarP_2,48.38 //
analyzed: vāṇī kalatram madhura artha bhāṣiṇī snānam su tīrthe ca su bandha vargaḥ

original: karārpitaṃ yatsukṛtaṃ samastaṃ svargastadā syāttava kiṅkaropamaḥ /
analyzed: kara arpitam yat sukṛtam samastam svargaḥ tadā syāt tava kiṅkara upamaḥ

original: yo dharmavān prāpsyati so 'tisaukhyaṃ pāpī samastaṃ vividhañca duḥkham // GarP_2,48.39 //
analyzed: yaḥ dharmavān prāpsyati saḥ ti saukhyam pāpī samastam vividham ca duḥkham

original: yo dharmaśīlo jitamānaroṣo vidyāvinīto na paropatāpī /
analyzed: yaḥ dharma śīlaḥ jita māna roṣaḥ vidyā vinītaḥ na para upatāpī

original: svadāratuṣṭaḥ paradāradūraḥsa vai naro no bhuvi vandanīyaḥ // GarP_2,48.40 //
analyzed: sva dāra tuṣṭaḥ para dāra dūraḥ sa vai naraḥ naḥ bhuvi vandanīyaḥ
miṣṭānna dātā carita agnihotraḥ vedānta vid candra sahasra jīvī

original: māsopavāsī ca pativratā caṣaḍ jīvaloke mama vandanīyāḥ // GarP_2,48.41 //
analyzed: māsa upavāsī ca pativratā ca ṣaṣ jīva loke mama vandanīyāḥ

original: evaṃ samācārayuto naro 'pi vāpīṃ sakūpāṃ sajalaṃ taḍāgam /
analyzed: evam samācāra yutaḥ naraḥ vāpīm sa kūpām sa jalam taḍāgam

original: prapāśubhaṃ hṛdgṛhadevamandiraṃ kṛtaṃ nareṇaiva sa dharmauttamaḥ // GarP_2,48.42 //
analyzed: prapā śubham hṛd gṛha deva mandiram kṛtam nareṇa eva sa dharmauttamaḥ

original: varṣāśanaṃ vedavide ca dattaṃ kanyāvivāhastvṛṇamocanaṃ dvije /
analyzed: varṣa aśanam veda vide ca dattam kanyā vivāhaḥ tu ṛṇamocanam dvije

original: bhūmiḥ sukṛṣṭāpi tṛṣārtihetostadevametaṃ sukṛtat samastam // GarP_2,48.43 //
analyzed: bhūmiḥ su kṛṣṭā api tṛṣā ārti hetoḥ tat evam etam samastam

original: adhyāyamenaṃ sukṛtasya sāraṃ śṛṇoti gāyatyapi bhāvaśuddhyā /
analyzed: adhyāyam enam su kṛtasya sāram śṛṇoti gāyati api bhāva śuddhyā

original: sa vai kulīnaḥ sa ca dharmayukto viśvālayaṃ yāti paraṃ sa nūnam // GarP_2,48.44 //
analyzed: sa vai kulīnaḥ sa ca dharma yuktaḥ viśva ālayam yāti param sa nūnam

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde manuṣyasya sukhaduḥ khaprāpakadharmādharmanirūpaṇaṃ  #
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde manuṣyasya sukha duḥ kha prāpaka dharma adharma nirūpaṇam
nāma aṣṭacatvāriṃśattamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
śrī garuḍa mahāpurāṇam
garuḍaḥ uvāca
śrutā mayā dayā sindho hi ajñānāt jīva saṃsṛtiḥ
adhunā śrotum icchāmi mokṣa upāyam sanātanam
bhagavan devadeveśa śaraṇa āgata vatsala
asāre ghora saṃsāre sarva dus kha malīmase
nānāvidha śarīra sthāḥ anantāḥ jīva rāśayaḥ

original: jāyante ca mriyante ca teṣāmanto na vidyate // GarP_2,49.3 //
analyzed: jāyante ca mriyante ca teṣām antaḥ na vidyate

original: sadā duḥ khāturā eva na sakhī vidyate kkacit /
analyzed: sadā duḥ kha āturā eva na sakhī vidyate kkacid

original: kenopāyena mokṣeśa mucyante vada me prabho // GarP_2,49.4 //
analyzed: kena upāyena mokṣa īśa mucyante vada me prabho
śrī bhagavān ubāca

original: śṛṇu tārkṣya pravakṣyāmi yanmāṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi /
analyzed: śṛṇu tārkṣya pravakṣyāmi yat mām tvam paripṛcchasi
yasya śravaṇa mātreṇa saṃsārāt mucyate naraḥ
asti devaḥ para brahma svarūpaḥ niṣkalaḥ śivaḥ

original: sarvajñaḥ sarvakartā ca sarveśo nirmalo 'dvayaḥ // GarP_2,49.6 //

analyzed: svayañjyotiḥ anādi antaḥ nirvikāraḥ parātparaḥ
nirguṇaḥ saccidānandaḥ tad aṃśāḥ jīva saṃjñakāḥ
anādya vidyā upahatāḥ yathā agnau visphuliṅgakāḥ
deha ādi upādhi sambhinnāḥ te karmabhiḥ anādibhiḥ
sukha duḥ kha pradaiḥ puṇya pā rūpaiḥ niyantritāḥ
tad tad jāti yutam deham āyuḥ bhogam ca karma jam
pratijanma prapadyante teṣām api param punar
sa sūkṣma liṅga śarīram āmokṣāt akṣaram khaga
sthāvarāḥ kṛmayaḥ ca ajāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ paśavaḥ nagaḥ
dhārmikāḥ tridaśāḥ tadvat mokṣiṇaḥ ca yathākramam
caturvidha śarīrāṇi dhṛtvā muktvā sahasraśas

original: sukṛtānmā navo bhūtvā jñānī cenmokṣamāpnuyāt // GarP_2,49.12 //
analyzed: sukṛtāt mā navaḥ bhūtvā jñānī ced mokṣam āpnuyāt
caturaśīti lakṣeṣu śarīreṣu śarīriṇām

original: na mānuṣaṃ vinānyatra tattvajñānantu labhyate // GarP_2,49.13 //
analyzed: na mānuṣam vinā anyatra tattva jñānan tu labhyate
atra janma sahasrāṇām sahasraiḥ api koṭibhiḥ
kadācid labhate jantuḥ mānuṣyam puṇya sañcayāt
sopāna bhūtam mokṣasya mānuṣyam prāpya durlabham

original: yastāra yati nātmānaṃ tasmātpāpataro 'tra kaḥ // GarP_2,49.15 //
analyzed: yaḥ tāra yati nā ātmānam tasmāt pāpataraḥ tra kaḥ
naraḥ prāpya itarat janma labdhvā ca indriya sauṣṭhavam

original: na vettyātmahitaṃ yastu sa bhavedbrahmaghātakaḥ // GarP_2,49.16 //
analyzed: na vetti ātma hitam yaḥ tu sa bhavet brahma ghātakaḥ

original: vinā dehena kasyāpi puruṣārtho na vidyate /
analyzed: vinā dehena kasya api puruṣa arthaḥ na vidyate
tasmāt deham dhanam rakṣet puṇya karmāṇi sādhayet
rakṣet ca sarvadā ātmānam ātmā sarvvasya bhājanam
rakṣaṇe yatnam ātiṣṭhet jīvan bhadrāṇi paśyati
punar grāmaḥ punar kṣetra punar vittam punar gṛham

original: punaḥ śubhāśubhaṃ karma na śarīraṃ punaḥ punaḥ // GarP_2,49.19 //
analyzed: punar śubha aśubham karma na śarīram punar punar
śarīra rakṣaṇa upāyāḥ sarvadā budhaiḥ
na icchanti ca punar tyāgam api kuṣṭha ādi rogiṇaḥ
tat gopitam syāt dharma artham dharmaḥ jñāna artham eva ca
jñānam tu dhyāna yoga artham acirāt pravimucyate
ātmā eva yadi na ātmānam ahītebhyaḥ nivārayet
kaḥ nyaḥ hita karaḥ tasmāt ātmānam sukhayiṣyati
iha eva naraka vyādheḥ cikitsām na karoti yaḥ

original: gatvā nirauṣadhaṃ deśaṃ vyādhimthaḥ kiṃ kariṣyati // GarP_2,49.23 //
analyzed: gatvā nirauṣadham deśam kim kariṣyati
vyāghrī iva āste jarā ca āyuḥ yāti bhinna ghaṭa ambu vat
nighnanti ripu vat rogāḥ tasmāt śreyaḥ samabhyaseta
yāvat na āśrayate duḥ kham yāvat na āyānti ca āpadaḥ
yāvat na indriya vaikalyam tāvat śreyaḥ samabhyaset
yāvat tiṣṭhati dehaḥ yam tāvat tattvam samabhyaset
sandīpta kośa bhavane kūpam khanati durmatiḥ
kālaḥ na jñāyate nānā kāryaiḥ saṃsāra sambhavaiḥ

original: sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ jano hanta na vetti hitamātmanaḥ // GarP_2,49.27 //
analyzed: sukham duḥkham janaḥ hanta na vetti hitam ātmanaḥ
jātān ārtān mṛtān āpad bhaṣṭān dṛṣṭvā ca duḥ khitān

original: loko mohasurāṃ pītvā na bibheti kadācana // GarP_2,49.28 //
analyzed: lokaḥ moha surām pītvā na bibheti kadācana
sampadaḥ svapna saṃkāśāḥ yauvanam kusuma upamam
taḍit capalam āyuṣyam kasya syāt jānataḥ dhṛtiḥ
śatam jīvitam ati alpam nidrā ālasyaiḥ tad ardhakam
bālya roga jarā duḥkhaiḥ alpam tat api niṣphalam
prārabdhavye nirudyogī jāgartavye prasuptakaḥ

original: viśvastaśca bhayasthāne hā naraḥ ko na hanyate // GarP_2,49.31 //
analyzed: viśvastaḥ ca bhaya sthāne hā naraḥ kaḥ na hanyate
toya phena same dehe jīvena ākramya saṃsthite
tiṣṭhati nirbhayaḥ
ahite hita saṃjñaḥ syāt adhruve dhruva saṃjñakaḥ

original: anarthe cārthavijñānaḥ svamarthaṃ yo na vetti saḥ // GarP_2,49.33 //
analyzed: anarthe ca artha vijñānaḥ svam artham yaḥ na vetti saḥ
paśyan api praskhalati śṛṇvan api na budhyati
paṭhan api na jānāti deva māyā vimohitaḥ
tat nimajjat jagat idam gambhīre kāla sāgare
mṛtyu roga jarā grāhaiḥ na kaścid api budhyate
pratikṣaṇa bhayam kālaḥ kṣīyamāṇaḥ na lakṣyate

original: āmakuṃbha ivāṃbhaḥ stho viśīrṇo na vibhāvyate // GarP_2,49.36 //
analyzed: āma kuṃbhaḥ iva aṃbhaḥ sthaḥ viśīrṇaḥ na vibhāvyate
yujyate veṣṭanam vāyoḥ ākāśasya ca khaṇḍanam
grathanam ca taraṅgāṇām āsthā na āyuṣi yujyate
pṛthivī dahyate yena meruḥ ca api viśīryate

original: śuṣyate sāgarajalaṃ śarīrasya ca kā kathā // GarP_2,49.38 //
analyzed: śuṣyate sāgara jalam śarīrasya ca kā kathā

original: apatyaṃ me kalatraṃ me dhanaṃ me bāndhavāśca me /
analyzed: apatyam me kalatram me dhanam me bāndhavāḥ ca me

original: jalpantamiti martyājaṃ hanti kālavṛko balāt // GarP_2,49.39 //
analyzed: jalpantam iti martya ajam hanti kālavṛkaḥ balāt
idam kṛtam idam kāryam idam anyat kṛtākṛtam
evam īhā samāyuktam kṛtāntaḥ kurute vaśam
śvas kāryam adya kurvīta pūrvāhne ca āparāhnikam

original: na hi mṛtyuḥ pratīkṣeta kṛtaṃ vāpyatha vākṛtam // GarP_2,49.41 //
analyzed: na hi mṛtyuḥ pratīkṣeta kṛtam vā api atha vā akṛtam
jarā darśita panthānam pracaṇḍa vyādhi sainikam

original: adhiṣṭhito mṛtyuśatruṃ trātāraṃ kiṃ na paśyati // GarP_2,49.42 //
analyzed: adhiṣṭhitaḥ mṛtyu śatrum trātāram kim na paśyati
tṛṣṇā sūcī vinirbhinnam siktam viṣaya sarpiṣā
rāga dveṣa anale pakvam mṛtyuḥ aśrāti mānavam
bālān ca yauvana sthān ca vṛddhān garbha gatān api
sarvān āviśate mṛtyuḥ evambhūmi dam jagat
sva deham api jīvaḥ yam muktvā yāti yama ālayam
strī mātṛ pitṛ puttra ādi sambandhaḥ kena hetunā

original: duḥ khamūlaṃ hi saṃsāraḥ sa yasyāsti sa duḥ khitaḥ /
analyzed: duḥ kha mūlam hi saṃsāraḥ sa yasya asti sa duḥ khitaḥ

original: tasya tyāgaḥ kṛto yena sa sukhī nāparaḥ kvacit // GarP_2,49.46 //
analyzed: tasya tyāgaḥ kṛtaḥ yena sa sukhī na aparaḥ kvacid
prabhavam sarva duḥ khānām ālayam sakala āpadām
āśrayam sarva pāpānām saṃsāram varjayet kṣaṇāt
loha dāru mayaiḥ pāśaiḥ pumān baddhaḥ vimucyate
puttra dāra mayaiḥ pāśaiḥ mucyate na kadācana
yāvataḥ kurute jantuḥ sambandhān manasaḥ priyān
tāvantaḥ sya nikhanyante hṛdaye śoka śaṅkavaḥ
vañcita aśeṣa vittaiḥ taiḥ nityam lokaḥ vināśitaḥ
hā hanta viṣaya āhāraiḥ deha stha undriya taskaraiḥ

original: māṃsalubdho yathā matsyo lohaśaṅkuṃ na paśyati /
analyzed: māṃsa lubdhaḥ yathā matsyaḥ loha śaṅkum na paśyati

original: sukhalubdhastathā dehī yamavādhāṃ na paśyati // GarP_2,49.51 //
analyzed: sukha lubdhaḥ tathā dehī yam avādhām na paśyati
hita ahitam na jānantaḥ nityam unmārga gāminaḥ

original: kukṣipūraṇaniṣṭhā ye te narā nārakāḥ khaga // GarP_2,49.52 //
analyzed: kukṣi pūraṇa niṣṭhāḥ ye te narāḥ nārakāḥ khaga
nidrā abhī maithuna āhārāḥ sarveṣām prāṇinām samāḥ

original: jñānavānmānavaḥ prokto jñānahīnaḥ paśuḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_2,49.53 //
analyzed: jñānavān mānavaḥ proktaḥ jñāna hīnaḥ paśuḥ smṛtaḥ
prabhāte mala mūttrābhyām kṣudh tṛḍbhyām madhya ge ravau
rātrau madana nidrābhyām bādhyante mūḍha mānavāḥ
sva deha dhana dāra ādi niratāḥ sarva jantavaḥ

original: jāyante ca mriyante ca hā hantājñānamohitāḥ // GarP_2,49.55 //
analyzed: jāyante ca mriyante ca hā hanta ajñāna mohitāḥ

original: tasmātsaṅgaḥ sadā tyājyaḥ sacettyaktuṃ na śakyate /
analyzed: tasmāt saṅgaḥ sadā tyājyaḥ saced tyaktum na śakyate

original: mahadbhiḥ saha kartavyaḥ santaḥ saṅgasya bheṣajam // GarP_2,49.56 //
analyzed: mahadbhiḥ saha kartavyaḥ santaḥ saṅgasya bheṣajam
sat saṅgaḥ ca vivekaḥ ca nirmalam nayana dvayam

original: yasya nāsti naraḥ so 'ndhaḥ kathaṃ na syādamārgagaḥ // GarP_2,49.57 //
analyzed: yasya nā asti naraḥ saḥ ndhaḥ katham na syāt amārga gaḥ
sva sva varṇa āśrama ācāra niratāḥ sarva mānavāḥ

original: na jānanti paraṃ dharmaṃ vṛthā naśyanti dāmbhikāḥ // GarP_2,49.58 //
analyzed: na jānanti param dharmam vṛthā naśyanti dāmbhikāḥ
kim āyāsa parāḥ kecid vrata caryā ādi saṃyutāḥ
ajñāna saṃvṛta ātmānaḥ sañcaranti pracārakāḥ
nāma mātreṇa santuṣṭāḥ karmakāṇḍa ratāḥ narāḥ
mantra uccāraṇa homa ādyaiḥ bhrāmitāḥ kratu vistaraiḥ
eka bhukta upavāsa ādyaiḥ niyamaiḥ kāya śoṣaṇaiḥ
mūḍhāḥ parokṣam icchanti mama māyā vimohitāḥ
deha daṇḍana mātreṇa kā muktiḥ avivekinām
valmīka tāḍanāt eva mṛtaḥ kin nu mahā uragaḥ
jaṭā bhāra ajinaiḥ yuktāḥ dāmbhikāḥ veṣa dhāriṇaḥ
bhramanti jñāni vat loke bhrāmayanti janān api
saṃsāra ja sukha āsaktam brahma jñaḥ smi iti vādinam
karma brahma ubhaya bhraṣṭam tam tyajet antyajam yathā
gṛha araṇya samāḥ loke gata vrīḍāḥ digambarāḥ

original: caranti gardabhādyāśca viraktāste bhavanti kim // GarP_2,49.65 //
analyzed: caranti gardabha ādyāḥ ca viraktāḥ te bhavanti kim
mṛd bhasma uddhūlanāt eva muktāḥ syuḥ yadi mānavāḥ

original: mṛdbhasmavāsī nityaṃ śvā sa kiṃ mukto bhaviṣyati // GarP_2,49.66 //
analyzed: mṛd bhasma vāsī nityam śvā sa kim muktaḥ bhaviṣyati
tṛṇa parṇa udaka āhārāḥ satatam vana vāsinaḥ
jambūka ākhu mṛga ādyāḥ ca tāpasāḥ te bhavanti kim
ājanma maraṇa antam ca gaṅgā ādi taṭinī sthitāḥ
maṇḍūka matsya pramukhāḥ yoginaḥ te bhavanti kim
pārāvatāḥ śilāhārāḥ kadācid api cātakāḥ

original: na pibanti mahītoyaṃ vratinaste bhavanti kim // GarP_2,49.69 //
analyzed: na pibanti mahī toyam vratinaḥ te bhavanti kim
tasmāt nitya ādikam karma loka rañjana kārakam
mokṣasya kāraṇam sākṣāt tattva jñāna khageśvara
ṣarḍūana mahā kūpe patitāḥ paśavaḥ khaga
parama artham na jānanti paśu pāśa niyantritāḥ
veda śāstra arṇavaiḥ gheraiḥ uhyamānāḥ itas tatas
ṣaḍūrmi nigraha grastāḥ tiṣṭhanti hi ku tārkikāḥ
veda āgama purāṇa jñaḥ parama artham na vetti yaḥ
viḍambakasya tasya eva tat sarvam kāka bhāṣitam
idam jñānam idam jñeyam iti cintā samākulāḥ
paṭhanti aharniśam śāstram para tattva parāṅmukhāḥ
vākya chandaḥ nibandhena kāvya alaṅkāra śobhitāḥ
cintayā duḥkhitāḥ mūḍhāḥ tiṣṭhanti vyākula indriyāḥ

original: anyathā paramaṃ tattvaṃ janāḥ kliśyanti cānyathā /
analyzed: anyathā paramam tattvam janāḥ kliśyanti ca anyathā

original: anyathā śāstrasadbhāvo vyākhyāṃ kurvanti cānyathā // GarP_2,49.76 //
analyzed: anyathā śāstra sadbhāvaḥ vyākhyām kurvanti ca anyathā
svayam na anubhavanti ca
ahaṅkāraḥ tāḥ kecid upadeśāt iva arjitāḥ
paṭhanti veda śāstrāṇi bodhayanti parasparam

original: na jānanti paraṃ tattvaṃ darvī pākarasaṃ yathā // GarP_2,49.78 //
analyzed: na jānanti param tattvam darvī pāka rasam yathā

original: śiro vahati puṣpāṇi gandhaṃ jānāti nāsikā /
analyzed: śiraḥ vahati puṣpāṇi gandham jānāti nāsikā
paṭhanti veda śāstrāṇi durlabhaḥ bhāva bodhakaḥ
tattvam ātma stham a jñātvā mūḍhaḥ śāstreṣu muhyati

original: gopaḥ kakṣāgate cchāge kūpaṃ paśyati durmatiḥ // GarP_2,49.80 //
analyzed: gopaḥ kakṣa gate chāge kūpam paśyati durmatiḥ
saṃsāra moha nāśāya śābda bodhaḥ na hi kṣamaḥ
na nivarteta timiram kadācid dīpa vārtayā
prajñā hīnasya paṭhanam yathā andhasya ca darpaṇam

original: ataḥ prajñāvatāṃ śāstraṃ tattvajñānasya lakṣaṇam // GarP_2,49.82 //
analyzed: atas prajñāvatām śāstram tattva jñānasya lakṣaṇam
idam jñānam idam jñeyam sarvan tu śrotum icchati
divya varṣa sahasrāt ca śāstra antam na eva gacchati
anekāni ca śāstrāṇi su alpa āyuḥ vighna koṭayaḥ
tasmāt sāram vijānīyāt kṣīram haṃsaḥ iva ambhasi
abhyasya veda śāstrāṇi tattvam jñātvā atha budbhimān
palālam iva dhānya arthī sarva śāstrāṇi santyajet
yathā amṛtena tṛptasya na āhāreṇa prayojanam

original: tattvajñasya tathā tārkṣya na śāstreṇa prayojanam // GarP_2,49.86 //
analyzed: tattva jñasya tathā tārkṣya na śāstreṇa prayojanam
na veda adhyayanāt muktiḥ na śāstra paṭhanāt api

original: jñānādeva hi kaivalyaṃ nānyathā vinatātmajaḥ // GarP_2,49.87 //
analyzed: jñānāt eva hi kaivalyam na anyathā vinatā ātmajaḥ
na āśramaḥ kāraṇam mukteḥ darśanāni na kāraṇam

original: tathaiva sarvakarmāṇi jñānameva hi kāraṇam // GarP_2,49.88 //
analyzed: tathā eva sarva karmāṇi jñānam eva hi kāraṇam
mukti dāḥ guru vāc ekā vidyāḥ sarvāḥ viḍambikāḥ
śāstra bhāra sahasreṣu hi ekam sañjīvanam param
advaitam hi śivam proktam kriyayā a parivarjitam
guru vaktreṇa labhyeta na adhīta āgama koṭibhiḥ
āgama uktam viveka uttham dvidhā jñānam pracakṣate
śabdavrahma āgama mayam param brahma viveka jam
advaitam kecid icchanti dvaitam icchanti ca apare

original: samaṃ tattvaṃ na jānanti dvaitāddvaitavivarjitam // GarP_2,49.92 //
analyzed: samam tattvam na jānanti dvaitāt dvaita vivarjitam

original: dve pade bandhamokṣāya namameti mameti ca /
analyzed: dve pade bandha mokṣāya namama iti mama iti ca
mama iti badhyate jantuḥ na mama iti pramucyate

original: tatkarma yanna bandhāya sā vidyā yā vimuktidā /
analyzed: tat karma yat na bandhāya sā vidyā yā vimukti dā
āyāsāya aparam karma vidyā anyā śilpa naipuṇam
yāvat karmāṇi dīpyante yāvat saṃsāra vāsanā
yāvat indriya cāpalyam tāvat tattva kathā kutas
yāvat deha abhimānaḥ ca mamatā yāvat eva hi
yāvat prayatna vegaḥ sti yāvat saṃkalpa kalpanā
yāvat naḥ manasaḥ sthairyam na yāvat śāstra cintanam
yāvat na guru kāruṇyam tāvat tattva kathā kutas
tāvat tapaḥ vratam tīrtham japa homa arcana ādikam
veda śāstra āgama kathāḥ yāvat tattvam na vindati
tasmāt sarva prayatnena sarva avasthāsu sarvadā
tattva niṣṭhaḥ bhavet tārkṣya yadi icchet mokṣam ātmanaḥ
dharma jñāna prasūnasya svarga mokṣa phalasya ca
tāpa traya ādi santaptaḥ chāyām mokṣa taroḥ śrayet
tasmāt jñānena ātma tattvam vijñeyam śrī guroḥ mukhāt
sukhena mucyate jantuḥ ghora saṃsāra bandhanāt
tattva jñasya antimam kṛtyam śṛṇu vakṣyāmi te dhunā
yena mokṣam avāpnoti brahma nirvāṇa saṃjñakam
antakāle tu puruṣaḥ āgate gata sādhvasaḥ

original: chindyādasaṃgaśastreṇa spṛhāṃ dehe 'nu yā ca tam // GarP_2,49.103 //
analyzed: chindyāt asaṃga śastreṇa spṛhām dehe nu yā ca tam
gṛhāt pravrājitaḥ dhīraḥ puṇya tīrtha jala āplutaḥ
śucau viviktaḥ āsīnaḥ vidhivat kalpita āsane
abhyaset manasā śuddham trivṛt brahma akṣaram param
manaḥ yaṣchet jita śvāsaḥ brahma bījam a vismaran
niyacchet viṣayebhyaḥ sārathiḥ
manaḥ karmabhiḥ ākṣiptam śubha arthe dhārayet dhiyā

original: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma brahmāhaṃ paramaṃ padam /
analyzed: aham brahma param dhāma brahma aham paramam padam
evam samīkṣya ca ātmānam ātmani ādhāya niṣkale
om iti ekākṣaram brahma vyāharan mām anusmaran

original: yaḥ prayāti tyajandehaṃ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim // GarP_2,49.108 //
analyzed: yaḥ prayāti tyajan deham sa yāti paramām gatim
na yatra dāmbhikāḥ yānti jñāna vairāgya varjitāḥ

original: sudhiyastāṃ gatiṃ yānti tānahaṃ kathayāmi te // GarP_2,49.109 //
analyzed: sudhiyaḥ tām gatim yānti tān aham kathayāmi te
nirmāna mohāḥ jita saṃga doṣāḥ adhyātma nityāḥ vinivṛtta kāmāḥ

original: dvandvairvimuktāḥ sukhaduḥ khasaṃjñairgacchantyamūḍhāḥ padamavyayaṃ tat // GarP_2,49.110 //
analyzed: dvandvaiḥ vimuktāḥ sukha duḥ kha saṃjñaiḥ gacchanti amūḍhāḥ padam avyayam tat
jñāna hrade satya jale rāga dveṣa mala apahe

original: yaḥ snāti mānase tīrthe sa vai mokṣamavāpnuyāt // GarP_2,49.111 //
analyzed: yaḥ snāti mānase tīrthe sa vai mokṣam avāpnuyāt
prauḍha vairāgyam āsthāya bhajate mām an anya bhāj

original: pūrṇadṛṣṭiḥ prasannātmā sa vai mokṣamavāpnuyāt // GarP_2,49.112 //
analyzed: pūrṇa dṛṣṭiḥ prasanna ātmā sa vai mokṣam avāpnuyāt
tyaktvā gṛham ca yaḥ tīrthe nivaset maraṇa utsukaḥ

original: muktikṣetreṣu mriyate sa vai mokṣamavāpnuyāt // GarP_2,49.113 //
analyzed: mukti kṣetreṣu mriyate sa vai mokṣam avāpnuyāt

original: ayodhyā mathurā māyā kāśī kāñcī avantika /
analyzed: ayodhyā mathurā māyā kāśī kāñcī avantika

original: purī dvāravatī jñeyāḥ saptaitā mokṣadāyikāḥ // GarP_2,49.114 //
analyzed: purī dvāravatī jñeyāḥ saptā etāḥ mokṣa dāyikāḥ

original: iti te kathitaṃ tārkṣya mokṣadharmaṃ sanātanam /
analyzed: iti te kathitam tārkṣya mokṣa dharmam sanātanam
jñāna vairāgya sahitam śrutvā mokṣam avāpnuyāt

original: mokṣaṃ gacchanti tattvajñā dhārmikāḥ svargatiṃ narāḥ /
analyzed: mokṣam gacchanti tattva jñāḥ dhārmikāḥ svar gatim narāḥ

original: pāpino durgatiṃ yānti saṃsaranti khagādayaḥ // GarP_2,49.116 //
analyzed: pāpinaḥ durgatim yānti saṃsaranti khaga ādayaḥ
sūtaḥ uvāca
sva praśra uttara rāddhāntam evam bhagavataḥ mukhāt
śrutvā hṛṣṭa tanuḥ tārkṣyaḥ nanāma jagat īśvaram
sandehaḥ me mahān naṣṭaḥ bhavat vākya virocanāt

original: ityuktvā viṣṇumāmantrya sa gataḥ kaśyapāśramam // GarP_2,49.118 //
analyzed: iti uktvā viṣṇum āmantrya sa gataḥ kaśyapa āśramam

original: sadyo dehāntaraṃ yāti yathā yāti vilambataḥ /
analyzed: sadyas deha antaram yāti yathā yāti vilambataḥ
anayoḥ ubhayoḥ ca eva na virodhaḥ tathā eva vaḥ
sarvam ākhyātavān tāta śrutaḥ bhagavataḥ yathā

original: mārīco 'pi mudaṃ lebhe śrutvā vākyaṃ ramāpateḥ // GarP_2,49.120 //
analyzed: mārīcaḥ pi mudam lebhe śrutvā vākyam ramāpateḥ
apākṛtaḥ tu sandehaḥ brāhmaṇāḥ bhavatām mayā
uktam suparṇa saṃjñam tu purāṇam parama adbhutam
idam āpa hareḥ tārkṣyaḥ tārkṣyāt āpa tatas bhṛguḥ
bhṛgoḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ saṃprāpa vāmadevaḥ tatas punar
parāśara muniḥ prāpa tasmāt vyāsaḥ tatas hi aham

original: mayā tu bhavatāṃ proktaṃ paraṃ guhyaṃ hareridam // GarP_2,49.123 //
analyzed: mayā tu bhavatām proktam param guhyam hareḥ idam

original: ya idaṃ śṛṇuyānmartyo yo vāpyabhidadhāti ca /
analyzed: yaḥ idam śṛṇuyāt martyaḥ yaḥ vā api abhidadhāti ca

original: ihāmutra ca loke sa sarvatra sukhamāpnuyāt // GarP_2,49.124 //
analyzed: iha amutra ca loke sa sarvatra sukham āpnuyāt
vrajataḥ saṃyamanyām yat duḥkham atra nirūpitam

original: asya śravaṇataḥ puṇyaṃ tanmukto jāyate tataḥ // GarP_2,49.125 //
analyzed: asya śravaṇataḥ puṇyam tad muktaḥ jāyate tatas
atra ukta karma pāka ādi śravaṇāt ca nṛṇām iha
vairāgyam āvahet yasmāt tasmāt śrotavyam eva ca

original: bhajata jitahṛṣīkāḥ kṛṣṇamenaṃ munīśaṃ samajani bata yasmādgīḥ sudhāsāradhārā /
analyzed: bhajata jita hṛṣīkāḥ kṛṣṇam enam muni īśam samajani bata yasmāt gīḥ sudhā sāra dhārā

original: pṛṣatamapi yadīyaṃ varṇarūpaṃ nipīya śrutipuṭaculukena prāpnuyādātmanaikyam // GarP_2,49.127 //
analyzed: pṛṣatam api yadi iyam varṇa rūpam nipīya śruti puṭa culukena prāpnuyāt ātmanā aikyam
vyāsaḥ uvāca
iti sūta mukha udgīrṇām sarva śāstra artha maṇḍitām
vaiṣṇavīm vāc sudhām pītvā ṛṣayaḥ tuṣṭim āyayuḥ
praśaśaṃsuḥ tathā anyonyam sūtam sarva artha darśinam
praharṣam atulam prāpuḥ munayaḥ śaunaka ādayaḥ
iti hari vacanāni sūta vācā khaga pati saṃśaya bhedakāni yāni

original: sa munirapi niśamya śaunakendro bahutaramānayati sma cātmani svam // GarP_2,49.130 //
analyzed: sa muniḥ api niśamya śaunaka indraḥ bahutaram ānayati sma ca ātmani svam
apūjayan te munayaḥ tadānīm udākhāgbhiḥ muhur eva sūtam
dhanyaḥ si sūta tvam iha iti udairayan vyasarjayan tam ca nivartite dhvare
purāṇam gāruḍam puṇyam pavitram pāpa nāśanam

original: śṛṇvatāṃ kāmanāpūraṃ śrotavyaṃ sarvadaiva hi // GarP_2,49.132 //
analyzed: śṛṇvatām kāmanā pūram śrotavyam sarvadā eva hi
śrutvā dānāni deyāni vācakāya akhilāni ca
pūrva ukta śayana ādīni na anyathā saphalam bhavet
purāṇam pūjayet pūrvam vācakam tad anantaram
vastra alaṅkāra godānaiḥ dakṣiṇābhiḥ ca sādaram
anna dānaiḥ hema dānaiḥ bhami dānaiḥ ca bhūribhiḥ
pūjayet vācakam bhaktyā bahu puṇya phala āptaye
yaḥ ca idam śṛṇuyāt martyaḥ yathā api parikīrtayet

original: vihāya yātanāṃ ghorāṃ dhūtapāpo divaṃ vrajet // GarP_2,49.136 //
analyzed: vihāya yātanām ghorām dhūta pāpaḥ divam vrajet

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe mokṣopāyanirūpaṇaṃ nāmaikonapañcāśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttara khaṇḍe śrī kṛṣṇa garuḍa saṃvāde dvitīya aṃśe dharma kāṇḍe pretakalpe mokṣopāyanirūpaṇam nāma ekonapañcāśattamaḥ dhyāyaḥ

original: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe dvitīyo dharmakāṇḍaḥ samāptaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī gāruḍe mahāpurāṇe dvitīyaḥ dharmakāṇḍaḥ samāptaḥ
